[\[21b.7\]]blangs na don du gnyer ba la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o zhes dam bcas te/_de bas na ji srid du mi'i bdag po de'i mgo bo su zhig slong bar mi byed pa de srid du du ma rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi mgo bo rnams bzo bo rnams la byed du gzhug go snyam mo/_/de rnams nyid kyis kyang mgo bo slong
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]ba su zhig la phyi rol nyid du so sor mchod nas gtang bar bya zhes te/_sa skyong bas ni sa 'di na/_/dbang po skyong byed skyong byed cing /_/yun ring byas bdag nyid 'tsho zhing /_/skye bo ma lus gso bar byed/_/de nas zla ba chen po blon po rnams kyi gtso bos rin po che'i rang
[\[22a.2\]]bzhin gyi mgo rnams byed du bcug ste/_phyi rol nyid du slong ba pa'i skye bo rnams la gang gis don grub ces bya ba rnam par spyod cing 'dug go/_/de nas spos ngad ldang ba'i ril spra'i gdong can skra dang sma ra yongs su smin pa/_ma byas pa'i khro gnyer byas pa 'dra ba/_sdong dum tshig pa
[\[22a.3\]]ltar dkar ba ma yin pa dang pags pa rtsub pa dang ldan pa dang /_'gro ba la srin bu pad+ma ltar 'khyog pa dang rags pa'i rtsa'i dra bas mi mnyam pa'i byin pa dang brla dang lag pa dang ldan pa dang /_sbrul ltar rang bzhin gyis drag pa/_drag po'i mig can zhes bya ba'i bram ze so sor gnas par
[\[22a.4\]]gyur to/_/de la bsam pa kun nas byung ste/_zla 'od ces bya ba'i rgyal po thams cad gtong ba ste/_de bas na re zhig 'gro bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal po de la mgo bo blangs pas dam bca' don med par bya'o snyam mo/_/mgo bo rab tu sbyin pa'i nus pa su zhig ces bya ba la yod pa zhes bya ba rnam
[\[22a.5\]]par bsams nas/_/rim gyis bzang po'i brag tu 'ongs par gyur to/_/de nas sa 'dzin bcas pa rnam g.yos te/_/yang dang yang du rgya mtsho 'khrug pa'i sa/_/chu bo'i chu ni gang ba rnyog pa can/_/bskyod pa'i nya rnams kyis ni g.yos pa'i bar/_/nyi zla dag ni rnam par mdzes mi
[\[22a.6\]]'gyur/_/rdul gyis 'od med me long rnam pa can/_/phyogs rnams kun nas dri ma can gyur te/_/bdag po myang ba byas pa dang ni 'dra/_/dus ma yin pa yal ga can rnams las/_/me tog sngo skya ge sar can 'byung ste/_/rdul tshogs 'byung ba'i rlung rnams ldang ba ni/_/gtsug phud
[\[22a.7\]]cha yis rjes su 'gro ba ltar/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu dang bcas sa 'byung ste/_/dri bcas rid pa'i skye bos khyab cing khyab/_/mtshan mo kun nas dud pa'i skar ma can/_/nub dang nye bar song ba'i zla ba bzhin/_/nags kyi bdag po rnams kyang rtswa 'jam pa/_/ba rnams 'o ma skad cig gis zad
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]'gyur/_/gtsang bar gyur kyang zhugs pa'i sreg blugs can/_/mchod sbyin byed pa'i me ni de mi 'bar/_/de nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshan ma ngan pa mthong nas bzang po'i brag la gnas pa'i skye bos 'di ni ci zhig ces bya ba kun nas dogs par byed cing kun nas g.yeng ba dang bcas pas
[\[22b.2\]]'gro bar gyur to/_/der ni gang zhig shin tu mkhas pa de rnams rgyal po'i brlag pa nye bar rtogs par gyur pa yid mi bde bar gyur nas 'di ltar smras par gyur to/_/dka' ba sdug bsngal las skyes pa/_/sa skyong 'di la ma gyur cig_/gang gi dpung pa'i grib ma la/_/brten nas lus
[\[22b.3\]]can bde bar nyal/_/de nas mchi ma dang bcas pa'i/_/mig dang ldan pa'i grong khyer gyi lha mos blon po zla ba chen po la/_drag po'i mig can zhes bya ba'i bram ze 'di rgyal po 'di'i dbu slong ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ste/_de bas na thabs gang gis kyang 'di bzlog par mdzod cig ces smra
[\[22b.4\]]zhing 'dug go/_/de nas blon pos rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi mgo de rnams spungs te/_bram ze chen po gang gis khyed kyi don 'grub pa de bdag nyid kyis don bsgrub par bya yis khyod kyis rgyal po mthong bas dgos pa ci zhig yod ces drag po'i mig can la smras so/_/gal te nor ni chung ba'i
[\[22b.5\]]skyes bu las kyang ni/_/'dod pa rnyed 'gyur de phyir nor mang bas ni ci zhig bya/_/gal te glang chen gom pa tsam ni brkos pa'i chus/_/skom pa sel na rgya mtshos dgos pa ci zhig smros/_/bram zes smras pa/_rags pa'i 'o ma'i nu 'jing ldan zhing sprin dkar ltar ni 'od ldan pa rnams be'u bcas
[\[22b.6\]]mi 'dod de/_/cung zad rna ba g.yo ba skor ba'i bung ba'i tshogs myos pa yi glang po'i dbang po rnams mi 'dod/_/rgyan yang gsal ba gsal ba'i 'od zer ldan pa'i nor bu rnams dang gos kyang khyad par can mi 'dod/_/'di ni thams cad ster ba zhes bya de phyir bdag ni sa skyong 'di las
[\[22b.7\]]mgo bo slong bar 'dod/_/blon pos smras pa/_dam pa rin chen rang bzhin mgo bo 'di rnams ni/_/dad pa rtse gcig pas ni bdag gis khyed la 'bul/_/gal te 'di rnams kyis ni khyed la don med na/_/da lta nyid du bdag gi mgo bo khyer bar mdzod/_/rje bo'i don du srog 'dzin pa'i/_/
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]'bangs kyi don ni bstan 'gyur ba/_/de yi don du 'grub gyur pa/_/gal te de rnams don byas nyid/_/bram zes smras pa/_yang dang yang du smras pa 'dis ci zhig bya/_/mngon spyod kyi las la sa'i bdag po'i mgo bos bdag la dgos pa yod do/_/de nas rgyal po zla
[\[23a.2\]]'od lha'i mig gis mgo bo slong ba po de phyi rol na gnas pa mthong nas langs te dga' ba'i grogs po dang 'dra bar blon po'i gtso bo de la smras pa/_mang pos smras pas chog ste don du gnyer bar ma byas pas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal ba'i phyir zam par gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams
[\[23a.3\]]kyi don du gnyer ba rnams te/_pha rol ring zhing rgal dka' ba/_/rgya mtsho rgal bar 'dod pa las/_/gang zhig 'brel ba'i gru gcog pa/_/de ni ji ltar grogs por brjod/_/de nas chos la grogs gyur pa'i/_/skyes bu chos kyi rjes 'jug la/_/spro ba nyid du bya ba ste/_/chos
[\[23a.4\]]kyi gegs ni mi rigs so/_/gal te don gnyer 'di lta bu/_/thar pa'i rgyu ni med gyur na/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa 'di/_/byang chub sems dpas ji ltar rdzogs/_/de ltar bla_ngas te ral gri blangs/_/mi bdag 'dis ni bram ze la/_/bram ze bdag gi mgo chod cig_/ces bya sdug
[\[23a.5\]]bsngal med par smras/_/bram ze gang du sems ni snying rje med pa gang du ste/_/gtum po dang ni yang dag 'brel pa lta bu bdag 'dis zhes/_/mchod phyir thogs pas yun ring por ni rnam bsams nas/_/bram ze'i brang la ngo tsha dang bcas 'dra bar gnas par gyur/_/de nas bram ze
[\[23a.6\]]des smras pa/_/blon po dang grogs po dang gnyen 'dun gyi skye bos yongs su bskor bar byas pas khyed la bdag gcig pus mgo gcod par nus pa ma yin te/_/de bas na khyed gcig pu 'dug par 'os so zhes zer ro/_/de nas rgyal po des mna' dang bcas par sdug bsngal gyi chus
[\[23a.7\]]kun nas gdungs pa'i mig dang ldan pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de bzlog nas ral gri'i lag pa can gyi bram ze de dang rjes su 'gro bar gyur pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal du song bar gyur to/_/de nas blon po zla ba chen pos 'di ltar smre sngags kyis kun nas bslang ba'i yi ge
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]smras pa/_kye ma mi yi bdag po mgo bo med pa ni/_/de ring su zhig gis ni nges par lta bar nus/_/mchod sbyin byed pa'i nus pa nye bar nyams pa ni/_/mchod sbyin srin po rnams kyis nye bar nyams pa ltar/_/sa ni skyod ba med par de ring grong khyer 'dir/_/shin tu phongs par rnam par
[\[23b.2\]]snang ba nyid 'gyur te/_/bud ba'i tshogs kyis bskor bas khyab pa'i chu nas ni/_/glang por nams kyis pad+ma rgyas pa 'don pa ltar/_/de bas ji srid mi yi bdag po 'di ni shi ba ma thos par/_/de srid thog ma nyid du bdag gi srog 'di btang bar bgyi/_/de ltar rnam par bsams nas ting
[\[23b.3\]]'dzin stobs kyi blo ldan de/_/rang lus rnam par spangs nas rang 'byung 'gro ba nyid du gyur/_/skyes bu de nyid don byas bde ba yang dag thob nas ni/_/zla ba'i 'od ltar dkar ba'i las ni 'gro la gsal byas nas/_/grogs po rnams la rgud pa chen po thob par blta byas te/_/gang zhig
[\[23b.4\]]thog ma nyid du lus kyi 'jig pa thob par gyur/_/de nas rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal du zhugs pa'i rgya la po la de'i btsun mo'i 'khor du 'o dod 'bod pa'i sgra chen po kun nas byung bar gyur to/_/skyed mos tshal der zhugs nas bram ze des rgyal po la smras pa/_/gson pa'i
[\[23b.5\]]gzugs de ltar gnas pa'i khyed kyi mgrin pa la bdag gis ral gri rdeg par nus pa ma yin no/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bram ze de bas na rtag tu me tog 'byung ba'i tsam pa ka'i shing 'di la bdag bcing bar gyis shig_/bram ze des kyang de ltar byas par gyur to/_/de nas skyed mos tshal
[\[23b.6\]]na gnas pa'i lha mo rnams drag po'i las can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'gro ba'i gnyen du gyur pa yi/_/sa yi bdag po 'di yi ni/_/mgrin par rno ba'i ral gri yis/_/ji ltar sdig can khyod rdeg byed/_/rgyu mtshan med pa'i drag po nyid kyis rtsub pa'i yid/_/khyod ni gal te sa yi
[\[23b.7\]]bdag po'i mgo gcod na/_/me stag 'phro bar byed pa'i thog gis khyed kyi yang /_/mgo 'di bdag cag rnams kyis khyad par du brlag bgyi/_/de nas rgyal po des nags kyi lha mo rab tu myos pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas par 'di ltar bzlog cing 'dug go/_/bdag bla na med pa yang
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar 'dod pa la khyed cag rnams kyis bar chad chen po bya bar ni mi rigs te/_gang gi phyir rjes su yi rang bas ni bsod nams thob par 'gyur ro/_/'di las gzhan du na dge ba'i phyogs nyams pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/don gnyer
[\[24a.2\]]slong bzhin pa rnams la/_/bdag gis mgo rnams sngon yang byin/_/mgo bo 'dis ni gzhan rnams kyi/_/stong phrag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas lha mo de rnams gnas de nas log par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po des 'di ltar smon lam
[\[24a.3\]]btab ste/_/'jig rten yun ring ngo mtshar skyed byed pa'i/_/mgo bo byin pa 'di las dge ba gang /_/byang chub thob nas des ni zhi ba gang /_/phra rab rdul ldan dbang po bdag la shog_/bzang po'i brag ces bya ba'i grong khyer 'di nyid dang /_/bdag gis gang la mgo bo rnams ni byin
[\[24a.4\]]pa ste/_/yid ni mngon par dga' ba'i gnas der mchod rten ni/_/chen po lus 'dzin rnams la phan pa'i don gyur cig_/de ltar smon lam btab pa'i sa bdag nyid kyi ni/_/snying rje 'jam pa'i sems dang ldan la snying rje med pa des/_/lto 'phye'i 'od dang 'dra ba'i 'od ldan ral gris
[\[24a.5\]]glo bur du/_/zhal gyi 'dam skyes pad+ma bzhin du gcod par gyur/_/de nas skad cig gis ni sa'i bdag po'i mgo bo gcod pa la/_/me tog kha bye mchi ma'i thigs pa dor bas rjes 'brel pa/_/rlung gis bskyod pa'i rang 'dab lag pa rnams kyis bdag nyid la/_/lcug ma gzhon nu ma rnams
[\[24a.6\]]rang dbang med par brdung bar gyur pa bzhin/_/rlung gis rnu ba bskor ba'i ma lus 'byed pa ni/_/rlung gis rnam 'khrugs rlabs kyi lag pas pad gdong g.yo byas pa'i/_/skyed mos tshal der pad+mo'i bud med rnams kyi tshogs byung ba/_/rkang pa drug pa'i skad kyis mya ngan dang bcas bzhin du
[\[24a.7\]]gyur/_/sgra sgrogs rgya mtsho'i chu yi rnam 'gyur can/_/sa ni g.yo bar gyur cing lha rnams kyang ni ngo mtshar gyur/_/nam mkha' sa dang phyogs rnams ngos la dri zhim bsgos byas pa'i/_/man dar ba'i char ni sa bdag lus la 'bab par gyur/_/rgyal po 'jig rten pha rol song bar gyur na
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]rgyal po'i khab/_/dpal med skye bo mang pos khyab pa mdzes par mi 'gyur ro/_/sgra med pa dang g.yo med chu skyar dang ni ngang pa can/_/nyin mor byed pa nub par gyur pa la ni pad+ma ltar/_/de nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten sa skyong gshegs par gyur pa de la ni/_/rgya mtsho'i chu yi rlabs bskyed
[\[24b.2\]]pas ni skad med pa yi sdug bsngal shugs ldan pa/_/sa ni du ba ltar ni mthon po rnams la ring por 'dzeg byas nas/_/ser skya dang ni dkar po'i 'od ldan ri rab gangs kyi dpung pa can/_/bram ze des kyang de'i mgo bo'i skra la yang dag par bzung nas skyed mos tshal de las phyir 'byung
[\[24b.3\]]bar brtsams so/_/de nas bzang po'i brag la gnas pa'i skye bos mya ngan gyi dbang gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/mi skyong seng ge'i khri la gnas pa'i 'bangs rnams kyis/_/dga' ba skyes pa'i gdong gis ji ltar mthong ba ni/_/mtsho las skyes pa rnying pa lta bu'i mgo bo de/_/bram zes
[\[24b.4\]]skra nas bzung nas khyer ba nyid du gyur/_/gzhan yang gang zhig shar gyi ri bor yang dag gnas pa'i ri bong can gyi mdzes chen 'dzin byed cing /_/glang po mchog gi rgyab gnas gyen lta'i gdong can rgyal po rnams kyis gus pa dang bcas mthong /_mgo bo bcad pas rnam par 'gro ba'i
[\[24b.5\]]'thug pa'i khrag gis brang gi steng ni nyer gos pa/_/'og tu blta zhing bskor ba'i khri rnams kyi ni sa yi bdag po 'ding ba kun nas lta ba'o/_/blon po skyabs med du zhing shin tu che ba'i sreg pa'i sar/_/ga pur dang ni tsan dan du ru ska yi shing ldan byas nas ni/_/mi yi bdag po der ni bcug
[\[24b.6\]]nas rlung yang rlung gis ni/_/sreg blugs 'dzin pas gsang sngags kyis ni bsnun pas 'bar zhing 'byung /_/de nas 'bar bzhin pas sreg pa mthong nas smre sngags 'don par gyur pa'i skye bo'i tshogs des 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ma bcom ldan 'das ma mi rtag pa zhes bya ba
[\[24b.7\]]khyad par med pa ste/_/dal zhing so yi rnam par byugs pa sngar ni ri bong 'dzin pa'i mdzes pa 'phrog par byed pa'o/_/gang zhig bud med rnams kyi sor mo'i ze'u 'bru gi wang 'dzin pa rnams kyis reg pa ni/_/de yi lha yi dbang po'i rgyal mtshan lhung ba dang 'dra zhi ba la ni dmigs
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]par byed pa yi/_/g.yo ba'i sbyin sreg 'bar ba'i sor mo rnams kyis rgyal po'i lus ni kun nas sreg par byed/_/de ltar smre sngags bton nas skye bo'i tshogs de mya ngan gyis 'khrug pa'i yid can gyis rang rang gi gnas su song bar gyur to/_/de ltar na rang gi mgo
[\[25a.2\]]bo yongs su gtong ba la yang yid mi g.yo bas byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad do zhes bya ba rnam par bsams nas byang chub 'dod pa gzhan gyis kyang gtong ba la rtse gcig pa'i dam pas gnas par bya zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi skyes rabs 'di/_/dgra bcom
[\[25a.3\]]rnams la mchod bya'i mchog/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po'i rgyun/_/rgyal bar mdzad pa nyid kyis gsungs/_/de tshe zla 'od ces bya ba'i/_/sa yi bdag por bdag gyur te/_/shA ri'i bu ni blon por gyur/_/bram ze de nyid lha sbyin no/_/zla 'od kyi skyes pa'i rabs te skyes pa'i rabs
[\[25a.4\]]lnga pa'o//_//byang chub sems dpas bud med nyid dus na'ang /_/rang lus las ni sha ni bcad cing byin/_/gzhan don nus pa'i mi yi lus nyid la/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa stobs ldan smos ci dgos/_/'di ltar rjes su thos te/_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skyed mos tshal
[\[25a.5\]]sngo bas mthar thug par byas pa/_nor sbyin dang 'dra bar gyur pa'i tshong pa'i skye bos yongs su gang ba'i tshong 'dus kyi lam dang ldan pa/_dri za'i yul la dkar po gtso bor gyur pa/_sa la rgyan dang 'dra ba ut+pa la dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rgyal po'i pho brang gang zhig rdzogs pa dang ldan pa zhes
[\[25a.6\]]bya ba da ltar yang grags par gyur pa'o/_/de la lang tsho dang pos nye bar bsags bzhin pa'i mdzes pa'i rang gi sa la lha mo dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gzugs ldan ma zhes bya ba'i bud med byung bar gyur te/_nye bar zhi ba nyid kyis gzhan la phan pa ni/_/grub par byed dang yid
[\[25a.7\]]kyang gsal bar byed nyid kyis/_/skye bo rnams la shin tu ngo mtshar byed 'gyur ba/_/de ni snying rjes gzugs dang ldan pa 'dra bar snang /_/de nas dus gcig gi tshe yul der dge ba'i rtsa bzad pas mdzod dang bang mdzod kun nas zad pa mthong nas kun nas phongs pa'i skye ba dang ldan pa
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]la skya rengs kyi kha lo sgyur ba'i 'od zer rnams kyi tsha bas lhag ma dang bcas pa'i kha ba can ri'i kha ba rnam par zhu ba dang /_kha ba med pa nyid kyis chu bo kun gyi chu kun nas skams pa dang /_chu med pa nyid kyis zhing pa rnams kun nas rnyings pa de mthong nas zhing pa'i skye bo yid mi bde ba dang /_don du gnyer
[\[25b.2\]]ba rnams kyi yid kyi re ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /_shin tu stobs chung ba'i ba glang rdzi rnams kyis rjes su 'gro bzhin pa'i shi ba lhag ma'i ba glang gi tshogs dang ldan pa/_kha zas la rtse gcig pa'i dbul po'i skye bo dang ldan pa/_dam pa ma yin pa'i skye bos 'brel ba dang 'dra bar gnod pa
[\[25b.3\]]byed pa'i mu ge shin tu che ba byung bar gyur to/_/yid 'ong nu ma'i rdeg po nub gyur pa/_/gtsang ba'i gser gyi bum pa dang 'dra ba'i/_/kha zas med pa'i bud med rnams kyis ni/_/so 'dzin lci ba sra ba nyid ni dor/_/bde ba yongs su dman pa 'dzin par byed bzhin pas/_/lhag pa dpung
[\[25b.4\]]pa'i yal ga rnams la sra ba nyid/_/yongs su phongs pa'i mig can bud med rnams kyi ni/_/gdu bu rnams ni lhod pa nyid du kun nas 'gyur/_/kun nas yegs pa'i skra rnams kyis ni khyab gyur pa/_/mtshan mo zad pas ri bong mtshan ltar 'od med cing /_/smin ma sgeg pa'i rgod pa 'byung ba rnam
[\[25b.5\]]bral ba/_/bud med rnams kyi gdong pa rnams ni byung bar gyur/_/khyim gyi nang du 'dag pas nye bar byugs nas ni/_/bza' ba rnying pa byis pa la ni sbyin byas nas/_/khyim bdag mo ni rang gis de ltar gdung ba min/_/khyim bdag lam gyis bkres ldan mthong nas 'dzin mi 'gyur/_/be'u shi
[\[25b.6\]]ba nyid kyis rtswa yi bza' ba 'dor ba ni/_/skad 'don pas ni g.yo bar gyur pa'i lkog shal ldan/_/nags nas bdag po'i khyim du 'ongs pa'i ba nyid ni/_/lhag par mchi ma dang bcas mig ldan byed par gyur/_/rim gyis kun nas stobs chung nyid du song ba yi/_/rtswa za med pa nyid kyis rim gyis
[\[25b.7\]]'gro rnams kyi/_/lhag par lhod pa nyid du song bar gyur pa ste/_/ba rnams nu 'jing rnams la 'o ma zad par gyur/_/kun nas stobs ni chung ba dman pa cung zad mthong nas ni/_/mjug ma'i rtsa ba la ni nye bar dmigs nas kun 'khrugs pa/_/rnam pa gang gis kyang ni rung ba'i tshig la gsal ba ni/_/
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]phyugs rdzis rgas shing yan lag rid pa'i ba ni bslang bar gyur/_/bza' dang btung ba zad pas ba glang nor ni shi ba yang /_/gos ni rnying ba gon pas lus po skya ba dang ldan pa/_/skye bo gnas pas nye bar nyams pa'i yul phyogs de la ni/_/khyim las phyi rol byung ba'i
[\[26a.2\]]don du nus par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzugs ldan mas khyim 'ga' zhig tu bud med gang zhig mngal phyir byung ba'i dbang gis shin tu lhag par rab tu 'bar zhing dregs pa'i mes gdung bar byas pa'i lus can 'gram pa dang mig dang lto ba shin tu zhom pa'i khung bu can rtsib ma'i phreng
[\[26a.3\]]ba mngon par gsal ba/_shin tu dri ma can gyi gos rul gyis yan lag g.yogs pa/_bdag nyid la mnyes gshin pa'i gus pas bu la chags pa dang bral ba'i bud med su zhig bu de nyid za bar 'dod pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang sring mo shin tu drag pa'i las 'di khyed byed par 'dod dam
[\[26a.4\]]zhes bya ba de la smras so/_/bud med de yang 'di ltar bsams te gzugs ldan ma zhes bya ba 'di ni sbyin pa'i ngang tshul can la snying rje dang ldan pa ste/_/de bas na gal te bdag gis 'di la bya ba 'di smras par gyur na nges par 'di bdag la bkres pa'i gnyen po byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba rnam
[\[26a.5\]]par bsams nas smras pa/_sring mo bdag shin tu mngal byung bas mngon par 'phel ba'i bkres pa'i mes kun tu song ba'i lus dang ldan pa ste/_de bas na bu chung 'di za bar 'dod do zhes bya ba'o/_/brang skyes zhes bya'i bu chung 'di/_/sdang bar byed pa ltar mthong zhing /_/bdag cag
[\[26a.6\]]sems can rnams la ni/_/chos dang chos min dag mi mthong /_/de nas gzugs ldan ma snying rje skyes par gyur pa'i mchi mas gang bar gyur pa'i mig gi ut+pa la dang ldan pa des bud med la 'di skad ces smras so/_/snying rje dang bcas ngus pa tsam gyis rnam mthong ba'i/_/sdug bsngal
[\[26a.7\]]can 'di khyim pa'i skra yis khyab pa ni/_/ri dgas phru gu ltar ni yid 'phrog mig ldan pa'i/_/snying rje med ma khyod ni byis pa ji ltar za bar byed/_/myur du 'gro bas rab bskyod mtho ba'i gtsug phud can/_/sa yi rdul gyis mig gi rdzi ma rtsub gyur pa'i/_/byis pa gzhan gyi bu la yang
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]ni 'jam sems pa/_/bud med rnams la byams pa nyid ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rgod pas rnam par 'phro byas pa yi mchu yi 'dab ma can/_/khyad par byas pa shin tu rgya che'i mig dang ldan/_/zur chag smra bas khyab pa ji ltar 'di la ni/_/bu yi gdong pa blta ba'i don du ci yi phyir mi
[\[26b.2\]]nus/_/rta yi 'gros kyi lad mo byis pa'i phyir ni byed bzhin pa/_/dbyug pa'i rta la gnas pa dri can gtsug phud kyis khyab pa/_/rgod pas 'phro ba'i so yi phreng ba 'khyog cing mdzes ldan pa/_/bud med su zhig bu ni blta ba'i phyir ni 'dod ma yin/_/mchu gnyis phye ba dga' bas kun
[\[26b.3\]]nas lta bar gyur pa ni/_/kha zas za bar 'dod pas rtsub pa'i sgra ni sgrogs byed pa/_/khwa ta mo ni bkres pas yongs su gdung yang phru gu ni/_/rjes 'gro 'bad pas gson bud med dam pas spos ci dgos/_/gzhan yang brgya lam na skye bos 'di thos nas sha za mo ltar khro ba'i dbang gis
[\[26b.4\]]'di bu gsod pa zhes bya ba yin pas yul phyogs 'di nas skrod par byed do/_/de bas na 'di ma brtsams pa las yid skyo bar gyis shig ces bya ba'o/_/stag mos ri dgas phru gu ltar/_/bu chung 'di ni bza' byas nas/_/ri dgas sdig can rab 'bar 'di/_/lcags kyi ri lu za bar
[\[26b.5\]]byed/_/des smras pa/_sring mo ji ltar bya ste gang gi phyir yan lag thams cad nas byung ba'i bkres pa'i me 'di bzod par mi nus so zhes zer ro/_/de nas gzugs ldan ma 'di ltar bsam par byed de/_/gal te bdag byis pa blangs nas 'gro bar gyur pa na de'i tshe nges par 'di srog dang
[\[26b.6\]]bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'on te 'di la bkres pa zhi ba'i don du bza' ba shin tu ring po nas blangs par gyur na de nas 'dis bu 'di srog dang bral bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/dus las 'das pa 'bras bu med pa'i las byed cing /_/rmongs pas 'jig rten spyod pa nyid du ngal bar 'gro/_/dro ba'i
[\[26b.7\]]'od zer ji srid du ni nub mi 'gyur/_/de srid nyid du nyi ma skyong ba gzung bar rigs/_/de nas 'dir dus la bab pas rang gi sha rnams kyis 'di ni tshim par bgyi zhes zer ro/_/sdig can snying po med 'di yi/_/lus las snying po blang bya ste/_/chu klung gis zos rtsa 'gul ba'i/_/'gram
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]gyi shing las 'bras bu bzhin/_/de nas bud med des slar smras pa/_/sring mo song shig dang khyod kyi drung du bdag gis byis pa 'di bag med par byed mi nus so/_/de nas gzugs ldan mas de la smras pa/_/gal te khyod la 'dir mtshon cha cung zad yod na re zhig long shig_/_
[\[27a.2\]]des kyang gzugs ldan ma la mtshon cha gtad cing 'dug go/_/de nas gzugs ldan mas ni rang gi lus kyi sdug bsngal ma bsams shing /_/gser gyi bum pa'i rnam pa can gyi nu ma gnyis bcad nas/_/mtshon cha shin tu rnon po des ni khrag ni 'bab byed pa/_/bkres pas nye bar gdungs
[\[27a.3\]]pa'i bud med de la byin par gyur/_/bdag gis sdug bsngal ltos med par/_/srog chags rnams kyi sdug bsngal sel/_/gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis gnod de/_/gang phyir rang sdug bsngal gyis min/_/nu ma gnyis po de yang bud med de la byin nas gzugs ldan ma rang gi khyim
[\[27a.4\]]gyi nang du rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/nu ma gnyis bcad rnam par 'dzag pa'i khrag gis ni/_/mu tig har dang gos dang skye rags bcings ba gos/_/gzugs ni bzang ba tsan dan dmar pos gos pa la/_/gser gyi sku gzugs 'dra ba'i bud med de byung gyur/_/de nas gzugs
[\[27a.5\]]ldan ma la khyim thab kyis ngo mtshar ba dang bcas pas stan las langs te dris ba/_khyed la dge ba 'di gang gis/_/mdzes ma dge ba med pas ni/_/lus la sha za bzhin du yang /_/'o ma 'dzin dag bcad par byas/_/des kyang gtam de khyim thab la brjod pa/_/'phags pa'i bus
[\[27a.6\]]mngal byung bas mngon par 'phel ba'i bkres pa'i me dang ldan pa'i bud med de la myur du bza' ba dang btung ba sbyin par 'os zhes slar smras so/_/gzugs ldan ma'i khyim thab des kyang ngo mtshar ba'i yid dang ldan pas de ltar bya zhes brjod nas/_snying rje'i snod du gyur pa yi/_/des smras
[\[27a.7\]]la la shin tu zhim/_/snod kun nas 'byung za ba ni/_/phongs pa'i bud med de la byin/_/de nas skye bo'i tshogs des ni/_/gzugs ldan ma yi ngo mtshar de/_/mthong nas yud tsam ngo mtshar bas/_/sor mo'i 'dab ma bskyod cing 'dug_/'jig rten 'di yang de la smras/_/khyod kyi phrin las 'di yis
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]ni/_/ser sna can gyi sems kyang ni/_/nges par gtong la rab spro byas/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa gang /_/byang chub 'dod rnams kyis thos 'di/_/'jig rten phan phyir de ni khyod/_/ngas par gzugs dang ldan par gnas/_/bud med nyid ni gang du blo rno 'di gang du/_/gtong ba 'di ni gang
[\[27b.2\]]du 'jam nyid 'di gang du/_/dam pa 'di yis kun nas gtong ba sngon 'gro ba'i/_/gtong bas gtong ba dang ldan gzhan dag ngo tshar byas/_/de nas gzugs ldan ma'i khyim thab des bden ba'i byin rlabs 'di ltar byas par gyur to/_/ji ltar skyes pa gzhan gyi yang /_/sbyin pa 'di 'dra mi thos
[\[27b.3\]]pa/_/de ltar myur du bden pa des/_/bdag gi nu med nu 'byung shog_/bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byed pa'i/_/de ltar khyim bdag des smras pa/_/nu ma'i khur gyis mi nus pa/_/de yi brang la slar skyes gyur/_/sbyin pa'i chu yis 'jig rten skom pa sel byed cing /_/so yi 'od zer ze
[\[27b.4\]]'brus yid 'phrog zhal gyi pad+ma can/_/grong khyer de la lci ba'i nu 'jing gi ni ngang skya can/_/gzugs ldan ma ni slar yang pad+mo kun nas snang bar gyur/_/de nas lha'i bdag pos 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi gtong ba las lhag par gyur pa'i gtong ba 'dis gzugs ldan ma bdag lha'i grong khyer
[\[27b.5\]]las lhung bar byas nas rang nyid kyi bdag po nyid byed 'dod par slar ci zhig 'gyur ram zhes bya ba rnam par bsams nas/_dogs pa dang bcas pa'i yid dang ldan pas dgongs pa de'i shes par 'dod bzhin pas/_/rab tu brgyad bar byas pa'i chu 'dzin pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu sngo ba'i bar snang la
[\[27b.6\]]'dug ste/_ut+pa la dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs nas pad+ma'i sdong po'i skud pa ltar dkar ba'i mchod phyir thogs kyis brang gi dbus su mngon par brgyan par byas pa dang ldan pa dang /_mgrin par btags pa'i phreng ba dang ldan pa dang /_/bud med kyi mig dang 'dres pa ltar/_khri snyan sa
[\[27b.7\]]le nag po'i pags pa phug pa'i phyogs su bkal bar byas pa/_lag pa g.yas pas shing lo'i thum bu gnyis thogs pa/_bram ze gnyis skyes kyi gzugs mngon par sprul nas slong mo don du gnyer ba zhes bya ba gzugs ldan ma'i khyim du phyin par gyur to/_/de nas gzugs ldan
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]mas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bza' ston blangs nas bram ze gnyis skyes kyi brgya byin la byin no/_/gnas skabs la bab pa sngon du 'gro bar/_lha yi bdag pos 'di la smras/_/khyed kyis nu ma yongs btang bas/_/kun nas 'byung zhing khyab pa ni/_/bcag pa'i dung
[\[28a.2\]]ltar dkar ba yi/_/grags pas 'gro ba brgyan par byas/_/dka' thub 'dis ni ci zhig khyod/_/lha yi dbang po'i gnas 'dod dam/_/bzang mo ngo mtshar dbang gis khyod/_/nyid la bdag ni 'dri bar byed/_/de nas lha yi bdag po la ni ji bzhin des smras pa/_/sa gsum zhi ba'i
[\[28a.3\]]don du rgyal ba nyid ni bdag 'dod de/_/bram ze bdag gi bden pa 'dis ni de ltar 'gro ba la/_/yon tan rnams kyi rten gyur des ni skyes pa'i dngos por shog_/tshig ni de ltar smras pa des ni skyes pa nyid gyur te/_/dga' ba'i sems ldan brgya byin yang ni rang gi grong khyer song /_/'gro ba la
[\[28a.4\]]ni ngo mtshar ba de 'byung bar shes nas ni/_/'jig rten pa yang shin tu brten pa'i ngo mtshar can du gyur/_/kha spu 'byung ba rnam bskyod mig sman phye ma ltar gnag pa/_/skyes par gyur ba nye bar mthong nas de zhal zla ba la/_/nyid du glang po'i 'phral sgong ltar tsho nu 'bur gnyis po ni/_/yangs pa'i brang
[\[28a.5\]]la ngo tsha ltar nyid kyis ni mi snang gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' la yang gzugs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du ming du grags par gyur to/_/de nas ut+pa la ldan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang la dus gcig gi tshe na rgyal po sras med par grongs pa nyid nye bar song bar gyur te/_rgyal po grongs
[\[28a.6\]]par gyur pa sgra gcan gyis gzung ba'i mtshan mo byed pa'i mtshan mo ltar grong khyer de mdzes par ma gyur to/_/rgyal po zhig pas mngon par 'phel ba'i mya ngan dang ldan pa'i blon po rnams la nyams pa 'ga' zhig la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi skye bo la dbugs dbyung bar byas nas grong khyer ba'i
[\[28a.7\]]tshogs la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gtso bo med pa'i phyir yul 'dir brgya lam na dgra rnams 'ongs te rang gi nor dang bral bar byed par 'gyur te/_de bas na khyim rab tu 'bar ba bsal ba'i don du khron pa rab tu rko ba dang 'dra bar dus 'das pa sdug bsngal gyi rgyu bdag cag 'dod par 'gyur
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]bar bya'o/_/de bas na 'dir dus thob pa 'di 'dir gzhon nu gzugs ldan 'di la rgyal po'i mtshan ma lus pa tshang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i yon tan rnams kyis phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa ste/_de bas na 'di nyid bdag por bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur bar bgyi'o zhes zer ro/_/de nas
[\[28b.2\]]gzhan la phan pa'i don du yid ni brtan byas te/_/de la dga' ba skyes pa'i grong khyer bas ni dbang bskur byas/_/rnga yab gnyis dang lan cig tu ni yid ni mngon dga' ba'i/_/gdugs dkar po ni 'khor gyi skye bos kun nas gzung bar gyur/_/tshong dus sar ni rta babs steng du me tog phreng
[\[28b.3\]]bas 'brel/_/ri bo'i bung ba rnams kyi gar gyis yid ni mngon par dga'/_/dri yi chu yis spangs pas dri zhim byas pa'i lam nas 'gro/_/grong khyer pa rnams lus ngan grong khyer dang mtshungs grong khyer byas/_/chu 'dzin rnams ni dus su shin tu char pa sbyin gyur to/_/nye bar 'tsho bas nam
[\[28b.4\]]yang sdug bsngal byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/der ni khrims kyis sa ni skyod bar byed pa'i sa bdag la/_/skye bos sdug bsngal 'di 'dra nam yang thos par mi 'gyur ro/_/ma rmos par ni 'bras bu che ba'i zhing ni byung gyur te/_/shing rnams rtag tu me tog dang ni 'bras mang ster bar gyur/_/rgyal po
[\[28b.5\]]bzang po des ni rgyal srid skyong ba srid sgrub ltar/_/rnga mo rnams kyang rang nyid kyis ni 'o rgyun mang po 'jo/_/mi 'chad sbyin pas yongs su rdzogs pa'i yid kyi re ba ni/_/nus pa gsum ni 'byung bar ldan pa dbang po rnams rgyal ba/_/sna tshogs yon tan rnams kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lus ldan
[\[28b.6\]]pa'i/_/sa skyong des ni rgyal po dang ni ldan pa'i sar ni gyur/_/de nas nor bu rnams kyis yid 'ong seng ge'i khrir bzhugs nas/_/mi dbang seng ge mi skyong rnams kyis zhabs pad 'dud byas pa/_/pad+ma 'dra ba'i zhal ldan rab tu shes rgya'i chos dang ldan/_/skye bo'i don du 'bras bu don dam chos
[\[28b.7\]]ni ston par mdzad/_/sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa che ba 'di ni blta bar bgyi/_/bdag gis 'di nyid du ni gang gis bud med nyid spangs te/_/skye ba'i 'bras bu grags pa'i tshogs gsum grags par byas pa ni/_/'jig rten bdag pos dga' bar byed pa'i skyes pa nyid ni 'di/_/sbyin pa'i
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]shing las me tog tsam zhig 'dir ni rab tu skyes/_/pha rol du ni rgya che'i 'bras bu gzhan ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'di na lan grangs du mar spyad nas don gnyer sa la ni/_/tshul khrims dri med ma lus sbyin pa'i gter ni nges par mdzad/_/yon tan chu brlan med gyur
[\[29a.2\]]na/_/gal te don gnyer zhing sa rnams/_/sbyin bdag sbyin pa'i 'bras 'dod pa/_/sbyin pa'i sa bon gang du gdab/_/grags dang bsod nams rab sbyin pa'i/_/gang zhig gnyen rnams las lhag pa/_/don gnyer rnams ni shes rab can/_/smin bskyod lto 'phyes su zhig skrag_/
[\[29a.3\]]gcig ni bstod pa mang po dang ldan ngag ni smra ste gcig kyang rtsub pa'i yi ge can/_/gcig ni nus pa dang bcas lta ste gzhan ni nor gyi nga rgyal gyis ni brnyas bcas dang /_/gcig gis bsod nams grags pa dag ni legs par ster la gzhan ni dngos po gcig nyid do/_/ring por sbyin bdag
[\[29a.4\]]bdag ltos yon tan 'di rnams kyis ni slong ba po ni rnam par rgyal/_/gal te phyogs rnams yon tan me tog phreng bas dri zhim pa ni byed 'gyur na/_/gal te slar yang snying dga'i 'bras bus longs spyod phyir ni 'dod pa mi chung yod/_/grags pa chen po'i grib ma can ni nor gyi shing rnams skye bar
[\[29a.5\]]'gyur ba ni/_/de bas don du gnyer ba'i skye bo'i sa la nyi ma re rer gdab par mdzod/_/de nas drug cu'i lo rnams 'jig rten pa la rjes bstan nas/_/yon tan ldan pa'i don gnyer rnams la yang yang bde byas te/_/ku mud ltar dkar ba'i grags pas phyogs rnams snang byas nas/_/stobs
[\[29a.6\]]chen mi skyong de ni skye ba gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de ltar bud med nyid du gyur pa na yang bcom ldan 'das des rang gi sha rnams kyang sbyin par mdzad na mi'i lus thob par gyur pa su zhig ces bya ba'i phyi rol gyi dngos po la ltos pa byed par gyur zhes de bas na gtong ba po'i skye bo rab tu spro ba bskyed pa'i
[\[29a.7\]]phyir 'di brjod par bya'o/_/gzugs ldan ma'i skyes pa'i rabs te skyes pa'i rabs drug pa'o//_//phyi rol gyur ba'i rdzas kyang dka' ba yis/_/dman pa rnams kyis yon tan can la dbul/_/dam pa rnams kyis dga' ba'i lus kyang ni/_/dud 'gro rnams la yang ni gtong bar
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]mdzad/_/'di ltar rjes su thos bzhin pa yid 'phrog cing mthong bzhin pa ngo mtshar bar byed pa/_byang phyogs su snying por gyur pa pad+ma dang ut+pa la rnam par phye ba'i tshogs kyis skyed mos tshal mngon par brgyan par byas pa/_rlung gis rnam par bskyod bzhin pa'i lha'i nye 'khor na rgyal mtshan
[\[29b.2\]]dang ba dan dang ut+pa la dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i khab na/_lha'i grong khyer gzhan dag gi shing pa ri dzA ta ka skyes par gyur pa dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' tshong dpon gyi rigs mdzes par gyur to/_/de nas tshong dpon gtso bo'i rgyu skyes pas rab tu dga' ba rnyed pas dga' ston gyi khyad par sna tshogs
[\[29b.3\]]pa la 'jug pa'i khang pa'i phyogs gcig na rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rol cha rnams kyi sgra thos pas gar byed pa'i rma bya rnams kyis mngon par brgyan pa dang /_sbrang rtsi byed pa kun nas 'dzag pa'i sbrang rtsi'i smyon chu bud med rnams kyi 'gram pa la mngon par chags par gyur pa dang /_nor
[\[29b.4\]]bu'i rang bzhin rta babs rnams la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dri zhim pa'i me tog gi phreng ba bcings par gyur pa dang /_dga' bas smras pas 'khor gyi skye bo'i dga' ba dang ldan pa/_grogs po rnams dang gnyen 'dun gyi skye bo rnams kun nas tshim par byas pa'i rang gi khang par don du gnyer
[\[29b.5\]]ba rnams la sbyin gtong chen po byin par gyur to/_/tshong dpon bu yi 'phro bar byed pa'i 'od kyis ni/_/bsil ba'i 'od zer can gyi 'od ni kun nas 'phrog_/gal te de bas rang gi skye bos rjes mthun pa/_/'di yi ming ni zla 'od nyid ces btags par gyur/_/ri bong can sar bzhin du
[\[29b.6\]]nyi ma re rer kun nas nye bar bsags bzhin pa'i 'od kyi mdzes pa dang ldan pa de thos pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa'i yon tan gsal zhes bya ba'i bla ma gzhan dag la bstan bcos dang snyan dang gas kyi cha gzung ba'i don du phas gtad cing 'dug go/_/de nas de yi drung gnas la/_/thos
[\[29b.7\]]pa dang ni shes rab kyis/_/yun mi ring ba'i dus nyid na/_/dbang po rnams rgyal de rgyal gyur/_/de yi shes rab mthong nas ni/_/slob ma kun pas khyad par can/_/legs smras rtsa gcig 'dri ba la/_/bla ma ngo mtshar dang bcas gyur/_/mun pa'i tshogs ni 'byed byed pa/_/lam
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]dang lam min gsal byed pa/_/der ni rig pa lhag par mdzes/_/ku mu da 'byung zla chas bzhin/_/lha yi mig gis mthong nas ni/_/gter ni gang gang des thob pa'i/_/de de ma lus don gnyer la/_/dge ba thob pas sbyin par gyur/_/rang gi brtan pa 'dra ba des/_/de
[\[30a.2\]]ltar sbyin pa sbyin par gyur/_/ji ltar don gnyer rnams kyi tshig_/byin cig ces bya slar ma thos/_/de nas bla ma de'i slob ma brgya phrag lnga tsam po de rnams kyis zla 'od la 'di skad ces e ma don du gnyer ba rnams kyi steng du khyod kyi brtse ba chen po bdag cag gis bsam par bya ste/_
[\[30a.3\]]gal te khyod la don du gnyer ba su zhig srog rnams kyang bslangs par gyur na nges par de la de rnams khyod kyis sbyin par 'gyur zhes smras so/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_de ltar ma yin te slong ba po nyid ni brtse bas sbyin pa po las khyad par du 'phags te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang zhig
[\[30a.4\]]bdag nyid gnod byas nas/_/sbyin pa dge bar byed 'dod pas/_/slong ba'i sdug bsngal bzod pa ste/_/de 'dra brtse ba po ni med/_/'dir ni grags dang pha rol du/_/'bras bu gnyis don gnyer la ster/_/nor tsam ster ba'i sbyin pa po/_/de las de ni khyad par 'phags/_/don gnyer
[\[30a.5\]]byin cig ces brjod cing /_/chung zhes bya bar mngon par brjod/_/sbyin bdag med ces rjod byed cing /_/des ni shin tu chung bar 'gyur/_/phan pa'i phyir ni mthar 'gro bas/_/sbyin bdag dpag bsam shing 'drar byed/_/gsal byas 'bras bus sngags pa ni/_/don gnyer nyid de ci
[\[30a.6\]]ltar chung /_/gal te 'gro ba la ni rnam par sbyar phyir yod mi 'gyur/_/kun nas bsod nams chung ster slong mo'i sprin rnams 'di/_/sbyin bdag rgya mtsho rnams ni 'byung ba ma yin te/_/yon tan ldan pa mu tig grags pa che ba'i lto ba bsten/_/de nas slob ma de rnams slar yang byang chub
[\[30a.7\]]sems dpa' la 'dri bar gyur to/_/ci zhig khyod sbyin bdag chen po'i 'bras bu 'dis ni mchod sbyin brgya byas pa'i dpal 'dod dam/_'o na sgyur ba nyid 'dod ces re zhig smra bar gyis shig_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bdag gi blo ni rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa'i go 'phang mngon par
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]'dod pa ma yin te/_re zhig khyed cag rnams kyis blta bar gyis shig_/srid pa'i thang ka'i dbus su gang gi gzugs/_/'du byed bzo bo rnams kyis byas gyur pa/_/de dang de ni mi rtag pa 'di ni/_/g.yo bas khro ba bzhin du 'jigs par byed/_/chags dang sdang la rgyab phyogs pa'i/_/
[\[30b.2\]]gdug pa'i bdag nyid 'chi bdag la/_/srid pa'i rtser yang 'gro bya min/_/srog chags rnams kyi tshe'i gnas pa/_/bskyod bzhin pa yang zad par 'gyur/_/ri mo'i las la rnam bkod pa/_/skad cig re rer skya ris bzhin/_/drag po mi rtag pa thob nas/_/dpal ni yun ring 'bar ba min/_/bzhi
[\[30b.3\]]mdor gnas pa'i mar me yi/_/rtse mo rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/_/yid byung rmongs pa kha cig ni/_/mi rtag seng ge mo bzhin mthong /_/de nyid blos byas gzhan dag ni/_/'jigs pa med pas sbyang mo bzhin/_/bsod nams byas pa'i blo ldan gyi/_/yid ni 'chi bdag gnod mi 'gyur/_/
[\[30b.4\]]gdugs kyi grib mas bsgribs pa ni/_/lam zhugs nyi mas gdung mi byed/_/rgyags dang nga rgyal mun pa'i phyir ni 'di dag rnams/_/thos pa'i sbrul ltar thob par dka' ba rtag tu nyid/_/skye dgu rnams kyi longs spyod skad cig gis 'jig pa/_/rjes su 'brel ba'i sgra yi bstan bcos bsten
[\[30b.5\]]pa ltar/_/de ltar 'gro ba rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas shes nas/_/chu yi shugs kyis 'jig pa'i dbu ba'i tshogs ltar don med pa/_/rgyags dang nga rgyal gti mug tshogs ni bzlog pa la/_/skye med don du skyes rnams re zhig 'bad pa mdzod/_/de bas na bdag khyab pa nyid du 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal zad
[\[30b.6\]]par bya ba'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod do/_/de nas slob ma de rnams rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pas slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/mang pos smras pas ci zhig bya ste/_smin ma'i dbus nas 'od zer 'phro ba mdzod spu'i ri bong mtshan ma 'dzin byed pa/_/mun pa rnam par
[\[30b.7\]]rgyal ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis dkyil 'khor kun nas rgyas mdzad cing /_/'byung 'gyur gzugs can bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan chen po khyod la mthong ba ste/_/gser ni bcad ltar 'od ldan lus 'dzin rnams la grol ba'i lam ni gsal byed 'gyur/_/bdag cag kyang rnam pa thams cad du
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]mngon par rdzogs par byang chub thob pa khyed kyi slob mar gyur cig ces zer ro/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_dgon pa chen po sbrul mang ba/_/'bad pa ldan pas rgal 'dod cing /_/zhi ba'i gnas su 'gro 'dod pa/_/thabs ni su zhig 'dod mi byed/_/bdag nyid
[\[31a.2\]]chen po 'dis bdud rtsi bgos skal bdag cag la zhal gyis bzhes so zhes bya ba rnam par bsams nas/_dga' ba skyes nas song ba'i slob ma de rnams rang gi gnas su song ba dang /_dus gcig na tshang tshing du nye bar song ba'i byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar bsams shing 'dug go/_/bdag gis don du
[\[31a.3\]]gnyer ba'i skye bo'i don shin tu byas te/_da ni rang gi sha dang khrag gis dud 'gro rnams tshim par bya'o zhes rnam par bsams nas mtshon cha dang sbrang rtsi dang mar blangs te/_gnyen 'dun rnams la ma smras par mtshan mo chen mo'i gos dang rjes su mthun pa'i thun mtshams su/_yol bas mi 'dor
[\[31a.4\]]bar byas pa'i phyogs gzhan la mthug par gyur pa'i mun pas mi snang bar gyur pa'i 'gro ba la khyim gzhan du rab tu 'bar bzhin pa'i mar me'i 'od kyis reg pa ngo gdong mdzes pa nyis 'gyur du gyur pa'i gzhon nu ma'i skye bo rnams yod pa dang /_khyad par du rgyan 'dzin par byas pa sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i
[\[31a.5\]]smin ma'i ljon shing gyen du byas pa mthong bas/_/rgod pa dang sgeg pa'i mchil mas bkug pa'i 'dod pa can skye bo'i snying gi nya dang ldan pa'i smad 'tshong ma rnams yod pa dang /_grogs mo'i skye bos ster bzhin pa'i dus btab pa thos pas g.yeng ba med cing g.yo ba med pa'i mig dang ldan pa'i bar mi mo
[\[31a.6\]]rnams yod pa dang /_dga' ba'i skye bo rnams kyis dus btab pa la spro ba dang ldan pa yod pa dang /_dri'i thig le byas pa de mthong ba la 'phros pas me long gi nang du lta ba rnam par rgod pa'i 'dod ma rnams yod pa dang /_'o ma'i rgyun gyi sgra thos bzhin pa'i ba glang gi rdzi mo rnams kyis be'us ldag pas
[\[31a.7\]]g.yo bar byed pa'i dril chung lkog shal dang ldan pa'i ba rnams yod pa dang lam gyi bzhi mdor ldugs pa'i skyugs ldad kyis bde bar mig rnam par btsums par byas pa'i tshong dus kyi khyu mchog rnams kyis lam 'gags par gyur pa'i grong khyer gyi lam rnams yod pa la/_rgyags pa dang bcas pa'i
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]thong gshol 'dzin pa'i 'gram pa dmar skya ltar dmar ba'i shar gyi ri bo'i rtse mor lhag par gnas pa'i ri bong can gyi mtshan ma yod pas/_ku mu da'i tshogs rgyas pas skyed mos tshal dris bsgos pa'i mtshan mo'i dus su gyur pa na/_gzhan dag khyim thab shi ba'i skra lo ltar mgo yegs pa dang /_du bas
[\[31b.2\]]'od med par byas pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i shing dang ldan pa/_gyen du lta ba'i sdig pa can gyi ce spyang mo rnams kyi skad kyis kha phye ba'i ngo gdong gi bu ga nas rnam par byung ba'i sreg blugs 'dzin pa'i snang bas gsal shing la gnas pa'i skyes bu rnams kyi dpung par nges par 'brel pa'i shas
[\[31b.3\]]che bar gyur pa'i mi g.yo ba'i bya rgod dang kaM ka gsal bar byas pa dang /_shin tu drag pa'i bud med kyi tshogs kyis phyed tshig pa'i shing khang gi dbus su gnas pa'i skyes bu rnams kyis lus 'gags par byed bzhin pa dang /_phyogs 'ga' zhig tu mtshan mo rgyu ba rnams la dogs par gyur
[\[31b.4\]]pa'i mi sha'i skra thos pas 'byung po'i tshogs kyi gdong nas kha chu'i thigs pa rnam par 'dzag pa dang /_gzhan du mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi lag pa bdag gis bzung bar byas pa'i gri gug rnams kyis rnam par gcod bzhin pa'i skyes bu'i brla las rnam par 'dzag pa'i khrag gi rgyun
[\[31b.5\]]gyis sa stengs kun nas bangs pa dang yang nas yang du sreg blugs 'dzin pa'i 'bar ba'i sor mo rnams kyis kun nas sdigs mdzub byed pa dang 'dra bar mun pa chen po bsal bar byas pa dang phyogs 'ga' zhig tu me tog kun da sar pa ltar dkar ba dang kun nas skya ba'i mgo bo'i thod pa
[\[31b.6\]]dang ldan pa dang /_phyogs gzhan du dur khrod gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kun nas lta bzhin pa'i bud med rnams kyi lus la ce spyang gi tshogs kyis 'brel ba dang /_phyogs 'ga' zhig tu rig sngags smra ba rnams kyis bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar gnas pa'i phyogs skyong
[\[31b.7\]]rnams la shubs nas bton pa'i dri ma med pa'i ral gri rnams kyi nang du son pa 'phro ba'i sreg blugs za ba'i gzugs brnyan gyis 'jigs su rung ba'i mthong ba dang ldan pa'i dur khrod chen por phyin par gyur to/_/byams pa'i sngags kyis lus bsrung bar byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la der
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]sha za ba'i bud med kyi skye bos tho 'tshams par ma nus so/_/bdag nyid chen po de yang dur khrod kyi phyogs gcig na ce sbyang rnams kyis bkug pas rnam par skyong ba'i lto ba'i rgyu ma'i dra ba dang sha dang rtsib ma'i mtshams dri ma can gyis gsal ba dang /_rlung gis bskyod pa'i ro
[\[32a.2\]]bsregs pa'i thal ba'i chas kun nas skya bar byas pa'i skra lo 'jings par gyur pa/_khras mchu 'thog pa nyid kyis snang bar gyur cing rnam par 'gyur ba'i so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa shi ba'i bud med mthong nas yid byung ba der song ba'i mi g.yo ba'i lta ba can gyis 'di skad ces/_kye ma 'dod chags can
[\[32a.3\]]rnams kyis ring po ma yin par mthong ba'i blo ste/_gang rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i chags bral gyi bud med kyi lus la yang chags pa skye bar 'gyur zhes smras so/_/yid 'phrog rnam par mi g.yo'i mig can gang la ni/_/dga' ba'i skye bos sin d+hu ra yi khyad par byas/_/de ring 'dir ni sgeg
[\[32a.4\]]mo'i gdong can de nyid la/_/slar yang ce spyang gis ni rkang 'dzin byed/_/gang dag rgod pas cung zad 'od ni 'byung 'gyur ba/_/skye bo 'dod chags can gyi yid ni 'phrog byed pa/_/khyi dang khwa tas gcod pa rnam par rnying ba'i mchu/_/so rnams de nyid rnam par 'gyur ba nyid du song /_/gang dag
[\[32a.5\]]dga' bos rnam par mthong zhing dgar 'gyur te/_/rkang pa drug bcas chu skyes 'dab ma ltar ni mdzes/_/mig gnyis bya rnams kyis ni sha khrag 'phrog byas pa/_/de dag sbrul gyi tshad dang rjes su zlos pa can/_/yun ring gang dag lo ma ltar 'jam 'od ldan pa/_/smug rtsi
[\[32a.6\]]dang bcas grogs mo'i skye bos byas gyur pa/_/'gram pa'i rus pa lhag ma can ni de dag gi/_/ma d+ha ka ltar skya ba da ltar gang du song /_/de bas btsums par byas pa'i mig dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma'i/_/ba spu'i tshogs ni langs pa gang zhig dga' bos reg pa ni/_/nu 'bur gnyis ni
[\[32a.7\]]'gyur ba'i khrag gis shin tu dmar ba yi/_/de la khyi so rnams kyis de ring kun nas 'bigs par byed/_/dga' bo'i dbung rgyan gyis ni skra lo'i me tog lhung ba ni/_/gang zhig btsums par byas pa'i mig can 'khyud nas bde bar nyal/_/de ni dur khrod sa yi mal stan la ni nyal bzhin pa/_/glo bur
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]'ongs nas shin tu dga' mar ci ste 'khyud mi byed/_/rgyus pa rus pa sha dang khrag dang rgyu ma'i rang bzhin las/_/bud med ces bya mang ba'i skyon gyi sbrul gyis khyab 'di la/_/yang dag ma yin kun tu brtags pas nyams pa'i skye bo 'di/_/'dod chags dang bral dngos po la ni don med chags par
[\[32b.2\]]'gyur/_/de rnams skye ngan tshogs kyi rnon po'i mda' rnams kyis mi 'jigs/_/brtan pa de zhi ba de'i longs spyod de rnams nyid/_/bud med dug ni ljon shing gi ni rnam spangs nas/_/gang dag zhi ba'i 'bras bu can gyi dka' thub nags rnams gnas/_/de nas der du ba'i phung po mngon
[\[32b.3\]]par 'thul ba'i mchod sbyin gyi shing dang ldan pa/_mi'i rkang mar yongs pas dgang blugs nges par lhung zhing 'bar bar sol ba'i phung po rnams las su ra swa ra'i sgra 'byung ba dang /_b+haN+Da ka'i bya'i skad mngon spyod kyi sngags brtsams pa'i las dang ldan pa'i dur khrod kyi mchod sbyin la
[\[32b.4\]]mtshon cha rnon pos yan lag rnams kun nas bzhogs te/_sbrang rtsi dang ni mar dag gis/_/'dzag pa'i chu yi rgyun gyis brlan/_/grog sbur rnams kyis zos bzhin pa/_/bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis ni 'di/_/lnga bdag phyugs nyid du ni khyer/_/der yang dri mas rtsub pa'i ril bur byas
[\[32b.5\]]pa'i go cha ltar dri mar bcas pa'i 'od glang po che'i khrag gis nye bar gos pa'i ri dgas kyi bdag po'i sen mo ltar 'khyog cing dmar zhing rno ba'i mchu dang ldan pa/_lto 'phye khros pa'i mig dang 'dra ba'i mig can/_lcags kyi tsher ma ltar rtsub pa'i sen mo rtsub cing dngar ba ma yin pa'i skad kyis
[\[32b.6\]]bya'i chogs gzhan rnams kun nas skrag par byas pa/_bya rnams kyis sra ba'i 'dab ma'i sgras 'gro ba kun du mtshon bzhin pa/_mthon por 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i 'dab chags ni/_ri bo ltar ni mthon po'i gzugs can de yi phrag par bya des ni/_/glo bur du ni mngon par 'dzeg par byas
[\[32b.7\]]nas mtho yor ltar/_/ut+pa la chen po'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs mig ni gdon byas nas/_/khrag gis khyab pa'i mig rdzi'i ri mo slar yang lhung bar gyur/_/phrug pa rje skyong don du mnyes gshin pas ni reg byas pa/_/ri dgas mo ni mngon par phyogs par stag la yang ni rab tu 'gro/_/mnyes gshin pa yang
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]snying rje zhes bya gzhan don sgrub pa'i phyir/_/skyed byed byang chub sems dpa' la ni ji ltar gnod par byed/_/de nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba des byang chub sems dpa' la dris par gyur to/_/nges par bdag gi 'don bzhin pa'i mig 'di la khyed kyi sdug bsngal chen po
[\[33a.2\]]nyams su myong ngam zhes so/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_/gal te gang gis kyang mi dgos pa'i bdag gi lus zad par song bar gyur na de nas bdag la sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur te/_da lta'i nye bar dgos bar gyur ba sems can du ma rnams kyis mthong nas mchog tu
[\[33a.3\]]dga' ba bdag gis nyams su myong zhes zer ro/_/gal te lus po 'di ni sdug bsngal rnams kyi rten/_/yan lag can rnams la ni 'grub pa nyid du 'gro/_/che ming mang 'dod rnams la de ltar rin chen ldan/_/'di las gzhan du lto 'phye bzhin du skyon mang ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems
[\[33a.4\]]dpas sha za rnams kyis ji ltar bde bar bdag la zo shig ces rnam par bsams nas/_bdag nyid ri dgas dang 'dra bar ston zhing 'dug go/_/de na bya rnams yang dag 'ongs pa la/_/rgyun mi 'chad pa'i skad kyis 'jigs byas pa/_/de yi sha ni cig car zad 'gyur te/_/sems kyi brtan
[\[33a.5\]]pa la ni rgyab phyogs min/_/de nas de yi lus ni yon tan me tog gi_/dri yis lhag par dri zhim byas nas srog rnams kyis/_/ji ltar yang ni rnam par spangs te skyes pa yi/_/sdug bsngal gyis khyab bya rnams ltung ba'i gnas shing bzhin/_/de nas nus pa'i ri'i rtse mo nas shin tu ring bar
[\[33a.6\]]kun nas longs spyod pa'i bung ba bzhin du kun da ltar dkar skar ma'i bdag po spangs nas mtshan mo song ba la/_bzlas pa'i me tog rtse mo dang 'dra bar nyi ma'i gdong gis nye bar 'brel bar gyur pa'i shar gyi ri'i rtse mor nyi ma yod pa la nyin mor byed pa'i 'od zer rnams kyi lag pas yang dag par
[\[33a.7\]]reg pa'i bde ba dang 'dra bar mngon par gsal bar gyur pa'i pad+ma'i sdong bu'i tsher ma rnams kyis kha spu langs shing gnyid dang bral ba'i pad+ma'i bud med rnams yod pa la srog chags ku ra ra rnams kyi skad rjes su byed pa'i rnam par grol bar gyur pa'i grong khyer gyi sgo dang sgo glegs yod pa la gnyid
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]sad nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'dod pa'i dogs pas yid sdug bsngal bar gyur pa grogs po dang 'khor gyi skye bo dang /_gnyen 'dun gyi tshogs dang bcas pa bu tshol bas sems g.yengs pa de dang de la sems shing 'dug gi/_bdag gi bu de mtshan mo kun nas 'khor zhing sbrul gyis
[\[33b.2\]]sos btab gyur tam ci/_/'on te snying rje dang bral so sor 'gugs byed rnams kyis rgyan rnams phrogs nas bsad/_/sa yi dbang phyug mche ba can gyi mche bas brang du kun nas brgyab pas zad par gyur/_/bcings pa'i ka ba bcag par byas nas gshin rje'i grong khyer ci zhig song bar gyur/_/
[\[33b.3\]]rim gyis nye bar song nas dur khrod kyi phyogs gcig tu bya rgod rnams kyis sha la gcod par byed bzhin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa gang gis kyang mngon par shes nas skye bo des tshong dpon la smra zhing 'dug go/_/kye ma bdag nyid chen po 'di shi ba nyid du nye bar song ste/_ji ltar rtog
[\[33b.4\]]par byed pa de ltar nges par 'dis bdag nyid dud 'gro rnams la sbyin par bya zhes bya ba'o/_/de yang thos nas tshong dpon de dgra stas ma lus par gcod pa'i shing bzhin du ltung bar gyur te/_yun ring por 'du shes so sor skyes pa 'di ltar smre sngags 'don pa la rtse gcig par gyur to/_/bdag
[\[33b.5\]]skyes 'di ni bya rnams kyis ni gcod bzhin pa/_/rul pa'i 'brel pa lhod pa 'di ltar rnam mthong nas/_/kye ma lha yi nyes par spyad pa chen pos ni/_/de lta na yang rtsub pa'i bsam ldan bdag ni 'tsho/_/dud 'gro rnams kyi brtsi ba 'di 'di 'dra/_/gal te rang gi lus ni sbyin pas gsal
[\[33b.6\]]byas pa/_/sdig pa med pa'i pha dag kun nas dor byed pa/_/khyod kyis ji ltar snying rje med pa nyid ni brtsams/_/'jam pa'i ltan ldan mal cha yid ni 'phrog byed par/_/dkar po steng du g.yogs par bde bar nyal byas nas/_/de ring 'dir ni rus pa rnams kyis kun khyab pa'i/_/thal ba
[\[33b.7\]]dang bcas shing khang sa mal ji ltar nyal/_/de ring mtho ris song ba'i snying rje'i grogs ldan du khyod la/_/skye bos lta 'dod byas pa rang bde la ni ma ltos pa/_/dam pa'i yon tan gtam gyis me tog rnams mchod gtam rnams la/_/yid ni 'phrog byed gang gi tshogs rnams bdag gis
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]thos par gyur/_/khyod kyis bdag la gshin pa'i chu snyems mchi mas 'dres pa ni/_/lta 'dod sbyin par gyur ces bya ba gang zhig rnam bsams pa/_/mnyes gshen pas brlan dag pa'i yid kyis de shes 'gyur na ni/_/bud med kyis ni bdag yid re ba ci phyir
[\[34a.2\]]nyams par byas/_/de ltar tshong dpon gyis yun ring por smre sngags 'don par byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus la mes 'du byas te/_mig gi chu rab tu 'dzag pas dbang bskur bar byas pa'i bzhin dang ldan pas stong pa dang 'dra bar smre sngags kyi sgra dang bcas par rang gi khyim du
[\[34a.3\]]song bar gyur to/_/de nas ri rab kyi ni phyogs rer phug rnams las ni sgra chen grag_/gser gyi rde'u chung dang ni rnga chen rnga chung rnams ni brdung byas nas/_/lha yi tshogs kyis mya ngan 'das pa'i me ni de la dri zhim pa'i/_/me tog char ni byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa'i phung po la 'bebs
[\[34a.4\]]gyur/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad cing gzhan gyi don du bdag nyid lan du mar yongs su gtong ba zhes bya ba rnam par bsams nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchog tu dad pa bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'o/_/tshong dpon gyi skyes pa'i rabs te skyes
[\[34a.5\]]pa'i rabs bdun pa'o//_//gzhan gyi don ni yang dag bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtswa bzhin lus ni btang /_/gzhan la bde ba sgrub byed brtan pa rnams/_/rang gi bde ba la ni ltos pa min/_/'di ltar rjes su thos te/_ston kar chu 'dzin gyi tshogs gsal
[\[34a.6\]]ba'i nam mkha' la zla ba ltar/_ma lus pa'i ri bong can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer rnams kyis snang bar byas pa'i mtshan mo la ku mu da'i tshogs kha bye ba dang 'dra bar/_rab tu myos pa'i nags kyi sa la pad+ma'i 'byung gnas bzhin du/_lang tsho dang po phun sum tshogs pa la dul ba dang 'dra ba/_
[\[34a.7\]]gsal ba dang 'jam pa'i yi ge'i tshig dang ldan pa'i ngag la don dang 'dra bar ston ka'i zla tshes ring po nyid du song ba ltar dri ma med pa'i chu dang ldan pa'i gsal ba'i nya'i tshogs kyis gting du khyab pa/_'gram gyi shing rnams kyi me tog gi rdul gyis kun nas ser skyar byas pa'i dbu ba'i phreng ba'i
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]skye rags kyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba'i chu bos brgyan par byas pa'i rang bzhin gyis dge bar gyur pa'i bA rA Na sIr rgyal po'i pho brang du/_spros pa'i so'i nor bu rnams kyi 'od zer gyi snang bas mngon par brgyan par byas pa'i bzhin gyi pad+ma can zhes bya ba'i rgyal po byang chub sems
[\[34b.2\]]dpa' byung bar gyur/_mdzes pa dang ni gzugs dang gzi brjid rnams kyis kyang /_/bde ba dang ni rmongs par byed pa gdung ba'i rgyu/_/ri bong mtshon dang me tog mtshon cha dro ba'i 'od/_/gang zhig nyams pas cig car du ni rgyal bar byas/_/nam mkhar 'gro ba rnams la 'bras bu dang
[\[34b.3\]]bcas shing /_/pad+ma'i nags la phung ba'i tshogs rnams dang ni 'dra/_/gcig tu 'gro ba rnams kyi gnyen du gyur rnams la/_/gang la grogs po bzhin du bde ba 'byung bar gyur/_/'gro rnams don ni sgrub bde yang dag brtson pa'i bdag nyid can/_/snying rjes yongs su 'dzin dang rnam
[\[34b.4\]]par dag pa'i blo ldan pa/_/gang gi snying gar ser sna rab tu rnam par ma zhugs te/_/khyim gyi sbrul ni sngags rnams kyis ni bsrung bar byas/_/gang gi bsam pa che ba rab tu grags pa'i sbyin pas ni/_/ser sna rnam par bzlog par byas shing phyogs rnams su ni khyab/_/slong ba'i skye bos
[\[34b.5\]]nam yang byin zhes bya ba'i tshig rnams ni/_/chung bar byed pa'i slar yang 'jig rten pas ni thos ma gyur/_/snying gi kha ba'i ri las sbyin pa mnyam pa'i sa las 'jug pa ni/_/kun nas rdul ni nye bar bzlog pa 'jig rten ma lus khrus byas pa/_/gang zhig sa rnams kun gyis 'dud bya gzhan
[\[34b.6\]]don gcig pa'i 'bras bu can/_/ri bong can gyi 'od zer rnam dag grags pa'i gang gA gzung bar gyur/_/gang gi rgud pa bsal byas te/_/de ring nor gyis tshim byas gang /_/zhi ba'i lam la gzhag pa gang /_/'di 'dra gang gis gnas par 'gyur/_/bdag nyid srid pa rnam gcod phyir/_/
[\[34b.7\]]lam bzang la ni bzhag 'dod pas/_/gzhan don med pas 'ga' zhig gzhan/_/bya ba bdag nyid chen rnams med/_/dpung pa dang ni brtson 'grus kyis 'pham dgra las rgyal/_/gzhan gyi yul du stobs can gang gi stobs rnams ni/_/mngon par song ste mthong ba'i 'phel ba byung ba yi/_/
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]rgya mtsho'i chu rnams 'gram gyi mthar ni song ba bzhin/_/sgra sgrogs phan tshun yin pa'i rnga dang ldan pa yis/_/gang gis khros pa rnam par rgyas bzhin glang po rnams/_/kun nas dbang du song ba byes su 'gro ba'i tshe/_/lcags kyu 'dzin rnams ji ltar yang ni 'byung
[\[35a.2\]]bar 'gyur/_/'jig pa'i dbang gis smyon chu 'byung ba nyer zhi ba/_/ral gri dang ni mda' stan khu tshur lhod byas pa'i/_/g.yul ngos dgra rnams gang gi nga rgyal bzod min te/_/ri dgas bdag po la ni glang po che rnams ltar/_/gang la grags pa'i gzi brjid can gyis phan tshun du/_/don
[\[35a.3\]]gnyer bde ba'i dngos po rnam 'phel phun tshogs can/_/'bras bu ster ba'i shing la bya bzhin skye dgu rnams/_/rtag pa nyid ni bde ba'i phyir ni ngal so 'gyur/_/de nas dus gcig gi tshe rgyal po de'i yul du khams mi snyoms pas lto ba'i me nye bar 'grib par 'gyur te/_nyin re bzhin du kun
[\[35a.4\]]nas skya ba dang stobs chung ba'i lus can gzi brjid med pa'i skye bo'i tshogs nad chen pos btab par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bkas sman pa rnams/_'bad pa dang bcas par yang dpyad byed cing nad de bsal ba'i phyir skye bo de la nus par ma gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po des sman pa de
[\[35a.5\]]rnams la smras pa/_thabs gang gis skye bo rnams kyi nad 'di bsal nus par 'gyur zhes zer ro/_/sman pa rnams kyis smras pa/_lha lags gal te nya ro hi ta'i sha yod par gyur na de nas bdag cag gis skye bo 'di rnams nad med par byed nus so zhes gsol to/_/de nas rgyal po des mchog
[\[35a.6\]]tu 'bad par byas kyang gang nas kyang nya ro hi ta nye bar rnyed par ma gyur to/_/de nas nam zhig de ni phyi rol byung ba dang /_/glang chen skyed par gnas pas yid kyi dbang phyug ni/_/dkar po'i gdugs kyis rab tu log pa'i nyi ma la/_/rlung yab g.yabs pas rnam par g.yos pa'i na bza' can/_/de nas
[\[35a.7\]]g.yog 'khor skye bos rjes su song ba'i sa skyong ni/_/glang po'i bdag po rnyed nas nad pa rnams kyis rnam mthong nas/_/mi nus bzhin ldan glo bur nyid du lag pa rnam bteg ste/_/mi skyong nad las bdag cag skyobs shig ces ni tshig smras gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas nad dang ldan zhing yid
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]'khrug pa de rnams kyis snying rje ba'i 'o dod 'bod pa'i sgra thos nas/_sems sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dang ldan pa brtse ba dang yongs su 'dris pa sdug bsngal gyi mchi mas mig gang bar byas pas 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/_/bdag la rgyal srid kyi bde bas ci zhig bya ste/_gang du bdag gi
[\[35b.2\]]yul 'khor na gnas pa rnams la gnas skabs 'di zhes bya ba bsams par gyur to/_/khyim du zhugs nas blon po rnams la bos te/_bdag gis ni sras dbang bskur ba rab tu bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa zhes 'di skad ces smras so/_/de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lang tsho sar pas rtsub
[\[35b.3\]]pa'i lus 'di yod pa la/_/sdang ba 'jigs par byed pa'i pha rol gnon pa ni/_/gzhan don rgyu yi mngon par mthong ba yod pa ste/_/khyed ni nags su 'gro bar 'dod pa dus min ci/_/rgyal pos gsungs pa/_ji ltar khyed cag rnams kyis rtog par byed pa de ltar ni ma yin no/_/blon po rnams
[\[35b.4\]]kyis de'i phyir slar 'di la zhus pa/_lha yi dgongs pa gang zhig yin/_/rgyal pos gsungs pa/_rmi lam ngan pa mthong bas dogs pa skyes pa bdag 'di ltar rtog par byed de dus 'ga' zhig na ma brtags pa nyid du mi rtag pa 'di kun nas 'ongs te bdag nyid nyams par byed de de bas na sras
[\[35b.5\]]dbang bskur ba lta ba'i phyir 'dod do zhes zer ro/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_ji ltar lhas bka' stsal ba de bzhin no zhes bya ba'o/_/de nas kun nas mtho ba gser gyi rta babs can/_/sil snyan mchog gis gsal ba yi sgra khyim mchog la/_/sras la dbang ni bskur bar byas gyur sras
[\[35b.6\]]la byams/_/sa yi bdag po sa skyong rnams kyis 'dud byas pa'o/_/de nas gzhon nu des yab kyi drung du song nas zhus pa/_bdag gis ji ltar gnas par bgyi zhes bya ba yab kris bka' stsal bar mdzod cig_/rgyal pos gsungs pa bu nyon cig rnam pa thams cad du dus nam zhig na yang tshe
[\[35b.7\]]ldan khyod kyis don du gnyer ba rnams kyi steng du gus pa med par gnas par mi bya zhes bya ba'o/_/ltos shig_/smod pa'i rgyu ste bde 'gro rnams ni 'gog byed pa/_/bsags pa sha za mo ni stong pa'i khang pa ste/_/legs pa'i zam pa 'jig par byed pa'i chu tshogs ni/_/'dod pas long ba
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]rnams la ser sna dgra gyur pa/_/sngon ni rang gi nor la chags pa'i sman pa rnams/_/nya yi rgyal po zos pas bdag nyid tshim byas nas/_/smin ma bskyod pas 'od 'bar rtsub pa'i tshig rnams kyis/_/tha mar med ces slong ba po ni sreg par byed/_/blo ldan de rnams
[\[36a.2\]]legs pa'i skye bo 'phags pa rnams/_/skye bo gzhan dang de rnams ngan song mi mthong ste/_/gang rnams kyis ni bdag nyid sdug bsngal rgyu las 'don/_/ser sna'i sbrul gyis khad pa nyid du ma byas pa'o/_/gzhan yang gang zhig dgag pa'i rdul gyi dri ma can gyi phongs pa'i tshig ni smra ba
[\[36a.3\]]ste/_/ring nas skye bo de ni re ba slu bar byed pas slong mo rnams kyis yongs su spong /_/skom pas rkan ni skams par gyur pa lam zhugs rnams kyang khrus dang btung ba'i bya ba rnams/_/dri ma med pa'i skye bo 'gro ba'i khyim gyi sgo yi chu la byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/kha spu ring ba rnams kyis mun
[\[36a.4\]]pa'i gdong can ring por rab zhugs pa yi mig ldan pa/_/skye bo dbyig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis gang tshe chu ni don gnyer yi dgas rnams ni bzlog_/de nyid mkhyen pa skye dgu rnams kyi gnyen ni rgyal bas ser sna'i 'bras bu de gsungs te/_/de ltar yang dag bsams nas gzhan la
[\[36a.5\]]phan pa rgyab tu phyogs pa'i blo gros skyes pas mi bya'o/_/bu gzhan yang 'jig rten du bdag nyid che bar 'dod pa khyod kyi bden pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_bzod pa dang /_sbyin gnas la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi nor bu rnams kyis bdag nyid mngon par brgyan par bya'o/_/yon tan ldan zhing zhi ba
[\[36a.6\]]'gro ba rnams la phan min rnam gcod la mkhas pa/_/yon tan can ni mnyes gshin rnam 'jug legs pa'i blo ldan shin tu bden pa'i tshig_/dpal dang yongs su chags pa rgyas pa'i dri mas dri ma dang bcas min pa ni/_/skyes pa rnams kyis skyes pa'i grangs sogs mdzes pa'i skye bo
[\[36a.7\]]rnams ni 'jog par byed/_/gang dag dral 'dzin 'gro ba ma lus nang gi nad kyis dub pa sel byed pa/_/gang dag gis ni blo rnams dang ba mun bral nor bu rnams kyi 'od bzhin du/_/gang dag slong mo ba ni 'di la srog rnams kyis kyang dga' ba byed 'dod cing /_/de rnams yon tan ldan pa rnams
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]kyi dang po'i grangs la ji ltar 'jug mi bya/_/khyod kyis kyang skyes bu thun mong ba ltar/_yon tan dang ldan pa rnams la gus pa med par gnas par mi bya'o/_/ltos shig ma dros 'od zer 'thon nas yon tan can bzhin don du gnyer ba rnam dag thob/_/chu 'phel bas ni rgya mtsho skad cig der ni
[\[36b.2\]]kun nas 'khrul bzhin grags par byed/_/mtshar ba dang ldan de nyid la ni rgya mtsho rnams kyi chu 'phel mi 'gyur te/_/rab tu dga' ba 'byung ba chen po chen po rnams nyid la ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nas gsal bar gyur pa'i skar ma'i tshogs dang 'dres pa'i nam mkha' la ri bong can gyi khyad par
[\[36b.3\]]brtsams pa'i shar gyi phyogs la dpe chags pa'i tshogs lhung bas rnam par bskyod pa'i mar me'i rtse mo'i sor mos sdigs mdzub dang 'dra bar sar pa'i chu gter ltar sngo bar snang ba'i mun pas bar rnam par grol ba'i khyim rnams la gnas pa'i srog shing la rnam par 'brel pa'i g.yo ba med
[\[36b.4\]]pa'i khyim bya yod pa dang /_a ka ru'i spos kyi dris dri zhim par byas pa'i byug pa'i bya bas g.yo zhing sgra sgrogs pa'i gdu bu rnams kyis brgyan par byas pa'i lag pa'i pad+ma can gyi bud med rnams kyis lhag par gnas pa dang /_'jam pa'i mal stan gyi dkyil dang ldan pa'i gnas pa'i khang
[\[36b.5\]]pa rnams la rab tu ma 'brel ba'i skye bo nyo tshong gyur pa 'ga' zhig tu rnam par ma byas par gyur pa'i tshong dus kyi sar byang chub sems dpas sras la rjes su bslabs nas/_mar me'i snang bas snang bar gyur pa'i rgyan rnams kyis mdzes pa dang ldan pa'i khyim gyi mchog gi sa la 'dzegs nas/_
[\[36b.6\]]btsun mo'i 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad btang bar byas pa bA rA Na sI'i chu bo de la bdag nyid mchong bar 'dod cing 'di skad ces smras par gyur to/_/chu bo 'di la lus che ba/_/rin chen dkar po ltar dri med/_/tshul 'jig rten nad zhi'i phyir/_/ro hi ta nyar bdag gyur cig_/de ltar skye dgu'i
[\[36b.7\]]don du yongs 'phel shar ldan pa/_/brtse ba'i khyad par rjes su 'gro ba'i yon tan lus/_/lus ni btang bar byas te spro zhing khyab pa'i mchog//chu bo bA rA Na sIr sa yi dbang phyug gis/_/de nas sa bdag de ni rnam par mdzes par gyur/_/rang gi khyim nas chu la nges par mchong byed cing /
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]ri bo mchog rab 'gram nas bskal pa'i shing 'dra bar/_/lha yi dbang phyug glang po dpral 'bur gyis brdungs pa/_/de nas sa yi skyong bas mchongs par gyur pa la/_/rlung gis bshig pa'i dkar bas khyab pa'i nam mkha' can/_/chu yis bskyod par byas pa'i nya
[\[37a.2\]]yi tshogs dang ldan/_/bskyod pa'i ngang skya can gyi 'gram ni rgal bar gyur/_/chu bo de la mchongs pas skad cig gis ni de/_/kun nas mtho ba'i chu yi sgras ni 'jigs byas pa/_/kha ba can gyi ri mnyam pa dang 'dra ba'i lus/_/ro hi'i nya ni mi yi dbang po byung bar gyur/_/bdag nyid
[\[37a.3\]]chen po des bye ma dkar po ltar yid 'phrog pa'i chu bo'i 'gram nas rgal nas gal te skye bo'i tshogs 'di bdag srog rnams las rnam par bral bar _byed na de nas nyes par spyad pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pas ngan 'gro la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o/_/de bas na 'dir rnyed pa 'di
[\[37a.4\]]rang nyid kyis dbang po thams cad 'gags par byas nas srog yongs su dor bar bya'o zhes bya ba rnam par bsams nas srog rnams dor bar gyur to/_/de nas rnyog pa can gyi chus dbang bskur ba dkar po mche ba gnyis pa dpral bar 'bur gnyis ldan pa/_nub pa'i ri'i rtse mo bzung ba'i
[\[37a.5\]]bsil ba'i 'od zer can yod pa la shin tu srab pa'i rdul gyis nye bar bsams pa'i shel gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i rab tu srab par gyur pa'i skar ma yod pa rnams la ku mu da'i tshogs zum par gyur pa la pad+ma'i 'byung gnas gnyid log pa dang bral bar gyur pa rnams yod pa dang /_ba bla'i
[\[37a.6\]]rdul dang 'dra ba'i chung ba'i 'od zer gyis ri'i rtse mo rnams kun nas byug par byas pa yod pa rnams la mi'i bdag pos stong pa'i mal cha skyong bar byed pa'i skye bo las nye bar thos nas/_blon po rnams kyis rgyal po de gang du gshegs par gyur ces bya ba khyim dang nye bar skyes pa'i skyed mos tshal
[\[37a.7\]]nye bar mthong nas kun nas yongs su bskor cing /_bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba'i rgya mtsho'i bud med kyi 'gram du mu tig gi phung po ltar ring bar gyur pa nya ro hi ta zhes bya ba mthong bar gyur to/_/gzugs ma mthong bar gyur pa nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi zab pa'i tshig de rnams kyis kyang thos
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]par gyur te/_nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam gcod phyir/_/skye bo 'di la sa bdag de/_/bdag nyid chu bo'i chu la ni/_/dor nas ro hi ta nyar gyur/_/de nas blon po de rnams kyis de thos nas mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal gyis yid sdug bsngal bar gyur pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ma snying rjes rgyal
[\[37b.2\]]bo'i bdag nyid sems can rnams la phan don du 'di ltar yongs su dor bar byed cing /_sa la ma lus pa 'di mgon med par gyur pa zhes bya ba rnam pa mang por de ltar smre sngags bton nas yid stong zhing rang gi khyim rnams su mngon par song bar gyur to/_/gtam 'di blon po rnams las ni/_/nye bar
[\[37b.3\]]dmigs nas mun pas khyab/_/lha mo mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mig/_/sa bdag de la smre sngags 'don/_/'jig rten gnyen gyur khyod ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang /_/rang nyid kyis ni sa bdag mtho ris song ba zhes/_/de ltar na yang mtha' med sdug bsngal skal ba can/_/'tsho bar 'dod
[\[37b.4\]]pa bdag ni rnam spangs phyir ni 'dod ma yin/_/shin tu 'jam pa'i sems ldan khyed kyis brtse ba ni/_/nam yang sems ni rtsub med sdang bar byed pa yang /_/skyon med par ni rjes su 'gro ba'i skye bo 'di/_/rjes su chags can rnam spangs ci phyir khyod ni song /_/khros pa shin tu che ba drag mo rnam par

[\[38a.1\]]bur ldan pa khyed cag la byin nas/_/bdag gi dga' bo med pas shir Sha'i me tog 'dra/_/ne tso khyod la di ring su zhig klog par 'gyur/_/bdag gi 'ga' bo grogs dang bral ba des song bas/_/slar yang bdag la skra lo bzhag pas dgos pa med/_/yun ring

[\[38a.3\]]ni dor bar gyur/_/gang dag mig ni tha ma dang 'brel mig thur ni/_/mig sman byed par 'dod pa myur du rnam spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal dang ni ldan pa phyed rdzogs bud med ni/_/mchi ma dang bcas rgyan gyis khyab par phyis par gyur/_/rnam par phyi zhing ge sar dang bcas me tog ni/_/mgo

[\[38a.5\]]rnams ni lhung gyur bung bas 'khor ba ste/_/bskal pa'i rlung gis gdungs pa yid 'phrog bskal shing 'dra/_/kha cig bsnyen bkur ba yi skye bo las shes nas/_/mchi ma bcas pa'i mig can sa bdag shi ba nyid/_/mtshan mo'i pad+ma ltar khyab pa yi tshig ldan pa/_/sa la lhung ste bud med
[\[38a.6\]]rnams ni shi bar gyur/_/gzhan ni rim gyis 'khor ba'i skye bos rnam par mthong bzhin pa/_/mi bdag zla ba'i 'od ni rnam par rgyal ba de bris nas/_/pang du yang dag gnas pa bud med du zhing sdug bsngal gyis/_/ri mo'i shing leb skya ris rnams dang lhan cig dor bar gyur/_/skra
[\[38a.7\]]rnams rnam par 'dzings nas dri zhim kun nas chad pa yi/_/skud pa rnams kyis me tog kha phye rnams kyis ldan pa ni/_/gzhon nu ma ni kha cig gdu gu chad pa'i pad+ma ltar/_/dmar ba'i lag pa rnams kyis brang ni skad cig de la brdungs/_/de nas blon po chen po de rnams mya ngan gyi dbang gis

[\[38b.1\]]mig gi mchi ma'i thigs pa 'byung ba'i snying rje rje 'dra ba'i smre sngags 'don pa dang lag pa'i sras che ba des/_gzhan la snyim pa'i chu sbyin par byas nas btsun mo'i 'khor de rnams rnam pa gang gis kyang dbugs 'byung bar byas te/_nad kyis mnar ba'i skye bo de la smras par gyur to/_/rgyal

[\[39a.1\]]phyir/_/lam bzang po la gzhag 'dod de/_/gzhan don med par gzhan 'ga' ni/_/bdag nyid che rnams bya ba med/_/der yang chos kyi rgyal srid rjes su skyong ba'i rgyal po la dus gcig na mu ge shin tu drag po byung bar gyur to/_/rim gyis kyang yul der rab tu srab

[\[40a.1\]]yang dang yang du rjes su brjod pa rnams kyis ci zhig bya/_/gang gis dgos pa de myur du brjod par gyis shig ces zer ro/_/bram zes smras pa/_blangs par ma gyur pa yang lha yi dbang pos ster/_/gtsang zhing mang ba'i chu ni chung ba slong ba la/_/de lta na yang mi brtan

[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]yis kyang ni yud tsam du lhung ba/_/srid pa'i ljon shing 'di ni rnam pa gang gis gcod mi 'gyur/_/chog shes sngags kyis yongs su skyong bar byed pa'i sems 'jug pa/_/yul gyi sbrul gyi 'jigs pa rnam spangs bde bar gnas pa ste/_/brten pa yang ni 'bras bu mi 'byung yid 'dod shing rnams
[\[40b.2\]]la/_/lha yi gnyis 'thung gis ni chags pa rnams la zad mi 'gyur/_/bsnyen pa phongs pas nam yang mgo ni 'dud par mi byed don du gnyer ba chung yang mi 'gro ste/_/nor gyi nga rgyal rnams kyi mdun du rje bo bka' stsol zhes pa'i tshig ni smra min te/_/skye bo ngan pa sbrul rnams dag gi me ni

[\[40b.5\]]'di rang gi lus kyi sdug bsngal yang ma brtsis par nyi ma re re nyid du sems can gyi don du sgrub par byed ces bya ba'o/_/de bas na 'di'i nges pa re zhig shes par bya zhes rgyal po de'i bza' ba'i dus na bram ze'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas lo ma'i thum po gzung zhing mdun du gnas te

[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]po la byin par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang phyug dri ma med pa dang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i cod pan gyi nor bu rnams kyi 'od kyis kun nas bslang ba'i dbang po'i gzhu'i khor yug gis kun nas song ba'i lus dang ldan pa pus mo'i mthar rab tu 'phyang ba'i mu tig gi gter

[\[41a.3\]]bdag gi ngor ni byang chub kyang /_/lus can rnams ni sbyin pa ster/_/rang gi sdug bsngal ma bsams par/_/khyed las gzhan gyis ster ba min/_/snyan smra dam pa'i skye bo'i lam ni sten byed pa/_/gzhan la phan pa'i phyir ni rtag tu brtson pa rnams/_/khyed cag don du gnyer ba su zhig bde
[\[41a.4\]]mi byed/_/'bras bu rjes su 'brel pas yid kyi re ba bzhin/_/gang phyir don gnyer mnyes gshin pas ni gnyen bzhin dga' ba skyes pa'i mig gis blta ba ste/_/gang zhig 'das pa'i dus min 'jam pa ster bar gyur te gang zhig gus pa nyung ba yang /_/don du gnyer la lhag ma'i bde ba byin na gang zhig
[\[41a.5\]]lan mang bde ba thob 'gyur ba/_/de ni ring byas pa yi lhag ma'i sbyin pa'i spyod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis sbyin pa po ni smra/_/rnam pa thams cad du sa 'di mgon dang bcas pa gang la khyed ni bsrung ba po ste de bas na zhing pa rnams la sa bon thams cad 'debs par mdzod cig_/bdag ni di ring nyid nas

[\[41a.7\]]gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i glang po che bzhin du kun nas chus sbos pa'i che ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/_bsil ba dang 'jam pa'i rlung gis reg pa'i dbang gis rab tu srab par gyur pa'i dbugs kyis gnya' ba bskyod pa'i rma bya gyen du lta ba rnams kyis sgra 'byin pa dang /_chu 'byung ba'i dus la
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]kun nas tshim pa'i brtan pa rnams kyi 'brug dang 'dra bar kun nas phyogs kyi sgo dang bcas pa bar snang la chu 'dzin pa rnams kun nas 'khrigs par gyur to/_/de nas ka dam pa dang a rdzu na yi dris/_/'byed pa'i bsil ba'i rlung gis kun nas gdungs pa ste/_/lto 'phye rnams kyis ring bar tsan dan shing
