[\[88b.5\]]chu'i ri mos mgrin pa sngo ba dang /_legs par gnas pa'i sen mo dang /_rkang pa can gser dang /_dngul gyi bum pa'i rnam pa can gyi dpral 'bur ldan pa dang /_bzod pa'i lcags kyus lam du 'gro ba bzlog par byas pa dang /_yon tan thams cad kyi gnas pa dang 'dra ba byang chub sems
[\[88b.6\]]dpa' spos kyi glang po mche ba drug pa glang po che'i tshogs kyi bdag po byung bar gyur to/_/zla ba'i 'od zer ltar dkar tshogs kyi bdag po de mdzes te/_/mu tig gis ni lhag par dkar ba'i so can dpral 'bor che/_/sngon po spung bar byas pa gar gyi dus su phyugs bdag gi_/rgod pa chen
[\[88b.7\]]po mtshan mo rjes su mthun par 'phrog byas 'dra/_/rlung gis gdungs pa'i ku mu ta rnams yang dag sprul byed cing /_/ze'u 'bru'i cha yis kun nas ser bar byas pa'i ge sar can/_/yal ga can rnams kha yi ris ltar dkar ba glang dbang ste/_/gus pas bung ba'i sgra yis mngon par stod
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]par byed pa 'dra/_/yal ga can rnams me tog ring nas spang byas te/_/'dab ma bskyod pa'i pad+ma rnams kyang de bzhin du/_/de yi 'gram pa smyon chus gos par byas pa yin/_/rim gyis dga' ba bung ba rnams ni 'ongs par gyur/_/bar ni bral ba tsho ba'i 'gram pas
[\[89a.2\]]mdzes pa ni/_/kun nas phyogs kyi sgo yi bar ni bsgos byas pa/_/smyon chu rim gyis 'thung zhing tshogs ni 'dzin pa des/_/bung ba rnams ni rna ba'i g.yo bas zlog mi byed/_/yid 'phrog rgyun ni mi 'chad pa/_/rab mchog slong mo pa ltar ni/_/rkang drung de las smyon chu ni/_/sbyin bdag ltar
[\[89a.3\]]ni 'dzin par gyur/_/tshogs kyi bdag po des kyang ri bo 'bigs byed la kun nas brten pa gser gyi ri bo las kyang bdag nyid mngon par lhag par sems par gyur to/_/glang po che'i tshogs de yang nges yang dag par kun nas skyong bar byas pa dang /_rgyal po dang ldan pa 'dra bar rgyal srid
[\[89a.4\]]'phel bar gyur to/_/bzang mo dang ni shin tu bzang /_/de yis sems bzang rang bzhin gyis/_/bzod ma dga' ba dga' mo ni/_/glang mo gnyis ni byung bar gyur/_/de nas dus gcig gi tshe na rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan ltar 'khyog pa/_glog gi yal ga kun nas 'phros pa ltar kun
[\[89a.5\]]nas phye ba'i rgya che ba'i mig dang ldan pa dang /_chu 'dzin pas lci ba'i chu 'dzin pa'i 'brug gi sgras kun nas skrag pa 'dar ba'i yan lag dang ldan pa dang /_srab pa'i dpung pa'i yal ga 'phangs pas kun tu mthong zhing lci ba'i 'o ma 'dzin pa dang ldan pa dang /_ral gri'i 'od kyis snang bar byas
[\[89a.6\]]pa'i lag pa g.yas pa dpag bsam gyi shing gi rnam rtog snom pa'i dga' po de la 'khyud par byed pa dang /_rna ba'i ut+pal ltung ba dang /_lhod pa'i skra los dpung pa'i phyogs bkab pa dang rlung gis bskyod pa'i steng gi gos 'dzin par byed pa dang /_'phros pa'i rgyan gyi nor bu rnams kyi 'od zer
[\[89a.7\]]gyis lus kyi srog shing snang bar byas pa dang /_nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa la ze'u 'bru bzhin du 'jam pa'i lag pa las pad+ma chen po sar pa dris phyogs rnams kyi bar gyi dri zhim par byas pa dang bung ba'i tshogs kyis kun nas glu blangs pa dang /_gser gyi khab dang 'dra ba ge
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]sar dang ldan pa dang /_shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad can ba glang ltar ser ba'i ro dang ldan pa dang /_mtsho ma phang las yang dag par byung ba kun nas lhung ba nags kyi ri de la gcig pur gnas pa'i glang po'i bdag po de'i mdun du lhung bar gyur to/_/pad+ma de yang blangs nas des 'di ltar bsams so/_/
[\[89b.2\]]bzang mo dang shin tu bzang mo bdag gi chun ma las gang zhig dang po 'ongs par gyur pa de la bdag gi bka' drin sbyin par bya'o zhes zer te/_kun nas 'khor ba'i bung ba'i tshogs kyis nang khyab pa/_/dri zhim ze'u 'brus rnam par khyab pa'i ge sar can/_/'di ni dgod cing yid 'ong 'dab ma'i
[\[89b.3\]]chogs ldan pa/_/dga' bas pad+ma chen po rab tu sbyin par bgyi/_/de nas shin tu bzang mo dang por 'ongs ba la gser gyi rang bzhin gyi chu skyes de'i glang po'i bdag po des byin par gyur to/_/des kyang de mnos nas gus pa dang bcas par mgo bo la btags te 'dug go/_/phyis bzang mo ni kun
[\[89b.4\]]nas nye bar 'ongs nas shin tu bzang mo'i dpral 'bur gnyis kyi dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma de mthong nas nges par chu skyes 'di bdag la brnyas par byed cing chun ma 'di la tshogs kyi bdag pos byin no snyam du bsams nas/_mchog tu phrag dog skyes pas mche ba gnyis kyi bdag po de spangs
[\[89b.5\]]nas/_/gzhan gyi rnam par gnas par gyur to/_/des ni gang gi zhag la mche ba gnyis pa byin pas mthong /_/dkar po dri ni zhim pa pad+ma kha phye chun ma las/_/der ni phrag dog gis ni kun bzung rtswa ni za mi 'gyur/_/sgom pas kyang ni gzugs ni zos pas chu ni 'thung mi 'gyur/_/dam min
[\[89b.6\]]rnam rtog dgang lugs kyis/_/yid bcas skye bo su zhes bya/_/phrag dog me lce 'bar ba yis/_/bdag nyid bsreg phyir su zhes 'phel/_/gang zhig lam min mi 'gro ba/_/gang gis phrag dog lto 'phye mo/_/yid kyi khyim la lhag gnas min/_/rtag pa de rnams bde bar nyal/_/de
[\[89b.7\]]nas bzang mo ri bo 'bigs byed kyi brag gi dbus na shing gi grib mas bkag par skyil mo krung rnam par bcings te/_bsam gtan gyi g.yo ba med pa'i mig myos pa'i shang shang te'u'i mig kun nas bris pa dang 'dra ba/_chos gos dmar po yan lag la g.yogs pa'i rang sangs rgyas mthong
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]nas/_mtsho nas ku mu ta rnam par blangs nas mchod cing 'dug go/_/de nas 'phangs nas mngon par bkag pa bsgom pas nyi ma de/_/ku mu ta yi phreng ba de rnams kyis ni thub pa mdzes/_/kun nas snang bar rim min 'od zer snang ba'i yan lag can/_/thun mtshams
[\[90a.2\]]chu ni 'dzin pa ltar ni steng du skar ma yis/_/de nas glang mo de ri bo 'bigs byed kyi 'gram du gnas te/_rang sangs rgyas mchod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di las gang zhig 'bras bu 'byung ba des bdag spos kyi glang po 'di gsad pa'i phyir/_rgyal po'i btsun mor gyur cig snyam du rnam par bsams nas
[\[90a.3\]]bdag nyid lcebs par gyur to/_/lus lci bas shing gi yal ga kun nas chag pa de lhung ba'i sgra thos nas/_rma bya rnams rab bskyod pa'i mdongs sgro can ni 'phur ba ste/_/stag ni rab tu nyal zhing lta ba kun nas phye bar gyur/_/kun nas skrag pa'i rtswa yi bza' ba rnams spangs nas/_/rna ba gyen
[\[90a.4\]]song ri dgas tshogs ni 'khrug par byung bar gyur/_/de yang dus byas nas rgyal po gzhan dag la skye ba dran pa'i bu mo bcas par gyur to/_/cung zad skyes bzhin pa'i kha ma bye de ri mo gsum gyi rim pa'i skas kyi phreng ba la lhag par 'dzeg pas ngal ba skyes pa dang 'dra ba'i lang tsho sar pa'i bzo bos
[\[90a.5\]]'dod pa dang bcas pa lus kyi mdzes pa nye bar 'phel bzhin pa/_ngo tsha ba dang dgod pa'i rtse ba rab tu brtsams pa/_bung ba'i tshogs kyi skra lo ljang pa/_gser bcad pa ltar 'od gsal ba/_gzugs dang ldan pa'i dpal dang 'dra ba mi'i bdag po su zhig nyid la byin par gyur to/_/des kyang
[\[90a.6\]]rgyal po de la gzhan ma yin pa'i bud med dag 'dra ba'i bud med kyi yon tan rnams kyis dbang po 'phrogs par byas nas/_dus gcig gi tshe na tsan dan gyis rjes su byugs pa'i yan lag can dbugs kyis kun nas 'khums pa'i mchu gnyis dang ldan pa bdag nyid 'bar ba dang 'dra ba bstan
[\[90a.7\]]zhing 'dug go/_/gang gi tshe sman pa rnams kyis gso bzhin pa yang de lta bu nyid du rim gyis g.yo bas kun nas dkris par gyur pa de'i tshe/_de'i khyod shin tu dga' ba dang bral ba kun nas 'ongs par gyur to/_/des kyang de la smras pa/_bdag gi rims 'di tsan dan gyi mchog gis kyang ma yin te/_/
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]sprin las bsil ba'i rlung gis kyang ni ma yin te/_/zhi bar 'gyur ba min te shel ltar dri med pa/_/mtshan mor byed pa'i 'od zer tshogs kyang ma yin te/_/'bigs byed ri la mche gnyis lhag rgyal yod pa ste/_/chu gter dkar po 'dra ba rtsub min rwa can gyi/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar chen po de yi ni/_/
[\[90b.2\]]so rnams la ni sa skyong mu tig rnams ni yod/_/btags pa chu yi thigs pa ltar ni dri ma med pa yi/_/de rnams kyis ni gal te bdag gi lus byug pa/_/de yib sos gal te mal cha byed gyur na/_/de tshe rims 'di de nas zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/_/de nas rgyal po de nges par btsun mo 'di skye ba gzhan
[\[90b.3\]]la 'bigs byed kyi nags la gnas pa spos kyi glang po thos pa'am/_/mthong ba zhes bya ba nges par skyes nas rngon pa la bos te smras pa/_/ri bo 'bigs byed la mche ba drug pa spos kyi glang po che yod de/_/gal te ba so rnams blangs par gyur na/_/de nas bdag khyod la nor chen po rnams sbyar
[\[90b.4\]]bar bya zhes zer ro/_/rngon pas gsol ba/_gal te nus na de ltar bya zhes zer ro/_/btsun mos smras pa/_ji ltar spos kyi glang po 'di dbugs dbyung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba de'i thabs bdag gis shes te/_kha bsgyur gos ni 'dzin byed pa/_/rab tu byung ba zhig mthong nas/_/blo ldan
[\[90b.5\]]slob ma bzang po ltar/_/btud nas gnyis 'thung mchod par byed/_/khyod kyis kha bsgyur gos dag ni/_/de bas yang dag par gon nas/_/'di ni dug gis byugs pa'i mdas/_/gnad du kun nas 'bigs par gyis/_/des de ltar zhes bya ba so sor thos nas kha bsgyur ba'i gos kyis yan
[\[90b.6\]]lag dkris te mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu blangs nas ri bo 'bigs byed la song bar gyur to/_/de nas ri bo'i nags kyi nang du de'i 'chag pa mthong nas glang po che'i tshogs de dogs pa dang bcas pa glang po che'i bdag po la zhus shing 'dug go/_/kha bsgyur gos can su zhig ni/_/me stag bzhin du ser
[\[90b.7\]]skya'i mig/_/lcags kyi ka ba ltar ni lus/_/sems can skrag bzhin par ni snang /_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_kha bsgyur ba yi gos can la/_/dogs pa bya ba ma yin te/_/khyed rnams lta bar gyis shig dang /_/khrel yod zhi ba'i lam ni mtshon par byed pa po/_/thub pa rnams
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]kyis rgyal mtshan dregs pa gcod pa'i rgyu/_/gal te dmar por kha bsgyur lus la brgyan byed pa/_/gos ni skye bo rnams kyi dbugs 'byin rgyu mtshan no/_/de nas tshogs de dang shin tu ha cang ring ba ma yin par gnas pa'i rngon pa des shing gis bdag nyid la bsgribs te/_/
[\[91a.2\]]gzhu bdungs shing gnas te/_de ni pags pa'i snying po'i rang bzhin la ni kun nas 'dzin byed cing /_/glang po'i rgyal po bsad phyir gzhu rgyud la ni mde'u rnon mda'/_/shing rnams kyi ni yal ga'i lag pa ze'u 'bru'i sor mo rnams/_/rlung gis bsgul ba rnams kyis 'bigs byed log par
[\[91a.3\]]byed pa 'dra/_/smyon chus btsum byas pa yi mig can mche bar sna ni rnam bkod pa/_/smyon chus bsgos par byas pa'i 'gram pa shing las sprug par byed pa can/_/dge ba'i lam ni shes par byed pa gnyis 'thung dbang po mda' yis ni/_/ri dgas dgras ni nyes mgrin thob nas dpral 'bur
[\[91a.4\]]la ni brgyab par gyur/_/de nas gzhu yi steng 'og kun nas lhung ba ni/_/mche gnyis tshogs kyis khros pas rjes su 'gro bzhin pa/_/ri dgas dgra ni glang po'i bdag pos nyer sbas pa/_/bu ltar kun nas tshangs pa 'jigs par khyab pa ni/_/e ma dgra 'di gnod pa byas pa gang du ste/_/mche
[\[91a.5\]]gnyis bdag po'i snying rje 'di 'dra 'di gang ste/_/sa 'dzin nags kyi nang gi lha mo rnams la ni/_/nges par 'di ltar sems la ngo mtsher byung bar gyur/_/rno ba'i mda' ni nges par 'bigs pa der ni glang chen mgon po la/_/'dzag pa khrag gi cha yis mtshan pa'i kha ni cung zad 'dar byed pa/_/glang
[\[91a.6\]]po'i tshogs de shing rnams la ni dri ni zhim par grol byas te/_/mya ngan lci ba bral ba dang ni 'dab ma rnams ni phyed zad pa/_/de nas mda' de blangs nas 'don par gyur pa ste/_/cung zad mdud pa'i sna yi nang du sna yis ni/_/nan gyis glang po shin tu bzang mos glang po che'i/_/khro ba bzod pa ltar ni
[\[91a.7\]]bdag po 'di ni su zhig gis/_/sdug bsngal ldan pa glang po'i bdag po de yi ni/_/nan gyis rma ni khrag gi chu yis byug byas pa/_/rnam par chad pa'i mu tig yon tan 'dra ba yis/_/de ni bsil ba'i chu yis blangs par byas par gyur/_/skom pas chu ni rnam par 'dzin par gyur pa ni/_/smyon
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]chus bdag la su zhig dri zhim byed par 'gyur/_/de ltar bsal ba 'khor lo'i rlabs kyi sgra ldan pa/_/shin tu zla skyes mya ngan lta bur sgra don gyur/_/khyed la de ring mda' ni 'phangs pas byung ba ni/_/sdug bsngal glang po dbang po bsrabs nyid 'gyur ba nyid/_/de ltar 'khor bar byed cing bskyod pa'i
[\[91b.2\]]'gram dag la/_/rim gyis bung ba'i phreng rnams kyis ni bris 'drar gyur/_/rnam 'gro a ka ru nag du bas 'od med pa/_/rnam par bskyod pa'i glog gis dkris pas lto ba mtshan/_/sprin rnams kyi ni dpral tsha dro ba'i 'od zer ni/_/de la bde phyir lha yi dbang pos kun bsgribs gyur/_/dang ba zla skyes
[\[91b.3\]]chu dang chags pas bsil ba ni/_/rab tu rgyas pa'i me tog sna tshogs dris bsgos pa/_/gnyen ltar gnyis 'thung bdag po la ni kun 'ongs pa/_/mdas ni phigs pa de la rlung ni g.yob par gyur/_/de nas glang po'i dbang pos gal te rnam pa gang gis kyang bdag dus byed par 'gyur ba de las na
[\[91b.4\]]glang po che'i tshogs 'di ni mgon med par 'gyur ro snyam du rnam par bsams nas bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di ltar byas par gyur te/_ji ltar ri dgas shor 'di la/_/gnod byed la yang mnyes gshin pa/_/de ltar de ring bden pa des/_/bdag gi dug ni zad gyur cig_/de nas bden pa'i
[\[91b.5\]]byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus skad cig de nyid la glang po'i rgyal po de'i mdas brgyab pa'i sdug bsngal las ldog pa byung bar gyur to/_/de nas de ltar gson par gyur pa mthong nas rngon pa des btud nas rgyal po'i btsun mo'i gtam de brjod cing smras pa/_glang po'i mgon po gsod don du/_/drag po'i
[\[91b.6\]]mda' yis drag po'i yid/_/zhe sdang 'joms pa khyed la brdegs/_/snod ma yin la bdag gis ni/_/de ltar rngon pa de yi tshig/_/thos nas mche gnyis bdag pos ni/_/mche ba kun nas bton pa ste/_/lag pas bzung nas sdug bsngal med/_/khrag 'dzag pas ni nges 'brel ba/_/sna
[\[91b.7\]]de de yis mdzes par gyur/_/ban d+hu ka phreng chags pa ni/_/pad+ma dkar po 'dra ba'i dpal/_/bden pa'i tshig ni de nyid kyis/_/glang po'i mgon po de yi ni/_/dung ni chag pa ltar dkar ba/_/mche ba skad cig slar ni byung /_/de nas slar ni mche ba byung bas ngo mtshar ba/_/chu 'dzin dkar
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]po'i 'od ldan glang po'i bdag po yi/_/mche ba nye bar bzung nas nags kyi nang gnas te/_/ri dgas dgra ni sa skyong pho brang 'gro bar gyur/_/de nas mche ba mthong bas rab tu dga' ba'i yid can rgyal po des rngon pa de la ji ltar khas blangs pa'i nor sbyar zhing 'dug go/_/
[\[92a.2\]]rgyal po de yang brdzun pa'i rims de yang spangs nas mche bde rnams mthong ste/_/phyis 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_phrag dog gi gtam skye ba gzhan la nyams su myong ba bdag po la smras nas/_mig gi ut+pa la mchi ma'i chus khyab pas de dang de'i smre sngags 'don pa 'gyur te/_kye hud smad pa
[\[92a.3\]]phrag dog yon tan phyogs 'joms pa/_/gang gis bdag ni rmongs byed dam pa'i sems ldan pa/_/nags la gnas shing dka' thub pa ni zhi ba'i yid/_/tshogs kyi bdag po de ni bdag gis zad byas gyur/_/bdag nyid chen po gang gis yun ring skyong ba ni/_/glang po gzhan gyis rab tu gnod phyir
[\[92a.4\]]nus ma yin/_/di ring glang po de ni med pas kun 'khrugs pa/_/glang po'i tshogs de ji ltar nyid du byung bar gyur/_/gang gis bar chad med par smyon chu 'thung 'dod pa/_/yud tsam du ni yongs su 'khor de 'gram dag la/_/de ni med par di ring dka' thub 'khrugs pa ni/_/ring po nas ni
[\[92a.5\]]pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i nags 'gro gyur/_/yud tsam du ni glang po'i bdag po de yi gang zhig 'byung /_/dpral ba drag pas kun nas 'phros pa'i 'dab ma can/_/yun ring phyir de smyon chu cha yis bsgos pa de/_/nges par shin tu bzang mo yan lag can mi 'dor/_/rgya mtsho'i dus ni skye rags kyis ni
[\[92a.6\]]rnam brgyan pa/_/kun nas dbugs byung 'jam pa'i rtswa yi gos ldan pa/_/bdag po'i gtso bo gsod phyir bdag ni ci zhig 'dzin/_/sa las bdag la ci phyir rko ba sbyin mi 'gyur/_/de nas rgyal po de de ltar smre sngags 'don pa la rtse gcig par rngon pa des 'dzin cing 'dug go/_/btsun
[\[92a.7\]]mo mya ngan ma byed cig_/bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs che ba'i bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid chen po de slar yid 'phrog pa'i mche ba chen po byung ba/_/mda'i dug gi shugs kun nas bzlog pa'i sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_srog rnams 'dzin cing glang po che'i tshogs chen po de'i bdag po nyid
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]byed do zhes zer ro/_/de nas tshogs 'di de las thos par gyur nas ni/_/mi dbang btsun mo rab tu yid can slar gyur te/_/sa bdag kyang ni ngo mtshar bar ni song bar gyur/_/mche gnyis bdag po'i snying rje yud tsam rnams bsams nas/_/de ltar bzod pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'dod pa'i thugs
[\[92b.2\]]rje'i bdag nyid can rnams dgra bo mtshon byas kyang rab tu phog par byed pa la nus pa yod kyang bdag nyid chen po rnams bzod pa byed pa nyid do snyam du shes nas bzod pa la gus par bya zhes bya ba'o/_/glang po che'i skyes pa'i rabs te skyes pa'i rabs dgu pa'o//_//sbrul ni
[\[92b.3\]]mche ba 'phrog pa lta bu ste/_/nus pa med par khro bcas kyang ni bzod/_/nus pa yod kyang gang zhig 'dor mi byed/_/bzod pa de ni bzod ldan shes par bya/_/'di ltar rjes su thos te/_rnam par gnon pa'i tshul gyi mthus rgyal po gzhan dang chags 'og gi rgyal po las rnam par rgyal
[\[92b.4\]]ba/_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_mdzod phun sum tshogs pa mang po dang ldan pa/_gzi brjid can/_brtan shing thos pa 'dod pa la sogs pa shes rab kyi yon tan rnams kyis lhag par gnas pa/_tshogs gsum dang rjes su mthun pa'i rang bzhin can/_rang bzhin gyis mchod par byas
[\[92b.5\]]pa lho phyogs kyi bdag po ka ling ka'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i rgyal po byung bar gyur te/_lag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis 'pham dgra las rgyal byas pa'i/_/gang gi stobs rnams stobs dang ldan pa gzhan gyi yul/_/mngon par song ste mtho ba'i 'phel ba byung ba yi/_/chu yi phung po'i chu
[\[92b.6\]]rnams 'gram gyi mtha' bzhin no/_/phan tshun min pa'i rnga ldan sgra ni sgrogs byed pa/_/gang gi stobs rnams khro ba rnam par rgyas pa bzhin/_/kun nas 'gro ba'i dus su dbang du song ba ni/_/lcags kyu 'dzin pa rnams kyi ji ltar yang ni 'byung /_/de lta bu'i stobs 'byung ba 'bad pa dang
[\[92b.7\]]bcas pa rnams kyis nga rgyal ma chags pa'i mi'i bdag po de'i chags pa'i rgyun zhes bya ba gnyis skyes kyi blon po byung bar gyur to/_/rgyal po de yang rigs kyi rgyun rnam par chad pa la 'jigs pas dus gcig gi tshe na sras kyi don du lha'i bye brag du ma la nye bar song bar gyur to/_/de nas
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]chags pa'i rgyun gyis rgyal po de la gsol pa/_/btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du lhas zhugs par mdzod cig dang /_bdag gis ni lha'i sras kyi don du lha la nye bar brten par bgyi zhing rgyal srid kyang so sor bskyang bar bgyi zhes so/_/rgyal pos kyang de ltar bya'o zhes
[\[93a.2\]]mngon par brjod nas btsun mo'i 'khor du zhugs te/_yul rnams la gzhan dbang du song bar gyur to/_/chags pa'i rgyun gyis kyang rang gi ming gis mtshan ma'i yo byad kyi tshogs thams cad byas nas rgyal srid rjes su skyong ba byed par gyur to/_/ka ling ka'i rgyal pos kyang sna tshogs pa'i
[\[93a.3\]]gar dang /_glu lta zhing nyan pas snying 'phrog par byas pa/_lha'i bdag po'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang 'dra bar gzhan gyis kyang nor dang /_skye bo'i dbus su song ba rnam par gnas par gyur to/_/yid ni 'phrog pa blon po ma d+hu ka ltar skya/_/zla ba'i 'od zer kun nas
[\[93a.4\]]'phro bar byed pa 'dra/_/la la zhig gi me long nges 'brel lta can gyi/_/'gram pa dag ni smug rtsis bskus par byas par gyur/_/gzhan ni g.yo med rgyas pa'i mig can mthong ba ste/_/dgod pa cung zad bskyod pa'i mchu yi rtse mo ni/_/ut+pal sar pa la ni nyer gnas ut+pal gyis/_/dung
[\[93a.5\]]ba bskyod pa can ni 'grib par gyur pa ste/_/rgyal phyogs la la zhig ni bstan la lhag gnas pa/_/yid 'phrog thang ka'i ri mo lta bar byed pa ni/_/rkang pa sgra med sa bdag de nyid nyer 'ongs nas/_/lag pa gnyis kyis mig ni bkab pa byas par gyur/_/lag pa rnam par 'dar zhing bdag
[\[93a.6\]]dang lhan cig chog_/zhes bya mngon dga' gnas pa tshig ni chad pa can/_/nu ma dag ni gos kyis 'gebs par byed pa ni/_/pho nya mo yang 'dar ba'i yan lag 'dzin par gyur/_/khyed nyid bdag la ma 'ongs pa na srog mchog ste/_/tshig gis dgod pa bdag la lta ba 'dzin par gyis/_/
[\[93a.7\]]de ltar brjod pa'i la la zhig ni g.yon phyogs na/_/gnas pa'i bud med ji ltar yang ni mgu zhig 'dug_/cung zad bskyod pa'i sgra ni sgrogs pa rkang gdub brgyan pa yi/_/rkang pas sa yi steng du sgeg pa dang bcas gnon byed cing /_/bud med dgod cing rna ba la ni ci yang smra byed pa/_/gzhan
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]gyi bud med mig gi mda' ni phog par mtshon par byas/_/de nas ma nyams pa'i yul gyi bde ba nyams su myong bar byed pa mi'i bdag po de'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi myos pa'i bud med de rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'jam pa'i dgod pas gtam dang /_khro ba dang phrag dog gis smin ma bskyod pas
[\[93b.2\]]yid 'phrog pa'i sgeg pa rnams kyis shin tu yang snying kun nas bteg par gyur te/_kun nas dgod pa'i dus su bskyod cing mthong ba'i smin ma can/_/dgod pa'i zla tshes kun nas song ba'i gdong ba'i zla ba ldan/_/ri mo gsum gyis rnam par bskyod cing srab pa'i spu phreng can/_/bud med rnams
[\[93b.3\]]ni su yid 'phrog par mi byed de smros shig_/'phrog par byed cing gsal ba'i so yi phreng ba'i 'od ldan pa/_/kun nas zla ba'i 'od ni 'dzag par byed pa 'dra ba ste/_/bud med skye bo'i rab tu dregs pa'i rgyan can tshig rnams ni/_/la ba li ltar dri zhim po ni su zhig 'phrog mi byed/_/'gro ba
[\[93b.4\]]gsum la yang ba nyid ni de rnams song min nam/_/bde ldan de rnams nyid dang legs pa'i blo can de rnams nyid/_/skyon mang pa yi sbrul gyis nges par bsags pa brten min pa/_/rnam par sgeg pa'i dug gi ljon shing yal ga'i nags rnams kyis/_/de nas dus 'das pa dang /_btsun mo
[\[93b.5\]]sems can kun nas chags pa byung bar gyur to/_/de yi yon tan gter 'phel ba/_/nyi ma re rer mngal 'gro ba/_/mdun du 'o ma kun 'dzin pa/_/nu ma dag ni sngo bar gyur/_/pus mo'i steng du bkod byas nas/_/lag pa 'dab ma ltar 'jam pa/_/ji ltar yang ni rtag las de/_/khyod ni
[\[93b.6\]]mthong nas langs par gyur/_/sang ngam zhes bya ngo mtshar bcas/_/bu 'dod pa dag mnyes gshin par/_/yang dang yang du de mthong gyur/_/de nas zhag rnam par dag pa la dngos su gter dang 'dra ba rang gi 'od kyis mi'i bdag po'i pho brang gi nang rnam par byas pa/_'chi ba med pa'i
[\[93b.7\]]gzhon nu'i rnam pa can/_/ma lus pa'i sa la rgyan du gyur pa'i sras skyes par gyur te/_lus kyi 'od kyis zla ba yi/_/gang phyir 'od ni des 'phrog pa/_/gnyen 'dun rnams kyis zla ba zhes/_/de bas de yi ming du btags/_/sum cu rtsa bzhi'i tshad rgyal mo gzhan rnams la yang sras rnams
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]skyes par gyur to/_/de nas lo brgyad lon pa'i gzhon nu rnams gzhon nu zla ba dang lhan cig rgyal po'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i phyir bla ma gang zhig la brtad cing 'dug go/_/gzhon nu thams cad kyang ri dgas shor ba la sogs pa'i chags pa la rtse gcig pa yon tan
[\[94a.2\]]gyi cha du ma rnams kyang gzi brjid dang /_dpung pa'i stobs kyi gzhon nu zla ba lhag par gyur te/_yon tan gnyen dang blo gros bzang po skyes te shin tu lci ba bsngags par bya ba'i gnas/_/skyon ni chen po kha cig la ni skye ba'i mthar thug yang ba nyid ni bkag byas pa/_/gang phyir mi rnams rigs
[\[94a.3\]]chen las ni skyes kyang khyi dang mnyam pa mthong bar 'gyur ba ste/_/rgya mtsho rin po che yi tshogs ldan las ni chu yi nya phyis ci zhig skye bar mi 'gyur ram/_/bden par sngon po nyid mtshungs par/_/in+d+ra nI la rma bya'i mdongs/_/rin chen la gnas de bsngags pa/_/gang phyir dam pa la gnas dge
[\[94a.4\]]yon tan skyes pa la med pa/_/rnam ldan la yang 'ga' zhig tu/_/mching bu in+d+ra nI la'i mdog_/'dzin kyang de yi yon tan yin/_/de nas rgyal po de byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur nas gzhon nu de rnams la yang yul 'ga' zhig byin par gyur to/_/de nas zla ba mi'i
[\[94a.5\]]bdag pos rjes su gnang bas spun zla rnams dang lhan cig tu rang gi yul du song nas dum bu 'dzin pa'i ming gis mtshan pa'i yo byad thams cad mthong nas smras pa/_rnam pa thams cad du yul tsam gyis kho bo cag gi yab rgyal po ste/_chags pa'i rgyun nyid dang bdag po zhes bya ba'o/_/
[\[94a.6\]]gzhon nu rnams kyis smras pa/_'o na dum bu 'dzin pa'i ming 'di spangs nas rang rang gi rang gi yul gyi ming rnams bdag cag gi yo byad thams cad la bri bar bya zhes zer ro/_/de ltar bya'o zhes zla bas kyang khas blangs pa la dang por zla ba'i ming de rnams kyis 'bri zhing 'dug go/_/de yang de
[\[94a.7\]]ltar bsgrub pa rnam par shes nas dum bu 'dzin pa khros pas mchog tu 'ongs te/_bram ze rnams tshogs su bcug nas dben par smras par gyur pa/_rgyal po'i sras 'dis bdag la bdag po nyid 'phrogs pa ste/_de bas na 'dir 'di thob pa thabs gang gis kyang zla ba yid 'phrog dang rnam par bral
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]bar bya zhes bya bar khyed cag rnams kyis blta bar gyis shig_/'bras bu chung ba'am ni che ba mngon par 'don pa thob pa'i yid dang ni/_/bya ba med pa'i blo dang ldan pas skad cig tsam yang gnas par mi rigs te/_/gal te rdza mkhan 'khor lo nyin mtshan med par dbyug gus 'khor bar mi byed na/_/
[\[94b.2\]]rdza phor ram ni bum pa sa ni yod kyang 'byung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro/_/bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/_/dngos po 'di la khyed nyid thabs rtogs par nus pa zhes zer ro/_/dum bu 'dzin pas smras pa/_/gal te de ltar yin na de nas gal te rnam pa gang gis kyang rgyal po 'di rmi lam khyed rnams kyi mdun du smra
[\[94b.3\]]bar gyur na/_de la khyed cag rnams kyis smra bar bya ste/_lha lags dum bu 'dzin pa'i rmi lam gyi 'bras bu mngon par shes pa ste de nyid la dri bar bya zhes zer ro/_/de ltar bgyi zhes bram ze rnams kyis khas blangs par gyur to/_/de nas dus gcig gi tshe na rgyal po de rmi lam mthong bas snying skyobs
[\[94b.4\]]bram ze de rnams la rmi lam smra zhing 'dug go/_/bram ze rnams kyis kyang dum bu 'dzin pa ni rmi lam gyi 'don pa rig pa zhes bya ba bstan to/_/de nas rgyal po des dum bu 'dzin pa la bos nas rmi lam 'di ltar smra zhing gnas te/_rmi lam du ni ding sang grong khyer ma lus bsngags rnams kyis/_/'di ni
[\[94b.5\]]kun nas bskor ba 'od med phongs pa'i 'jig rten can/_/bcings shing lus ni kun nas btsir ba bdag ni sa skyong gis/_/shing khang sa la lus kyis kun nas khyab par bcug pa mthong /_/de bas na re zhig rmi lam 'di'i 'bras bu bla ma rnams kyis smra bar 'dod ces zer ro/_/dum bu 'dzin pas
[\[94b.6\]]smras pa/_lha lags rmi lam gyi rnam par smin pa ni dka' ba mthong ba yin te/_rgyal srid chen po las nyams pa/_/khyod kyi rmi lam 'dis mtshon te/_/zla ba gnyis kyis 'gro byas pa/_/yang na khyod kyis bsten pa'i mtha'/_/bram zar de yi tshig ni thos pas sa skyong ni/_/shi dgos zhes bya
[\[94b.7\]]'jig pa nyid ni 'ong ba'i phyir/_/skyed mos tshal gyi sa dang khyim du mngon dga' min/_/'chi ba rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par bsams bzhin pa/_/ring por yang ni yid la sdug bsngal byed pa ste/_/steng du song ba'i gdengs ka'i sbrul ltar blta dka' ba/_/lus can shin tu dor ba nyid ni smos ci dgos/_/
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]de nas rgyal po des dum bu 'dzin pa la smras pa/_slar thabs 'ga' zhig yod par 'gyur ram/_gang gis bdag rgyal srid las kun nas nyams pa'am dus ma yin par 'chi ba thob par mi 'gyur zhes zer ro/_/dum bu 'dzin pas gsol ba/_/des na lha thabs
[\[95a.2\]]gsan pa 'ongs te zla ba gzhon nu dang lhan cig gzhon nu thams cad srog chags gzhan dag kyang mchod sbyin gyi las la gsad par bya dgos zer te/_de'i khrag ni ne tso'i mchu ltar khyad par gyis ni dmar ba yi/_/gang ba yangs pa'i sar ni rdzing bu shin tu rgya che la/_/sa skyong gal te 'jug par gyur na
[\[95a.3\]]de'i phyir rgyal srid las/_/nyams pa'am ni phyi rol song ba'i bdag po'i dbang mi 'gro/_/de nas rgyal po de bdag 'tsho bar gyur pa la slar yang sras rnams lhag pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur zhes bya ba rnam par bsams nas/_gzhon nu de rnams lcags sgrog gis bcings pa blangs nas
[\[95a.4\]]dum bu 'dzin pa la mchod sbyin gyi las brtsams par gyis shig ces smras so/_/de nas gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba/_/rgyun bdun pa yi las ni rab tu 'jug par byed pa yis/_/sa skyong che ba'i sras ni med par 'khrug pa ni/_/skyon can blon po des ni rgyal po la ni smras/_/mi
[\[95a.5\]]yi zla ba zla ba de ni khyod lus skyes/_/stobs kyis brnyas pa gal te yod par mi 'gyur na/_/khyod kyi mi dge 'joms pa'i mchod sbyin cho ga 'di/_/'bras bu chen po'i phyir ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba min/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_zla ba gzhon nu ni bla ma'i skye bo la gus pa ste/_de bas na
[\[95a.6\]]bdag gi bka' las 'da' bar 'gyur ba ma yin te de bas na 'di la pho nya thong shig ces bsgo ba dang /_de ltar bya'o zhes dum bu 'dzin pas khas blangs nas rgyal po des pho nyal bos nas bsgo ba song shig gang der gnas pa'i zla ba la smros shig dang /_bdag gi drung du myur bar 'ong bar gyis
[\[95a.7\]]shig ces zer ro/_/de ltar bgyi'o zhes pho nya de yang rgyal po'i bka' nye bar 'dzin pas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du kun nas 'gro bar gyur to/_/bdag nyid chen po de yang 'khor dang bcas pa dpyid ka'i dus kyi zla ba la lhan cig byed pa'i snye ma brtsams pa dang /_a ti mu ka ta dang /_
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]mya ngan med dang /_thig le'i dris lhag par dris bsgos pa'i skyed mos tshal du cung zad zhugs te bdag nyid rnam par rtse zhing 'dug go/_/sgo ba la zhus pas zhugs par mngon par rjes su gnang ba'i pho nya de rab tu mthug pa'i mchi ma'i thigs pa 'bab pa'i gdong gis zla ba la phyag 'tshal nas
[\[95b.2\]]rnam pa gang gis kyang sems can du ma rnam par 'jig pa'i phyir nye bar brtsams pa'i mchod sbyin gyi gtam de brjod nas rgyal po'i bka' smra zhing 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' la grogs bshes dang gnyen 'dun rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di thams cad mkhyen la rnam
[\[95b.3\]]par 'jig pa'i phyir 'dug pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dum bu 'dzin pa'i g.yo'i rnam par spyod pa ste/_kye ma skyon can de'i bsdams pa can dang 'dra bar lus kyi bya ba zhi ba dang /_srin po dang 'dra bar nang gi byed pa ma dag pa'o/_/kye ma gdug pa'i bdag nyid can rnams kyi/_/yo byad rnams kyi rnam
[\[95b.4\]]pa thams cad du/_/rab zhi'i cha byad kyang ni rnam par rtsub pa'i yid/_/skye bo ngan la cung zad yid brtan mi bya ste/_/gang phyir chu skyar g.yo med 'gram la gnas kyang ni/_/kun nas 'phros pa'i nya ni gsod pa min nam ci/_/sdug bsngal nye bar len par byed pa brten pa rnams la brten pa yang /_/
[\[95b.5\]]kun nas rmongs pa skyed par byed pa nang du gdung ba nges par 'dzin/_/sbrul gyi dug ltar rma las byung ba mtha' gcig tu ni che ba ste/_/spyod pa brten bzhin min pa skye bo ngan pas bzod pa nyid du dka'/_/de bas na gzhon nus bka' stsol cig/_/ji srid du gdug pa'i bdag nyid sha za'i 'jug pa can
[\[95b.6\]]'bras bu med pa'i bram ze'i ming can dum bu 'dzin pa 'di bcings nas 'ong bar bya ba'am/_pha rol tu song ba rnams gyis mgon po'i dbang du thob par bya zhes zer ro/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bden mod kyi bdag la yang dum bu 'dzin pa'i don du cung zad khro ba mngon par sdang ba byung
[\[95b.7\]]bar gyur te/_/de ni bdag gi sreg lugs 'dzin pa chu'i rgyun dang 'dra ba'i bzod pas nye bar zhi bar song ste/_gal te yang bdag cag gi srog gis bla ma rnams yun ring por gso bar gyur na de lta na bdag cag ni don dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'o/_/de bas na dum bu 'dzin pa'i phyir khyed rnams
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]kyi khros pas tshog ste bdag gis ni 'gro ba kho nar bgyi'o/_/de nas pho nya ngo mtshar bas 'di ltar smras par gyur te/_e ma ngo mtshar ba chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du gzhon nu don dam par bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te dgra bo zad phyir kun
[\[96a.2\]]nas ldang gyur pa/_/khro ba'i sbrul ni bzod pa'i rigs pa 'gegs pa ste/_/dge legs thob la dga' ba'i bsam pa bcings rnams kyi/_/bzod brten rnams kyi snang thob de ni mdun 'gro ba/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchi ma'i chu'i thigs pa btang ba'i rang gi nang 'khor gyi skye
[\[96a.3\]]bos rjes su 'gro bzhin pa shing rta mchog la zhon te/_mchod sbyin gyi nang na gnas pa'i yab kyi drung du 'ongs te phyag btsal nas gsol ba/_rang gi srog ni rjes tshol ba'i/_/gal te yab kyis bdag btang na/_/bdag gi lus 'di mchod sbyin la/_/phyugs nyid du ni nyer brtag mdzod/_/
[\[96a.4\]]bdag gis bu khyod btang ba zhes/_/sa yi bdag pos brjod pa la/_/zla ba'i steng du sdug bsngal gyis/_/mchi ma'i thigs pa lhung bar gyur/_/gang tshe yun ring por gnas kyang /_/'chi bdag spyod yul bgrod bya ba/_/de tshe gzhan ni rnam 'jig pas/_/tshe ni gnas par su zhig 'dod/_/
[\[96a.5\]]de nas dum bu 'dzin pas mchod sbyin byed pa po de rnams la smras pa/_mkhan po rnams gson cig_/sreg lugs dang po so sor sbyin par gyur pa la gzhon nu zla ba thog mar gsad par bya ste phyis ni gzhon nu 'di rnams zhes zer ro/_/de skad smra ba'i dum 'dzin la/_/mgrin pa bteg pa'i
[\[96a.6\]]gzhon nu rnams/_/'jam pa'i yan lag ltar gyur te/_/seng ge la ni ri dgas bzhin/_/de nas gzhon nu de rnams thal mo sbyar bas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di ltar zhu ba byed cing gnas par gyur te/_bdag nyid chen po bsngags par mthong ba'i sems ldan pa/_/'jig rten la
[\[96a.7\]]byams spun zla khyed ni gnas pa la/_/bdag cag phyugs bzhin brtse med 'di ni ji ltar ni/_/dum bu 'dzin pa snying rje med pas khyer bar 'gyur/_/de nas spun zla de rnams kyis tshig gsan nas snying nas sdug bsngal bar gyur pas byams pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la kun
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]nas dmigs par gyur te/_rnam par dag pa'i sems ldan pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/_/mnyam par gzhag pa'i bdag nyid kun nas chags pa 'dra/_/ngo mtshar bcas pa'i bdag nyid mi skyong sras rnams kyi/_/lto 'phye ltar sngo'i lcags sgrog chag par gyur/_/lcags sgrog chag pas ngo
[\[96b.2\]]mtshar bar gyur pa'i rgyal po de la 'di ci yin zhes bya ba rtog pa skyes pa'i dum bu 'dzin pa de la chu yis lci ba'i chu gter byung bar gyur te/_sa ni bsgribs shing dbang phyug chen po'i mgrin ltar sngo/_/'phro ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i glog gi khro gnyer gyis/_/khros pas srin po bzhin du sgra chen sgrogs
[\[96b.3\]]par gyur/_/'dab chags grol bas rnam par 'chag pa'i shing rnams ni/_/sgra dang ldan pa rab tu skyo ba'i brag gi dkyil/_/ri bo rnams kyi rtse mo kun nas lhung byed cing /_/mi yi grogs po drag po'i shugs can rab tu rgyu bar gyur/_/mthug pa'i dra ba rdo ba'i tshogs ni mthug pa des/_/
[\[96b.4\]]de nas sprin rnams mthug las rab tu grol bar gyur/_/shin tu 'khrugs pa'i sems ldan gnyis skyes rnams kyi ni/_/oM gyi sgra ni mchod phyir dbus su zhi bar gyur/_/kun nas dkar dmar byed cing chu ni 'dzin rnams kyi/_/lto ba rnams ni 'od dang chu yi lci ba ni/_/myur du nyi ma nub par gyur
[\[96b.5\]]te rgyal po yi/_/sdug bsngal rnams la blta bar mi nus bzhin du gser las byas pa'i bum pa rnams/_/mchod sbyin sa la bzhag pas rab tu brdegs bzhin pa/_/nam mkha' las lhung rdo ba rnams kyis myur du ni/_/chag par byas pa bskyod cing kun nas sgra 'don 'gyur/_/nam mkha' las
[\[96b.6\]]lhung rdo ba rnams kyis brdegs pa ni/_/mchod sbyin me ni 'jigs pa 'dra bar rab tu zhi/_/kun nas rab tu 'phos pa'i me stag khyab pa can/_/bskyod cing lhod pa skya ba'i du ba'i tshogs dang ldan/_/glang po rnams kyi phyi ba'i lcags shubs kyis bcings pa/_/mche bas 'gram la mngon par brdegs
[\[96b.7\]]pas sa 'brel ba/_/rdo bas mngon par bsnun pa kun nas sgra sgrogs shing /_/rab tu 'phro ba'i 'od ldan me stag 'phros par gyur/_/rma bya gnas pa'i srog shing las ni kun nas lhung ba ste/_/khyim bya ro dang bral zhing 'jigs pas sgra 'don gyur/_/rdo bas kun nas brdegs pas g.yo ba'i mig
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]ldan pa'i/_/ri dgas rnams ni khyim gyi nang du zhugs par bar gyur/_/bsil ba chu gter rlung ni 'thung bar byed 'dod cing /_/rgya che'i tshang las rnam par 'byung ba'i phyed kyi lus/_/gdengs ka can gyi bu yi sgra bcas myur du rnam rgyal nas/_/lto 'phye rdo bas kun nas
[\[97a.2\]]brdegs pas rab tu zhugs/_/byang chub sems dpa' ring po nas ni yongs gsal nas/_/gzhon nu dang bcas kun nas lhung ba shugs ldan pa/_/rdo ba rnams la mi skyong du ma 'dzin bcas pa ni/_/pho brang 'jigs pa'i skye bos khyab par 'jug par gyur/_/blon po dang ni sa yi bdag po song bdag
[\[97a.3\]]la/_/glog gi 'od kyis rnam par snang ba'i lam la ni/_/thog gis mgo bo dag ni rnam par chag pa yi/_/klad pa byung ba'i cha yis nye bar gos pa'i skra ldan pa/_/mchi ma dang ldan skye bo las ni shi thos nas/_/sa yi skyong ba rnams kyis bka' la mchod pa ste/_/'jam pa'i sems nyid
[\[97a.4\]]shin tu sdug bsngal khur gyis ni/_/btsun mo glo bur du ni srog ni gtong bar gyur/_/de nas 'jigs pa'i skye bo rnams kyis nang dor ba/_/sa yi bdag po'i pho brang sgo ni chag gyur pa/_/rdob rnams kyis kun nas brdungs pas skad cig der/_/gser gyi ka ba rnams chag sgra skyes lhung bar
[\[97a.5\]]gyur/_/shi bar gyur tam 'on te 'tsho 'am ci/_/g.yo sgyu'i bsam pas sa bdag dum bu 'dzin pa dag/_/de ltar 'phros pa kun nas chu ni 'dzin pa rnams/_/khros pa ltar ni glog gi mig gis rnam bltas gyur/_/de nas tho rangs kyi dus su byang chub sems dpa' pha ma dag la mes bsreg
[\[97a.6\]]par byas te/_shi ba la chu'i snyim pa ster cing kun nas skyo ba'i blo can gyis/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dngos po thams cad skyes ma thag tu rab tu 'jig pa'o zhes bya ba legs par gsungs pa 'di la rnam par bsams nas spun zla de rnams la smras pa/_'phel phyir bu
[\[97a.7\]]yi shi bdag ni/_/mnyes gshin yid ma des spangs nas/_/bdag las 'bras bu ma thob pa/_/bdag gi ma ni gang du song /_/sa yi skyong ba bdag gi yab/_/sa ni skyong bar mdzad nas ni/_/chos 'jig dum bu 'dzin pa dang /_/lhan cig tu ni gang du gshegs/_/dran par bya yi phun
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]tshogs 'di/_/rta babs ka ba lhung gyur pa/_/bla ma'i khyim na mya ngan byed/_/sa la gcog byed rnam lhung ba/_/'di dag mi mnyam yang dag lhung /_/chags pa'i so pag 'byung ba ni/_/'od med ri ma'i rtsig pa rnams/_/bdag nyid mya ngan byed pa 'dra/_/ci zhig glu yi rab 'di/_/'on
[\[97b.2\]]te gnas kyi pho brang yin/_/khang ba zhig pa'i cha rnams ni/_/dka' bas 'di ltar dpog par gyur/_/gnas 'di pho brang yod 'gyur te/_/dpal ldan sa yi bdag po de'i/_/de ltar phrad 'dod skye bo ni/_/gzhan la smrar 'gyur mya ngan gyis/_/dpal bral rdo ba bsnun pa yis/_/ne tso khu byug shi
[\[97b.3\]]ba ni/_/sa yi bdag po'i pho brang gi/_/skyed mos tshal 'di sgom byed 'dra/_/mi gnas bde ba re can gyi/_/rgyun pa yongs su skyong byed cing /_/de ltar dgra ni rdzogs don du/_/phrad pa 'dod pa 'dra bar gnas/_/bya ba ma chad skyes rnams kyi/_/byed par 'gyur dang byed pa dang /_/byas 'gyur
[\[97b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i don du ni/_/shing bya'i sgra ni mi rtag nyid/_/bdag kyang gnas la nam mkha' ni/_/rtag pa zhes bya mngon par brjod/_/'di ltar steng du mthong ba ltar/_/khros pas mi rtag pa nyid gnas/_/gzhan dbang min par 'jug pa'i phyir/_/yid la zhi ba nyer thob pa/_/gnyen rnams
[\[97b.5\]]mnyes gshin spangs pa ni/_/chags pa bral bas bde bar gnas/_/kun nas rtog par yul rnams mngon par 'dod pa skye bo la ni srid par gnas mi byed/_/sred pas yid ni bcings pa rang bzhin gyis ni dri bcas brten pa'i thal mo 'ching bar byed/_/bsten pas gdungs pa mchog
[\[97b.6\]]du bsten par 'dod pas long ba bzhin du kun nas 'joms par byed/_/kun nas 'joms pa sdug bsngal rgyun ni kun nas brnyas pa'i nyon mongs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs/_/dka' bas rnyed pa yang ni rim gyis rab tu nyams pa'i bde ba slar ni 'gyur ba ste/_/de nyams pa la skyes pa
[\[97b.7\]]bsams pa'i me ni sbar zhing yongs su gdung ba nyid du 'gro/_/sdug bsngal 'di ni srid pa'i rjes 'brel kun nas bsags pa g.yo sgyu can gyi rgyu yin te/_/de rnams shin tu bde ldan gang rnams kyis ni yang dag chung 'dod yid rnams la ni bzhag_/de bas rgyal srid dor nas bdag_/sdug
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]bsngal mang po'i tsher ma can/_/zhi phyir zhi ba'i lam gnas ni/_/dka' thub nags su 'gro bar bgyi/_/de nas rjes skyes bya ba byas pa dbang bskur nas/_/spun zla gnyis skyes rnams kyis shis pa rtsom pa ni/_/dpal ni spangs te dka' thub rnam par 'phel ba'i
[\[98a.2\]]phyir/_/brten pa'i yid can de ni nags su song bar gyur/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/_gnod byed la yang bzod pa lhod par ma mdzad do zhes bya ba rnam par bsams nas dge ba tshol ba rnams kyis bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pas gnas par bya zhes
[\[98a.3\]]bya ba'o/_/zla ba'i skyes pa'i rabs ste skyes pa'i rabs bcu pa'o/_/sdom la/_ri dgas rma bya thub pa dang /_/sngo bsangs dka' thub gsum de bzhin/_/dga' ba'i sdom tshangs glang po dang /_/sa skyong sras ni zla ba yin//_//dam min 'jug rnams nyin rer ma gus kyang /_/gang
[\[98a.4\]]zhig rang gi khro ba 'dul bar byed/_/de ni gzhan dag rnams kyi 'gro ba yang /_/dul ba dang ldan brtan pas 'dul bar byed/_/'di ltar rjes su thos te/_dri ma med pa'i me long gi dkyil ltar chu dang ba 'ga' zhig la tshul spyod pa'i 'dab chags rnams kyi gshog pa rnam par 'phangs pas pad+ma
[\[98a.5\]]rnams kyi tshogs 'khrug par byas pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems thub pa rnams kyis 'jug ngogs la brten pa dang /_'jam pa'i rlung gis rnam par 'bigs bzhin pa'i chu rlabs kyi rgyun gyis bskul ba'i sbu ba dkar po'i phreng bas 'gram gyi ri mo 'dres par byas pa dang /_'gram
[\[98a.6\]]gyi shing rnams kyi me tog gis brag gi dkyil bkram pa dang /_skye bo bzang po'i spyod pa ltar 'jig rten thams cad la bde bar byed pa'i lto 'phye chen po'i gnas mtsho chen po la dri ma dang bral ba'i nor bu rnams kyi gdengs can gyi tshogs rnam par brgyan par byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dar dar zhes
[\[98a.7\]]bya ba'i sbrul byung bar gyur to/_/lto 'phye skye bo la yang gnas par byed bzhin pa/_/bzod pa 'dod pas de ni bsam pa nges 'brel ba/_/nam yang khro ba'i sems ni gdung byed mi 'gyur te/_/sa las skyes pa chu ni spangs pa mi ltar ni/_/rtag tu byams pa gos byed pa'i/_/mkhas pa rnams
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]kyis rig pa ste/_/sems ni grogs dang dgra rnams la/_/snying rje tha ni mi dad 'byung /_/bdag nyid chen po de yang chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i dge slong ma dka' thub pa mthong nas mi'i cha byad du byas te mdud pa dang bcas pas nye bar brten par gyur to/_/blo gros chen po de'i yang gdengs ka'i
[\[98b.2\]]nor bu dang /_lus kyi pags pa 'dra bar nye ba'i dar dar zhes bya ba'i spun zla yod par gyur to/_/de dag phan tshun du phan pas rtse gcig pa'i yid la byed pa dang /_pha rol gyi rnam par 'tshe ba'i sdug bsngal las log pa dka' thub kyi nor can dang 'dra ba'i chu 'dzin pa de la rnam par gnas par gyur
[\[98b.3\]]te/_der yang gdengs can rnams kyis rang bzhin gyi bsam pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' nye bar gnas bzhin pa la mi bzod par gyur to/_/nyams pa med kyang mi dga' ba'i tshig de dang de rnams kyis nyi ma re re zhing 'di la gnod par gyur te/_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/_/bdag
[\[98b.4\]]nyid dri bcas skye ngan gyis/_/rmongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin nyid/_/zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams la yang /_/gang phyir rgyu nyid drag nyid 'brel/_/de nas nye ba'i dar dar lto 'phye'i tshogs kyi drung nas rngan can de ma bzod cing nga rgyal gyis mngon par gnas pa'i yid can cung zad kyang bzod par mi nus shing
[\[98b.5\]]dar dar la smras pa/_dam pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin mig gis thos pa 'di rnams kyi rngan can 'di bdag cag gis ma nus pa bzhin du ci'i phyir bzod par byed/_gang gi phyir chu'i rten gzhan rnams las lhag par gnas par byas pa stobs dang ldan pa'i grogs po rnams lto 'phye'i bdag po
[\[98b.6\]]yod de/_de rnams la spro ba bskyed nas 'thab mos lto 'phye 'di rnams mtsho 'di las nges par gdon par bya ba'am/_'jig pa nyid du khyer bar bya zhes zer ro/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bzhin bzangs dam pa ma yin pa'i skye bo dang lhan cig skyes pa'i khro ba 'di so sor sdud pa'i
[\[98b.7\]]stobs kyis yongs su dor ba gyis la khyod ltos shig dang /_bzod pa'i lcags kyus gnas pa'i lam ni 'da' byed pa/_/ring por khro ba'i mche gnyis gang zhig 'gag byed pa/_/de yi yid ni nam yang 'gyod par mi 'gyur te/_/pha rol du yang ngan pa'i 'gro ba thob par 'gyur/_/lam min
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]nas 'gro ngo tsha dor bar byed pa ste/_/blo ldan rnams kyi gso ba'i ngag ni thos min pa/_/dam min skye bo chags pas smod pa'i skye bo ni/_/skad cig gis ni bzang po yang ni bzang nyid 'dor/_/gang zhig tsher ma dang bcas lam la gom pa ni/_/'jug byed de
[\[99a.2\]]las langs pa'i sdug bsngal des thob ste/_/de ltar brtags nas skye ngan tsher ma drag pa can/_/gnas pa mkhas pa bde ba don gnyer yongs su dor/_/ji srid khro ba'i me ni me stag dang ldan pa/_/sems ni sreg par byed cing 'phel bar mi 'gro ba/_/de srid skyes pas bzod pa'i chu yis rab
[\[99a.3\]]spangs pa'i/_/bde ba sbyin pa nyid ni myur du gsad par bya/_/de ltar dgra bzhin kun 'jug pa/_/nad ni kun nas 'byung ba ltar/_/bzod dgra bzod pas rgyal byas te/_/rab zhi la ni yid bzung mdzod/_/gzhan yang shin tu dga' ba ri bong can gyi 'od zer ltar dri ma dang bral ba'i chu
[\[99a.4\]]dang ldan pa'i chu'i rten rnams ni gzhan dag kyang yod do/_/nus pa med pa dang 'dra bar mtsho 'di la ci'i phyir gnas par bya/_/de bas na 'ong bar mdzod cig dang mtsho gzhan la gnas par bya zhes zer ro/_/ji ltar phu bos bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba mngon par brjod nas nu bo dang rjes su 'gro bzhin
[\[99a.5\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' shel gyi nor bu'i tshogs zhu ba dang 'dra ba'i chu skyes kyi nags kyis bsgribs pa dang /_nang du rab tu 'gro ba'i gsal ba'i nya'i tshogs kyis khyab pa dang nye bar shing gi grib mas 'gram gyi chu bkab pa dang /_/'dab chags kyi tshogs du mas bar mtshams med pa'i
[\[99a.6\]]mtsho chen por mngon par 'jug par gyur te/_de nas sa 'og kun nas 'jug par 'dod pa'i de la ni/_/brten pa rab tu zhi la nges par 'brel ba'i yid can la/_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma tshogs kyis 'dres pa sbu ba'i mchod yon ni/_/mtsho yi rlabs rnams kyis ni skyes pa 'dra bar byin par
[\[99a.7\]]gyur/_/bdag gi chu ni gtsang bar mdzod/_/de la de ltar mngon brjod cing /_/rkang drug smin ma'i ljon shing 'degs/_/pad+ma'i tshogs ldan byas par gyur/_/nor bu'i 'od kyis bslang ba yis/_/der ni de dag nub gyur la/_/dbang po gzhu dang chu de ni/_/skad cig bar mtshams med
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]gnas gyur/_/mtsho de rgya che de dag gis/_/sa 'og lhag par gnas pa ni/_/kha phye'i pad+ma ut+pal can/_/bdag nyid gtsang ba 'dra bar sems/_/de nas pad+ma chen po dang ldan pa'i chu'i gnas der rang bzhin gyis drag pa dang /_dri ma can gyi bsam pa dang ldan pa'i sbrul chen pos de dag gi
[\[99b.2\]]rang bzhin gyis nges par skyes pa'i bzang ba nyid shes nas nyi ma re rer 'di ltar rngan chen gyi dug dang 'brel ba tsha ba'i yi ge rnams smras par gyur to/_/lto 'phye nyid ni yod cing yang dag brten/_/bzod ldan nyid ni khyed cag bdag la ci phyir 'gyur/_/zab pa'i chu ldan chu bo'i bdag po'i gnas la
[\[99b.3\]]yang /_/chu rta'i gdong gi me ni bsil bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam khyab khro ba'i sreg lugs za ba yod pa la/_/bzod pa mngon par smra ba nyid 'di rigs min te/_/e ma khyed cag gi ni mi bden chen po yis/_/shin tu bdag dang skye bo yang ni slu bar byed/_/gang zhig bdag nyid bzod
[\[99b.4\]]pa dang ldan zhes smra ba/_/khros pas nye bar sbas pa lus can gyi ni sel/_/khri snyan lpags dang shing lo'i gos ni 'dzin pa yin/_/gnod sbyin de yi g.yo sgyus dka' thub brtul zhugs can/_/khro ba'i me ni yod la 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gyi ni rgyu/_/khyed gnyis bzod pa'i skye bos dad
[\[99b.5\]]par byas pa ma yin te/_/chos kyi bdag nyid ji ltar don min 'di ni khyed cag gi/_/bdag gi slad du dgod pa'i dngos po srid par 'gyur ba yin/_/de bas na bdag cag gi chu'i rten gyi gnas 'di nas 'gro bar gyis shig ces zer ro/_/chu'i sbrul de yang de ltar rgyu med par ngag rtsub par
[\[99b.6\]]smra ba mthong nas dar dar ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i blo bdag nyid nang du smras pa/_dam pa rnams kyi tshig ni tshig gi gi dgra stas 'jigs par byed cing shugs dang ldan pa ni/_/ring po nas mthong 'jigs dang bcas 'drar dam pa rnams kyi gnyen 'dun yon tan rnams kyis dor/_/de ltar gcer
[\[99b.7\]]bu bzhin du mthong nas 'dul ba nyams pas dam pa min pa'i skye bo ni/_/dam pa'i sems kyi khyim bdag mo ni ngo tsha dang ldan gnas par bsam/_/de nas sprul chen po de'i skye bo ngan pa'i dngos po'i gzhu las drangs pa'i tshig rtsub mo'i mda' rnams bzod par mi nus shing nye ba'i dar dar khros
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]pas kun nas bskyod bzhin pa'i yid so'i rtse mo rnams kyis ma mchu 'dzin cing dar dar la smras pa/_spun zla lags sbrul chen po 'di'i brnyas pa 'di ci'i phyir bzod par bgyi/_/gang gi phyir 'di ni rgyu med par nyi ma re re zhing bdag cag la de ltar lhag par rgol bar byed/_/
[\[100a.2\]]'di'i chu'i rten 'di nyos pa 'di ma yin te/_de bas na mang po mngon par brjod pas ci zhig dgos/_thog mar g.yo sgyu ldan pa 'di ni skad cig gi tshig ste/_/chos dang 'brel ba'i lam nyams rgyu mtshan med par dgrar 'dzin pa/_/glog gi rgyas pa ltar ni ser skya'i dug gi me yis ni/_/
[\[100a.3\]]sbrul chen tshogs rnams kun nas 'phro bar gdul du gtang bar bgyi/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_sdug bsngal dang ldan pa 'di'i steng du sems la smod pa chog cing chog go/_/'di ni bzod pa kho na mdzes pa ste ci'i phyir zhe na/_stobs dang stobs chung la bzod po/_/sdig bcas la
[\[100a.4\]]yang gang zhig byed/_/don dam bzod can dam rnams kyis/_/de ni 'gro bar mngon par brjod/_/don med khro ba'i me 'bar ba/_/rtsub pa'i yi ge smra ba ni/_/sman ni cung zad lan min las/_/skye ngan la gzhan yod min te/_/de bas rtsub pa'i tshig smos shig_/rgyu mtshan med par 'di yang
[\[100a.5\]]ni/_/ming smra'i ngo bos rgyal byas te/_/dam min skye bo rmongs pa'i blo/_/don med sdig pa sog byed pa/_/bdag la smod cing skye bo ngan/_/de phyir de la brtse ba nyid/_/mkhas pas bya bar 'os pa yin/_/de bas 'di 'dra'i blo ni nye bar brtsams mdzod cig/_/gzhan ni nye bar gsod phyir
[\[100a.6\]]'di ni nye bar kun langs pa/_/'dul ba min par dgra stas bdag nyid zad pa la/_/thos pa che ba rnams la snying rje nyid ni mdzes/_/de nas nye ba'i dar dar ras gus pa dang bcas pas btud nas byang chub sems dpa' la phan pa nye bar ston pa chen po rnams kyi tshig rnams ni mnga' bar bya ba ma yin no zhes
[\[100a.7\]]bya ba brjod cing bzod pa'i chu'i dbang bskur bas rang gi khro ba'i me rnam par zhi bar byas te/_skye bzang rnams kyis gnas pa chen po byas pa ni/_/sa gsum 'dul ba min pa so sor 'gog byed pa/_/yon tan nges 'brel yid ni ngo tsha dang ldan pa/_/dge ba nyid la skye bo so sor bskyang bar bya/_/sbrul
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]chen po de yang de'i bzod pa kun nas 'dris pas 'dul ba'i yi ge byang chub sems dpa'i tshig la mnyan na slar 'gyod pa dang ldan pas rgyu mtshan med par sdang ba dang nges par 'brel ba bdag la nyi ma re re bzhin du shin tu rtsub pa'i tshig mngon par brjod pa la bdag nyid chen po 'di nyung ba yang
[\[100b.2\]]sems la rtsub pa skyes pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba de bas ni/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar chen po zhes bya ba rnam par bsams nas/_bla ma dang 'dra bar so sor blta bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ongs nas/_bzod par gsol zhing rnam pa mang po'i gtam 'di ltar smra bar gyur te/_yang
[\[100b.3\]]dang yang du rngan chen 'di ni bdag gis byas/_/khyed kyi yid ni 'gyur ba dang ldan ma mdzad de/_/khyed ni nges par gdengs can rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/_/thub pa chen pos kyang ni lto 'phye nyid ni mdzad/_/sbrul nyid 'jigs par byed pa 'di ni gang du ste/_/shin tu zhi ba dang ldan yid ni gang du yang /_/
[\[100b.4\]]bskor bar byas nas sdang ba nyid ni spangs byas te/_/'dab chags rgyal po yang ni khyod la mchod par byed/_de ltar sbrul chen po de rtsub pa'i tshig rnam par zlog ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba'i rjes su 'jug pas rang gi gnas su 'ongs te rang bzhin bzang po bzung bar gyur to/_/de
[\[100b.5\]]ltar na bcom ldan 'das des byang chub kyi spyod pa la gnas nas/_lto 'phye'i skye gnas su gnas kyang /_/bzod pa goms pas drag po'i yid can rnams kyang bzang po nyid du nye bar khyer ba zhes bya ba rnam par nges nas bzod pa la yongs su 'dris par bya'o/_/dar dar gyi skyes pa'i rabs te skyes pa'i
[\[100b.6\]]rabs dang po'o//_//brtson 'grus med par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ni/_/'gro bar sbyar phyir chung ba'ang thob pa min/_/de ltar ngal ba rtsi bar ma byas par/_/skal ba chen po rnams ni brtson 'grus rtsom/_/'di ltar rjes su thos te/_dri ma med pa'i chu 'bab pa'i lcang ma'i phreng
[\[100b.7\]]bas 'gram gyi ri mo sngo bar byas pa 'ga' zhig tu ka ran ta ka'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'gro bzhin pa'i bskyod pa'i nya'i tshogs kyi chu'i dkyil khyab pa dang /_rab tu brkyang ba'i gos ltar dkar ba'i 'gram dang ldan pa'i chu bos kun nas 'phangs pa'i sa 'dzin gyi logs dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig la nags
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]kyi mes phyed tshig pa yongs su smin pa'i skyu ru ra dang /_phreng ba dang /_rgya shug rnams kyis sa'i dkyil khyab pa dang /_mar ka ta'i khab ltar ku sha'i myu gu sngon pos nye bar bsags pa dang /_'ga' zhig tu phag rnams 'jug pas kun nas skrag pa dang /_kun nas
[\[101a.2\]]grol bar gyur ba'i rdzing gi 'gram gyi mtha' dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan du ri dgas kyi shas me sbar bas rab tu nyal ba'i stag rnams kyis phug gi sgor lhag par gnas pa de/_sna tshogs pa'i yal gas bskor bas kun nas bskor ba'i dma' pa dang /_'khyog pa'i ri mos mtshan pa'i shing rnams kyi sdong
[\[101a.3\]]bu dang ldan pa/_mthug pa'i 'dab ma can gyi 'od ma'i nags kyis bkab pa'i mdun ma can gyi ri'i sul bar pa dang ldan pa'i nags kyi nang na byang chub sems dpa' ri dgas kyi tshogs kyi bdag po byung bar gyur to/_/bdag nyid chen po des kyang dam pa'i spyod pa mi'i bdag pos rgyal srid rjes su
[\[101a.4\]]skyong bar gyur pa dang 'dra bar ri dgas kyi tshogs gang du yang 'jigs pa med par 'phel ba chen por 'gro bar gyur te/_ri dgas 'phrog byed mgrin pa ltar ni sngo ba'i rgyab/_/seng ge ltar ni bsam ldan sngo ba'i rtswa za zhing /_/dam dang dam min lam shes ri dgas rnams de ni/_/slob bzangs
[\[101a.5\]]mkhan po la ltar de la rjes 'gro gyur/_/de nas dus gcig gi tshe na ri dgas shor ba la dga' bas/_sa'i bdag po su zhig gi ri dgas kyi tshogs de rngon pa'i drung nas rna ba'i lam du song bar gyur to/_/rgyal po de yang gzhu 'dzin pa'i rta'i mchog la lhag par zhon pa/_/dmag tshogs kyis
[\[101a.6\]]bskor ba nags der 'ongs nas/_/ring po nas ri dgas kyi tshogs de lta zhing gnas te/_de nas skyugs ldad spangs te gyen du lta ba'i gdong /_/khri snyan sa le mda' ni mda' phogs dogs pa can/_/mda' yi yul du ri dgas khyer 'dod mi yi dbang po ni/_/dmag gi mdun du song ba lta zhing
[\[101a.7\]]gnas par gyur/_/g.yer kha'i sgra ni kun nas 'byung ba rnams mthong nas/_/gsod 'dod dmag tshogs de ni gzhu ni gzhu rgyud bdungs/_/mig gnyis bskyod pas blta ba'i ri dgas rnams kyis bskor/_/tshogs kyi bdag po des ni 'di ni nges par bsams/_/sa bdag bde ba skyong
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]ba bde ba don gnyer ni/_/skye dgu 'jigs pa ma skyes dge ba brten pa'i phyir/_/bdag la song ba kun nas ngal ba ma bsams nas/_/srung byed de ni gang zhig phongs pa la yang srung /_/'jigs pas 'khor ba rgya che'i mig ldan 'di rnams ni/_/kun nas zag pa'i khrag gis sa stengs sbangs pa ni/_/
[\[101b.2\]]ri dgas rnams ni mdun du lhung zhing lus 'phros pa/_/mda' rnams kyis ni bsnun pa ji ltar blta bar 'gyur/_/de ltar ri dgas 'di rnams ri dgas gsod pa yi/_/mda' ni rnon po rnams kyis ji srid bsnun min pa/_/stobs kyis de srid 'jigs pas bskyod pa'i mig ldan pa/_/'di
[\[101b.3\]]rnams la ni bsrung ba'i don du 'bad par bgyi/_/nags 'di yang dmag gi tshogs 'dis kun nas yongs su 'phangs pa ste/_de bas na phyogs gang gis ri dgas kyi tshogs kun nas 'bab par bgyi zhes bya ba kun nas bltas te/_yin mod thabs 'di rnyed de/_ri'i chu bo 'di las rgal nas ri
[\[101b.4\]]dgas rnams la bde bar 'gyur zhes bya ba brtag par bgyi'o/_/rim pa gcig gis ri dgas 'di rnams myur du chu 'bab pa'i rgya mtsho'i chun ma 'di la rgal bar nus pa ma yin no zhes zer ro/_/de bas na 'di 'dir thob pa de chu bo 'di'i dbus su gnas pa bdag gi rgyab la gom pa 'dor zhing ri dgas
[\[101b.5\]]'di rnams bde bar 'gro bar 'gyur snyam du rnam par bsams nas/_'gram gyi shing gi rtse mo la rab tu 'bab pa'i chu 'ga' zhig la kun nas bskor ba'i 'khor dong gi dbus su mnan pas sbu ba'i tshogs rnam par 'khrug pa'i sa 'dzin gyi chu bo de la dbus su zhugs nas bdag nyid brtan par byas te/_
[\[101b.6\]]bdag nyid chen po des ri dgas rnams la smras pa/_'gram 'di las ni kun mchongs te/_/bdag gi rgyab tu gom bzhag nas/_/dka' ba 'di la tshogs mtshungs pa/_/myur du 'jigs med song shig go/_/cha shas ldan phyir bdag gi lus/_/chos med phyir yang don med de/_/khyed
[\[101b.7\]]cag bsgral pas snying po 'di/_/shin tu ring nas thob par 'gyur/_/gzhan phan pa la rgyab phyogs pa/_/gang tshe lus kyi rma de tshe/_/gang tshe gzhan la phan dmigs pa/_/lus kyi rin chen 'di de tshe/_/gal te khyed cag mi skyong dmags bye gis rjes 'brel ba/_/bdag ni 'jigs pas
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]yongs su skyong bar nus pa ni/_/bdag gi tshogs kyi bdag po nyid kyi dgra 'di ni/_/de phyir sa la di ring 'bras bcas 'gyur ba yin/_/de ni re zhig nyid du de phyir 'ong bar mdzod cig dang /_/ji srid khyed rnams la yang rnon po'i mda' rnams lhung min pa/_/bdag
[\[102a.2\]]gi rgyab ni mi g.yo chu bo'i chu la zam gyur la/_/zhon nas dmag tshogs 'jigs pa 'di la kun nas rgal bar mdzod/_/de nas ri dgas de rnams shi ba'i 'jigs pas tshogs kyi bdag po'i rgyab la gom pa bzhag nas chu bo'i chu las rgal nas 'gram gnyis pa la nye bar 'gro ba'i phyir kun nas
[\[102a.3\]]brtsams par gyur te/_/ji lta ji ltar shin tu lhung ba de yi ni/_/rgyab tu skrag pas rnam bskyod mig can ri dgas rnams/_/de lta de ltar ri dgas tshogs ni 'dzin pa 'di/_/myur du rmig pa rnams ni brtan nyid song bar gyur/_/de nas ri dgas rnams kyi bdag po'i sha ni kun nas brkos pa'i khrag_/
[\[102a.4\]]rmig pa gnyis kyis kun nas thigs pa de yi rgyab ni 'dzag par gyur/_/ri dgas tshogs ni ri yi mtha' mar 'gro zhing ring nas blta byas te/_/sdug bsngal ma brtsis pa ste de ni dag pa nyid la dmigs par gyur/_/sems can yongs su skyong byed pa'i/_/thabs dang de bzhin stobs kyis kyang /_/
[\[102a.5\]]nang gi dga' ba'i rgyud pa ni/_/chen po rnams kyi sdug bsngal 'gegs/_/de nas rgyal po de ri dgas kyi tshogs kun nas bsgral ba'i phyir chu bo'i dbus su zam par gyur pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po mthong nas/_/ngo mtshar bas 'ongs te mda'i stan rnams la mda' rnams 'dzin par byed pa'i dmag
[\[102a.6\]]gi skye bo la smras pa/_/gang la la zhig ri dgas la rdeg par gyur na de ni bdag la gshed ma zhes bya ba'o/_/de nas gdams ngag thos nas ni/_/sa bdag de yi skye bo de/_/skad cig mda' dang sbyor bral ba/_/gzhu yi rgyud rnams byas par gyur/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang ri dgas thams cad
[\[102a.7\]]ci zhig rgal bar gyur tam 'on te ma yin zhes bya ba phyi nas lta zhing shin tu yang 'jigs pas bskyod pa'i mig can tshogs 'dra bar gyur pa lta bar byed cing /_ma nus pas gom pa gzhag par spro ba med par phyogs gang nas 'gro bar bya zhes/_res kyis 'dre ba'i snying dang ldan pa'i ri dgas kyi phrug
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]pa gcig mthong bar gyur to/_/mthong nas kyang mchog tu snying rjes dmigs par gyur te/_/dogs pa dor cig byang chub sems dpa' khyod la ni/_/byis pa gcig pur 'dor bar 'gyur ba ma yin te/_/bung ba'i sgra rnams kyis ni de ltar me tog ldan/_/shing rnams de la dbugs ni 'byin pa'i
[\[102b.2\]]'drar gnas 'gyur/_/de nas tshogs kyi bdag po chu bo de las so sor rgal te/_/ri dgas kyi phrug pa de la smras pa/_/bdag gi rgyab tu bu 'dzegs nas/_/shi ba'i sdug bsngal rnams grol gyis/_/khyod ni chu bo'i pha rol du/_/'gram 'di nas ni bdag gis khrid/_/gang gis 'jig
[\[102b.3\]]rten srid rgyal mtshos/_/rgal phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni/_/de khyod rgal bar mi 'gyur ba/_/chu bo'i chu las ji ltar cig_/de nas de ni 'di la zhon/_/ri dgas phrug pa brtson ldan la/_/chu bo rlabs kyi phreng ba can/_/snying rje dmigs pas 'dzin par 'gyur/_/khyed kyi rgyab la rma
[\[102b.4\]]rnams 'di dag shin tu ni/_/sdug bsngal shin tu skyed par byed pa yin nam ci/_/de ltar smra ba bzhin du kun nas rgal ba ni/_/chu bo rlabs kyi lhag pa rnams kyis de la smras pa/_de nas tshogs kyi bdag pos ri dgas kyi phrug pa de chu bo de las bsgral bar byas nas rab tu dga' bas rgyas
[\[102b.5\]]pa'i mig can ma dang yang dag par sbyar zhing gnas so/_/de nas sa la pus mo dag/_/mthong 'dod ri dgas phrug byas te/_/nu ma 'o ma 'byung ba dag_/myur du ma yis 'dzin par gyur/_/de ni kha 'di log byas nas/_/nu ma 'thung bas g.yo ba'i gdong /_/lce yi rtse mo bskyod pa yis/_/
[\[102b.6\]]mnyes gshin pas ni ldag par gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun nas ngal ba'i dbang gis rmig pa'i rma'i sdug bsngal gyis lus kyis 'bad pa nus pa/_ji ltar yang ni rmig mtshan rtsa ldan btsal byas nas/_/rim gyis ri dgas rnams kyi lam ni kun 'khrug pa/_/dal bus
[\[102b.7\]]khrag gis brlan pas sa la 'dug nas ni/_/ngal ba bsags pa de ni skad cig ngal bso gyur/_/gnas skabs 'di ni snying rje med pa 'di ring bu/_/ma ni yod kyang bdag gis khyod ni khyer byas pa/_/de nas yan lag smras pa snying rjes rjes gdungs pa/_/de la lta bzhin pa ni myur du
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]ngu ba 'dra/_/rgyal po de yang chu bo de las rgal nas 'khor dang bcas pa rta las babs te/_ngo mtshar ba'i yid can bdag nyid chen po de dang nye bar 'dug par gyur to/_/tshogs kyi bdag po de yang rgyal po de mthong nas smras pa/_langs par 'os pa mthong nas
[\[103a.2\]]ni/_/ngal bas bdag ni nyams byas pa/_/gang phyir khyod la bdag ma langs/_/'di ni bdag gis ma gus min/_/de nas rgyal po de gus pa dang bcas pas nye bar 'dug ste bde'am zhes dris te/_tshogs kyi bdag po la 'di ltar kun nas brten cing smras pa/_ngo tsha med pa gzhan la nye bar
[\[103a.3\]]'tshe phyir mtshon bzung ba/_/longs spyod 'dod pa rab rib kyis ni blo yi mig 'gag pa/_/bdag cag lta bu mi yi phyugs rnams kyis ni chos shes khyod/_/snying rje'i grogs po ri dgas thub pa khyod ni mchod par bya/_/mi skyong bran rnams 'thab mo'i dus la mi 'jigs pa/_/bdag nyid srung
[\[103a.4\]]bar byed par 'dod pas 'dzin pa ste/_/rang gi tshogs la bsrung bar mkhas pa thams cad du/_khyed kyi tshul gyis sa skyong rnams kyis tshul las rgyal/_/gal te bran ni mang po g.yul ngo yi ni dbus gnas pa/_/sa skyong la ni yongs su skyong byed 'di las ngo mtshar ci/_/ri dgas mang po 'di rnams
[\[103a.5\]]khyed ni gcig pu zhes bya bas/_/gang phyir skyong bar byas pa de ni 'dir ni ngo mtshar te/_/yon tan mang zhing snying rje ldan pa khyod kyi 'di/_/yon tan bral zhing snying rjes rnam bral chung ba ni/_/bdag gis mi nyid 'di ni ri dgas nyid khyab par/_/'thob pa'i phyir ni nye bar dgod par 'dra bar byed/_/
[\[103a.6\]]de ltar mngon par brten nas rgyal po des tshogs kyi bdag po la dris pa/_gzhan la phan pa la mkhas pa'i brtson 'grus 'dis khyod yang go 'phang ci lta bu zhig mngon par 'dod/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po gson cig_/sangs rgyas nyid ni rtogs bya'i phyir/_/bdag
[\[103a.7\]]gi brtson 'grus brtson ldan rnams kyi mchog_/ri dgas nyid la'ang ci nus par/_/yod pa 'di ni nyams mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar bdag gi ri dgas 'di rnams 'jigs pas khyab/_/'jigs pa'i shugs can chu bo'i chu las rab rgal ba/_/de ltar nyon mongs mang pos kun khyab 'gro ba ni/_/srid
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]pa'i sdug bsngal chu 'dzin pas ni rgyal gyur cig/_/rgyal po chen po brtson 'grus la rgyab tu phyogs pa'i stobs dang ldan pas kyang mngon par 'dod pa'i go 'phang la mngon par 'gro bar nus pa ma yin te ltos shig dang /_le los grogs dang bcas pa yang /_/skye bo 'char bar 'gro ba min/_/
[\[103b.2\]]lag pa'i rtse mo sar brdabs pa/_/pho long chu yis bangs pa bzhin/_/gzhan yang /_mkhas pas kyang ni le lo'i blo can bde ba yi ni rten/_/gnas ni mtho bar mngon par 'gro bar nus pa ma yin te/_/gzings ni skya ba 'dzin pa rnams kyis bskul ba ma yin pa/_/rgya mtsho'i pha rol
[\[103b.3\]]yun ring pos kyang 'gro ba ma yin no/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ri dgas kyi tshogs kyi bdag pos yang dag par mngon par smras pa ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_grags pa rnam par dag pa'i rigs las skyes pa yang ni longs spyod 'byung bar rab grags pa/_/'dun pa rnams la mkhas pa'i
[\[103b.4\]]gral ni mchog tu shin tu mkhas pa nyid kyis thob pa yang /_/le los yid kyi re ba lan cig yang ni skyes pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ma yin te/_/gzhu rgyud la ni brtad pa'i mda' yang 'phen pa po yi 'bad pa med par 'ben la mi 'gro'o/_/de bas na 'di ltar brtson 'grus la dmigs pa khyod
[\[103b.5\]]kyis sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang rtogs par nus pa zhes bya ba'o/_/gang dag zhi ba'i go 'phang 'dzeg 'dod pa yi ngang can 'dir ni nyon mongs rnams kyis bsam pa mi phyed pa/_/khyed las sngar ni bya ba byas shing smon lam byas pa'i skye bo byang chub la slob pa/_/de rnams kyis ni lam la rta ltar

[\[112b.1\]]nang bsags pa/_/rgya shug shing gis bzung zhing skyes pa ku ba'i shing /_/gnas la stod g.yogs bral ba'i 'ug pa'i snang bas brten/_/tshang las lhung bas dbus su brlan pa 'ga' zhig tu ni nang /_/phug ron sgo nga'i dum bu rnams kyis khyim gyis bsags pa/_/gzhan du rno zhing 'dres pa

[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]nas 'phel ba'i mdzes pa'i gtam 'byung ste/_/sgeg pa'i nyams kyis 'jam pa'i b+ha ra ta yi gar ni 'di las 'byung 'gyur te/_/rten nas 'jigs par 'gyur ba ci zhig 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa/_/e ma de ltar grong khyer 'di ni phug ron rnams kyi skad kyi smra ba 'dra/_/

[\[116b.4\]]dpyad nas khyed ni rnam dpyod la mkhas pa/_/so sor 'jigs pas lto 'phye dang mtshungs srid pa rnams/_/zhi ba'i lam la yid kyi re ba rnams zhugs nas/_/brtson 'grus rang bzhin shing rta la ni lhag gnas mdzod/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' e ma'o legs par bshad pa

[\[117a.1\]]la/_brad par 'dod pa chu dang bcas pa'i chu 'dzin pa ltar sngo ba nags kyi ma he'i khyu mchog rnams yod pa la/_dri zhim pa'i tsan dan gyi shing gi sdong po rnams la bde blag tu kun nas bskor ba'i lto 'phye rnams yod pa la shin tu drag pa'i nyi ma'i 'od zer 'khyud pas

[\[118a.1\]]yis/_/rgya mtsho rnams ni 'bar ba'i 'od can nor bu 'dzin/_/chu gter rnams ni shel spyad ltar dkar chu yi ni/_/shing rnams 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa chen po yang /_/khyed cag lta bu gzhan don yun ring por ni thob/_/khyed kyi tshig skud rnams kyi yon tan

[\[118b.1\]]nor chen po dang ldan pa'i nor can zhes bya ba'i rgyal po byung bar gyur to/_rgyal po des sras kyi don du sna tshogs pa'i lha nye bar mchod pa la rtse gcig pa'i dus gcig gi tshe na btsun mo'i lto bar byang chub sems dpa' btsas par gyur te/_ji lta ji ltar mngal gyis kun la le lo can/_/

[\[121a.1\]]pa bgrang phring yongs su 'dren pas lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang sor mo bskyod pas cung zad bzlas pa'i dbang gis kun nas 'phro ba'i mchu dang ldan pa/_me stag gis kun nas ser skya'i mig dang ldan pa/_kun nas smin pa'i 'bras kyi rtse mo dmar ba ltar skra
[\[121a.2\]]dang smar ser skya dang ldan pa/_bsnyungs pa rnams kun nas rid pa'i lus ma khros kyang khros pa dang 'dra ba'i bram ze srin po'i gzugs dang 'dra ba'i rig pa smra ba de mthong nas 'jigs pa'i yid kyis bsam zhing gnas so/_/rig pa 'dzin pa 'di sngags kyi mthus nges par bdag khyer bar 'dod pa

[\[125b.3\]]du ni 'dod pa'i lha yi glags tshol ba/_/mda' rnams kyis ni 'ben du gyur pa 'byung bar gyur/_/de yang bung ba gnyis ltar ut+pal mig can dgag byas pa/_/yan lag med pa ltar ni gzugs ni mdzes pa de mthong nas/_/g.yo bar gyur pa'i me tog mtshon chas rnam par rgyas bzhin pa/_/

[\[125b.5\]]sdug bsngal de ni bsams ma gyur/_/nor ni 'dod pa 'ga' zhig tu ni mthong nas gter ltar ni/_/yul gzhan song ba ltar ni grogs po rgud pa la gnas pa/_/gang phyir 'jig rten dam min skye ba ma brtsams pa thob nas/_/phal cher gnyen dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dran par mi 'gyur

[\[126a.1\]]grong khyer dang 'dra bar lhag par mdzes pa can byed du bcug go/_/de nas dpyid ka'i zla ba la me tog 'byung ba'i sna tshogs pa'i shing rnams la 'dod pa'i lha gnyid log pa ltar shin tu 'jam pa'i skad kyis khu byug ma rab tu sad par byed cing khyo shi ba ltar mtshan mo rnams rab
[\[126a.2\]]tu thung bar gyur cing /_zhag bzang po la rnam pa sna tshogs pa ngo mtshar ba'i ltad mo dang bkra shis par byed bzhin pa'i mi'i bdag po'i pho brang du bag ma len pa'i dus shes nas/_rgyan rnams 'dogs pa la mkhas pa'i bud med gzhon nu ma rnams kyis mi 'am ci mo la rgyan gdags pa'i phyir

[\[126a.7\]]tsha bas mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs spyod pa dang 'dra bar ngo mtshar bas 'di skad smra zhing 'dug go/_/legs pa'i lus can de ring gi bar du yang bdag cag la tshig gi bdud rtsi rjes su 'dzin par ci'i phyir mi byed de/_khyed ni 'di ltar bgo skal mi spyod pa'i ngang tshul can ci ltar yin zhes zer te/_khyed kyi so
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]yi 'od zer ge sar rtse mo la/_/bdag gi lta ba'i bung ba mo ni kun nas 'khor/_/lta ba'i phyir ni mngon par 'dod par byas pa ni/_/'jigs ma bzhin gyi pad+ma yid 'ong dgod pa yis/_/ri bong can ltar mdzes ldan dus gcig tshe na des/_/gnyid brdzun btab pas 'di yi bzhin la lta bas brel/_/des

[\[129b.1\]]'on te ci zhig 'di ni bdag gi bu mo snyam du sems shing dga' bas mchi ma'i thigs pa byung bar gyur pa las mig gi rdzi ma rlon par byas te/_de nas pha la kun nas mnyes byas shing /_/mi'am ci mos myur du ma la yang /_/dga' ba'i yid can spun zla mo rnams kyang /_/dgod pas mtshon bya yid
