[\[130a.3\]]'jog_/snying rje'i bdag nyid khyed la cung zad smra bar byas nas ni/_/de srid du ni rlung gi lam nas myur bar rab tu 'gro/_/thub pas smras pa/_bzang mo bdag la 'di ltar shin tu dgos pa bya bar khyod 'os pa ma yin te/_rngon pa 'di yis don yod pa/_/zhags chen yod ces mi
[\[130a.4\]]shes shing /_/drang po nyid du bdag gis ni/_/de tshe bden par khyed gtam byas/_/gnod byed la yang sdang ba ni/_/bdag la med na khyod ci smos/_/mi shes pas byas bdag gi skyon/_/de bas yid 'phrog ma bzod mdzod/_/de nas mi'am ci mo des drang srong de la mngon du phyag
[\[130a.5\]]btsal nas smras pa/_gang zhig bdag gis rtsub smras pa/_/khyod kyi sems la rab tsha ba/_/brtan pa dmigs nas de thams cad/_/bdag la yang ni bzod par 'os/_/sman chen bdud rtsi 'di dang ni/_/dam pa yi ge 'di yang ni/_/bdag nyid chen po de nyid la/_/sor gdub 'di yang
[\[130a.6\]]sbyin par mdzod/_/de yang khyed kyis bdag gi tshig gis 'di ltar brjod par mdzod cig_/ci ltar bdud rtsi 'dis ma smin pa bkres pa dang skom pa dang ngal ba bsal ba'i phyir nye bar sbyar bar byas nas yi ge 'di mthong ste/_mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i pho brang du 'ong bar mdzod cig ces smras te/_
[\[130a.7\]]thabs yod pa dang brtson 'grus dang /_/bdag la mnyes gshin chen pos ni/_/bral bas dub pa bdag blta phyir/_/khyod ni ci ltar 'ong mi 'gyur/_/gzhan yang drang srong chen po/_bud med rnams kyi nyal po'i gtam/_/bla ma rnams kyi mdun mi rigs/_/bya ba la gus 'di dag
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]la/_/ngo tsha nges par 'gegs par byed/_/thub pas smras pa/_khyod kyi gtam 'di thams cad bdag gis nor bzangs la smra bar bya yis khyod ni bde bar 'dug cig ces zer ro/_/de nas mi 'am ci mo de drang srong de la gsong por smras nas/_slar yang nam mkha'i dbus su song ste yab
[\[130b.2\]]kyi pho brang du nye bar song bar gyur to/_/yun ring po ma yin par song ba de la yang /_sa bdag de ni dpung gi stobs kyis rgyal nas rgyal ba po/_/yon tan nor can nor bzangs kyis ni de las nor 'dzin te/_/bdag nyid chen pos de la rang gi yul ni rab byin nas/_/nyi ma nub nas dpal ldan yab kyi grong
[\[130b.3\]]khyer 'ongs par gyur/_/ljon pa'i bu mo yan lag skems pa bdag gis mthong 'gyur ram/_/rang gi mdzes pas ri bong can gyi cha ltar mdzes pa bzhin/_/de las kun nas 'bri zhing yid re'i skya ris kyis/_/'di ltar yang nas yang du phrad 'dod 'dis ni bsams par gyur/_/phyi nas
[\[130b.4\]]rim gyis nye bar 'ongs te lag pa gnyis kyis ni/_/de yi mig gnyis glo bur dag tu 'gebs gyur pa/_/de ltar phrad par 'dod pa'i ngo mtshar bdag gis di ring ni/_/nyi ma 'das par yang ni rab tu dga' bas mtshon pa min/_/de nas nor can gyis nor bzangs rnam par rgyal ba rnyed nas
[\[130b.5\]]grong khyer dang nye bar 'ongs pa thos nas/_nor bzangs la glo bur nyid du mi'am ci mo dang bral ba brjod par bya ba ma yin te/_nam zhig des thos nas srog nyid yongs su dor bar 'gyur snyam du rnam par bsams nas/_sgo ba la smras pa/_song la nor bzangs la 'di skad ces
[\[130b.6\]]smros shig_/skyed mos tshal du mtshan mo gcig_/lo gcig dang 'dra bkas sdod mdzod/_/de nas nang par zhag bzang la/_/bu khyod pho brang du zhugs shig_/sgo ba des kyang rgyal po'i bka' bzung nas nor bzangs can du nye bar 'ongs te de skad ces smras par gyur to/_/nor bzangs
[\[130b.7\]]kyis kyang de ltar bya'o snyam du bsams nas skyed mos tshal du zhugs te/_mal gyi steng du lhag par gnas nas yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis gnyid kyis phebs par ma gyur cing 'di snyam du sems te/_de ring gnyid 'di khros pa bzhin du ji ltar mig dag la/_/brten
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]par phrad par 'dod pa bdag gi 'dzums par byed pa min/_/des kyang 'di 'dra bdag gi gtam gyis di ring nges par ni/_/grogs mo rnams dang lhan cig tu ni mtshan mo 'da' bar byed/_/de nas nyi ma gzhan la pho brang du zhugs nas/_pha dang ma dag la mngon par
[\[131a.2\]]phyag btsal te/_gnas pa'i khyim du 'ongs nas mal du yang dag par nye bar zhugs shing /_sgo skyong ma la smras pa/_bzang mo song la/_bdag gi tshig gis yid 'phrog ma la smros shig dang /_/bral bas phrad par 'dod pa'i yid can bdag la ni/_/gzhon nu 'jigs pa ci phyir drung du
[\[131a.3\]]'ong mi byed/_/ci phyir rang bzhin gyis ni lci ba'i ngo tsha 'di/_/bud med skye bos de ring yang ni khyod 'dzin byed/_/de nas sgo skyong ma de la yid 'phrog ma de ni ga la yod de gang zhig la 'gro bar byas/_bdag gis 'di skad smras par gyur snyam du rnam par bsam zhing mya ngan gyi dbang gis mchi ma'i chus
[\[131a.4\]]rnyogs pa'i lta ba byung bar gyur to/_/de nas dogs dang bcas pa'i yid can nor bzangs kyis sgo skyong ma de la smras pa/_song la skems pa de la smros shig_/bdag gis 'dod bcas smras pa gang /_/bzang mo khyod la bde ba 'di/_/mchi mas rnyogs mig ci phyir skyes/_/yang na khyed kyis
[\[131a.5\]]mchi mas brjod pa ste/_/dga' mo de ni dus kyi dbang song zhes/_/'di ni 'khrul pa nyid du nyer song ba/_/bdag yid de ltar na yang the tshom za/_/de nas nor bzangs kyis myur du langs nas mngon par song ste ma la dris par gyur to/_/ma lags yid 'phrog ma 'di gang na yod ces smras so/_/de nas
[\[131a.6\]]btsun mos 'di ni yun ring po ci tsam du bslu bar nus par 'gyur snyam du rnam par bsams nas dben pa'i sar mi 'am ci mo dang rnam par bral ba'i gtam de nor bzangs la smras pa/_de nas btsun mo'i tshogs de thos par gyur nas ni/_/yid 'phrog ma khyod da ni gang du song zhes smras pa
[\[131a.7\]]ste/_/mi g.yo mnyam pa'i rtsa ni rdo rjes bcom pa ltar/_/nor bzangs sa la brgyal zhing 'gyel ba nyid du gyur/_/yun ring pos kyang 'du shes so sor rnyed pa mngon par langs te/_ngu bzhin pa'i mas lta bar gyur pa/_gos phrag par 'dzin pa/_rang gi 'khor gyi skye bos spangs nas nyi
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]ma ri'i rtse mor nub pa la dmigs pa la de dang de'i smre sngags 'don cing smyon pa nyid du nye bar song ba rang gi pho brang nas phyir byung ste/_kyi hud yid 'phrog ma bdag yongs su dor nas khyod gang du song zhes zer zhing /_/sa 'dzin pa dang nags rnams gzhan de dang de la 'khor bar gyur to/_/de nas nor
[\[131b.2\]]bzangs dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mes yid kun nas gdungs pa'i btsun mo de rnam pa mang du 'di ltar smre sngags 'don pa la rtse gcig pa byung bar gyur te/_bdag yongs dor nas yan lag skems/_/yid 'phrog ma khyod gang du song /_/smre sngags 'don cing bdag gi bu/_/'di ltar
[\[131b.3\]]mtshan mo g.yang lhung ngam/_/sbrul gyis so btab gyur tam ci/_/'on te stag gis zos pa ni/_/rgyan ni phrogs nas drag po yi/_/chom rkun rnams kyis bsad dam ci/_/rtsa ba bcings pa'i skye bo 'di/_/mnyes gshin 'di 'dra kye ma smod/_/gnyen bshes rnams kyi sdug bsngal che/_/
[\[131b.4\]]gang phyir rnam bral la mthong min/_/skar ma'i me tog rnams kyis 'di/_/nam mkha'i dkyil na mchod byed cing /_/mtshan mo'i ma khyod gang du yang /_/nyal ba bdag gi bu srungs shig_/nyin mtshan dag gi mar me yis/_/ku mu ta dang chu skyes 'byed/_/bdag gi bu 'khor gang du yang /_/
[\[131b.5\]]zla ba nyi mas bsrung par mdzod/_/gnas pa 'am ni 'gro bzhin pa/_/bdag gis bdag skyes de nyal yang /_/chu skyes 'dab ma ltar mig ldan/_/nags su nags lha mos srungs shig grogs mo mi g.yo'i mig ldan pa/_/nor bzangs 'gro ba 'di ltos shig_/'di ni mthong la
[\[131b.6\]]dge ba ni/_/mig gi 'bras bu yongs rdzogs pa/_/mig gi dga' ston gyur pa ni/_/yid las byung ba dngos bzhin du/_/e ma skal ldan bud med de/_/gang zhig 'di yi chung mar gyur/_/e ma gzugs ldan rnams kyis ni/_/ba dan 'phrog 'dis 'jig rten du/_/gser gyi
[\[131b.7\]]nor bu ltar 'di ni/_/sa yi dkyil 'khor 'di brgyan byas/_/ji ltar skal chen 'di la ni/_/rgya chen mig ldan bdag gis mthong /_/de srid bdag ni mig gnod pa'i/_/bung ba grogs mo bzlog par mdzod/_/gcig pu khyod kyis bkag pa ni/_/rlung gi stegs bu chen po 'di/_/
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]'gro ba dpal ldan rnams mchog 'di/_/bdag gis ci ltar mthong bar gyur/_/skal cha mi ster ngang tshul can/_/grogs mo khyod kyi lta ba 'di/_/gang zhig gcig pu nyid 'di ni/_/gzhon nu brten pa lta bar 'dod/_/de ltar mi g.yo rgya chen lta ba rnams kyis mthong ba ni/_/grong
[\[132a.2\]]khyer bud med rnams kyis gang zhig 'dod bcas yun ring por/_/ri yi nags la di ring bdag gi bu de 'khor bzhin pa/_/'jigs pas skad cig tu ni ri dgas bud med rnams kyis lta/_/yid ni 'phrog pa se'u 'bru'i snying po ltar dmar skya/_/sen mo 'od ldan rnams kyis brgyan byas sor mo can/_/
[\[132a.3\]]ku sha ldan pa sa'i steng 'jam pa'i rkang pa dag_/bdag gi bu de ci ltar de ring 'jog par 'gyur/_/ut+pal sngon po sar pa rnams kyis yid 'phrog pa/_/dri zhim nor bu'i snod du brtan pa'i chang 'thungs nas/_/bdag gi de ni 'khor zhing skom 'dod snyim pa yis/_/cung zad dro ba'i chu ni di ring ji
[\[132a.4\]]ltar 'thung /_/slong ba ma bslabs pa ni rigs ni mthong ldan pa/_/sbyin pa nyid du mngon par brtson pa rtag tu bde/_/dregs pas kun nas ring dang skya ba'i lus ldan pa/_/des ni ci ltar gzhan la byin zhes smra bar 'gyur/_/bdag cag yun ring phyir na yid re mang po yis/_/skom pa dang ldan
[\[132a.5\]]bu la chags pa sems ldan ma/_/rab tu byin nas brtse bral skyed byed khyod kyis ni/_/ci phyir bu yi bdud rtsi bsnyen pa khyed kyis 'phrog_/'dir ni de ring la la gnas te bdag la ston/_/phyogs cha 'dis ni song ba zhes bya nus pa med pa/_/yid 'phrog de yi gom pa rnams kyis rnam brgyan pa/_/lam rjes
[\[132a.6\]]bdag gis de phyir rjes su 'gro bar bgyi/_/brtse ldan khyod kyis sdug bsngal brgya yis nyer 'tshe ba/_/gzhan ma yang ni mya ngan byed cing rjes su brtse byed pa/_/kye ma smre sngags 'don cing ma ni dam pa dag_/bu bzangs 'ongs nas khyod kyis ci phyir dbugs mi 'byin/_/yid 'phrog ma khyod mi'am ci'i rgyal
[\[132a.7\]]lus las skyes/_/snying rje bral nyid 'di 'dra khyed la ci ltar yin/_/bdag gi bu la 'khor ba gcig pu nyid 'ongs nas/_/gang phyir di ring dbugs 'byung ma byed de ni mtshar/_/de ltar nor bzangs rnam par bral bas 'jigs pa de/_/rgyun mi 'chad par mchi mas 'gags pa'i dmar lta ba/_/
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]sa yi bdag po mig ni mchi mas skad cig tu/_/mig gi 'gags pa ji ltar yang ni ngu 'phro bcad/_/de nas mi 'am ci mo dang bral ba las smyo ba skyes pa'i nor bzangs ri dang nags kyi nang rnams na kun nas 'khor zhing /_bya'am ri dgas gang dang gang nyid mthong bar gyur ba de dang de nyid la
[\[132b.2\]]dris par gyur to/_/de nas dus gcig gi tshe na me tog skyes pa'i sa la shir sha'i shing la nges par gnas pa lhan cig spyod ma'i skad 'byin pa'i ne tso la 'di ltar dris par gyur to/_/gsal zhing yid 'ong shir sha'i me tog rtse mo 'dra/_/dang po'i mya ngan med pa'i 'dab ma lta bur ni/_/dmar ba'i rkang pa ni
[\[132b.3\]]tso kim shu ka shing gnas/_/bdag gi 'dod ma khyod kyis nags rnams na mthong ngam/_/lhan cig spyod ma la skad 'don cing khyod kyis bdag gi lan nyan par mi byed cing de bas na khyed ni bde bar gnas par kyis shig_/da ni nor bu in dra nI la dang yongs su 'dres pa marka ta'i tshogs dang rjes su
[\[132b.4\]]mthun pa rgya che ba'i mjug sgro dang ldan pa/_ku ma ta sar pa ltar mig gi mtha' ma dkar ba/_brag gi steng na gnas pa'i rma bya 'di la dri bar bya ste/_sa 'dzin mgo bo la ni cod pan du gyur pa/_/thog ma'i sprin ni 'ongs pas gar gyi rtsed mo ba/_/rma bya mchog lags nags gseb 'di na khyod kyis
[\[132b.5\]]ni/_/bdag gi bud med 'khor bar byed pa rnams mthong ngam/_/khyed kyang mi smra ba nyid du ji ltar gnas te rnam pa thams cad du khyod ni ngo bsrung dang bral lam/_yang na khyod la skyon mi rigs te/_g.yo med mig gnyis ldan pa ri yi brag la gnas pa ni/_/bsam gtan la ni zhugs 'dra yan lag mi
[\[132b.6\]]g.yo khyed gnas pa/_/skems pa mi'am ci rgyal bu mos dor ba ci ltar bdag_/khyod kyang rma bya mos ni nges par de ltar dor ba yin/_/de bas na bud med dang bral ba su zhig la yang 'dor byed pa'i phyir rigs pa ma yin no/_/da ni yid 'phrog ma dang 'dra ba'i mig 'jam zhing rtswa sngon po la nye bar
[\[132b.7\]]gnas pa'i mig dang 'dra ba skyug ldad kyis kha'i mdun bskyod pa'i ri dgas 'di la bdag gis dri bar bya ste/_ri dgas khyu yi bdag po bdag gi mdzes ma dang /_/'dra ba'i mig ldan kun+da ltar ni lto ba dkar/_/kun nas 'khor bar byed pa khyod kyis nags 'di la/_/ljon pa'i bu mo de ring khyod kyis
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]mngon mthong ngam/_/khyed kyang bdag la dga' ba ma smras par langs te/_/bdag las 'jug pa kho na ste/_/yang na khyod kyang song shig_/lhan cig spyod ma dang lhan cig tu sbyor bar gyis shig_/nam gyi tshe yang bdag dang 'dra ba mi'am ci mo dang bral bas gnas skabs
[\[133a.2\]]'di nam yang nyams su myong bar ma gyur cig_/de bas na da ltar du ma'i shing dang shing gel pa'i me tog gi chang gis myos pa bdag gi bud med kyi mig gi 'bras bu ltar nag pa'i bung ba 'di la bdag gis dri bar bya ste/_/pad+mo rnam par kha phye sgeg mo rnams kyis ni/_/pad+ma'i gdong rnams la ni bskyod
[\[133a.3\]]cing lcang lo'i skra/_/bung ba'i mchog lags srab pa'i yan lag yid 'phrog ma/_/ri yi nags 'dir 'ga' zhig khyod kyis mthong ngam ci/_/ji ltar khyod kyang lan mi ster ba nyid yin te ljon shing bud med rnams kyis nye bar sbyin pa rang gi me tog gi snod na gnas pa de'i me tog gi ros kun nas gsal bar byas
[\[133a.4\]]pa'i gdong can khyed chang 'thung bar brtsams pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad du khyod ni brtse ba dang bral bas gang gi phyir dga' mo dang bral bas kun nas yid gdungs ba'i bdag la me tog chang gi btung ba mngon par 'dod pa/_pad+mo'i tshogs kyi dbus su nyer 'ongs skad cig tu/_/slar ni ljon shing me tog
[\[133a.5\]]tshogs ni 'ong ba ste/_/bung ba skad ni mi ster ba ste ci yi phyir/_/bung ba mo dang bral ba 'di la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal rnams ni nyams su myong /_/chu yang gang gi 'jig rten du/_/de nyid gzhan gyi sdug bsngal rnams/_/shes nas kun nas gdung bar 'gyur/_/brtse ba dang bral ba sbrang
[\[133a.6\]]byed ngan pa 'dis ci zhig bya ste/_de bas na da ltar 'dir chu bo'i 'gram gyi steng khyad par du byed pa'i ngur pa la bdag gis dri bar bya yis/_pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar mig can/_/lus skems dgod pa yid 'ong can/_/ngur pa khyod kyis yid 'phrog ma/_/mthong bar gyur tam 'on te ci/_/khyod kyang mtshan mo
[\[133a.7\]]thob nas ni/_/ngur pa mo dang rnam bral bar/_/de ltar sdug bsngal 'di shes shing /_/ci ltar mi smra nyid du gnas/_/bdag gi yid 'phrog ma mthong ngam 'on te min zhes bya ba 'di tsam ngur pa ngan pa 'di mi smra bar gyur pa la ngal ba ci tsam 'gyur/_de bas na 'di yang dang yang du dris pas chog ste/_
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]gang zhig 'di ral gri g.ya' dag pa ltar nag ba'i 'od/_/tshang 'di las lus phyed phyung ba'i lto 'phye ste/_/de ni 'di la bdag gis dri bar bya'o snyam mo/_/dbang phyug chen po'i rgyan dang 'chi bdag gzhu yi mda'/_/ut+pal sngon po'i phreng ba gsal ba rjes su mthun/_/lto 'phye 'phro bar byed pa'i rtse
[\[133b.2\]]yi rtse mo can/_/bdag gi 'dod ma khyed ni 'khor bas 'dir mthong ngam/_/'di yang khro ba'i dbang gis phud ces bya ba'i sgra dang bcas par gdengs ka cung zad rgyas par byas nas ci ltar tshang nyid du zhugs so/_/lto 'phye'i dug las kyang ni sdug bsngal ba/_/gang phyir 'dod pa bral skyes sdug bsngal che/_/
[\[133b.3\]]de ltar lto 'phye la ni dris pa dang /_/rgyu med kho bo cag la khro bar byed/_/yang na dka' thub pa rang bzhin gyis blo rab tu chung ba'i dud 'gro 'di rnams bdag gi mdza' mo ci'i phyir shes par 'gyur te/_/da ni ji srid du 'gro ba thams cad kyi mar me bcom ldan 'das nyid la yid 'phrog ma'i gtam
[\[133b.4\]]bdag gis dri bar bya'o snyam mo/_/mun pa'i tshogs ni ma lus 'joms/_/'jig rten mig gcig khyod kyis ni/_/nyi ma bdag dang bral bas rid/_/yid 'phrog ma ni ma mthong ngam/_/ji ltar 'di yang myur ba nyid du nub par nye bar song ba ste/_da ni ku mu da'i tshogs kyis gnyen chu'i dbus
[\[133b.5\]]nas 'byung ba lta bu'i bdag po'i glang po che'i dpral 'bur dang 'dra ba yang dag par 'byung bzhin pa zla ba la bdag gis dri bar bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das/_mtshan mo'i bud med kyi thig le/_/bdag dang bral bas yan lag rid/_/mtshan mo byed ldan yid 'phrog ma/_/'dir ni mtshan mo byed
[\[133b.6\]]khyod kyis/_/yid 'phrog ma 'di mthong gyur tam/_/skar ma btsun mo'i 'khor la ni/_/khyod ni rgyal po'i rol bas gnas/_/gdungs pa bdag la brnyas byas nas/_/bsil ba'i 'od can lan mi 'debs/_/snar ma lhan cig bral ba ni/_/nam yang khyod la yod pa ste/_/de ltar rang
[\[133b.7\]]sdug bsngal shes shing /_/ci phyir bdag la brtse mi byed/_/bdag la dpal med mthong nas ni/_/khyod kyis brnyas pa ma mdzad cig_/sgra gcan gyis zos khyod kyang ni/_/rang gi dpal ni 'dor ba yin/_/phal cher gnas gnas la gus pa/_/dgos ldan skye bos byed pa ste/_/
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]rnyed dka' de ni 'jig rten du/_/gang zhig sdug bsngal gnas pa brnyas/_/ji ltar lan ma btab pa nyid ni khyod kyang nub par gyur pa de bas na da ni klu ris bkra'i chu rten gyi mtha' ma la gnas pa de yang re zhig dka' thub kyi nags su 'gro bar byas nas dri bar bya'o snyam du rnam par
[\[134a.2\]]bsams nas/_tho rangs kyi dus su me la sbyin sreg byas pa/_shing lo las byas pa'i khang pa'i sgo la gzhag pa'i sa'i gdan la gnas pa/_/ral pa'i tshogs kun nas 'phyang bas mgo 'dzin pa 'degs pa/_/shin tu rid pa'i lus can/_bgrang phreng gis lag ngar dkris pa/_dpung pa la khri snyan sa
[\[134a.3\]]le'i pags pa rnam par bkod pa'i drang srong de'i gan du nye bar 'ongs nas dben pa'i sar 'dug ste dris pa/_khyad par du ni dag pa'i brtul zhugs lha yi mig gis ni/_/sdang dang grogs po rnams la mnyam pa'i sems ldan pa/_/yid 'phrog ma ni zhes bya yid 'phrog gdong ldan ma/_/bdag gi mdza' mo
[\[134a.4\]]khyod kyis 'dir ni ma mthong ngam/_/bdag gis ne tsho rma bya ri dgas bung ba dur pa dang /_/lto 'phye nyin mor byed dang rdzogs pa'i zla ba rnams la dris/_/snying rje dang bral de rnams kyis kyang bdag gi mdza' mo ni/_/ma smras brtan pa'i sems can khyod kyang de ltar ma gyur cig_/de nas dka' thub kyi nor can nor bzangs
[\[134a.5\]]la rjes su brtse bar gyur pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa bdag nyid brtan par gyis shig_/yid 'phrog mas ni khyod la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i grong khyer gyi lam bstan pa'i phyir bdag gi lag par yi ge 'di dang sor gdub 'di dang dag pa'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i sman 'di yang ba zhag ste/_'di ni
[\[134a.6\]]mar smin pa shin tu yang bkres pa dang skom pa'i ngal ba sel bar byed pa bza' bar byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pas yid 'phrog ma thob par bya ba'i phyir mi'am ci'i bdag po ljon pa'i grong khyer du mngon par 'gro bar byed pa/_khyod kyi skye bo ngan pa dang rjes su mthun pa smyon pa'i smra ba nyid 'dis chog ste/_
[\[134a.7\]]brtan par 'dug shig dang yid 'phrog ma thob par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/le lo'i bdag nyid can 'gyur te/_/ba lang rjes la'ang sgyid lug pa/_/brtson 'grus dang ldan thabs la mkhas/_/rgya mtsho la yang rgal bar byed/_/de nas nor bzangs kyis thub pa de'i gdams ngag gi sgron me'i snang
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]bas smyo ba'i mun pa bsal bar byas shing yid dga' bar sor gdub de blangs nas 'di snyam du bsams te/_mdza' bo'i ljon shing me tog ni/_/sor gdub de ring bdag gis rnyed/_/de mthong 'bras bu nam gyi tshe/_/sems bde ba ni rnyed par 'gyur/_/phyis drang srong de la smras pa/_/bcom ldan
[\[134b.2\]]'das kyis gdams ngag gi chu'i dbang bskur ba 'dis smyo ba'i gdung ba zad par gyur pa bdag gis 'di ltar mthong ste/_kidza ka'i 'bras bu dang 'dra ba la nye bar longs spyod par gyur pa/_za ba'i dus na ni bde ba'i ro nye bar skyed la mthar ni sdug bsngal bskyed pa rnams te/_su zhig ces bya
[\[134b.3\]]ba'i 'dod pa'i 'dam du bdag nyid nub cing /_bde ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa de ltar yang shes shing /_gang gi phyir bdag 'di ltar yid 'phrog ma thob par 'dod pa de bas na/_'di la rgyu ni 'di yin te/_/mdza' bo'i skye bo dang ni bral bas 'jigs pa yi/_/mdzes ma rnams kyi me tog ltar
[\[134b.4\]]'jam yid rnams ni/_/bdag dang bral ba'i dug gis yan lag brgyal ba can/_/ljon pa'i dus la skyes par nges par srog rnams 'dir/_/bdag la brten nas gal te srog_/dka' thub can ma nges dor na/_/gal te bdag ni gson por gnas/_/brtse bral gzhan ni ci 'dra yod/_/

[\[135a.1\]]bya ba'i ri rjes su thob par gyur to/_/de nas nor bzangs kyis ras de la bris pa ma lus pa yid la byas nas sa 'dzin de la mi'i skad dang ldan pa'i spre'u'i bdag po la 'bras bu sna tshogs pa rnams kyis bdag tu byas nas smras pa/_/spre'u'i bdag po myur du ni/_/sbrul rnams du

[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]snom zhing 'di ltar shis par brjod pa rab tu sbyar gyur te/_da ni bdag gi bu mo dang /_/rigs ni rnam grangs khyod dang ni/_/gang gA rgya mtsho dag ltar ni/_/nam yang rnam chad ma gyur cig_/da ni de bas na bu mo khyod kyi yab la lo rgyus 'di bdag gis smra bar bgyi zhes bya ba mngon
[\[139a.2\]]par smras te/_ljon pa'i drung du mngon par song ste skabs dang mngon du 'gro bar 'di skad ces smras pa/_'phags pa'i sras lags/_gal te ji ltar yang yid 'phrog ma'i bdag po 'ongs par gyur nas 'phags pa'i sras kyis slar ci zhig byed par 'gyur zhes zer ro/_/de nas ljon pas smin ma
[\[139a.3\]]bskyod pas gsal bar byas pa'i khro ba dang ldan pas smras pa/_rigs min lam la gnas pa de/_/gal te bdag gis mthong gyur na/_/khrag ni rab tu 'dzin ldan pa/_/mtshon chas gcod de phyogs rnams dor/_/yid 'phrog ma'i mas smras pa/_phan par byed pa de'i steng du mi mthun pa sems
[\[139a.4\]]par byed pa ni rigs pa ma yin no/_/ljon pas smras pa/_'o na 'di ltar phan par byed pa zhes bya bar smros shig dang /_des smras pa/_yid 'phrog ma 'ongs pa tsam gyis bdag la smras pa de/_ci ltar zhe na/_rngon pa drag po las blangs te/_/rgyal po'i sras de'i khyim du ni/_/bdag bcug nas
[\[139a.5\]]ni de dang de'i/_/longs spyod rnams kyis yang dag bsten/_/ljon pas smras pa/_gal te de ltar bdag cag la de bden par phan par byed pa zhes zer ro/_/de nas des ljon pa khro ba rnam par zlog pa shes nas slar smras pa/_gal te khyed ni dang ba yin na de bas na bdag 'phags pa'i sras la
[\[139a.6\]]bden par smra ba ste/_khyod kyi mag pa de 'ongs pa kho na zhes zer ro/_/gzhan yang /_'di ni ming tsam ma yin te/_/sa bdag sras ni bdag gi slad/_/gang gis bgrod dka' 'di ltar lam/_/bdag gi bu mo'i phyir ni bsnyegs/_/ljon pas smras pa/_gal te 'di ltar bdag cag la de
[\[139a.7\]]bden pa yin na de bas na bdag gis mag pa de mthong bar 'dod pa ste/_de nas de nor bzangs nye bar 'ongs pa'i phyir sgo srungs ma btang bar gyur to/_/sgo srungs mas kyang song ste byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_mi'am ci'i bdag po ni tshe dang ldan pa mthong bar 'dod do zhes zer ro/_/de nas
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]nor bzangs kun nas nye bar 'ongs te/_ljon pa la gsong por byas mngon par phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/_/de nas mi'am ci'i bdag po khro ba'i lhag ma cung zad dang ldan pas shes par brjod pa byin te/_chu bo'i 'gram du khrid nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_gzhon nu chu bo'i 'gram gyi
[\[139b.2\]]sa la skyes par gyur pa ni/_/dpag tshad bsgribs pa'i mda' rnams kyis ni nags 'di phyung byas nas/_/gal te nyin rer de nyid du ni bdag la phrad byed na/_/khyod la bu mo dang ni nor yang de dang de sbyin bya/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang de ltar bgyi zhes mnyan nas tog rtse blangs nas lcags ngar gyis
[\[139b.3\]]'bigs par byed pa'i mda' rnams kyis ni nags de rtsa ba nas gdon par bya ba'i phyir du brtsams te/_ljon pa yang rang gi pho brang du song bar gyur to/_/de nas yid 'phrog ma yid mi bde bas 'di ltar bsams te/_mda' rnams kyis ni nags mthug pa/_/bdag gi dga' bo gcig pu nyid/_/'jam
[\[139b.4\]]pa'i lag pa dag gis ni/_/ji ltar rtsa ba nas 'don 'gyur/_/de nas lha rnams kyi bdag pos nor bzangs mda' rnams rtsa ba nas 'don par byed pa mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' 'dis mda' rnams rtsa ba nas bton pa nyi ma gcig gis nus par 'gyur ba ma yin no snyam du rnam par bsams
[\[139b.5\]]te/_gnod sbyin gzhon nu rnams bos nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di gcig pu nyid mda' rnams 'don nus pa ma yin zhes smras pa/_de nas da ltar ni/_mche ba 'khyog cing sprin ni sar pa ltar ni nag_/phag gi gzugs can glo bur du ni byas nas kyang /_/ji srid nyi ma nub par ma gyur de srid du/_/skad
[\[139b.6\]]cig gis ni mda' rnams kun nas gdon par gyis/_/de nas gnod sbyin gzhon nu de rnams kyis de ltar bgyi zhes bya bas lha'i dbang po la mngon par phyag 'tshal nas/_mi'am ci'i bdag po'i grong khyer du 'ongs te phag gi gzugs su mngon par sbrul cing mda'i nags de thams cad rtsa ba
[\[139b.7\]]nas 'don par byed cing gnas te/_bdag nyid chen po 'jig rten phan rjes 'jug rnams la/_/skye ba du mar nye bar bsags pa'i las dang ni/_/zug rngur gyur pa'i dge bas kyang ni bskul ba yi/_/lha yi skye bo yang ni grogs nyid 'gyur/_/de nas gnod sbyin phag gi gzugs can de rnams
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]song ba dang byang chub sems dpa' yang 'ongs te/_ljon pa la mda' rnams kyi nags bdag gis rtsa ba nas bton te zhes bya ba smras par gyur to/_/de nas ljon pas rang nyid mngon sum du byas te/_gzhon nu 'di ni stobs dang ldan no/_/zhes bya ba smra zhing /_slar yang
[\[140a.2\]]rnam par bsams te byang chub sems dpa' la bkas gnang bar gyur te/_mde'u dang bcas mda' rnams 'di/_/chu bo'i pha rol par dor nas/_/til gyi bre chen 'di btab ste/_/de srid slar yang 'ong bar mdzod/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas thos te chu bo de'i pha rol du mda' rnams dor bar
[\[140a.3\]]bya ba'i phyir brtsams so/_/slar yang lha'i bdag po'i mthus shin tu stobs dang ldan pa'i rlung gis mda' rnams de glo bur nyid du chu'i pha rol du khyer bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas zhing de la til rnams rab tu gtor te slar yang btu ba'i phyir brtsams par gyur to/_/de nas
[\[140a.4\]]brgya byin lha'i bdag pos slar gnod sbyin gyi gzhon nu de rnams til rnams bsdu ba'i phyir grog ma'i gzugs kyis btang bar byas so/_/de rnams kyis kyang til de rnams btus te bye bo che 'gengs shing gnas par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas til rnams kyi bye bo che de bzung nas
[\[140a.5\]]nyi ma de nyid la ljon pa la ston zhing gnas so/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i bdag po des e ma'o ngo mtshar che'o snyam du rnam par bsams nas slar yang smras pa/_bdag gi gzhon nu 'di tha mal pa'i skyes pa'i las la nges par sbyar ba'i phyir rigs pa ma yin zhes zer te/_bdag gi sras rnams
[\[140a.6\]]'di dang lhan cig ta la bdun/_/lcags kyi rang bzhin phag mo bdun po rnams kyang ni/_/lcags kyi rang bzhin gal te mdas ni phigs gyur na/_/de nas yid 'phrog ma ni khyod la rab tu sbyin/_/de ltar bgyi zhes bya ba yang byang chub sems dpas so sor thob par ta la bdun dang phag mo bdun yang grong khyer las
[\[140a.7\]]phyi rol du mi 'am ci'i rgyal pos btsugs shing gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu mi'am ci'i gzhon nu thams cad lag pa na gzhu thogs pa rnams yab 'khor dang bcas pa rjes su 'gro zhing 'ben gyi gnas su song bar gyur to/_/'khor rnams kyis rnam par bshams
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]pa'i gdan la nye bar gnas pa'i ljon pa la sngon rol nyid du/_lcags kyi 'ben rnams thams cad rno ba'i gdong can gyis/_/slar yang 'phags pa'i sras kyis 'bigs par gyur pa ni/_/de ltar bsam zhing mchi ma dang bcas mig ldan pa/_/yid 'phrog ma ni rnam 'khrugs nyid du
[\[140b.2\]]song bar gyur/_/de nas ljon pa'i bdag skyes de rnams kyis ni der/_/'dus pa chen por stobs kyis shin tu nga rgyal can/_/la la zhig gis rno ba'i mda' yis ta la gcig_/phigs par gyur te 'ga' zhig gis ni ta la gnyis/_/de tsam gyi dpung pa'i stobs dang ldan pa nye bar gnas pa'i mi 'am ci
[\[140b.3\]]gzhon nu de rnams la/_sngon du khu tshur brtan byas te/_/mi g.yo'i mig can mi g.yo bar/_/nor bzangs gzhu ni bdungs byas nas/_/rno ba'i mda' ni 'phangs par gyur/_/de nas lcags kyi rang bzhin ta la de rnams phug byas nas/_/lcags kyi rang bzhin phag mo bdun po de rnams
[\[140b.4\]]kyang /_/sa 'og mthong ba dang 'dra mda' ni 'dod ldan byas/_/ltong ni nub cing rtsa la rab tu zhugs par gyur/_/de nas glo bur nyid du legs so legs so zhes bya ba ngo mtshar bas kun nas 'khor ba'i sor mo dang ldan pa'i ma lus pa mi 'am ci'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa' la mngon
[\[140b.5\]]du phyogs pa byung bar gyur te/_mi 'am ci'i bdag po yang mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to/_/'ben rnams rno ba'i gdong can gyis ni 'bigs 'gyur ba/_/bdag nyid chen po stobs chen ldan pa de yis ni/_/dgod pa'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i so yi phreng /_/yid 'phrog ma yi
[\[140b.6\]]bzhin ni de ltar blang bar 'gyur/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i bdag pos pho brang du 'ongs te/_slar nor bzangs la smras pa/_gzugs dang lang tsho mnyam par rnam par brgyan pa rnams/_/bdag gi bu mo'i dbus su 'jug pa khyod kyis ni/_/glo bur du ni lhan cig chos spyod rang gis ni/_/gal
[\[140b.7\]]te rig par gyur na de bas de sbyin bya/_/de ltar bgyi zhes bya ba so sor mnyan nas/_byang chub sems dpas rang gi gnas su 'ongs te/_mi 'am ci mo 'bangs mo rgan mo de yid 'phrog ma la btang bar gyur te/_gal te gzugs dang lang tsho dang /_/cha byad dang rgyan mnyam pa'i sring mo rnams kyi
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]dbus su gnas pa'i yid 'phrog ma khyod kyis shes par gyur na/_de nas bdag gis de khyod kyi chung ma nyid du sbyin par bya zhes zer ro/_/'di yang shin tu dka' ba khyod kyi phas nye bar bkod pa 'di la thabs gang yin pa zhes 'dri'o/_/de nas yid 'phrog mas
[\[141a.2\]]smras pa/_bdag gi sring mo kun gyi nang nas ni/_/gos kyis bsgribs pa'i rkang pa rkang gdub can/_/rkang gdub gnyis po rab tu gsal ba ni/_/de yi dbus su bdag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de bas na mtshan ma 'di la bltas nas bdag ni 'phags pa'i sras kyis sring mo rnams kyi dbus na
[\[141a.3\]]gnas pa gzung bar bya zhes zer ro/_/'bangs mo des kyang byang chub sems dpa' la de ltar smra bar bya'o/_/de nas nor bzangs yid dga' ba mi 'am ci'i bdag pos yang dag par bos pa de dang der nye bar 'ongs te/_lang tsho dang gzugs dang /_rgyan mnyam par de rnams glog ltar snang bar gyur
[\[141a.4\]]pa'i mi 'am ci mo rnams mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas ljon pas gzhon nu de la smras pa/_gang zhig khyed kyis mdza' mo de zung cig ces zer te/_de nas rkang pa gnyis kyis gsal bar byas pa des/_/gsal zhing 'od dang ldan pa'i skyod pa'i rkang gdub kyis/_/sa la rnam par 'brel
[\[141a.5\]]pas lta ba'i yid 'phrog ma/_/ngo tshe'i gdong can lag pa'i rtse mos bzung bar gyur/_/de nas ljon pa snying dga' bas nor bzangs la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pas bar chad med par bdag gi bka' rnams thams cad bsgrubs te/_de bas na yid 'phrog ma 'di khyod kyis lhan cig chos spyod ma so sor
[\[141a.6\]]bzung bar mdzod cig_/gzhan yang /_gang phyir sngon du 'jam pa'i lus can khyod ni ngal byas pa/_/mngon par 'ongs pa brtse ba bral ba bdag gis don med khyod/_/de ni gzhon nu dul ba'i ngo bo bzod par 'os pa ste/_/gang zhig bla ma'i skye bo mkhas rnams bzod min de ni ci/_/nor bzangs kyis
[\[141a.7\]]smras pa/_'o na bla ma rnams kyis bka' rab tu sbyin pas bdag ni rjes su 'dzin pa ste/_lci ba'i sems ldan bla ma rnams/_/gang zhig nyid ni bya ba ste/_/bka' ni rab sbyin mkhas pa nyid/_/de rnams las ni de nyid skye/_/de nas lha'i gzhon nu lha'i bu mo dang lhan cig pa 'dra bar mi'am ci mo de dang lhan cig ljon pa'i pho brang du
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]dus cung zad cig gnas te/_byang chub sems dpas mi 'am ci'i bdag po la smras pa/_lha lags gal te bka' drin yod na/_de nas yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu yab kyi pho brang du 'gro bar bgyi'o zhes zer ro/_/de nas ljon pas ci ltar gzhon nu 'dod pa de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/_bu mo
[\[141b.2\]]rnams la smras pa/_bu mo rnams song la gyos po'i rigs la mngon par 'jug pa'i yid 'phrog ma brgyan par mdzod cig ces zer ro/_/de rnams kyis kyang de ltar bgyi'o zhes bya ba so sor mnyan nas/_sring mo khyo bo yon tan mthong dang lhan cig tu/_/gyos po'i rigs la khyed ni de ring 'gro 'gyur te/_/
[\[141b.3\]]sring mo de ltar mchi ma dang bcas mig rnams kyis/_/cho ga bzhin du mi'am ci mo de brgyan gyur/_/bdag cag gis ni brgyan bya min/_/rang gi mdzes pas 'di brgyan pa/_/de ltar rgyan rnams 'di yi ni/_/lus la ngo tshar bcas ltar gnas/_/de nas yid 'phrog ma rgyan rdzogs pa/_sring mo rnams kyis
[\[141b.4\]]rjes su 'gro bar gyur pas dul ba dang bcas pas nye bar 'ongs te/_yun ring phyag rnams dpag med bzhin gyi chu skyes can/_/mchi ma dang bcas nye bar skye bos rnam bltas pa/_/pha dang ma yis mchi ma dang bcas mig ldan pa/_/skad cig rkang pa mchi ma'i thigs pa rnams kyis spangs/_/khyed ni med
[\[141b.5\]]par bdag ni brten pa mi 'thob ste/_/bu mo nam zhig tshe na slar yang 'ongs par 'gyur/_/de ltar rjod par byed cing mas ni yid 'phrog ma/_/skad cig tu ni kun nas brten te nus min du/_/de nas mi'am ci'i bdag pos 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bu mo dang bral bas/_sdug bsngal gyis
[\[141b.6\]]khyab pa'i bdag nyid ji ltar yang brtan par byas nas yid 'phrog ma'i ma la smras pa/_gsal ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni mkha' la cha ni gsum du song ba la/_/sems rnams sbed cing skad cig lus ni 'dzin pa rnams la nyi ma'i drod ni brten 'gyur te/_/gzhon nu 'di ni khyod kyi bu mo chu bral pad mo
[\[141b.7\]]ltar ni rnying par 'gyur ba ste/_/de bas song shig slar yang 'ongs 'gyur te/_/mi brtan pa ni yongs su dor bar mdzod/_/de nas nor bzangs kyi spyi bo'i gtsug gi nor bu bcings nas ljon pas smras pa/_nor bu 'di yi mthu yis ni/_/mthu ni chen po khyod la yang /_/lha yi ltar ni thogs med pa/_/
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]nam mkha' las ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de bas da ni yid 'phrog ma la dmigs nas nam mkha'i dkyil du 'byung ste/_tshe dang ldan pa nye bar rgyas pa'i yab kyi pho brang du 'gro bar mdzod cig_/bdag gi bu mo 'di legs dang /_/dpal ldan rnams kyis khyed mdun 'gro/_/tshig
[\[142a.2\]]dang don dag ltar khyed cag_/phan tshun brten pa 'byung gyur cig_/de nas 'phrog pa'i sems ldan bla ma dag btud nas/_/skad cig tu ni mi'am ci mo'i skye bo 'khyud byas te/_/kun nas 'phros pa'i rgyan dang rin chen 'od ldan pa/_/bza' mi gnyis ni myur du nam mkha' la ni song bar gyur/_/phyir
[\[142a.3\]]lta'i mig can mchi ma'i cha ni grol bzhin pa/_/bdag po dang ni lhan cig nam mkha' la 'jug pa/_/mi 'am ci mo de la mchi ma byung ba'i mas/_/ji srid mig las 'das pa de srid mthong bar 'gyur/_/de nas nor bzangs kyis rang gi skye bo dang bral bas skrag pa'i yid 'phrog ma la yang nas yang du mchi ma
[\[142a.4\]]rnams phyis nas/_rdul gyi cha dang bcas pa de yi gdong ni des mthong nas/_/pad+ma rgyas pa chu yi thigs pas rjes su 'brel pa ltar/_/nyin par 'gro zhing nyi ma'i 'od zer bzlog pa'i don du ni/_/lag pa gnyis ni bteg nas snam bu chen po brkyang bar gyur/_/de nas glo bur nyid du glang po che'i grong khyer dang nye
[\[142a.5\]]bar gyur to/_/srab cing yid 'phrog nor can mdzes pa la ni dmigs byas nas/_/rlung gis cung zad snam bu bskyod par byas pas 'gro ba ni/_/rig pa 'dzin pa 'di ni nam mkha' las ni 'ongs sam ci/_/zhes ni grong khyer skye bo mi g.yo mig can gyis mthong gyur/_/de nas nor bzangs nam mkha'i
[\[142a.6\]]dkyil nas yang dag par brgal ba mthong ste/_yid dga' ba'i sgo ba rnams kyis rgyal po nor can la lha lags/_yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu nor bzangs 'ongs so zhes bya ba smra zhing gnas par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po des bden nam 'on te min snyam nas/_mdza' bo rnams ni sdug bsngal
[\[142a.7\]]gyis dad par bya zhes bya ba smras te/_stan las langs te mi 'am ci mo dang bcas pa'i nor bzangs nyid zhugs pa mthong nas/_'di ni rmi lam yin nam 'on te ci snyam du rab tu dga' bas yang nas yang du 'khyud de/_'di ma'i drung du khrid par gyur to/_/de nas kun nas langs te bral bar mi nus
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]pa/_/rab tu dga' ba'i mchi ma'i chu yis mig 'gags pa/_/mas ni yun ring po nas bdag skyes de mthong ste/_/skad cig kun nas 'khyud de spyi bor 'o byas gyur/_/de nas yid 'phrog mas btsun mo la mngon par phyag btsal nas smras pa/_/bde ba'i 'phags pa'i sras kyis kyang /_/bdag
[\[142b.2\]]gi don du rtsol byas pa/_/gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams myong ba/_/'phags mas bdag gi de bzod mdzod/_/btsun mos smras pa/_bu mo khyod ni bdag gi rigs la bsngags par bya ba ste/_ci'i phyir khyod kyi steng du bdag ni khro ba dang ldan pa byung bar gyur pa de bas na ltos shig_/
[\[142b.3\]]lto 'phye chen po'i nor bu ni/_/grib mas gsal byas sa 'og gi/_/rgya mtsho las ni rtsol ma byas/_/su zhig rin chen rnyed par 'gyur/_/de nas dri ma med pa grags pa'i gter ni 'ongs pa yis/_/bdag nyid chen po thos chen gral la gnas pa'i sras la ni/_/yun ring grong khyer lha yi rnam par
[\[142b.4\]]'byor pa lta bu yis/_/dus min zla 'od mi yi bdag pos byed du bcug par gyur/_/rigs bzangs pa dang khro ba phrag dog gi gtam thos pa'i rgyal po nor can gyis gnyis skyes 'di bsad par bya ba ma yin snyam du dgongs nas rang gi yul nas bton par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes rabs
[\[142b.5\]]'di dge slong rnams [(]gyi [,]kyi[)]mdun du 'di ltar bstan par mdzad de/_brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan pa ni/_/nor bzangs rgyal sras bdag yod 'gyur/_/gzugs dang skal bzang ldan pa ni/_/mi 'am ci mo grags 'dzin gyur/_/de yi don du bdag gis ni/_/sngar ni sdug bsngal de de thob/_/
[\[142b.6\]]phal cher 'dod pas khengs bdag nyid/_/nyon mongs rnams kyi snod du gyur/_/de phyir yul skyes bde ba'i cha ni dang por rtogs byas nas/_/yid 'phrog yul 'dod rnams kyi yongs su smin la dga' ba ni/_/bdag nyid 'dod pa rnams kyis ring por 'di rnams yongs spangs skad/_/'dod
[\[142b.7\]]pa rnams ni skad cig sbrul ltar yun ring spang bar mdzod/_/mi 'am ci mo dang nor bzangs kyi skyes pa'i rabs te skyes rabs lnga pa'o//_//bsam gtan gyi ni mar me snang ba yis/_/snang ba thob kyang mya ngan 'das mi 'gro/_/gang phyir byang chub thob par 'dod pa'i yid/_/de ni
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]sems can phan rjes 'brel phyir ro/_/'di ltar rjes su thos te/_rig byed kyi de kho na nyid yang dag par rtogs pa dang /_sna tshogs pa'i bstan bcos rnams la goms pas srid pa dang bral ba'i blo mkhas pa du ma rnams kyi mdun sa rnams la grags pas khyab pa/_
[\[143a.2\]]rang gi grub mtha'i bya ba rnams la rtse gcig pa/_khyim gyi gnas la lhag par gnas shing dus gcig gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' bram ze 'bar ba can zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/_/bdag nyid chen po de yang khyim na gnas pa'i skyon shes pa rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba mngon par 'dod pa yo byad kyis
[\[143a.3\]]yongs su gang ba'i khyim na yang dga' ba thob par ma gyur cing dus gcig gi tshe na 'di ltar bsams te/_yo byad yod na rgyags pa skye 'gyur te/_/de yod na ni rab zhig la 'gyur/_/rab zhi med na ngo tsha bral ba ni/_/dri ma can gyi las ni skye bos 'dod/_/dga' min yang dag sbyor ba'i sdug bsngal skad cig tsam/_/
[\[143a.4\]]sems kyi bde ba skad cig tu ni dga' bral dus/_/nor ni rnyed par bya phyir yid ni ngal rnams kyi/_/gal te de phyir 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal 'bras bu med/_/de ltar khyim pa rnams ni rtag tu sems 'khrugs pa'i/_/rang gi skye bos mnyes gshin nges 'brel yid ldan pa/_/bde ba zhes bya 'bras
[\[143a.5\]]med mngon pa'i nga rgyal brten/_/khyim pa rnams la yid bde cung zad kyang ni med/_/khyim zhes bya ba de ltar dga' ba spangs nas ni/_/'ching ba byed pa 'di ni myur du bdag 'dod pa/_/dka' thub rnams ni mngon par 'phel phyir nags nang du/_/de bas rab tu zhi ba'i gnas ni bdag gis brten/_/
[\[143a.6\]]de ltar bdag nyid chen po des bsams nas khyim na gnas pa yongs su dor te/_chu g.yo ba med cing 'bab pa 'gram gyi shing me tog skyes pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa/_bstan bcos rnams la goms pas dri ma dang bral ba'i shes rab dang 'dra ba'i chu bos brgyan par byas pa'i sa 'dzin gyi
[\[143a.7\]]phyogs gcig na/_ri dgas kyi tshogs dbugs 'byung ba'i so rnams kyis rtswa sngon po gcod pas yid dga' bas pad+mo'i nags kyi tshogs na ngang pa dang /_ngang skya dang /_ngur ba rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i shin tu che ba nags kyi nang 'ga' zhig
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]na/_khri snyan sa le'i pags pas brang gi mthil 'dres par byas pa'i gnas kyi khyad par thob pa/_kun nas dga' ba dang 'dra ba tshangs pa'i dpal gyis 'khyud par bya ba'i gzugs can chog shes pa/_gzugs dang ldan pa dang 'dra bar shing 'ga' zhig la brten nas rnal 'byor dang yid
[\[143b.2\]]'brel pas dka' thub bya ba'i phyir brtsams te/_bsam gtan la ni rtse gcig yid ldan dbang pos rnam rgyal ba/_/chog shes rnyed pas bde ba snying rje dang ni ldan pa dang /_/rgya chen blo ldan gnyis skyes des ni gang zhig brten pa ni/_/shing des shing nyid don ni byas pa dga' bzhin 'dod par
[\[143b.3\]]'gyur/_/rtswa yi gding ba bting byas nas/_/sna yi rtse mor mig brtan pas/_/bsgom pa rnams kyi mchog des ni/_/bsgom bya rtse gcig yid 'dzin 'gyur/_/brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i lam/_/bzhon pa nyer bsags ngal ba ni/_/bsam gtan pha rol phyin bstan pa/_/de
[\[143b.4\]]nas de ni ngal sos gyur/_/'dod pa dge ba rnams dang ni/_/chos rnams la ni so sor gnas/_/rtog bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_/rnam dag bdag nyid dben pa las/_/dga' dang bde ba myong byas pa/_/zhi ba'i bdud rtsi myang byas te/_/bsam gtan lam ni thob pa'i phyir/_/bsam
[\[143b.5\]]gtan dang po des thob gyur/_/rtog med dpyod pa med pa dang /_/de nas dpyod pa la mkhas pa/_/des ni nang bdag nyid dang bcas/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/rim gyis dga' ba las bral te/_/dran pa dang ldan btang snyoms ldan/_/brtan pa lus bde myong ba can/_/
[\[143b.6\]]bsam gtan gsum pa des thob 'gyur/_/btang snyoms kyis ni yongs dag pa/_/bde sdug dag ni spangs pa'i phyir/_/dga' bas 'dod chags bral ba'i phyir/_/de nas bsam gtan bzhi pa brnyes/_/de ltar 'di ni bsam gtan bzhi skyes par byas pa/_gzugs dang ldan pa dang 'dra
[\[143b.7\]]ba'i snying rjes 'khyud pa/_nye bar zhi ba la rtse gcig pas dud 'gro rnams la yang gnyen dang 'dra bar nags de na dbugs 'byung ba'i rgyu gnas par gyur te/_ri dgas dang ni phug ron rma bya ri skegs rnams/_/bsam bzang sbrul dang ri dgas rnams kyang de dang de/_/gnas nas slob ma ltar ni
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]nags kyi nang du ni/_/de dang nye bar 'ongs te rnam par ngal bso gyur/_/de nas dus gcig gi tshe na bdag nyid chen po des skyil mo krung bcas pa'i de'i rkang pa dang nye bar gnas pa'i ri dgas pho mo gnyis ni bsam gtan gyis g.yo ba med pa'i mig gis phug ron
[\[144a.2\]]mo mngal btsa' ba dang nye bar rtswa rnams dang rtswa'i dum bu rnams kyang mchus bzung nas/_ral pa'i tshogs rnam par bcings pa'i cod pan gyis mgo bo la 'dug nas cung zad dma' ba'i tshang brtsam par byas te/_der sgo nga rnams bzhag nas rtswa dang sa bon rnams dang 'bras bu rnams za bar 'dod pas
[\[144a.3\]]nam mkha' la song ste nags gzhan rnams la gnas nas yang nas yang du 'ongs te/_sgo nga de rnams gzung zhing rnam par gnas par gyur to/_/de nas phug ron mo ni srab pa'i mjug sgos khyab/_/de yi yan lag kun nas btsir bas drod ni bsags pa yi/_/tshang na sgo nga dkar dang dmar ba'i yan lag can/_/
[\[144a.4\]]phug ron phrug pa rnams ni kun nas 'bigs 'byung 'gyur/_/de nas phug ron mo ni phug pa rnams mthong ste/_/yang yang za bar 'dod pas mchu'i rtse phyi ba ni/_/rang gi bkres chen ma bsams pri yang ku ta ni/_/ma rmos 'khrungs pa'i 'bras bu rnams kyis de rgyas gyur/_/phug ron de rnams
[\[144a.5\]]lus las skyes pa rab 'byung ba/_/ma ni sa bon 'dzin pa la ni blta byas nas/_/skad cig rab g.yo rtse mo'i sgro can gdong rnams ni/_/rab tu phye zhing gnas gyur skad ni gdon byas pa/_/de nas bsam gtan rdzogs pa'i dus na shing dang 'bras don du/_/dbang po zhi ba thub pa de ni nags nas
[\[144a.6\]]'gro 'dod pa/_/phug ron mo ni rtswa dang shing gi 'bras bu 'dzin mthong nas/_/tshad dang ldan pa'i mgo la 'brel bzhin pa ni gnas par gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas nges par bdag gi ral pa'i tshogs 'di rtswa dang shing bu'i dum bus tshang rnam par brtsams pa'i phug ron mo 'di
[\[144a.7\]]btsas pa ste/_gal te yang bdag gis langs nas shing rnams dang sdong bu dang rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu rnams 'ongs pa'i phyir 'gro bar gyur na de nas nges par dka' thub ma 'di ni gnas 'dir 'ongs te/_'di rnams dmar ba'i rkan dang ldan pa gsal byas pa/_/de ring phug ron phru gu mthong
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]bar ma gyur pa/_/shing rnams la ni yang yang mya ngan gyis gnas te/_/nam mkha' la ni 'phur nas kun nas 'khor bar 'gyur/_/e ma skye ba brgyar 'khor ba'i/_/bag chags 'di ni rjes su 'jug_/dud 'gro rnams kyang phru gu la/_/gang phyir mnyes gshin kun nas 'phel/_/gal te
[\[144b.2\]]bu rnams med gyur na/_/gnyen rnams grogs po nyid gang du/_/rang nyid na med la 'gyur te/_/gnyen bshes sa bon med gang la/_/mnyes gshin med pa la sems ni/_/mi bde rnams ni yod mi 'gyur/_/yid mi bde med chags bral ba/_/zhi ba ldan pa bde bar gnas/_/bu
[\[144b.3\]]zhes bya ba'i sdug bsngal rnams/_/nyon mongs kyis rmongs skye byas nas/_/rmongs pa'i skye bo la thob ste/_/phyi nas 'gyod pas gdung pa can/_/ba lang re sde mi 'dod kyang ni stobs ldan pa'i/_/re lde can gyis ji ltar nan gyis sbyor bar byed/_/skye bo blo ngan 'di ni dge dang mi dge bas/_/
[\[144b.4\]]srid pa'i rgya mtsho la ni las kyis bskul bar 'gyur/_/de phyir phug ron phru gu rnams ni ji srid sgro skyes par/_/ma gyur bdag gi ral pa'i tshang na gnas pa de srid du/_/bsam gtan bdud rtsis nye bar bsags pa'i sems dang lus dga' ba/_/'dir ni g.yo med gzugs dang ldan pa nyid du
[\[144b.5\]]gnas par bgyi/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpas rnam par bsams te phug ron gyi phru gu rnams la rjes su brtse bas dkris pa la rnam par ma brtsis par yang skyil mo krung bcings nas bsam gtan gyi bde bas bdag nyid tshim zhing gnas so/_/phug ron phru gu sgro rab tu 'phel ba de rnams ma
[\[144b.6\]]dang lhan cig nam mkha' la 'phur zhing song ba rnams la/_de dang nye bar gnas pa'i lha mos kun nas nye bar 'ongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' la bltas nas ngo mtshar bas kun nas lhag par gnas pa'i blo dang ldan pas e ma'o bdag nyid chen po drang srong 'di sems can rnams la rjes su brtse
[\[144b.7\]]ba ste/_gang gi phyir sngar byung ba'i bsam gtan las langs te phug ron rnams kun nas bsrung ba'i phyir slar yang bsam gtan gyis bdag nyid g.yo ba med par byas shing yang dag par gnas te/_bdag nyid chen po 'di yang phug ron 'di rnams song ba rnams la yang tshang 'di
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]mgo bo las kun nas med par 'gyur ba ma yin te/_de bas na bdag gi ral pa'i cod pan na rnam par bsags pa'i phug ron gyi tshang 'di bshig par bya'o snyam du rnam par bsams nas/_'ga' zhig sgo nga'i dum bu rnams kyis nang khyab pa/_/shin tu thob
[\[145a.2\]]pa mchog gi tshang de de yis ni/_/rim gyis rim gyis 'dab ma ltar ni 'jam pa yi/_/lag pa gnyis kyis mgo bo las ni nyer khyer gyur/_/lha mo de yang song ba la byang chub sems dpas bsam gtan las sems bzlog ste/_mgo bo'i yang ba nyid shes nas 'di ltar bsam zhing gnas
[\[145a.3\]]te/_sgro rnams rab tu rdzogs pa phug ron phru gu rnams/_/ma dang lhan cig nags kyi nang du song ba la/_/nges par gus pa rtse gcig pa ni su zhig gis/_/de yi tshang ni bdag gi mgo las nyer khyer gyur/_/de ltar rnam par bsams nas bdag nyid chen po des langs nas shing dang ku sha dang me tog
[\[145a.4\]]dang 'bras bu rnams 'ongs te khrus byas pa/_'phro ba'i 'od zer 'byung ba'i me la bsreg byas nyin phyed na/_/dri dang 'brel ba'i 'dam dang bral ba'i 'bras bu nyer zos te/_/sna yi rtse mor gnas pa'i mig ldan shing gi 'og tu ni/_/sems gcig pa ni slar yang rnal 'byor brtsams par gyur/_/de ltar
[\[145a.5\]]bsam gtan gyis de kho na nyid rnam par mthong ba mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar 'gro ba'i phyir nus kyang bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir nye bar 'tshe ba mang ba'i 'khor ba la yang kun nas 'khor bar 'gyur snyam du rnam par bsams nas
[\[145a.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchog tu dang ba bskyed par bya zhes bya ba'o/_/drang srong 'bar ba can gyi skyes pa'i rabs te skyes rabs drug pa'o//_//shes rab bam ni brtson 'grus ldan pas kyang /_/bsod nams chen po rnam par dag pa 'am/_/mtho ba'i blo ldan chen po
[\[145a.7\]]rnams kyis ni/_/'di dag thams cad 'jig rten phan phyir ro/_/'di ltar rjes su thos te/_bstan bcos sna tshogs la yongs su 'dris pa/_dri ma dang bral ba'i yid dang ldan pa/_'jig rten pa thams cad kyi gnyen du gyur pa/_/dul ba gzugs dang ldan pa 'dra bar gzhan la phan pa la 'bras
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]bu rtse gcig pa/_'dab chags ngal ba rnams la shing chen po 'dra bar skyes bu'i yon tan thams cad kyis brten pa/_snyan par smra ba nyid kyis 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi yid 'phrog pa/_legs par bshad pa rnams la rtsom pa po 'jig rten na mkhas pa gtsang ba bag dang ldan pa rgyal po'i
[\[145b.2\]]rigs kyi rgyal mtshan du gyur pa de dus gcig gi tshe na/_grong khyer 'ga' zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' ke sha pa zhes bya ba'i ming can byung bar gyur te/_bdag nyid chen po des kyang 'tsho ba yongs su dag par slar su zhig yin snyam du sems so/_/bdag gis gang la gnas na bde bar
[\[145b.3\]]'jig rten la phan pa bsgrub par nus snyam mo/_/re zhig bsten pa ni mi bden pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_chags pa dang /_'tshe ba'i skyon du ma rnams kyi rgyu yin pas de la gnas shing 'bad pa dang ldan pa yang nam zhig gi tshe zhi ba nye bar thob par 'gyur/_ci'i phyir na/_
[\[145b.4\]]mi yi bdag po sna tshogs ston pa'i 'dab ma la bsam nus pa yi/_/skyes bu rnams kyi sems ni dang ba skyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin/_/'khrug pa mang ba'i 'dam can chu la gos ni 'khru bar byed bzhin pa/_/nam yang dkar ba nyid 'gro bar 'gyur ba nyid ni ma yin te/_/tshong yang nyo
[\[145b.5\]]tshong gi dus na brdzun pa'i tshig mang bas chos las 'da' ba nyid do/_/zhing gi las kyang ba lang rnams la lcag dang dbyug pa brgyab pas sdug bsngal skyed par byed de/_rnam pa thams cad du sman pa nyid bdag nyid dag pa dang 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde bar byed par mthong ba yin te/_de bas
[\[145b.6\]]na sman pa nyid tshol bar snyam du rnam par bsams nas dus ring pos de'i rtog pa skyes par gyur te/_lci ba'i sems ldan de la gnas pa yi/_/yon tan can dag nad pa rnams kyi nad gcod la/_/nam yang nad kyis gdung bar 'gyur min la/_/lus can rnams kyi lus ngal bsrung byas
[\[145b.7\]]bzhin/_/bar chad med par dam pa rnams la smras/_/de ni med pas mdun sa mdzes mi 'gyur/_/gtsang ba'i mar me bral bas 'od med pa'i/_/mtshan mo la ni ri mo'i khyim bzhin du/_/'gro la 'dod pa bskyed cing mun pa 'phrog_/de ni bde ldan mdun sar gang zhig 'gro/_/
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]shin tu dga' bar gyur pa de 'gyur te/_/ri bong can ni shar la zla tshes ltar/_/chen po 'gro ba'i don ni byed pa yi/_/yon tan brten pa gsal ba'i de nyid mthong /_/zla ltar rnam dag sems ldan rnams kyis ni/_/skye bo yon tan ldan las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de ltar
[\[146a.2\]]'gro ba'i lam ni gnod byed sel ba la mkhas pa/_/yon tan mang ba rnams kyi mngon sum du ni gter dang 'dra/_/de ni shes rab yongs su 'dris pas dag pa'i blor 'gyur te/_/kun nas yongs su 'dris pa med kyang gnyen ltar gyur pa yin/_/de nas dus gcig gi tshe na legs pa'i blo can gyi slob
[\[146a.3\]]mas rjes su 'gro bzhin pa/_byang chub sems dpa' yul gzhan du song ba la glags rnyed pa dang 'dra ba'i nad kyis bud med 'ga' zhig gi bdag po srid pa gzhan du nye bar song bar gyur to/_/des kyang 'jam pa'i lag pa gnyis kyis brdabs pas kun nas dkar dmar du byas pa'i lci ba'i 'o ma
[\[146a.4\]]'dzin pa mig gi mchi ma'i thigs pa rnams kyis bzhin bkrus pa/_rgyan rnam par bkrol ba/_skra lo lhod pa dang rnam par grol ba'i khur gyis sku kun+da ra'i me tog kun nas dor ba/_kun+da'i ljon shing ltar sbrang byed kyi tshogs kyis me tog 'gegs pa/_me tog mtshon cha'i bud med dang 'dra ba/_
[\[146a.5\]]kyi hud khyim thab khyod gang du song snyam du rnam pa mang po de ltar smre sngags 'don cing 'byung pos bzung bar gyur to/_/de nas dran pa rnam par rmongs pa nyid kyis smras/_/rang gi skye bo mchi ma grol bar nyer 'ongs dang /_/de ring bdag gi khyim 'dir ci phyir ngu ba ste/_/'jigs pa bral ba bdag gi
[\[146a.6\]]khyim thab gson pa yin/_/de ltar smras nas dgod dang bcas pas mi 'khrugs par/_/ri bong can gyi gdong can khyad par rnam bsams te/_/shin tu ma thug par dga' bas kun nas 'khyud byas te/_/bdag po shi ba la ni mal gyi steng gnas smras/_/de ring bdag la mngon par mi smra ci phyir
[\[146a.7\]]'di/_/mdza' bo khro ba dga' ba la gnod dor bar mdzod/_/gal te bdag ni nongs par byed pa 'byung 'gyur na/_/khyed kyi yid ni khros pa don med 'byung ba min/_/kye lags btsums pa'i mig ldan g.yo sgyu nyid kyis ni/_/'on kyang khyod kyi skyon bcas nyid ni bdag gis shes/_/de ltar
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]dgod cing phrad par 'dod pa'i yid can gyis/_/de la nye bar sbas nas 'gram du 'ong byed 'gyur/_/nges par khyod ni zla 'dra bzhin dang ldan pa su zhig gi/_/'dod pa dga' ba gzhon nu ma ni gzhan la dga' bar byed/_/de bas song la yun ring khyod kyis 'dod pa 'bras bcas gyis/_/
[\[146b.2\]]chags la rtse gcig khyed la 'di ltar bdag gis gegs mi byed/_/shin tu ring shar ma lus ri bong can mtshan mthong nas ni/_/mchi ma'i chu yis lta ba 'gegs pa dbugs ni phyung byas te/_/de ni khyod dang phrad pa'i yid re khur gyis ngal ba la/_/mal gyi dbus su yan lag rnams ni rgyags bzhin
[\[146b.3\]]bsnyal bar 'gyur/_/mdzes pa khyod ni nges par 'jigs te bdag gi tshogs 'di ni/_/mnyan nas gang gi khyed ni rtsub pa nyid du nyer song ba/_/longs shig bdag ni khros pa min zhes kun nas brjod bzhin pa/_/des ni de yi mig ni sor mo rnams kyis phye bar gyur/_/de nas de yi
[\[146b.4\]]rang gi skye bo'i tshogs des nges par 'di dka' thub ma 'byung pos bzung ba ste/_gang gis khyo shi ba la yang 'khyud nas 'di ltar mang po smra ba nyid du nye bar song ba zhes bya ba brjod de ngu bas kun nas ngal bas gnyid kyi dbang du song bar gyur to/_/khyim na skye bo'i sgra med pa mthong nas des srog dang
[\[146b.5\]]bral bas bya ba dang bral ba'i lus khyo bo de phrag pa la bkal te mtshan mo yongs su smin pas 'od med pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i nam mkha' la grong khyer gyi sgo rnams rnam par grol bar gyur pa'i sgo dang ldan pa rnams la/_mchil pa skad 'don pas khyab pa'i grong dang grong khyer gyi shing
[\[146b.6\]]rnams yod pa dang mkha' snang gi rnam pa'i mar me'i rtse mo rnams yod pa dang /_lhag ma dang bcas pa'i gnyid kyis khyab pa'i mig dang ldan pa'i skas kyi rim pas mtshan pa'i rkang pa byas nas lam nas 'gro ba rnams so sor gnas par gyur pa dang /_nyi ma sprin gyis bsgribs pa'i
[\[146b.7\]]dus ltar kun nas 'od med pa dang 'dra ba'i nor ldan yod pa dang /_tho rangs kyi rnga'i sgras kun nas gang ba'i bar dang ldan pa'i lha'i khang pa rnams yod pa dang khyim bya'i sgra kun nas thos par gyur pa dang ldan pa'i grong dang grong khyer rnams yod pa la bud med des gang dang gang du phyin
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]par gyur pa de dang de nyid du/_dus ring nyid kyis rnam par rnyings pa yi/_/dri ma can gyi gos ni gon bzhin pa/_/pheg rdob byed pa'i sgra ldan byis rnams kyis/_/kun nas 'od med mdzes pa yongs su bskor/_/de ni mthong nas byis pa rnams dgod 'gyur/_/mig ni
[\[147a.2\]]mchi ma dang bcas bud med rnams/_/'gyur te rang nyid kyis 'di kye ma rmongs/_/dri med blo ldan mi rnams kyis 'di smras/_/de nas dus kyi rim pas rnag dang bcas pa sha dang pags pa lhung bas dkar rtsis rjes su byugs pa dang 'dra bar rus pa'i lhag ma can lus de des 'dzin par byed cing
[\[147a.3\]]dus gcig gi tshe na/_/ri'i gnas gzhan rnams dang dur khrod rnams su yang kun nas 'khor bar gyur to/_/dus gang gi tshe yongs su ngal ba dang ldan par gyur pa de'i tshe shing gi rtsa ba 'ga' zhig na ngal bso ste/_de'i lus dri ma dang bral ba'i chu bo la khrus byas nas nyi ma'i 'od zer rtsub pas
[\[147a.4\]]bdag gi khyim thab kun nas ngal ba zhes bya ba brjod cing /_skad cig skad cig du ni keng rus dkar po de/_/rim gyis rim gyis pad rtsa ma yin pas ni byugs/_/de yi mgo las skyes pa 'phos pa'i mgo la ni/_/gsal zhing ut+pal sngon po'i phreng ba bcings par gyur/_/kun nas
[\[147a.5\]]dmar ba'i 'dab ma nags kyi nang nas ni/_/nye bar btus nas rna ba'i bu gar sbyor bar gyur/_/dpral ba dkar po ri mo mthong la btsag gis ni/_/thig le kun nas rdzogs par byed pa nyid du 'gyur/_/so rnams rtsa ba gsal ba mang ba'i rgya skyegs kyis/_/tshon gyis dmar ba'i 'od
[\[147a.6\]]dang ldan pa byas par 'gyur/_/kun nas 'khrugs pa'i pad+ma'i rtsa ltar dkar ba'i 'od/_/lag pa gnyis pa me tog rtsi ni sbyar bar 'gyur/_/srab pa'i mar me'i rtse mo'i mig sman gyis nag pa/_/smin mtshams gnyis kyi shul dag rim gyis byas par gyur/_/rgya chen mig gi bug pa dag
[\[147a.7\]]la dgod bcas pas/_/mig thur yang nas yang du 'khor zhing gnas/_/de nas sprin med zla ba'i 'od zer gyis dag pa/_/pad+mo'i lo ma'i nang na chu ni bzhag byas te/_/dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi keng rus der/_/dga' bas rnam par lta bar byed cing kun nas smras/_/khyod kyi lus ni rgyan
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]rnams nges par byas pa ni/_/skal bzang nyid kyis dga' ba nyid du nyer song ba/_/dri ma med pa'i chu yi me long 'di la khyod/_/brtse ldan re zhig bzhin gyi zla ba rnam lta mdzod/_/de nas mtshan mo 'ongs pa dang mi'i rus pa bzhis la brkos shing de'i dbus su ni 'dab ma rnams kun nas bkram ste
[\[147b.2\]]pad+mo'i 'dab ma rnams kyi mal cha rnams bkod nas/_/keng rus de la 'phags pa'i sras tshur shog_/a ga ru dang spos kyis bsgos shing gnas pa'i khang pa bdag gis brtsams pa 'dir glang po che phru gu'i so'i rang bzhin rkang pa dang ldan pa 'jam pa'i mal cha dang bcas pa la
[\[147b.3\]]zhugs shig ces smras so/_/de nas mon lug so rnams kyis ni dum byas te/_/keng rus de yi kha la dgod par byas nas ni/_/de la de nyid du ni rmongs pas kun 'khyud de/_/mi yis snang bar byas pa shing khang mthar ni bsnyal/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas slob ma dang rjes su
[\[147b.4\]]'gro ba skye bo'i drung nas kun nas mngon par 'ongs te/_/skye bo rnams kyi drung nas bud med de gdon gyis bzung ba mthong nas slob ma la smras pa/_/yang dag ma yin kun brtags kyis/_/de ltar skye bo 'di rmongs pa/_/shin tu bdag 'dzin byed pa ste/_/ci ltar dngos po med pa yang /_/
[\[147b.5\]]bdag gi nang ldan rnams kyi nad/_/sman rnams kyis ni zad par byas/_/bud med de yi gdon thabs kyis/_/bdag gis zad par byed par 'gyur/_/ji ltar me tog mthe bo ni/_/med par sor mos 'dzin mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin thabs dang rnam bral ba'i/_/bya ba 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/_/slob
[\[147b.6\]]mas smras pa/_blo dang ldan pa rnams la ni nus par bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba ci zhig yod de/_bdag nyid chen po de yang snying rje'i kha lo sgyur bas rab tu bskul bar gyur pa'i yid kyi shing rta khyim du mi 'gro zhing /_nyin mor byed pa nub pa'i dus kyi mtshams bgrod par dka' ba la ma brtsis
[\[147b.7\]]shing /_nges par bud med de khyim dang yongs su 'dris par dur khrod kyi sa nyid la mngon par dga' bar byed snyam du rnam par bsams te/_'bar ba'i sreg lugs 'dzin pa'i snang bas n+ya gro d+ha'i shing la gnas pa'i bya rgod dang bya'i mtha' ma gsal bar byas pa/_mes 'jigs pa dang 'dra ba'i dkyil
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]'khor la gnas pa'i glang po che'i tshogs ltar nag pa'i yun ring po nas mun pas lta bar gyur pa dang 'dra bar ce spyang gi tshogs kyis lus mi snang bar byas pa dang /_bar med par rtsub pa'i skra shad kyis sa'i dkyil khyab pa dang /_me'i dbus su btsos bzhin pa'i kha zlum
[\[148a.2\]]pa'i mi lus dang ldan pa dang /_pad+ma'i rtsa ba gsar pa ltar kun nas dkar ba'i sdug pa rnams kyis khyab pa dang /_'ga' zhig tu ri mor bris pa'i bum pa'i gyo mo rnams kyis bar mtshams med pa dang /_phyed tshig pa'i shi ba'i gos dri ma can gyi dum bu rnams kyis kun nas khyab pa dang /_nye

[\[157a.1\]]nas/_/sa yi skyong ba bdag ni gnyid log pa'i/_/gang gis kyang ni mu tig har phrogs pa/_/zla 'od ltar dang nor bu'i gzhi yis lci/_/de nas rgyal po des mdun na 'don gyi mngon sum du chom rkun gyi rkang rjes shes pa la bos nas smras pa/_bzang mo 'di yi rin thang
[\[157a.2\]]che ba'i mu tig gi har su zhig gis khyer ba ste/_de bas na chom rkun brjod par gyis shig ces zer ro/_/de nas chom rkun pa'i rkang rjes shes pas phyi rol du byung ste/_rkang pa'i rjes bkod pa mthong zhing grong khyer de la lan gsum bskor ba byas shing /_mi'i bdag po'i pho brang du rjes su zhugs nas
[\[157a.3\]]seng ge'i khri'i 'og gis kun nas mthong zhing yang yang du/_/mi yi bdag po'i bzhin lta zhing /_/blo gros chen po de bgad gyur/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ci'i phyir 'di dgod pa ste 'o na smros shig ces zer ro/_/rkang rjes shes pas smras pa/_lha lags ji ltar bdag gis mthong ba ni gang
[\[157a.4\]]zhig bzang mo 'di yi mu tig gi har khyer ba'i chom rkun pa 'di tha mal pa ni ma yin no/_/rgyal pos smas pa/_'o na smros shig dang /_rkang rjes shes pas smras pa/_lhas ni dpe cig gsan par 'os pa ste zhes bya ba'o/_/sa 'dzin rtsig pa'i logs las ni rko byed cing /_/'ga' zhig tu
[\[157a.5\]]ni rdza mkhan rigs ni rgyas pa'i phyir/_/sa de lhung bar byed pas mnan par gyur pa'i lus/_/sdug bsngal gyis phongs des ni skad cig 'di skad smras/_/gang la shing rnams chen po skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_/srog 'dzin rnams kyis rnam par sbyor phyir lo tog rnams/_/sa de nyid kyis de
[\[157a.6\]]ring bdag gis lus bcag pa/_/'gro ba 'dir ni bdag gis ci phyir bde thob 'gyur/_/de ltar brjod nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po des rkang rjes shes pa la smras pa/_'o na gsal bar smra bar gyis shig_/rkang rjes shes pas smras pa/_gal te 'di las kyang lhas shin
[\[157a.7\]]tu gsal bar smra ba bzhed na de bas na dpes gzhan brjod par bya ste/_me la mchod pa gnyis skyes la la yod gyur te/_/cho ga bzhin du me la rab tu mchod cing grags pa ni/_/de yi me stag gis ni lag pa tshig pa de/_/khyab pa nye bar song ba 'di skad smras par gyur/_/gang zhig bdag
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]ni nyin rer bsreg lugs kyis mchod pa/_/'dud pa'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag ni btsal byas pa/_/me 'di de nyid kye ma bdag la sreg byed pa/_/lus can rnams kyi su zhig skyabs ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de tsam zhig brjod nas slar yang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[157b.2\]]khyed kyi tshig 'di bdag cag gis shes pa ma yin te/_/de bas na shin tu mngon par gsal ba'i don ci ltar 'gyur ba de ltar smros shig ces zer ro/_/rkang rjes shes pas smras pa/_gal te rgyal po chen po shin tu rab tu gsal bar gzhan yang bzhed na de bas na gsan par 'os pa ste/_la la khrus ni
[\[157b.3\]]bya phyir chu bo'i chu la 'jug pa ste/_/bram ze des ni khyer bar gyur pas 'di ltar smras/_/gang zhig chu zhes skyes so 'tsho bar byed pa de nyid ni/_/sdug bsngal can bdag khyer te su la skyabs su 'gro/_/de ltar brjod nas slar yang cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po des slar de la smras pa/_bram ze
[\[157b.4\]]chen po 'o na shin tu gsal bar brjod par mdzod cig dang /_rkang rjes shes pas smras pa/_gal te de ltar yin na de pas na lhas gsan par 'os so zhes zer ro/_/nags mtha' 'ga' zhig tu ni 'dab chags rnams gnas pa/_/yun ring sna tshogs shing gi sa bon za ba ni/_/de las byung ba'i rab
[\[157b.5\]]tu stobs ldan me yis ni/_/gzi brjid gsal bas mtshan rnams stobs kyis tshig par byas/_/gang zhig nags ni mthug pa yis/_/shing gi grib ldan 'dab chags rnams/_/de nyid las ni byung ba'i me/_/de rnams gang la skyabs su 'gro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'o na tshig gi don rnam par
[\[157b.6\]]gsal bar khyed kyis smra bar 'os pa ste/_/da dung yang bdag cag gis shes par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/zhes zer ro/_/rkang rjes shes pas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po shin tu gsal ba'i dpe gson cig_/zhing pa la la zhig zhing la/_/lo tog bskyed par 'dod pa ni/_/thong gshol gyis
[\[157b.7\]]ni mo zhing gnas/_/dga' bas gnya' shing 'dzin pa ni/_/de yi bu mo 'bras chan ni/_/bzung nas gus pas rtse gcig pa/_/myur bar zhing sar 'ongs pa ste/_/lang tshos yangs pa'i mig ldan pa/_/de nas 'bras snod 'jog byed cing /_/de yi bstan dang yang dag ldan/_/ske rags dang
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]bral lhod pa ni/_/mtshan ma'i gos ni lhung bar 'gyur/_/de ni gcer bu de mthong zhing /_/grong gnas pa yi yid las byung /_/so sor rtog pa ma thob par/_/'dod dang bcas pa sems bcas 'gyur/_/de nas ngo tshas 'jigs pas g.yo ba'i mig ldan de/_/lag
[\[158a.2\]]pa rnams 'dar mchi ma 'byung ba'i mig ldan pa/_/yid 'byung bas ni chos kyi sems dpa' rgyal ba ni/_/'ongs ste gzugs 'gyur sdug bsngal ldan ma yang /_/btsan thabs kyis ni bya min nad pas byas nas ni/_/phyis nas 'gyod pa skyes pas gdung ba des smras pa/_/bya min 'di
[\[158a.3\]]ltar byed pa bdag la ji ltar ni/_/bu mo khyod kyi di ring 'dir ni gegs ma byas/_/bu mo des ni ngo tsha dang bcas pha de la smras pa/_/'phags pa lags sdug bsngal ldan pa bdag la khyod nyid skyabs yin te/_/dal ba min pa chen po gal te khyod las 'di 'byung na/_/da ni gzhan las ci yi
[\[158a.4\]]phyir ni bdag nyid slong bar bgyid/_/mnga' bdag nyid kyi drung nas ni/_/gal te sdug bsngal chen po 'byung /_/'jig rten 'di yi yid 'phrog ma/_/bde ba gang las skye bar 'gyur/_/mun pa 'phros pa'i 'od ldan pa/_/gal te mar me nyid byed na/_/snang bcas khyim ni 'dod rnams kyis/_/snang ba
[\[158a.5\]]gang nas slong bar 'gyur/_/de ltar bdag nyid chen po des smras nas slar yang cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyed kyis 'di tsam pa smras kyang 'di ci yin zhes bdag gis shes pa ma yin no/_/rkang rjes shes pas smras pa/_gal te rgyal po chen po gzhan la nye bar bstan
[\[158a.6\]]pas smras pa/_mkhyen pa ma yin na de bas na gsal bar bdag gis brjod par 'gyur te/_skyed mos tshal gyi tha mar gnyid/_/log pa'i na chung la gsal bar/_/mu tig gi har khyed nyid kyi/_/mdun na 'don 'dis mngon du 'phrogs/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de ni slar bdag gis
[\[158a.7\]]gang du gzhag par 'gyur zhes zer ro/_/rkang rjes shes pas smras pa/_gal te de ltar yin na de bas na seng ge'i khri 'di bsal bar mdzod cig dang seng ge'i khri yang bsal ba dang /_de nas de'i sa 'og brkos nas ni/_/skye bo dgod pas rnam par mthong bar gyur pa ni/_/lto 'phye dkar
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]po gnyid log ltar ni rab bzung nas/_/yid 'phrog mu tig har ni kun nas bton par gyur/_/de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar skyes te skye bos kyang ni der/_/don dam la ni ma lus 'brel ba'i blo can de yi mkhyen pa yis/_/skye ngan dngos pos yid ni smod cing skye bzang la brnyas can/_/khro ba dang bcas
[\[158b.2\]]nyid ni mdun na 'don de 'byung bar 'gyur/_/skye bo yon tan can rnams kyi/_/yon tan phun tshogs cher grags pa/_/ser snas non pa'i sems ldan pa'i/_/skye bo ngan rnams bzod pa min/_/res ma'i gtso mo des kyang mu tig gi har blangs nas sems dga' zhing rang gi khyim du song bar
[\[158b.3\]]gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang gdan la kun nas nye 'khor dang bcas pa rgyal po de'i lam bzang po rtogs par bya ba'i chos kyi bstan pa 'di ltar byas par gyur te/_skye bo 'di yi phun tshogs 'di/_/sdug bsngal gyis ni yang dag ldan/_/dug can sbrul gyis shis brjod pa/_/dug dang lhan cig skyes
[\[158b.4\]]pa ltar/_/nor gyi phyir ni bya min rnams/_/bde ba 'dod pas byed 'gyur ba/_/dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las 'byung bas/_/sdug bsngal chen po mthong min pa/_/yul gyi mun pa las nub pa'i/_/tshad ni kun nas mthong byed cing /_/skye bo shi ba min pas sems kyi khyim la 'brel pa 'debs
[\[158b.5\]]par byed/_/yun ring re ba'i lto 'phye mo ni nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba'i phyir/_/chog shes sngags ni thob pa'i skyes pa la ni kun nas yod par byed/_/longs spyod rnams ni thob pa'i yid ldan ngal ba rnams lam bltas gzhan rnams la ni brten/_/bsnyen pa sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa su la'ang gnod
[\[158b.6\]]par mi byed dgra sta'i so ltar ni/_/gal te gtan du ba yi bde ba 'dod na de bas chog shes la ni dmigs par mdzod/_/re ba'i me stag chog shes la ni yang dag gnas pa'i yid ni tshig byed ma yin no/_/de nas rgyal po des legs so legs so zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' la mngon
[\[158b.7\]]par bstod de/_yo byad chen pos gus par byas te rang gi khyim du rnam par btang bar gyur to/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das des so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs su yod pa na yang shes rab kyis 'jig rten pa rnams ngo mtshar bar mdzad na/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lta smos
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]kyang ci dgos snyam du rnam par bsams nas/_sems dang ldan pa su zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dang ba bskyed par mi byed ces bya ba'o/_/rkang rjes shes pa'i skyes pa'i rabs te skyes rabs brgyad pa'o//_//yul gyi dgra rnams kyis ni
[\[159a.2\]]bskul gyur pa/_/shin tu 'jigs pa'i sa yi 'og tu sdig_/skye bo ring po nas ni 'gegs byed de/_/legs par gsungs pa myur du grogs po ltar/_/'di ltar rjes su thos te grong khyer gzhan zhig na drang srong rgyas pa'i rigs brgyan par byed 'dod pa ltar gar gyi cha rnams la mkhas pa'i
[\[159a.3\]]drang srong rgyas pa'i sras su zhig gi khyim bdag mo'i lto ba na byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'gyur te/_rgyas pa'i sras kyi mchog gi bud med de la ni/_/dus ni 'das nas mtshan mo'i zla ba'i cha lta bur/_/yid 'phrog yan lag can ni bu mo'i rgyu yis ni/_/gzugs ldan gar gyi cha dang 'dra ba
[\[159a.4\]]skyes par gyur/_/de yi gzugs ni khyad par du yang mdzes pa mthong nas ni/_/chu las skyes pa'i rdul ltar 'jam pa'i lus kyi srog shing gi/_/bzhin gyi ri bong can gyi mdzes pa ma lus 'phrog byed pa'i/_/pha ni dga' bas dpe med ma zhes ming du btags par gyur/_/de nas dpe med mas lo gnyis lon pa
[\[159a.5\]]dang de'i pha ma dag 'jig rten gzhan du nye bar song bar gyur to/_/rgyas pa'i sras de'i gzhan dag la rgyas pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i gtso bo grogs po byung bar gyur to/_/des kyang yang dag par nye bar 'ongs te dpe med ma'i rang gi skye bo la smras pa/_mtho ris su nye bar song ba'i grogs po de la
[\[159a.6\]]dpe med ma 'di'i 'o ma bdag ni pha yin te/_de bas na mya ngan gyis chog gis gal te yang khyed cag la 'dod na de bas na bdag gi 'di gar gyi cha rnams la mkhas pa byed par 'gyur zhes zer ro/_/rang gi skye bos de ltar bgyi zhes bya ba so sor thos pa la gtso bo des dpe med ma blangs nas rang gi khyim du khyer te
[\[159a.7\]]dus ring ba ma yin pa nyid kyis yi ge rnams la mkhas par byas te/_gar gyi cha rnams la goms shing mkhas par byas par gyur te/_'dis ni legs par bdag ni gnas la nges sbyar te/_/bdag nyid chen po gtso bo rnams kyi mchog gis ni/_/de ltar rab tu 'dzin ltar phrad 'dod de la ni/_/nyi ma
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]re rer gar gyi chas ni kun 'khyud gyur/_/de nas gtso bo des gar gyi cha ma lus pa de la grub pa'i ngo bor byas nas bu mchog la rab tu byin par gyur to/_/grong khyer de la yang mi'i bdag pos bos nas gtso bo de la smras pa/_klog dang gar ni ma lus pa/_/gang gis khyed kyis mnyen dang /_
[\[159b.2\]]mthong /_/'jig rten 'di la de nyid kyi/_/'bras bcas rna ba mig dang sems/_/de bas 'dir ni gar mchog ni/_/gar gyi dbang phyug ston byed pa'i/_/khyed la lta bar 'dod pa ste/_/khyim du btsun 'khor bcas skye bo/_/gtso bos smras pa/_khyed 'dra rtogs ldan sa yi dbang phyug yod pa la/_/
[\[159b.3\]]sbyor ba byed pa'i yid ni bde blag bya bar 'gyur/_/shar nas gnas pa'i bde mthong 'gro ba'i 'od can la/_/ze'u 'bru kun nas dbugs ni 'byung ba pad+ma ltar/_/e ma yid kyi rnam 'gyur gsal bar rab tu 'gro ste gang gi nyams rnams kyis/_/shin tu glu yi rnam 'gyur de rnams rjes
[\[159b.4\]]lhung nyams kyi dbang gis gdon par mdzod/_/kun nas 'gro ba 'di yang sgeg cing rkang pa rnam par bkod pas 'jam pa ni/_/de ltar brjod cing ltad mo ba ni 'phrog byed gar mkhan la yang spro ba skyed/_/de lta bur gyur pa'i lha yang ltad mo ba ste de bas nas bdag gi rjes su 'dzin pa ste gal
[\[159b.5\]]te bdag gar gyi bstan bcos rab tu spyor zhing lhas mthong bar 'dod ces zer ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_/de bas na dus 'da' bas chog ste gar gyi cho ga rab tu rtsom pa nyid du mdzod cig ces zer ro/_/de ltar bgyi'o zhes bya ba gtso bo des so sor mnyan nas mig la dga' bar gyur pa ltad mo'i
[\[159b.6\]]khyim rnam par bsams na/_/btsun mo'i 'khor dang blon po dang grong khyer ba'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i rgyal po de yang dag par nye bar bzhugs pa la rdza rnga'i sgras kun nas khyab pa'i mi'i bdag po'i pho brang du zlos gar mkhan gyis shis pa brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gdon pa sngon du 'gro
[\[159b.7\]]bar gar gyi cho ga rab tu skabs phye bar byas pa la/_gtso bo des dpe med ma dang lhan cig tu ltad mo ba rnams kyi sar rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/kun nas thos par byed cing rdza rnga'i sprin gyi sgra chen po/_/gar de sprin gyi dus na mig rnams la ni mngon par dga'/_/dgod pas snang bar
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]byas pa'i gdong can sgeg cing mngon dga' ba/_/gar mkhan mo yi glog de ma lus pa ni brgyan par byas/_/gtso bo'i dpyid ni mdzes pa ma nyams yang dag thob nas ni/_/de ni 'jam pas dgod pa'i dbang gis bzhin gyi chu skyes kyi/_/sor phreng 'od zer ze'u 'bru
[\[160a.2\]]can na cung zad du/_/dpe med ma yin pad+mo sgeg dang bcas par gsal byas gyur/_/nyams ni gang gang ston par byed cing sgeg dang bcas par nyams ldan nas/_/de ni gang du shin tu dgar 'gyur yan lag srog shing can/_/mtshar bas legs so legs so zhes ni skye bo kun brjod
[\[160a.3\]]cing /_/de la bltas nas phrad 'dod phyir ni de rang bzhin ltar 'gyur/_/bud med gzugs ni zla ba ltar ni yid 'ong sgeg spangs kyang /_/skye bo sems ni phrad par 'dod pa byed pa nyid yin te/_/ngo tsha sgeg dang 'jam pa'i dgod pas mchu ni bsgum byas pa/_/yid kyi rnam 'gyur ldan pa'i sna
[\[160a.4\]]tshogs cha mkhas smos ci dgos/_/de nas dka' thub pa'i sras gzhan dag dka' thub spyod pa'i yongs su ngal bas yid skyob nyid kyis 'di ltar bsams par gyur to/_/rang bzhin gyis rtsub pa'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu mngon par zos pas mod pa'i sdug bsngal nye bar lhung bas bzod par dka'
[\[160a.5\]]ba'i ri dgas kyi pags pa dang shing gi lo ma tsam gyon pas sra ba la nyal bas lus skyo ba'i dka' thub kyi nags na gnas pas bdag la chog ste/_de bas na bdag ni song ste khyim na gnas pa nyid du bya dgos snyam mo/_/rab tu dga' ba'i khyim bdag mo kun nas don du gnyer ba'i skye bo tsho bar
[\[160a.6\]]gyur pa na me mchod kyi du bas gtsang bar byas pa dang /_bud med rnams kyis ba rnams kyi be+e'u la rab tu rtse bar byed pa dang /_shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog rnams kyis lha'i gnas mchod pa dang /_kun nas 'byung ba'i kun+da sar pa ltar dkar ba'i zho dang bsres pa'i gtor ma rnam par bkod pas
[\[160a.7\]]shar phyogs su bsres pa dang /_tho rangs dang mtshan mo'i sgo rnams la ba lang skyong bar byed pa rnams kyis ba rnams 'jo bar byed pas 'o ma'i rgyun gyi sgra thos pa dang /_nyi ma re re'i rjes la mngon par 'ongs pa'i grogs po skye bo'i gtam gyis dga' bar gyur pa bram ze nyan pa po khyim pa su zhig
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]ces bya ba'i khyim snying dga' bar mi 'gyur snyam du rnam par bsams nas grong khyer du 'ongs te/_mi'i bdag po'i pho brang du rdza rnga'i sgra thos nas grong khyer ba'i skye bo yang de la mngon par phyogs par mthong nas/_re zhig bdag gis kyang 'gro bar bgyis te ltad mo blta bar bgyi'o snyam du rnam par
[\[160b.2\]]bsams nas mi'i bdag po'i pho brang du rjes su zhugs ste mtha' gcig tu spo'i gdan la nye bar gnas shing sgeg pa'i rkang pa rnam par bkod pa dang /_yan lag g.yo ba dang smin ma mthong pos 'di ltar rab tu bskul ba 'dra/_/'di ltar gyur pa'i gzhon nu ma yi gzugs ni e ma sgeg pa yi/_/mdzes
[\[160b.3\]]pa yid 'ong su zhig yid la bde bar byed ma yin/_/bud med kyi gzugs 'di lta bu rnams dka' thub kyi nags na gnas pa rnams kyi mig gi yul du gang na 'gro ba yin te/_glu'i sgra rnams ni rna ba'i lam du ji ltar 'gro ba yin snyam pa de bas na bdag gi dka' thub kyi
[\[160b.4\]]nags na gnas pa yongs su dor ba ni gnas yin no snyam du rnam par sems shing /_mig mi g.yo ba dang ldan pas dpe med ma mthong bar gyur te/_de bas gtso bo lta bas 'brel ba mig ni dkar rgyas pa/_/de yi gos ni 'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i lbu ba ltar dkar ba/_/gser gyi pad+ma
[\[160b.5\]]zum dang rjes su mthun pa 'dzin pa yi/_/'o ma 'dzin pa gnyis las glo bur du ni cung zad lhung bar gyur/_/'o ma 'dzin pa gnyis ni 'byung ba srab pa'i dbus kyi cha/_/de la de nas rgyas pa mthong nas cung zad dgod byas te/_/glags ni tshol la rtse gcig pa dang g.yo ba'i bsam pa can/_/
[\[160b.6\]]yid las skyes pa'i dbang gis kun nas 'dod pa song bar gyur/_/bud med gzugs ni mthong nas ni/_/dka' thub nor can legs blo yang /_/brtan ni skad cig tu ni dor/_/tha mal skye bo smos ci dgos/_/de nas dpe med ma steng gos lhung blangs nas gtso bo de yan
[\[160b.7\]]lag med pa'i dbang du song bar shes nas mun pa dang bcas pa'i skye bo'i sgron mar gyur pa'i legs par bshad pa 'di ltar rab tu smras par gyur to/_/chos la yid ni nyams pa med par shin tu ring btang nas/_/su zhig dri ma dang bcas las ni dmyal ba'i don du byed/_/gang zhig mtshan mo rnams la
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]mar me snang bar byed pa dor/_/lam las nyams pa nges par de ni mi mnyam rnams la 'gro/_/de nas gtso bo des legs par bshad pa des slob ma slob dpon gyi ltar lam ngan pa la 'jug pa yang dag pa'i lam la zhugs par byas te/_legs so legs so
[\[161a.2\]]zhes bya ba brjod nas rang gi steng gos dpe med ma la byin par gyur to/_/dka' thub pa'i sras de yang ngo mtshar ba'i blo e ma 'o legs par bshad pa zhes bya ba brjod nas dpe med ma'i mdun du shing gi lo ma dang bcas pa'i khri snyan sa le nag po'i pags pa bzhag par gyur te/_
[\[161a.3\]]legs so legs so zhes brjod pa'i/_/der yang dga' ba'i yid dag gi/_/gos dag zla ba ltar dkar ba/_/tshong ba gnyis pos bzhag par 'gyur/_/blon po dang ni rgyal po'i sras/_/de bzhin ngo mtshar de ldan pas/_/zla bas gos dag bzhag gyur te/_/sor mo'i 'dab ma
[\[161a.4\]]dag 'khor ba/_/de nas gar gyi ltad mo rdzogs pa la thog ma nyid du rgyal po des gtso bo la dris par gyur pa/_khyod kyis ni dpe med ma rang gi gos kyis ci'i don du mngon par brgyan par bya zhes zer ro_/gtso bos smras pa/_lhas gsan par mdzod cig_/lhung ba'i gos can
[\[161a.5\]]'di yis ni/_/gzugs kyi yid 'ong nyid mthong nas/_/brtan pa dang bral bdag gi sems/_/gzhan las skyes pa min pas byas/_/'di yi bzhin gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa/_/shin tu yang ni dag gi zla tshes gsal ba yis/_/chos kyi lam las
[\[161a.6\]]'gegs par byed pa bdag gi mthus/_/chags pa'i rang bzhin mun pa chen po bral bar byas/_/de nas bdag gi yan lag las ni spun snal ma las byung ba bsal byas nas/_/'di la gtsang dang brtan pa'i sems ldan 'di la sbyin pa ste/_/mun pa 'bigs pa'i legs par
[\[161a.7\]]bshad pa rab tu byung ba ni/_/sems dpa' dang ldan de ni skye bo su zhig brten mi byed/_/de nas rgyal po des drang srong gi sras la bos nas smras pa/_re zhig brjod par mdzod cig ci'i phyir khrod kyis shing gi lo ma dang bcas pa'i khri snyan sa le'i pags pa nag po de dpe med ma'i mdun du gzhag ces zer
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]ro/_/dka' thub pas smras pa/_/rgyal po chen pos gsan par 'os te bdag gis sngon rol du kun nas bsangs par gyur te/_/ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin pa'i dka' thub pa'i rab tu byung ba nyid spangs nas khyim na gnas pa nyid rjes su skyong bar byed par 'gyur snyam mo/_/rgyas pa'i bud
[\[161b.2\]]med 'di yi legs par bshad pas klan ka byas pa dang 'dra bar ji ltar dus 'di tsam gyi bar du shin tu bya dka' ba'i dka' thub kyis bdag nyid rnam par sbyangs te/_glang po che'i khrus dang rjes su mthun pa skyon du ma rnams kyi gter khyim na gnas pa nyid dmigs par khyod 'dod pa de'i phyir slar nyid

[\[175a.1\]]gis bsgrub par bya/_/bya rgod kyis smras pa/_shes rab chen po dang ldan pa khyed la sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang 'di lta bu rnam pa thams cad du rnyed par dka' ba ma yin te/_zab pa thob par dka' ba min pa'i las rnams bza' dang rnam par shes pa po/_/bstan bcos la ni

[\[175b.1\]]'dod pa don min lhung bar byed/_/rab tu 'brel ba'i kha dog bzang pos mthong gyur pa'i/_/'od zer me la mchongs byed phye ma leb ltar ni/_/dbang po'i yul la chags pa mi mkhas skyes bu la/_/rang gi chos kyi lam nas lhung bar byed pa ste/_/bcings pa lhod pas lte ba'i rtsa ba bkag pa ni/_/shing

[\[176a.1\]]'phangs pa'i/_/de bzhin skyon rnams dgra ni rab bsad legs blo yi/_/shin tu rnam dag 'phrog bya min pa mang bcos pa/_/yon tan rnams kyis rab brgyan 'phags pa'i skye bos mchod/_/kun nas nye bar dmigs nas mi la skye min nam/_/lha yi mchog gi rgyan
