[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]ba'i smin pa'i nad kyis skye ba gzhan du nye bar khrid par gyur to/_/thub pa des kyang nyi ma nam mkha' lhag par 'dzeg pa la dbang bskur bar byas pa'i me'i bya ba dang ldan pa dang /_pad+mo'i 'dab ma rnams kyis kha sbyar la 'bras bu rnams rnam par gzhag pa la kha zas rnams 'dod cing
[\[179b.2\]]slar glang mo de phru gu de bzung nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur te/_phru gu de med pas bdag gis 'bras bu dang rtswa za ba sngar ma byas te/_gsal bar rang gi tshogs su nye bar zhugs nas de yun ring por song ba byung ba gyur snyam du rnam par bsams te/_de blta ba'i phyir langs nas
[\[179b.3\]]kha zas ma zos par phyir shing lo'i khang pa nas phyir byung ste ri dgas kyi phru gu rjes su 'brangs bzhin pas/_chu dang bcas pa'i spyi'u blugs 'dzin pa kun nas 'khor zhing /_snas kun nas lhung ba'i shing gi ze'u 'brus khyab pa/_/rkang par rnam par bkod pas rtswa'i myu gu kun
[\[179b.4\]]nas chad pa 'ga' zhig tu sen mo'i rtse mo nas lhung bas mon lug gi dum bu chad pas kun nas 'dres shing sa'i tshogs 'byung ba dang /_gzhan du chus bkug pa'i 'od ma'i rtse mo chad pas bar chad med pa'i glang mo de'i rkang rjes kyi rjes su 'brangs nas phrad par 'dod pa nyid kyis smras par gyur
[\[179b.5\]]pa/_phru gu rjes su 'gro ba ma/_/de yi gom pa rnam 'dod ma/_/kun nas 'od med ri mo srab/_/nor 'dzin steng du gnas pa yin/_/cung zad bar du song nas kun nas dkyil 'khor du byas pa'i lag pa dang ldan pa dang /_yun ring por 'dzums par byas pa'i mig dang ldan pa/_srog rnam par
[\[179b.6\]]chad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang gis rkang pa rnam par bkod pas sa'i dkyil 'dzad pa dang /_cung zad lto ba dma' bas sa'i rdul 'byung ba la lus kun nas 'od med pa dang ldan pa/_skom pa'i phru gu de nu ma nu ba dag gis kun nas reg bzhin pa mthong bar gyur to/_/mthong nas
[\[179b.7\]]kyang mchog tu dga' ba min pa'i dbang du song bar gyur te/_thub des ut+pal dmar po'i sdong bu ltar 'jam pa/_/mi yi 'o ma 'dzin dag kun nas reg bzhin pa/_/glang po'i phru gu des ni mya ngan gyis mthong nas/_/mchi ma'i chu yis mig ni 'gags pa byung bar gyur/_/mchi mas
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]kun nas khyab pa'i mig ldan de mthong nas/_/kun nas 'ongs bzhin rab tu skyo ba'i ral pa 'dzin/_/yun ring ma yi nu ma 'thung ba la chags pa/_/dka' thub nor can la ni phru gus bsu bar gyur/_/glang mo'i phru gu de yi steng du bzhag nas ni/_/lag pa dkar ba'i
[\[180a.2\]]bar dang ldan pa'i bgrang phreng gis/_/dpral 'bor mchil ma'i chus ni rab tu sbangs nas kyang /_/dka' thub nor can brtse ldan ngo bos smre sngags 'don/_/sgom pas kun nas skams pa'i rkan ldan khyod kyis kyang /_/yang nas yang du ma yi nu ma reg bzhin pas/_/dgra yi
[\[180a.3\]]yid kyang nges par rnam par 'gyod pa ste/_/dka' thub dang ldan brlan sems ldan pa smos ci dgos/_/mi shes ma yi nu ma don med ci phyir reg_/da ni bu khyod spyi'u blugs chu ni 'thung bar byas/_/de ltar 'di ni smras nas chu ni kun bkag nas/_/de ni de yi chus ni rim gyis bkang
[\[180a.4\]]bar gyur/_/g.yon can 'chi bdag la yang kun du bka' yis ni/_/khyed kyi ma 'di srid pa gzhan du song ba ste/_/de bas shog cig dka' thub nags su slar rgyug cig_/da ni yun ring khyod kyis bdag ni kun nas bsrungs/_/de nas dka' thub nags su rim gyis de 'ongs nas/_/shing lo rnam
[\[180a.5\]]par 'phyang ba lag pas kun dmigs te/_/mig gi chu yi thigs pa rnams kyis bzhin sbangs pa/_/de ni phongs pas slar ni 'di skad smras/_/'jam pa'i shing gi 'dab tshigs gang gi sna yi rtse mo las ni khyod kyis bkug pa ste/_/chu ltar bsil ba'i lan ni mong bar gang gis 'di yi nyi ma'i 'od
[\[180a.6\]]zer la ni sbangs/_/gang gi chu ni rgyas pa khyod kyis nu ma dag ni mnyes gshin pas blangs 'thungs pa ste/_/gnas 'di la ni ma de med pas di ring bu khyod ji ltar rol bar 'gyur ba yin/_/de nas 'bar ba'i sol ba'i phung po'i dbus su gnas pa gser gyi snod dang rjes su mthun pa'i
[\[180a.7\]]dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa dang /_ri rab kyi rtse mo la dmigs pa'i brgya phrag bcu'i 'od zer dang ldan pa yod pa la/_phru gu de 'jam pa'i rtswa sar pa kham gcig dang chu thigs gcig zos pa dang 'thungs nas de nyal ba'i phyir rtswa sngo bsangs dang shing gi lo ma rnams kyis mal du
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]bkram nas yang dang yang du mchi mas kun nas khyab pa'i mig dang ldan pa'i thub pa des smras pa/_mtshan mo gang gang nyal gyur pa/_/khyod kyi steng du rnam bzhag nas/_/ma de med par ci ltar ni/_/de ring skrag pas khyod 'dir nyal/_/phru gu de nyal du bcug nas
[\[180b.2\]]mtshams bsnyen pa dang smyung bar gnas pa dang me'i bya ba can gyi thub pa des shing los byas pa'i khang par zhugs te/_cung zad gnyid bsal bar byas nas mtshan mo'i bar du yang dang yang du mngon par byung nas mnyes gshin pa dang bcas par blta zhing gnas so/_/sna
[\[180b.3\]]tshogs pa'i 'dab chags kyi tshogs gnyid sad pas khyab pa'i tho rangs kyi dus su kun nas langs te/_ri dgas kyi pags pas g.yogs pa'i rtswa'i mal nas snga rol nyid du shing lo'i khang pa'i sgor 'ongs shing /_rim dang rim gyis phreng bas bskor ba'i lag pas de la kun nas
[\[180b.4\]]reg cing ngu ba las log par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gis mche ba gnyis pa'i phru gu de la shin tu mnyes gshin pas rnam par 'brel pa'i zhen pa drag po can gyi drang srong de la kun tu bltas nas 'di ltar bsams par gyur te/_gnyen 'dun mnyes gshin yongs dor
[\[180b.5\]]nas/_/thub pa 'di ni nags na gnas/_/'di nyid der yang lhag pa nyid/_/mche gnyis phru gu mnyes gshin pa/_/de bas na re zhig bdag 'gro ste drang srong 'di so sor rtog pa'i stobs ma thob pa gdul bar bya'o snyam du rnam par bsams te/_yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan rnams 'od kyis 'byung ba
[\[180b.6\]]yi/_/dbang po'i mtshon cha'i tshogs ni 'bro zhing sbas pa ni/_/'jig rten bya ba'i 'bad pa rnam par ma nyams pa/_/der ni myur bar lha yi dbang po kun nas 'ongs/_/kun nas nye bar 'ongs nas kyang thabs dang bcas par thub pa ni dge ba'i phyogs kun nas 'gegs par byed pa'i
[\[180b.7\]]mnyes gshin pa 'di ni phru gu 'di la sa bsal bar bgyi snyam du rnam par bsams nas/_bdag nyid chen po des glang po che'i phru gu de shi bar gyur pa de yang dang yang du rkang pa rnam par dgod par byed pa/_cung zad ma yin par yang yang sdug bsngal dang bcas par ngo gdong bteg par byas
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]nas nyal bar gyur pa rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus mi snang bar ston cing gnas so/_/thub pa des kyang ma dpyad par las de 'di ci yin zhes bya ba de dang bral bar dogs pas yang dag par 'ongs te/_bu khyod la yang rgyu mtshan med par dgra bo 'chi bdag gis ci brdegs pa nyid du gyur
[\[181a.2\]]tam zhes smras nas/_mchog tu mi dga' bas 'ongs nas shi ba dang 'dra bar bya ba dang bral ba de mthong ste/_yang nas yang du 'di ltar smre sngags 'don par byed par gyur te/_gang gis pad+ma'i rtsa ba yang /_/ci ltar yang ni 'dam nas 'don/_/'di de dus kyis khyer ba ste/_/mche ba
[\[181a.3\]]ma skyes sngon rol du/_/me yi khang pa'i nang gnas pa/_/bdag gi bsreg lugs za mchod cing /_/sgor ni rna ba dag bskyod cing /_/su zhig mdun du sdod par 'gyur/_/lce yi sor mos srab pa yis/_/rim gyis rab srab sna mdun gyi/_/su zhig sna yis bdag lag las/_/
[\[181a.4\]]pad+ma'i rtsa ba slar 'dzin 'gyur/_/gal te khyod kyis ma 'tsho 'gyur/_/khyod ni shi bar song mthong nas/_/rkang pas sna yi rtse mnan te/_/srog ni skad cig gis gtong 'gyur/_/myur du 'jig rten pha rol song /_/khyod kyi mi de don byas pa/_/gang gis khyod ni ma mthong
[\[181a.5\]]ba/_/shi bdag dbang nyid der song ba/_/gal te bdag gis byed mi 'gyur/_/mnyes gshin khyod kyi steng du bu/_/sdug bsngal dug gis brgyal ba'i mthu/_/yid 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ba min/_/de rnams bstan pa de bzung skyes/_/de rnams thar ba'i gnas na gnas/_/
[\[181a.6\]]sprul dang 'dra bar skrag pa yis/_/mnyes gshin gang rnams kyis ring byas/_/bstan pa shin tu dge ba yi/_/dmigs par 'dod pa bdag gi ni/_/so so'i skye bo nyid skyon gyis/_/sems 'di phyi nas 'gyod par 'gyur/_/nyi ma nam mkha'i dbus gnas la ni dbang bskur phyir/_/'gro zhing
[\[181a.7\]]chu skyes rnams kyi stug pa'i mtsho ru ni/_/ma yi nu ma rab tu dor nas su zhig ni/_/sna rtse bskyod cing sna ldan di ring bdag rjes 'gro/_/yid 'phrog byed pa'i glang chen phru gu nyid ni mtho ba'i shing rnams gcod byed cing /_/mche ba dag gis chu bo'i 'gram gyis rnams dang ni ku sha dang bcas dum dag
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]'dzin/_/smyon chus sngo ba'i 'gram pa phug pa khyod kyi mdzes pa'i gdong ni bdag gis ma mthong ba/_/rol bas sgeg par byed pa'i rna ba mchog gi rlung gis 'khor ba'i bung ba can gyi gdong /_/rnam par ma chad srab pa'i mchi ma'i thigs pa rnams kyis brlan par byas pa'i rma can dang /_/mig gis
[\[181b.2\]]gzung bya ltar ni bzhin gyi snying las phyi rol du ni byed bzhin pa/_/'ongs nas thos pa'i skye gnas can rnams legs pa'i tshig ldan rnams kyang ring par sgra byas pa/_/srab pa'i dga' bas dga' ba la ni brtan rnams gzhan dag brtan par bya phyir nus pa min/_/de ltar phrag pa dang ni nye bar ri dgas pa lhung
[\[181b.3\]]zhing ring ba'i lus ldan pa/_/sa la gnas shing glang po che yi phru gu la ni mig gnyis gtad byas pa/_/ngu bar byed cing mya ngan gyis gdungs thub pa la ni snying rjes rjes su yang /_/khyim kyi gnas su ljon shing me tog la ni 'khor ba'i bung ba'i skad rnams kyis/_/de nas lha'i bdag po skad
[\[181b.4\]]cig de las lug gi ljon shing ltar 'khyog pa'i ral bu'i khur bu can/_kun nas 'brel zhing phrag pa la bkal ba'i dbyig pa la 'phyang ba'i chu dang bcas pa'i bum pa dang ldan pa dang /_brang gi mthil pags pas g.yogs pa dang /_lag ngar gyi bar la pad+ma'i phreng bas bskor ba dang /_rtswa
[\[181b.5\]]ku sha cung zad blangs pa dang /_rkang pa'i bol na rab tu 'phyang ba'i shing lo'i gos dang ldan pa dang /_dbang po nye bar zhi ba/_gzugs dang ldan pa dang 'dra bar tshangs pa'i dpal 'dzin cing /_dka' thub pa'i gzugs su mngon par sprul te drang srong dang nye bar 'ongs nas smras pa/_drang srong chen po
[\[181b.6\]]rang gi skye bo rnams la mnyes gshin pa dmigs bzhin pa'i 'di'i shi ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzod bzhin du 'di ltar smre sngags 'don pa'i khyed kyi glang po che'i khrus dang rjes su mthun pa ci zhig sgrub par byed de/_yul rnams la ni 'dod pa'i shun pa bsal bas nye bar sbas pa 'di/_/lus
[\[181b.7\]]'di gang du gnyen 'dun rnams dang yang dag 'brel ba'i skyon spangs pa/_/thub pa'i skye bo dang 'gal gang du mnyes gshin 'brel bas blo ni long ba yi/_/khyod kyi smre sngags 'don 'di blo ldan rnams kyi dgod bya'i dngos po yin/_/gal te ngu ba'i sdug bsngal sgra 'don rnams kyi mchi
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]ma 'don rnams la/_/myur ba ltar ni mig rnams mnyes gshin 'byung ba 'dzin pa yi/_/gshin rje'i yul du song ba'i dga' bo rnams kyi 'os par 'gyur ba ni/_/sa ni ma lus 'di ltar tshe yi bar du rab tu ngu bar 'gyur/_/dge ba'i 'bras bu chud ba nyid phyir
[\[182a.2\]]tshe dang phun sum tshogs rnams kyi/_/gnas pa 'di ni srog chags rnams kyi myur du 'jig par nye bar 'gro/_/bsreg lugs 'dzin pa'i grogs po'i shugs kyis bskul ba chung ba'i 'od can ni/_/srab cing sngo ba'i dum bu'i me yi me stag rnams ni chu la ltar/_/gnyen 'dun
[\[182a.3\]]rnams la mnyes gshin gus med brtan pa yang ni rtsad nas bton nas sems stobs kyis/_/rags pa'i ka ba ltar ni mtho ba gsang med 'jigs pas rab tu sdug bsngal bskyed pa ltar/_/gal te khyed ni nags su 'ongs te glang po che ltar rang dga'i bde ba 'dod pa yis/_/ci phyir mnyes
[\[182a.4\]]gshin 'di ni shin tu brtan par slar ni zhags pa bdag nyid la 'phan byed/_/sngon gyi bskal par dka' thub bzang ba rnams kyis gnyis skyes mdun song rtsibs kyi mtha' ma can/_/stong phrag brgyad cu'i dus kyis brtsis pa'i grangs ni gang la tshe yi 'byung ba nyid du 'gyur/_/tshe ni 'gro ba zhes
[\[182a.5\]]byar shes nas yo byed rnams ni dor te des ni nags bstan 'gyur/_/tshe ni nyung ba la yang blo gros med pa rnams kyis sred pa da lta ji ltar don mi byed/_/ston kar kun nas zad pa'i chu can chu 'dzin pa/_/glog gi ljon shing lhan cig skyes pa dor bar byed/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba 'di la rang bzhin las/_/
[\[182a.6\]]phan tshun du ni rnam par bral ba ci ma mthong /_/dngos po zhes bya de de rnams kyang gsal byas nas/_/yud tsam chags pas lhan cig pa yi spyod yul yang /_/mnyes gshin pa yi skye bo la yang skad cig gis/_/skye bo sel bar byed de mar me snang ba ltar/_/ji ltar gzhu dang ldan pas
[\[182a.7\]]mda' ni steng du 'phangs/_/ring du song nas kyang ni slar ni lhung bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin du ni lus ni yongs su bskyangs pa yang /_/'bad pa de dang de yis lhung ba'i mtha' can nyid/_/byis pa dang ni gzhon nu dar bab rgas ldan pa/_/mi gsal ba dang man ngag la ni mkhas pa'am/_/'dug
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]pa'i bdag nyid 'chi bdag 'di ni mi ltos te/_/bsreg bya la brten rab tu song zhing me ni ltar/_/tshe 'di 'gro ba'i rang bzhin myur du rtogs nas ni/_/longs spyod rnams kyang 'gro ba'i rang bzhin chu shul ltar/_/de bas mkhas pas zhi ba'i phyir ni 'bad bya ste/_/rtag tu chos kyi lus la skud
[\[182b.2\]]par bya ba'i phyir/_/'jig rten gzhan du 'gro zhing skyes bu chos lus can/_/gang zhig la ni srid pa'i mtha' ma rjes su 'gro/_/mkhas pa rnams la de ni grogs ldan 'dod pa ste/_/gzhan ni grogs dang bcas yang grogs ni med pa nyid/_/rtag tu rgas dang na ba 'chi ba kun 'byung
[\[182b.3\]]ba'i/_/srid pa gsum la 'tsho ba'i yid ni su zhig 'gyur/_/gang zhig zad la rab tu 'bar bar nyal 'dod pa/_/de ni sra brtan bag med rnams su kun nas zhugs/_/dam pas don min 'phel ba'i phyir ni brtan byed pa/_/mnyes gshin rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig tu ni rigs min te/_/
[\[182b.4\]]sngags ni ma rnyed par yang 'tsho ba 'dod pa ni/_/dbugs dbyung drag po'i sprul tshang lag pa su zhig gtong /_/skye bo srid pa'i rtse mo las kyang 'joms par brtson pa ni/_/sgron ma bzung ba ltar ni bdag gis rnam mthong ste/_/de ltar bag med pas ni gnyen po ma byas pa'i/_/rmongs pa
[\[182b.5\]]rnams la mi rtag pa 'di dgod pa 'dra/_/lus can rnams kyi tshe gnas pa/_/ring du gnas pa mthong ba min/_/chu ni shin tu 'bab pa la/_/rdul gyis char pa 'phangs pa ltar/_/mnyes gshin spun gyis mi nus te/_/'ga' zhig du brten gcod phyir gang /_/rmongs pa des ni nam zhig na/_/
[\[182b.6\]]skye bo'i lcags sgrog che gcod 'gyur/_/'di ni shes rab dgra sta yis/_/blo byas rnams kyis gcod pa ste/_/de bas dam pas mkhas pa rnams/_/shes rab nyer 'phel 'dod pas brten/_/gang phyir shin tu phra rags sam/_/ring ba dang ni nye ba'am/_/mi rtag phyir ni de rang nyid/_/mkhas
[\[182b.7\]]pa yis ni mi byed do/_/de bas gzugs sogs tshogs pa ni/_/skad cig 'jigs las yid 'byung ba/_/'dod chags bral te chags bral ba/_/yod bzhin rnam grol rtog par byed/_/bdag ni rnam grol zhes shes nas/_/ye shes mthong ba rnam dag pa/_/bdag la skye ba
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]zad shes bya/_/srid pa yang ni mthong mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'dab ma la sogs mdzes pa'i tshogs med par/_/pad+ma yid ni 'phrog par yod pa ma yin te/_/de bzhin du ni gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs las ni/_/tha dad par ni mkhas pas rig byed mthong ma yin/_/de
[\[183a.2\]]nas thub pa des 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gsal bar mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig la mnyan nas sdug bsngal kun nas sel ba legs so legs so zhes bya bas mngon par bstod nas smras par gyur pa/_khyod kyi kha yi zla ba las/_/'byung ba'i ngag gi zla tshes 'di/_/
[\[183a.3\]]thob ste bdag gi mun pa 'di/_/myur du 'das par gyur pa yin/_/mkhas pas man ngag ston pa la/_/byis pa yang ni byis min 'gyur/_/nyi ma nges par 'char ba la/_/pad+ma zum pa nyid ni dor/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_/'dir mang du smras pas ci zhig bya ste/_/bde
[\[183a.4\]]dang sdug pa byed phyir brten nas yod dang med pa'i las dag brtan par shes nas ni/_/blo gros legs pa gnas pa 'byed pa'i rang gi dbang po rnams kyi dbang gi khrid byas min/_/dran pa ma nyams dbang po'i yul la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dngos grub mchog ni thob pa ste/_/bla ma'i skye bo las
[\[183a.5\]]ni 'di ltar rjes bstan blangs nas skye bos tha mar gdung mi byed/_/drang srong chen po legs so legs so/_/skad cig las yongs su gcod par byed pa'i khyed kyi blo ste bdag ni kun nas ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa ste ltos shig dang /_nyan pa po gang don ni ma lus thob pa tsam gyis
[\[183a.6\]]'dzin te de ni nyan du gzhug_/gang zhig 'chad pa po'i tshig ni lan gnyis smras pa 'bras bu byas pa der yang shes/_/gang zhig gsal bar lan ni du mar yang smras shes pa min te lder so'i rnam pa can/_/de la kun du ngal ba don med mkhas pa nyid kyis mi smra'i brtul zhugs mdzes
[\[183a.7\]]pa yin/_/bdag ni lha yi dbang po zhes bya ste bdag gi mthus slar phru gu 'di 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba brjod nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus glang po che'i phru gu de bslangs te gnas par gyur to/_/thub pa des kyang mchog tu ngo mtshar bar kun nas song bar gyur/_/gsal ba'i cod
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]pan 'od zer rnams kyis nyi ma'i snang ba skyes byas pa/_/dri med mu tig har bus nor bu'i 'od can mgrin pa mnan pa ni/_/slar yang byang chub sems dpa' lha yi dbang po'i gzugs ni 'byin byas te/_/thong gshol 'dzin pa'i snam bu ltar sngo 'jam pa bar snang brtan par gyur/_/thub pa
[\[183b.2\]]des kyang phru gu des rjes su 'brang bzhin pa/_yid rab tu dga' bas slar dka' thub kyi nags su zhugs par gyur te/_de nas dus kyi rim pas glang po phru gu nyid dor nas/_/smyon chus dri ni bsgos pa nags kyi mtha' dang phyogs kyi bar/_/mche ba 'debs pa rnams kyis ring du byas pa'i
[\[183b.3\]]glang po gzhan/_/ri bo chen po'i nang du tshogs kyi bdag po byung bar gyur/_/glang po des ni dus gcig tshe na bsil ba'i shing las ni/_/bud med 'o 'dzin 'o can 'bras bu bsags pa blangs nas ni/_/bkag nas thub pa la ni chu gter chu yi brlan pa byin/_/lhan cig byed pa'i yal ga
[\[183b.4\]]'bras bu can rnams de la byin/_/dam pa brtse ba dang ldan yon tan bsgrub pa mkhas pa la/_/dri zhim brlan pa ltar ni rang bzhin gyis ni stod byed pa/_/sngar ni phan byed bdag nyid che la su zhig bya ba yi/_/snying dang bcas pa'i yid la rjes su chags pa ring por mi 'gyur ram/_/mon
[\[183b.5\]]lug rnam par bcag ltar dri zhim 'dzag pa'i smyon chu'i phreng /_/bu khyod skyes pa chen po 'di ltar smra bzhin par gyur te/_/ri bo'i rtsig pa phug pas mdzad pa'i phyogs gcig ldan pa ni/_/mche gnyis kun da ltar dkar de la thub pa des reg gyur/_/slar yang rna ba'i ting ting
[\[183b.6\]]shags kyis bzlog par gyur pa yi/_/'khor ba'i bung ba rnams kyis kun 'thungs snyon chu'i dri zhim pa/_/glang po'i dbang po gzhan gyi mche bas lhag pa'i yan lag mchog_/glang po la ni smra ba rnams kyi mkhas pas 'di ltar smras/_/glang po'i dbang pos smyon chu dri zhim 'thung
[\[183b.7\]]bar 'dod pa yi/_/bung ba rnams la rna ba rnam par brdegs pas ma 'gegs shig_/shin tu gus pa med pas smad pa'i gang phyir sbyin chen yang /_/don gnyer rnams la kun nas dga' ba byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshogs ni bskyang phyir 'ong ma rnams kyis mun pa can gyi nags la gal
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]te rtag tu 'dod/_/gnod pa'i rtse dang lcags kyu las ni 'byung ba gal te sdug bsngal rnams ni khyod mi 'dod/_/sa skyong gis btang de bas glang po'i bdag khyod glang mo rnams kyi rjes su ma 'gro zhig_/chags pas sdug bsngal chen po la ni mi mkhas pas ni su zhig ces bya
[\[184a.2\]]btang ma yin/_/de ring khyod kyi dpral 'bor sprugs pas rnam par 'brel pa'i smyon chu'i gnas ni bsnoms byas te/_/mal ni rtswa sngon rtse mo bcag pa tha mar mche ba gnyis kyis bcad pa mthong nas ni/_/tshogs ni skyong ba rnams kyis dor ba me tog zas can nges par khyod la phrad 'dod de/_/
[\[184a.3\]]de bas khyod ni song shig bung ba rnams kyis nye bar glu blangs gdong can bdag slar mthong /_/de nas rim gyis mche ba gnyis pa'i mchog de tshogs kyi nang du rjes su thob pa la/_/thub pa des shing los byas pa'i khang par zhugs te/_bsam gtan la rtse gcig pa byung bar gyur to/_/de ltar

[\[188b.4\]]ni 'byung dang 'jigs pa dang /_/gnyer sems dang ni gnyid sad pa dang nyin mtshan la yang shin tu mun can phyogs rnams dang /_/mchi ma dang bcas mig dang brtan min gnyid ni mdza' bo'i skye bo rnams chad dus su brtan/_/mnyes gshin sbrul gyis btab pas rmongs pa'i yid can rnams

[\[189a.6\]]'khrugs pa dang ldan pa'i grong khyer ba'i skye bos phyir byung ste/_rgyal po gang na yod ces bya ba dris par gyur ba dang /_khra can drung na rgyal po 'di/_/rab tu byung zhing nye bar gnas/_/mchi ma'i mig bcas kha lo bas/_/'di ltar brjod cing mya ngan byed/_/de nas skye bo rnams kyis brgyud pas rgyal po

[\[191b.1\]]mchi ma dang bcas par byas so zhes smras nas/_drang srong chen po de song ba dang don grub ces bya ba'i mtshan byang chub sems dpa' la byas te/_dus ring po ma yin pa nyid kyis bla ma rnams kyi drung nas shes pa thams cad rtogs shing /_rigs mthun pa las grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i bud

[\[192a.1\]]ba'o zhes brjod cing bla ma'i skye bo 'di khros pa mthong ste ci'i phyir khyod ngo tsha med pa zhes bya ba gzhan dag la klan ka byas pa'o/_/slar la la zhig lci ba'i 'o ma 'dzin pa'i phyogs gcig tu kun nas reg pa'i phyed phye ba'i sgo rjes su 'dzin par gyur pa'o/_/la la zhig ni khyed gcig pu nyid kyi

[\[192b.1\]]ma 'gro ba zhag rer rjes su bcings pa ste/_/'jigs pa chen po zhes bya mi bzad yod pa la/_/ci ltar 'di ni yul rnams la ni rtse gcig pa/_/de ltar kha lo bas ni shing rta myur du bzlog_/khyim du 'gro phyir song shig slar ni 'dir ci 'dug_/'chi dang na dang rga bas kun nas dogs pa yis/_/bdag ni skyed mos tshal la dga' ba 'byung

[\[193a.1\]]ni khyod kyi gnas pa ste/_/sgra ni ring ba khu byug me tog gzhu can la ni bskul ba shes bya bdag gi dogs/_/gzhan yang rang gi rngul gyis yan lag 'tshed byas pa/_/gzhon nu lhan skyes snyem bu mo ni/_/bung ba mchog gis 'khor bar byas pa ni/_/skad cig ma ltar srab pa yongs su dor/_/gzhan dag gis kyang slar 'di la gsol pa/_/bung ba ljon shing

[\[193b.1\]]ma rnams la 'phral kho nar gnyid pa dang mi smra ba nyid byas par gyur to/_/der yang la la zhig rnams rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sgra dang dbugs kyi dbang gis so gsal ba dang /_rnam par 'dzag pa'i kha chu'i cha yis tha ma byas pa'i gdong rnams 'byung bar gyur to/_/gzhan dag rnams la nis 'jam pa'i steng du kun nas gram

[\[195b.1\]]nam mkhar lhag pa'i mos pa skyed par byed de/_nam mkha' la song ba'i bdag nyid mngon par bsdus nas nam mkha' mtha' yas pa mthong zhing khyad par rtogs pa'i phyir dang bdag nyid la mkhas pa yin pa'i phyir bdag nyid la bsdus te cung zad med ces bya ba ni ci yang med pa zhes bya ba'i 'du shes su nye bar song ba lus dang bral

[\[218b.1\]]bsil grib 'og_/nor bu mu tig rdo ba dag gi steng na ni/_/pad+ma'i stan can mngon sum bzhin du skyil krung mdzad/_/gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu nye bar zhugs par gyur/_/rig 'dzin ma nas/_a ho de ni shin tu brtan pa zab pa brling ba'i mdzad pa can no/_/'dis gangs ri thams cad dpal gyis gang
[\[218b.2\]]bar byas so/_/rje'i sras 'dir me tog 'di rnams gang nas byung /_rig pa 'dzin pas steng du bltas pa na ya mtshan che ste/_mkha' las lha rnams me tog char 'bebs shing /_/sems can chen po mngon par mchod par byed/_/de ni de bzhin mchod pa'i don du ni/_/bdag cag kyang ni me tog tshol du
[\[218b.3\]]'deng /_/zhes nas so/_/de nas rab tu zhugs pa na 'dres pa ji lta ba mthong ste spyan cung zad phye nas a ho nad med pa'i bsam gtan bzhi ni 'di lta ste/_rnam par rtog bcas rnam par dpyod dang g.yo ba'i rlabs/_/dang po yin te dga' bde g.yo bcas gnyis pa'o/_/bde ba la chags 'jig pa'i nad can gsum
[\[218b.4\]]pa'o/_/rab tu zhi ba ro gcig mthar thug 'di ni bzhi pa'o/_/bzhad gad pa nas/_kye na mnyam khyod rang gcig pu de bzhin du dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba thob nas bdag gcig pu 'gengs shing thum por bsdams nas tshong pa bzhin du rnyed pa thob nas gnas
[\[218b.5\]]par byed dam/_bdag bram ze la yang bsam gtan cig kyang ma byin zhes zer/_'dren pa ni bzhad cing na mnyam pa 'di ni sgom pa'i rjes su 'jug ste/_gzhan la sbyin par mi nus so/_/phreng ba'i yon tan bdag nyid bzhin/_/gal te bsam gtan 'jug 'gyur na/_/'jig rten kun gyi don bsgrub phyir/_/
[\[218b.6\]]yid kyi shing rta cis mi bsgrub/_/bzhad gad pa nas/_ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi bde ba thob par 'gyur ba lags/_'dren pa nas/_gnyis min rten cing 'dod lha'i mtshon rnams bcom/_/bde ba 'di ni rang dbang yod byas nas/_/g.yo ba rnams gsal mtsho chu shin tu dngas/_/bsil bzhin rang gi sems
[\[218b.7\]]las rab tu skye/_/bzhad gad pa nas/_'di ni gzhan zhig la/_yul gyi bde ba yang gzhan zhig gam ci/_'dren pa nas/_khyod ni bdud rtsi dang dug sre bar byed dam ci/_/bsam gtan bde bas yid ni bsil bar byed/_/yul gyis slar yang dbang med sems byed cing /_/'dod chags zhe sdang me yis rnam bcings shing /_/
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]dmyal ba'i me yis sreg par byed pa ltar/_/bzhad gad pa nas/_gal te de bzhin du yin na bdag kyang bsam gtan byed do/_/rgyal po nas/_de bzhin du mdzod cig_/bzhad gad pa bsam gtan byed pa na rna bar cung zad thos so/_/kye ngu ba bzhin du thos par byed do/_/'dren pa nas/_bsam gtan
[\[219a.2\]]ya mtshan che'o/_/bzhad gad pa nas/_khyod kyis ci yang ma thos sam/_rgyal pos kyang cung zad thos te/_'di ni grag pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad nges par bud med du zhing 'dug go/_/bzhad gad pa nas/_ji ltar shes/_rgyal po nas/_yan lag mchog rnams dbyangs snyan zhing /_/rnam par 'dren ring mnyen dang
[\[219a.3\]]'jam/_/bskyed pa rno zhing rnam par gcod/_/skyes bu rnams ni rnam par rtsub/_/na mnyam mi ring bar mnyen pa bzhin du'o/_/bzhad gad pa nas/_'di'i dbyangs sgrogs tshul ni sngon thos pa cig 'dra ba snyam mo/_/rgyal po nas/_bdag kyang de bzhin du snyam mo/_/de ni dka' thub ma mnar ba zhig ngu ba
[\[219a.4\]]yin nam/_der mngon par 'gro bar rigs so/_/bzhad gad pa nas/_kye na mnyam de bltas nas ci zhig byed zer/_yol ba'i nang du'o/_/legs ldan 'jig rten skyong rnams yongs su skyobs shig yongs su skyobs shig zer/_rgyal po nas/_skye bo 'di bzhin du mnar ba ci zhig nye bar blta bar rigs so/_/
[\[219a.5\]]bzhad gad pa nas/_/kye khyod ji ltar dus thams cad du gsar bu bzhin du pha rol gyi sdug bsngal gyis bdag nyid sdug bsngal bar byed dam/_rgyal po nas/_na mnyam/_'khor bar ring du slar yang ni/_/bdag nyid de bzhin skye zhing skyes/_/sems can 'ga' zhig gnyen min pa/_/gang na'ang de ni gcig
[\[219a.6\]]yod min/_/gnyis po rtab rtab por langs te yongs su zhugs pa na/_bzhad gad pa nas/_kye 'di ni lha mo pad+ma can la ci zhig rjes su byed pa ma yin nam/_rgyal po na re khyod ci zhig smra/_gang na lha mo pad+ma can gang la'o skol gnyis kyang phyogs tsam zhes zer/_de nas pad+ma can sha ba ri gnyis dang
[\[219a.7\]]rjes su 'gro zhing rab tu zhugs so/_/sha ba ri dag nas/_song mi khyod song zhes skad chen pos smra zhing khyod mi 'gro'am zhes mad mA da ka zhes pa nas bud med rnyed pa 'dis nga'i bu chung de'i nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma byed do zhes zer/_gnyis pa nas/_ha kye na be+e ka la lo la kA 'di ni'u cag gnyis kyis thob po/_/ji
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]ltar 'gro ba de ltar 'gror chug zer/_pad+ma can du zhing kye ma ji ltar 'phags pa'i bu khyod ni yongs su skyob pa'i ngang tshul de lta na skal dman bdag gi gnas skabs 'di lta bur 'jug pa las yongs su skyob par mi byed dam zhes smra/_bzhad gad pa nas/_kyai ji ltar the tshom byed/_lha mo pad+ma can no/_/rgyal pos de la bltas
[\[219b.2\]]nas rtab rtab por lha mo ma 'jigs shig_/pad+ma can ni brtags nas 'phags pa'i bu'am su zhig yin/_yang na bdag gis 'dir 'ga' zhig la 'phags pa'i bu mo'o zhes nye bar mthong ngam/_rgyal po ni bshums shing lha mo 'di nye bar mthong ba 'di ni bdag yin te/_nye du'i skye bo sdug bsngal bar bya'o/_/bzhad
[\[219b.3\]]gad pa nas/_kye lha mo ji ltar thams cad gzhan yin snyam du ma sems shig_/'di na ni mnyam dga' ba'o/_/pad+ma can ni gnyis po la bltas te/_shin tu sdug bsngal nas sa la 'gyel lo/_/sha ba ri dag nas/_shog mi khyod shog_/bzhad gad pa ni dbyug pa gyen du bsgrengs te/_ha na De bran mo yi bu gdug pa
[\[219b.4\]]can gyi sha ba ri dag_/dbyug pa kyog po lag 'gro khros pa 'dra ba'i dbyug pa 'dis khyed cag gi mgo gzhom par bya'o zhes zer/_rgyal po na re na mnyam de bzhin du ma byed cig_/ji ltar gnod pa byed pas bshes gyur pa/_/de ltar phan pa mdzad pas mi 'gyur snyam/_/gang las de yis bzod par gyur pa yi/_/'gro
[\[219b.5\]]ba mtha' dag zlog pa'i rgyu nyid do/_/sha ba ri dag phan tshun bltas nas shin tu brten te g.yo bar ga la 'gyur/_de ltar na bdag cag 'gro bar bya'o/_/'di ni bdag cag dbang pos sprul pa byas zer/_'jigs pas gar byed cing nges par zhugs te song ngo /_/'dren pa nas/_a yi lha mo 'dir ci'i phyir ji
[\[219b.6\]]ltar 'di 'dra ba'i skabs su zhugs/_pad+ma can ngu zhing 'phags pa'i bu bdag gi skal ba la dri bar mdzod/_/bzhad gad pa nas/_kye lha mo gzhon nu pad+ma skyes ji ltar/_pad+ma can phyogs rnams su bltas nas skal ba dman pa bdag la da gzod gtam ci zhig_/rgyal po rtab rtab por bu ci ci zhes smra/_
[\[219b.7\]]pad+ma can nas/_bu pad+ma skyes de ring gang na zhes smra/_bzhad gad pa na re/_ci ci kye lha mo smros shig_/pad+ma can nas/_bdag gi bu pad+ma skyes kyi dus gang /_bzhad gad pa nas/_kye lha mo gzhon nu ji lta ji ltar pad+ma can de yang gang gis yang phrogs so/_/rgyal po nas/_bdag gi bu gang gis phrogs
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]pas gang gis yang shin tu mi bzad pa 'dir gnas nas zhes bshums shing gnod pa shin tu mang ba dgon pa'i gnas 'dir bdag gis gzhan ci zhig sems par byed/_bzhad gang pa ngu zhing kye ma yongs su tshim pa med pa'i gshin rjes de ring med par byas so zhes rnam par bsams
[\[220a.2\]]te/_kye lha mo ji ltar 'di bzhin du sdug bsngal spyod pa dang phrad/_pad+ma can nas/_bdag me tog thu ba'i phyir gnas nas 'ongs pa dang phrad do/_/rgyal po nas/_lha mo nam zhig drang srong chen pos khyod ma mthong ba dang khro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bzhengs la de bzhin du 'gro bar mdzod cig_/bzhad gad pa
[\[220a.3\]]nas/_kye ji ltar sA ri btson ra nas thar nas lag tu 'ongs pa la slar yang khyod kyi ji lta ba bzhin du der 'jug gam/_rgyal po nas/_na mnyam 'di ni chos kyi lugs ma yin no/_/pad+ma can rgyal po la bltas nas ngu zhing 'phags pa'i bu khyod kyis bdag slar yang yongs su 'dor ram/_rgyal po nas/_ji ltar khyod
[\[220a.4\]]kyis bdag g.yang sa chen por skyur bar byed dam gzigs mdzod/_don gang bdag gis yongs btang nas/_/slar yang len par 'dod pa ni/_/dper na khyi bzhin gsal por ni/_/slar yang skyugs pa za byed dam/_/shin tu yun ring gnas gyur kyang /_/bdag cag nam zhig 'bral bar nges/_/de bzhin du yang
[\[220a.5\]]gsungs te/_bsags pa thams cad mthar 'dzad cing /_/mthon po rnams ni dma' mor lhung /_/'dus pa'i mtha' ni bral ba ste/_/gson pa'i mtha' yang 'chi ba yin/_/gzhan yang lha mo/_kun gyi rang bzhin yun ring gnas kyang rnam par 'bral/_/'chi bdag zhags pas 'dzin cing rnam par kha
[\[220a.6\]]gdangs rgyu/_/gal te chos phyir 'di ni da ltar rnam bral kyang /_/yang dag 'dus pa bas kyang shin tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/pad+ma can nas/_'phags pa'i sras gang gsungs pa der bdag 'gro'o/_/gal te bdag 'gro yang rkang pa'i sna mi 'gro'o/_/rgyal po nas/_lha mo ngang tshul 'dis bdag gi bka' ni
[\[220a.7\]]sgrub par mdzod/_/na mnyam drang srong chen po'i gnas su lha mo skyel bar mdzod cig_/bzhad gad pa nas/_na mnyam ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du bya'o/_/pad+ma can ni ngu zhing kye gau ta ma skad cig gzhes par mdzod cig_/bdag ni re zhig 'phags pa'i bu lta'o/_/bdag ni skal ba dman te slar yang bdag
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]gis mthong bar bya ba ga la yin zhes chags shing nges par bltas nas 'phags pa'i bu bdag la'ang legs par gzigs mdzod/_slar yang bdag gis khyod mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po nas/_lha mo nyes par bltas pas ci zhig_/'dus pa thams cad 'di bzhin 'gro bar 'gyur te gzigs mdzod/_/dper
[\[220b.2\]]na lam pa lam zhugs rnams/_/'gro zhing lam du 'dus gyur nas/_/tshogs kyang phyogs gzhan 'gro bar byed/_/de bzhin gnyen 'dun tshogs rnams so/_/bzhad gad pa nas/_kye na mnyam snying rje med par ma byed/_kye lha mo'i dbugs 'byin par mdzod cig_/rgyal po ni bshums shing ji ltar bdag gis
[\[220b.3\]]dbugs dbyung bar bya ste/_slar yang 'byung 'gyur yang dag 'dus pa thob ce'am ni slar yang khyod kyi sras po ni/_/pad+ma skyes kyis 'dir ni blon po dang ni dpung tshogs thams cad bcas par 'gyur zhe'am/_/lha mo'i gyos sgyug bdag gi yab yum dag ni rab tu dang bas di ring thob ce'am/_/mnga' ris shin tu
[\[220b.4\]]rgyas par smra'am ji ltar bdag gis dga' bas rab tu dbugs dbyung bya/_/yol ba'i nang nas 'di bzhin no zhes so/_/thams cad rtab rtab por gyur te/_slar yang yol ba'i phag nas 'di bzhin no zhes ci zhig_/'di bzhin gang la rig 'dzin rnams/_/dga' bas legs 'ongs nam mkha' las/_/me tog
[\[220b.5\]]rnams kyi char phab ste/_/'dir ni gsal por gyur pa'o/_/rgyal po ni ngo tsha dang bcas te/_lha mo 'dir yang 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas gal te bdag la 'dir lha mo dang bcas pa mthong na brdzun gyi dam bca' zhes 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma can ngu zhing phyag 'tshal te/_khyod la lha rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur
[\[220b.6\]]mod ces zer nas lta zhing yongs su song ngo /_/bzhad gad pa rjes su zhugs te song ngo /_/rgyal pos gzigs te/_bud med rin chen sbyin par btang /_/yid ni 'gro zhing bya ba byas/_/bdag gi gtsug gi rin chen 'di/_/spun bzhin du ni don med gnas/_/da ni dam pa slong ba su zhig 'byung snyam pa na/_de nas
[\[220b.7\]]bram ze zhig zhugs nas kye bdag slong ba po zhes yongs su zhugs so/_/pad+ma can gyis bltas te/_gau ta ma bram ze 'di ni ci zhig slong bar byed do snyam du bdag gi snying la sems so/_/bzhad gad pa nas/_kye lha mo 'di yang bram ze ste/_thams cad du bdag cag bram zes gtong bar mi byed de 'di na yang
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]sleb bo/_/yang na nags tshang tshing gi phag tu lha mo lta zhing sdod cig bdag gis nye bar 'gro bar bya'o/_/bram zes nges par bltas te/_'di ni lha gtsug na nor bu gang yin pa 'di yin te/_gcig pu nyid kyi phun tshogs kyis/_/sa gsum rnams ni khyab par mdzad/_/bskal pa
[\[221a.2\]]chags dus gnas pa yi/_/legs ldan pad+mo'i skye gnas bzhin/_/zhes zer nas/_kye rgyal po bde legs su gyur cig_/rgyal po nas/_bde bar 'ongs sam 'dir bzhugs shig gsung /_mig g.yas pa 'phrig par gyur nas bsams pa/_ji ltar mig ni g.yas 'gul zhing /_/gang zhig lhag
[\[221a.3\]]par mngon gsal byed/_/gang ba rgya chen bsngags 'os pa'i/_/gsal bar slong ba por gyur nges/_/bram ze chen po ci slong bar byed gsungs shig ces so/_/bram ze ni ngo tsha bzhin du bdag ni nges par 'dod pa che'o/_/rgyal po dga' ba dang bcas te ngo tsha ba chog go/_/bdag nyid kyi bzhin du 'di thams
[\[221a.4\]]cad kyang khyod kyi'o/_/bram ze nas/_gzhan don ro gcig shar ba yi/_/'gro ba'i bshes gnyen zhi mdzad pa/_/bdag gi mngon 'dod khyod bzhin du/_/khyod kyi gtsug gi nor bu ste/_/bzhad gad pa rtab rtab por nye bar btud de/_kye bram ze khyed la ngo tsha ba'ang med do/_/na mnyam dga' ba'i lus
[\[221a.5\]]kyi gnas skabs kyang 'di bzhin du sdug bsngal bar byed dam/_rgyal po nas/_na mnyam de bzhin du ma byed/_ji ltar bdag gi mchod pa'i gnas khyod kyis rgyang du 'phen nam/_'di ni sbyin bdag 'dir bdag slong mo pa/_/grogs po phyin ci log tu ci phyir byed/_/'di ni 'gro ba myang 'das rgyur
[\[221a.6\]]'gro ba'i/_/bdag gi kun mkhyen bzhon pa'i mchog yin no/_/gzhan yang /_yid bzhin nor dang slong ba'i skye bo dag_/phun tshogs yon tan slong ba'i skye bo 'phags/_/yid bzhin nor ni nor tsam ster byed kyi/_/slong ba'i skye bo yon tan kun 'byung ngo /_/kye bram ze gtsug gi nor bu 'di ni ji ltar 'dod par
[\[221a.7\]]bton nas khyer cig_/bram ze nas/_lha yi gtsug gi nor bu ri rab kyi/_/rtse mo lta bur su yis bskyod par nus/_/rgyal po nas/_rdo ba yis bsnun cing thon cig_/gzigs mdzod/_chu shing snying po med pa ltar/_/rnam par nyams gyur bdag med pa'i/_/lus 'di gzhan don 'gro ba yi/_/dga' 'gyur
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]gang gis skye ba med/_/bzhad gad pa nas/_yongs su skyobs shig yongs su skyobs shig_/nags tshal gyi lha rnams gdug pa can gyi bram zes na mnyam dga' ba ni gsod par byed do/_/lha mo rtab rtab por gyur nas 'di las gzhan pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ram zhes nye bar 'ongs so/_/bram ze ngo mtshar
[\[221b.2\]]te/_ci ste nags tshal gyi lha rnams 'ongs sam snyam mo/_/pad+ma can nas 'phags pa'i sras bya ba 'dis ci zhig byed/_rgyal po nas/_yid kyi shing rta'i 'bras bu dang bcas so/_/pad+ma can ngu zhing 'phags pa'i bu'i yid kyi shing rta'i 'bras bu dang bcas so/_/bram ze'i 'dod pa grub po/_/rgyal po nas/_
[\[221b.3\]]shin tu bdag tu rmongs pas chog go/_/gzigs mdzod/_'khor ba'i chu gter sems can rnams/_/las kyi dba' rlabs shugs kyis bskyod/_/mthon po dag ni dma' mor 'phangs/_/de nas gang dang gang gis bsnyen/_/bram ze nas/_shin tu snying rje chen po la bltas nas bdag kyang yang dag par
[\[221b.4\]]brtse ba skye na gtsug gi nor bu re zhig zhog cig_/pad+ma can nas/_bram ze de bzhin du rjes su 'jug go/_/bzhad gad pa dga' nas legs par smras so/_/rgyal po shin tu mi mnyes nas/_kye bram ze khyod kyis gzhan du smras nas 'di bzhin du rigs sam/_bram ze nas/_rgyal po bdag cag gi yul du mA
[\[221b.5\]]ri'i nad zhugs te/_de'i phyir blangs nas da ni 'dis spro bar byed do/_/rgyal po ni rtab rtab por ji lta ji ltar bram ze zhes gsungs/_bram ze nas/_kye rgyal po/_srong dang so so'i khyim rnams dur khrod mi bzad bzhin/_/yan lag brkyang zhing lus 'dzag shing gi phung po bzhin/_/ri rab kyang ni khyi dang mkha'
[\[221b.6\]]'gros rgyu ma rnams/_/rab gtugs 'di ni ku ru'i yul du byung bar gyur/_/rgyal po nas/_sdug bsngal lo/_/kye bram ze mA ri'i nad de rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i thabs gang yang med dam/_bram ze nas/_'chi nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i ched du 'di bzhin lha'i gtsug gi nor bu slong ba 'jig rten pa rnams kyis bdag btang
[\[221b.7\]]ngo /_/rgyal po shin tu mnyes nas skye bo rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir bdag gi gtsug gi nor bu slong bar byed do zhes kun nas phyung nas/_gtsug gi nor bu bkan nas rtsa ba rnam par bcings pa phyung nas ni/_/'di ni tshad chen ri bong 'dzin pa'i 'od zer lta bur dkar/_/'gro ba'i don rnams yang dag sgrub mdzad gnyis
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]skyes la byin nas/_/mi drag 'gro ba kun gyi nad rnams 'di yis sel bar shog_/ces byin te brgyal nas gar byed do/_/pad+ma can ngu zhing ha 'phags pa'i sras ha mthu chen po mgon med pa rnams kyi gnyen khyod kyis bdag gcig pu 'dir yongs su 'dor bar byed dam zhes zer/_bzhad gad pa
[\[222a.2\]]nas/_ha na mnyam dga' ba 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen brtse ba chen po yongs su skyobs shig kye yongs su skyobs shig dpag bsam gyi shing yongs su 'dor zhing chu gter yongs su skam mo zhes zer/_bram ze ni gzhan du 'dir bsdad nas ci byed/_'di ni sems dpa' chen po de'i mngon par 'dod pa bdag gis bsgrub
[\[222a.3\]]par bya'o snyam nas yongs su zhugs nas bltas pa na der thub pa cig 'ongs so/_/bdag ni sdig pa mi bzad pa dang ldan pas ji srid 'dis mi mthong ba de srid bdag 'bros so snyam nas zhugs so/_/de nas drang srong 'od zer can rin chen phreng ba ma dang bcas te rab tu zhugs so/_/ci ste sgra chen gnas skabs ma
[\[222a.4\]]yin 'di ltar lhung zhing ci ste sa chen g.yo bar byed/_/ci ste rlung rnams kyang ni rtsub cing ci ste phyogs rnams kyang ni skya bor 'gro bar byed/_/ci ste nyi ma yang ni mtshams min gza' yi bdag pos 'dzin cing bcom nas gnas byed cing /_/ci ste nyi ma'i gung la di ring 'dir ni yul rnams mun pas yang dag sgrib par
[\[222a.5\]]byed/_/'di bzhin du mi'i bdag po la ji ltar sdug bsngal mi 'dod pa zhig go snyam nas bu mo rin chen phreng ba ma da ltar pad+ma ba tI gar song /_rin chen phreng ba ma nas/_chu klung dal gyis 'bab pa'i 'gram du me tog thur song ngo /_/drang srong nas 'di myur du bltar 'gro bar bya'o zhes yongs su zhugs pa na rna bar
[\[222a.6\]]cung zad thos nas a ye ji ltar ngu ba'i sgra 'dra ba zhig go/_/der re zhig bdag 'gro bar bya'o zhes nas yongs su zhugs nas bltas pa na/_rin chen phreng ba ma ngu zhing /_legs ldan pad+ma can ni ji ltar ngu zhing mchis so/_/'di yang gau ta ma'o/_/drang srong nas 'di las gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang ngo /_/rin chen
[\[222a.7\]]phreng ba mas nges par bltas nas/_ha bdag gsod 'di ni lha gtsug na nor bu ste sa la 'gyel nas mchis so/_/drang srong nas/_ha bdag gsod bdag skal ba dman pa mi rtag pa ni stobs che'o/_/skye ba'i dpag bsam shing bzhin du/_/rtag tu 'tsho bar byed pa yi/_/de ni 'di na nyal zhing 'gyel/_/
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]phun tshogs nges par skad cig tsam/_/bu mo pad+ma ba tI/_ci zhig_/ji lta bde bzhin du ngu bar byed do/_/bzhad gad pa nas/_legs ldan gzigs gzigs drang srong nas/_'di ji ltar yin/_bzhad gad pa nas/_legs ldan gtsug na nor bu'i sbyin pa'o/_/drang srong nas/_ha dpag bsam gyi shing 'gro ba'i
[\[222b.2\]]gnyen gcig pu zhes zer/_pad+ma can la rin chen phreng ba ma 'khyud nas grogs mo dga' ma 'dir shog_/gnas skabs kyi mtha' 'di la ltos shig_/hA bu pad+ma skyes yab kyis kyang yongs su 'dor bar byed do/_/de nas pad+ma skyes dang /_lag bzangs dag kyang rab tu zhugs te 'di ni nga'o/_/pad+ma skyes ni
[\[222b.3\]]'dir blangs nas/_/bzod par dka' las rgyal bar byas/_/rje bo lta zhing 'gro bar byed/_/de las yid kyi the tshom ci/_/pad+ma skyes nas/_adz+dza sna chen po yum dang bcas te yab dang 'jal bar byed do zhes zer/_lag bzangs nas/_gzhon nu de ji lta ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes zer/_yongs su zhugs pa na pad+ma
[\[222b.4\]]skyes rta ba bzhin du 'gyel bar gyur to/_/adz+dza nga'i rkang pa la ci nam cig gis rmugs so zhes zer/_lag bzangs 'jigs nas myur du bltas te rang nyid bsams pa dang /_skrag pas kun nas 'gyel te/_ji ltar 'di ni sbrul yin te/_sa yi ser ga 'dir rjes su zhugs te song ngo /_/bdag gi mngon 'dod grub pa 'di
[\[222b.5\]]nyams so snyam mo/_/yang na myur du lha'i drung du nye bar 'gro zhing sleb ma thag tu gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od zer gyis dug med par 'gyur ro/_/snyam nas gsal bar smras pa/_gzhon nu myur du mdzod cig_/yab yum dag dang mjal bar bya'o zhes smras pa na/_nga'i rkang pa ni sbrid sil sil mchis so/_/gnyid kyang bro/_lus

[\[227a.1\]]pho can gyi du ba drag tu 'phyur la/_ri dwags kyi tshogs 'jigs pa med cing lam du bag phab ste gnas pa 'di ni dka' thub kyi nags tshal bzhin du mtshon no/_/'dren pas/_grogs po yang dag par mtshon no/_/'di dag ni dka' thub kyi nags tshal nyid de/_gang gi phyir/_gos
[\[227a.2\]]kyi don du shing shun rnams bcad rtse ba nyid kyis shin tu che ba min/_/ril ba rnying pa chag pas mtshan pa'i chu rgyun dag ni mkha' ltar rab tu dang /_/'ga' zhig dag na muny+dza'i ske rags khye'u sa bcad cing dor bar gyur pa mthong /_/rtag tu thos pas ne tsho dag kyang rig byed tshig 'di rab tu sgogs par byed/_/
[\[227a.3\]]des na tshur sheg rab tu zhugs te/_nye bar mtshon par bya'o/_/rab tu zhugs te gar dag byed do/_/'dren pas/_e ma thub pa'i skye bo rab tu dga' ba rnams ni rig byed kyi tshig rgyas pa la the tshom rnam par gcod par byed la/_khye'u'i skye bo rnams ni ji ltar gsher ba gsher ba'i yam shing dag gcod cing /_/
[\[227a.4\]]dka' thub pa'i gzhon nu ma rnams ni ljon pa gsar pa'i kyo ra 'gengs par byed pa'i dka' thub kyi nags tshal ni rab tu zhi ba dang dga' bar byed pa nyid do/_/'di nyid na/_bung ba'i sgra yis legs par 'ongs sam zhes ni brjod pa bzhin/_/'di dag mgo ni 'bras bu dud pas 'dud par byed pa bzhin/_/me tog
[\[227a.5\]]char pa 'thor zhing bdag la mchod yon ster ba bzhin/_/yal ga ldan pa yis kyang mgron gyi bsnyen bkur ji ltar bslabs/_/de'i phyir dka' thub kyi nags tshal 'dir ni 'dug par 'os pa zhig ste/_'dir gnas na bdag cag gi sems bde bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/bi dru Sha kas/_kye grogs po 'on kyang
[\[227a.6\]]nges par ri dwags 'di dag mgrin pa cung zad kyogs te g.yo ba med pa'i kha las cung zad zos pa'i rtswa kham nang na gnas pa zag cing rna ba gcig rab tu bslangs te gtad nas mig zum pa dang bcas pas nyan par byed pa lta bur mtshon no/_/'dren pas rna ba gtad nas/_gnas thob rab tu gsal ba'i 'gros can gdangs
[\[227a.7\]]snyan dag gis rnam par gzhag pa 'dzin byed pa/_/bung ba'i sgra bzhin nges par yid 'phrog rgyud mangs dag gi rgyud mangs sgra dang ldan pa yis/_/gsal zhing rol sgeg tshig ldan gru ni kun du 'khyog pa'i lus can ri dgas 'di dag rnams/_/so yi bar na gnas pa rtswa yi kham ni gcod pa'i sgra dag
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]bsdams nas nyan par byed/_/bi dru Sha kas/_kye grogs po dka' thub kyi nags tshal 'di na su zhig glu len par byed/_'dren pas/_ji ltar sor mo 'jam pa'i 'dab mas mngon par bsnun pa'i rgyud mangs shin tu gsal ba ma yin par sgogs shing glu yang snyan cing phra ba gtsor len pa de ltar bdag rtog
[\[227b.2\]]pa ni gnas 'di na lha dag mnyes par byed cing lha'i bud med rgyud mangs dang ldan pa'i gru len par byed do/_/bi dru Sha kas/_kye grogs po tshur shog_/yu'u cag kyang lha'i gnas blta bar bya'o/_/'dren pas legs par brjod de/_nges par lha ni phyag bya bar 'os pa'o/_/nye bar song ste 'phral la 'dug
[\[227b.3\]]nas grogs po gal te na skye bo 'di lta bar mi 'os pa srid do/_/de nas re zhig ta ma la'i gel pa 'di'i nang du 'dug ste lha lta ba'i skabs btsal bar bya'o/_/de ltar byas te/_de nas ma la ya can ma dang /_'bangs mo zhugs te sa la 'dug nas rgyud mangs byung bar byed do/_/'dren mas glu len pa/_go rI
[\[227b.4\]]rab rgyas pad+ma'i ge sar gyi/_/dngul ltar dkar ba'i 'od can bcom ldan ma/_/khyod kyi bka' drin dag gis bdag gi ni/_/mngon par 'dod pa rab tu grub par mdzod/_/'dren pas rna gtad nas/_e ma ho gru/_e ma ho rol mo/_'di la gsal byed kyi dbyangs rnam pa bcu po 'dis gsal ba thob cing /_
[\[227b.5\]]myur ba dang /_bar ma dang /_dal ba'i stabs rnam pa gsum rab tu gsal bar yongs su bcad de/_ba lang gi rnga ma la sogs pa rnam pa gsum gyi rim pas ngal bso bar byas pa de kho na'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rol mo'i cho ga yang dag pa gsum bstan to/_/'bangs mos/_rje'i sras mo nges par
[\[227b.6\]]yun ring du glu dag blangs nas khyod kyi lag rtse dag yongs su mi ngal lam/_'dren mas/_grung mo bcom ldan ma'i mdun du rgyud mangs sgogs par byed pa la bdag ga la ngal/_'bangs mos smod pa dang bcas par kye brtse med ma 'di'i mdun du rgyud mangs bsgrags pas ci zhig bya zhes bdag smra'o/_/gang
[\[227b.7\]]zhig 'di snyed kyi dus su skye bo gzhon nu ma'i dka' thub bsnyen nas nges pa la gnas pas bstan kyang da dung khyod la dang bar mi ston no/_/ji dru Sha kas thos nas/_kye grogs po 'di ni nges par gzhon nu ma ste ci'i phyir mi lta/_'dren pas skyon ci yod/_gzhon nu ma lta ba ni skyon med pa nyid do/_/'on kyang
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]gal te na bdag cag mthong nas 'jigs te/_ngo tsha ba gzhon nu ma la rnyed sla bas 'dir yun ring du mi sdod pa mi srid do/_/des na re zhig 'khri shing gi dra ba 'dis bsgribs te blta bar bya'o/_/gnyi gas bltas te/_bi dru Sha kas/_ya mtshan dang bcas par kye grogs po ltos shig ltos
[\[228a.2\]]shig_/ngo mtshar ro ngo mtshar ro/_/rgyud mangs kyi sgras rna ba'i bde ba skyed par byed pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_rnam par shes pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs 'dis mig gi yang bde ba skyed par byed do/_/de'i phyir 'di ni su zhig yin ci lha mo 'am/_klu'i bu mo'am/_yang na rig
[\[228a.3\]]pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo 'am/_yang na grub pa'i rigs las 'khrungs pa zhig go/_/'dren pas rnam par blta zhing chags pa dang bcas par grogs po 'di su zhig yin zhes bdag gis ma rtogs so/_/bdag gis 'di tsam shes te/gal te mtho ris bu mo yin na 'phrog byed mig stong ldan des don byas
[\[228a.4\]]'gyur/_/gal te klu yi bu mo yin na'ang 'di'i gdong yod tshe sa 'og zla bas stong ma yin/_/gal ste rig 'dzin ma yin gzhan rigs las rgyal bdag cag rigs ni 'bras dang bcas/_/gal te grub rigs las skyes de phyir grub pa 'jig rten gsum du grags par 'gyur/_/bi dru Sha kas/_'dren pa
[\[228a.5\]]la bltas nas dga' ba dang bcas shing rang gis rtogs par e ma'o/_/yun ring po zhig nas yid srub kyi spyod yul du lhung bar gyur to/_/bdag nyid la ston cing /_yang na ma yin te/bram ze bdag gi'o/_/'bangs mos/_mdza' ba dang bcas par kye bram ze bdag smra'o/_/brtse med ma 'di'i mdun du rgyud
[\[228a.6\]]mangs bsgrags pas ci zhig bya zhes te rgyud mangs 'phangs so/_/'dren mas bu mo bcom ldan ma go rI la ma smad cig_/ke ding bcom ldan mas bka' drin mdzad pa bzhin no/_/'bangs mos/_rje'i sras mo re zhig ci 'dra ba dag spros shig_/'dren mas/_bu mo nges par deng rmi lam du bdag 'di
[\[228a.7\]]bzhin nyid du rgyud mangs bgreng ba la bcom ldan mas gsungs pa/_bu mo khyod kyis rgyud mangs bgreng ba mkhas pa khyad par du 'phags pa 'di dang /_bdag la thun mong ma yin pa'i gus pa bu mo'i dngos po la rnyed dka' ba 'dis bdag shin tu tshim par gyur to/_/de'i phyir yun ring po ma yin pa na rig
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bas lag pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes so/_/'bangs mos dga' ba dang bcas par rje'i sras mo/_gal te de ltar yin na mi lam du zhes ci'i phyir brjod/_lha mos snying la 'dod pa'i mchog byin pa nyid yin no/_/bi dru Sha kas/_nges par bdag cag lha mo lta ba'i skabs su bab
[\[228b.2\]]po/_/de'i phyir tshur sheg nye bar 'gro bar bya'o zhes te nye bar btud do/_/bi dru Sha kas/_mi 'dod bzhin du khyen nas jo mo grung mo bdag bden par smra ste/_'di ni mchog byin pa nyid do/_/'dren mas 'jigs pa dang bcas par 'dren pa la mtshon te/_bu mo 'di su zhig ces so/_/'bangs mos/_gzhan
[\[228b.3\]]dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa 'dis na/_'di nyid bcom ldan mas bka' drin mdzad pa yin snyam mo/_/'dren mas chags pa dang bcas shing ngo tsha ba dang bcas par bltas so/_/'dren pas/_g.yo zhing yangs pa'i mig ldan dbugs 'byin cing /_/'dar zhing mkhregs stug nu ldan 'khrul byed ma/_/
[\[228b.4\]]lus 'di dka' thub nyid kyis shin tu ni/_/ngal gyur slar yang ci slad gdung bar byed/_/'dren mas/_bu mo shin tu 'jigs pas 'di la mngon du phyogs te 'dug par mi nus so zhes te/_logs la bltas nas 'khod do/_/bi dru Sha kas/_jo mo khyod kyi dka' thub kyi nags tshal 'di na gang zhig 'gron po
[\[228b.5\]]'ongs pa la tshig tsam gyis kyang phebs par smra ba ma yin pa 'di 'dra ba'i kun du spyod pa yod dam byu/_'bangs mos rje'i sras mo/_'gron po la bsnyen bkur bya ba rigs pa yin no/_/de'i phyir ji ltar mthu chen po dang ldan pa 'di dag la gus par bya ba la rmongs par gnas/_yang na khyod bzhugs shig_/kho mo
[\[228b.6\]]nyid kyis ji ltar rigs pa dag bya'i/_'dren pa la mtshon te jo bo legs par 'ongs sam/_jo bo stan yongs su bzung bas phyogs 'di brgyan par mdzod cig_/bi dru Sha kas/_kye grogs po 'di ni legs par smra'o/_/yud tsam zhig 'dug ste ngal gso bar bya'o/_/'dren pas/_khyod ni rigs par smra'o/_/
[\[228b.7\]]gnyi ga 'khod do/_/'dren mas kwa yi bzhad gad kyi ngang tshul can ma de ltar ma byed/_gal te dka' thub pa 'ga' zhig gis mthong na 'di las bdag dul ba ma yin pa dang ldan par dogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dka' thub pa zhugs te/_rigs kyi bdag po kau shi kas bdag la bka' bsgos pa/_mnyes

[\[229a.1\]]gshin shA Na Da l+ya/_yab kyi bkas/_rgyal tshab bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gzhon nu sprin kyi bzhon pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur bdag ri ma ya 'di nyid kyi phyogs 'ga' zhig na gnas pa sring mo ma la ya can gyi khyem thab kyi slad du blta ba'i phyir di ring 'ongs te/_
[\[229a.2\]]gal te de blta zhing ma la ya can gyi nyi ma gung gi mchod sbyin gyi dus yol bar 'gyur srid do/_/des na de bos la shog shig ces so/_/des na bdag re zhig go rI'i khang pa nyid du 'gro'o/_/'gro zhing sa la rnam par bltas nas/_a ye rdul dang ldan pa'i phyogs na rab tu gsal ba'i 'khor los mtshan pa'i rjes
[\[229a.3\]]kyi phreng ba dag snang ba 'di su zhig gi yin/_mdun du bltas te sprin gyi bzhon pa la nges par brtags nas 'di ni skyes bu chen po 'di yin nam snyam mo/_/gzhan yang /_mgo la gtsug tor 'di gsal smin ma'i bar na mdzod spu 'di ni rnam par mdzes/_/mig ni pad+ma'i rjes su mthun zhing brang gdengs
[\[229a.4\]]'phrog byed dag la 'gran par byed/_/lag pa 'khor los mtshan pa ji ltar de ltar skyes bu dag ni su zhig 'di/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i gnas dag ma thob 'dug pa yin nam snyam/_/yang na the tshom gyis ci zhig bya ste/_shin tu gsal bar 'di ni sprin gyi bzhon pa yin par nges so/_/_

[\[229a.7\]]'tsham pa'i bdag po'i skal ba dang ldan par gyur cig_/rgyal po'i bu mo/_khyod la rigs kyi bdag po kau shi kas bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyi mchod sbyin gyi dus yol bar 'gyur gyis myur du shog shig ces so/_/'dren mas/_mi dga' ba dang bcas par/_gang bla mas bka' stsal pa nyid do/_/rang gi

[\[229b.1\]]rtogs par/_gcig ni bla ma'i gsung dang gzhan/_/mdza' bo blta ba'i rtse dga' bzang /_/'gro 'am mi 'gro 'gal ba la/_/bdag snying 'phyang mo yug par 'gyur/_/shugs phyung zhing langs te ngo tsha ba dang bcas shing chags pa dang bcas par 'dren pa la blta zhing dka' thub pa dang lhan cig
[\[229b.2\]]song bar gyur to/_/'dren pas/_sred pa dang bcas par shugs phyung nas 'dren ma la blta zhing /tshang ra'i khyon gyi khur ldan zhing /_/dman pa dag tu 'gro ma 'di/_/gzhan du 'gro yang bdag gi ni/_/snying la gom pa bkod par gyur/_/'bangs mos/tshur sheg chur sheg_/rje'i sras mo zhes
[\[229b.3\]]te/_ma la ya can ma 'khor dang bcas pa song bar gyur to/_/bi dru Sha kas/_kye gang zhig blta bar bya ba dag mthong ngo /_/da ni nyi ma gung gi nyi ma'i gdung ba nyis 'gyur du byas pa bzhin du bdag gi lto ba'i me dag lhab lhab byed do/_/de'i phyir 'di nas song ste/_gang gis bram ze dag gi mgron du 'gyur
[\[229b.4\]]bar byas nas thub pa'i skye bo las dngos su rnyed pa'i rtsa ba dang chu ba la sogs pas srog gzung bar bya'o/_/'dren pas/_steng du bltas nas/_a ye/_bcom ldan 'od zer stong phrag ldan ni nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dzegs te bzhugs so/_/de ltar yang /_gdung bas de dus tsan dan la bdar thang chus dkar
[\[229b.5\]]ba'i 'gram pa 'dzin byed cing /_/rang gi rna ba bskyod pa'i rlung ni yang dag chags pas bzhin la g.yob byed cing /_/lag pas gtor ba'i chu thigs snying khar khyad par du 'dren glang po'i bdag po 'di/_/da ni bzod dka' zug rngu drag pos zug pa lta bu'i gnas skabs 'dzin par byed/_/ces te gnyi ga song

[\[229b.7\]]su bgrod de phyi rol du mngon par phyogs shing bltas nas/_'di nyid nas 'ongs pa 'di su zhig yin/nges par brtags nas ci grung mo'am/_'bangs mo gnyis pa yang zhugs so/_/dang po mas nye bar btud nas/_grogs mo grung mo khyod kyang ci'i phyir mgyogs par 'gro bar byed/_gnyis pas

[\[230a.1\]]rje'i sras mo ma la ya can mas bdag la gsungs pa/_bu mo grung mo bdag gi lus kyis me tog thu ba'i yongs su ngal ba mi bzod do/_/ston ka'i gdung bas byas pa bzhin du bdag yongs su gdung bas shin tu lhag par gzir bar gyur to/_/des na khyod song la chu shing gzhon nu'i

[\[230a.6\]]shing gi khang par gshegs pa ma lags sam/'dren mas/_ngo tsha dang bcas pas bu mo khyod kyis legs par dran par byas so/_/de'i phyir tshur sheg de nyid du 'gro bar bya'o/_/'bangs mos byon cig byon cig rje'i sras mo song bar gyur to/_/'dren ma gzhan du song ba na/_'bangs mos phyir bltas

[\[230b.1\]]'bangs mos tsan dan 'khri shing gi khang pa de ni 'di lags so/_/des na nang du zhugs te zla ba chu shel gyi nor bu'i rdo la rje'i sras mo bzhugs par mdzod cig_/'dren mas/_de ltar byas te shugs nar phyung nas bdag nyid kyis rtogs par/_bcom ldan me tog gi mtshon dang ldan pa gang gi gzugs

[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]bdag gis shes pa nyid do/_/'dren mas mchi ma dang bcas par bu mo de lta bu'i skal ba bdag la ga la yod/_'bangs mos rje'i sras mo de skad ci la gsungs/_khyab 'jug brang gi gzhi la dpal mo 'dzin pa yang bde bar ji ltar 'gyur/_'dren mas skye bo legs pa ngag snyan

[\[231a.3\]]bshums shig_/langs nas yal 'dab blangs nas btsur te khu ba snying gar byugs so/_/rje'i sras mo/_bdag smra'o/_/ma bshums shig_/nu ma'i ngos la byugs pa tsan dan yal 'dab kyi thang chu 'di ni nges par rgyun chad med par 'bab pa mchi ma'i thigs pa 'di dag gis dro bar byas pas khyod kyi snying
[\[231a.4\]]ga'i gdung ba mi sel lo zhes te chu shing gi 'dab ma dag gis g.yob par byed do/_/'dren mas/_lag pas bzlog cing /_bu mo ma g.yob ma g.yob chu shing gi 'dab ma'i rlung 'di ni shin tu pa'o/_/'bangs mos rje'i sras mo 'di'i skyon du ma byed cig_/'di ltar snyam zhing stug pa'i tsan dan 'khri shing
