[\[240b.1\]]dag bstan to/_/khyod kyang gang du 'gro/_sgo srungs kyis/_bdag la yang rgyal po chen po kun gyi dbyig gis bka' stsal ba/_ji ltar rab dga' song la bshes gnyen gyi dbyig la smros shig_/tshes gcig gi sgron ma'i dga' ston 'di la ma la ya can ma dang /_mag pa la yang 'ongs nas dga' ston de la
[\[240b.2\]]'os pa rnams cung zad nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes so/_/des jo bo rgyal po'i bu mo'i sngon du song shig_/bdag kyang bshes gnyen dbyeg bod pa'i slad du 'gro bar bya'o/_/gnyi ga song bar gyur to/_/'jug par byed pa'o/_/de nas sprin gyi bzhon pa dang /_bshes gnyen gyi dbyig zhugs par gyur to/_/'dren pas mal
[\[240b.3\]]stan rtswa 'jam dag dang gdan ni rdo gtsang khang pa ljon pa dag gi 'og_/btung ba chu rgyun bsil ba dag dang kha zas gtsang ba grogs ni ri dwags te/_/de ltar ma bslangs 'byor pa thams cad rnyed pa'i nags tshal 'di na spyon cig ste/_/gang zhig slong ba rnyed dka' gzhan don bsgrub pa'i 'bras med don bral nyid du gnas pa'o/_/bshes
[\[240b.4\]]gnyen gyi dbyig gis steng du bltas nas gzhon nu myur bar mdzod cig_/'di ni chu'i phung po bskyod pa'i dus so/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas thos nas legs par mtshon no/_/de ltar yang /_rab sgogs chu yi glang chen dbang po'i shugs kyis bsnun pas rjes 'brel rab rgyas shing /_/ri yi phug nang dag gi sa gzhi thams cad sgra snyan rab tu
[\[240b.5\]]sgrogs byed pa/_/thos pa'i lam 'gog sgra 'di ji ltar drag tu sgogs par byed pa de lta bar/_/rab 'phar grangs med dung dang ldan pa'i rlabs 'di dag ni nye bar 'ongs pa 'dra/_/bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis/_gzhon nu byung ba nyid ma yin nam ltos shig_/li shi'i yal 'dab dag ni zos gyur pa'i/_/lag ldan chu
[\[240b.6\]]srin gregs pa'i dri bzangs kyi/_/chu dang ldan pa rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs 'di/_/rin chen 'od zer dag gis spras te mdzes/_/'dren pas/_bshes gnyen gyi dbyig_/ston gyi dus kyi chu 'dzin ni/_/dkar ba'i sgrib byed kyis bsgribs pa/_/ma la ya yi rtse mo 'di/_/gangs can ri rtse'i dpal dag 'dzin/_/bshes gnyen gyi dbyeg gis/_/gzhon
[\[240b.7\]]nu 'di dag ni ri ma la ya'i rtse mo ma yin te/_nges par 'di dag ni klu rnams kyi rus pa'i tshogs so/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas/_mya ngan sdug bsngal dang bcas par rgyu mtshan ci'i phyir 'di snyed dus gcig tu shi bar gyur/_bshes gnyen gyi dbyeg gis/_gzhon nu 'di dag dus gcig tu shi ba nyid ma yin te/_'di dag ji ltar gyur pa
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]mnyan par mdzod cig_/sngon rang gi gshog pa'i rlung gis rgya mtsho'i chu bskyod de sa 'og nas blangs nas bya khyung gis nyi ma so so la lag 'gro du ma za bar byed lo/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas sdug pa shin tu dka' ba dag byed do/_/de nas bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis de nas nam zhig gi tshe klu'i
[\[241a.2\]]'jig rten mtha' dag brlag tu dogs nas klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyis bya khyung la smras pa/_sprin gyi bzhon pas gus pa dang bcas par dang por nga zo shig ces pa'am ci/_bshes gnyen gyi dbyeg gis ma yin no/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas smad pa dang bcas par gzhan ci/_bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis 'di brjod/_khyod kyi mngon
[\[241a.3\]]par 'debs pas skrag nas lag 'gro ma stong phrag rnams kyi mngal nga bar byed cing phru gu rnams kyang lnga pa nyid du nye bar 'gro'o/_/de ltar bdag cag gi rgyun chad par gyur na khyod nyid kyi rang gi don nyams par byas par 'gyur ro/_/des na gang gi don du khyod sa 'og tu mngon par babs pa de'i don du nyi ma so sor rgya mtsho'i 'gram
[\[241a.4\]]na gnas pa la re re nga nyid kyis bskul te gtang bar bya'o zhes so/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas sdug pa de ltar klu'i rgyal pos klu rnams legs par bsrungs lo/_/gang gi lce ni stong phrag gnyis nang na/_/gang gis sbrul gcig bsrung phyir sbrul dgra la/_/ding bdag bdag nyid ster zhes smra ba yi/_/lce de de la gcig kyang med
[\[241a.5\]]dam ci/_/bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis/_de dag kyang bya'i rgyal pos khas blangs so/_/de ltar nyi ma so so re re rnam bzhag bsgrubs gyur pa'i/_/gang zhig sbrul bdag rnams ni 'dab chags rgyal pos za bar byed/_/de dag rnams kyi rus phung gangs ri dag gi 'od can 'di/_/nyi ma so sor 'phel bar gyur cing 'gyur la 'gyur
[\[241a.6\]]ba yin/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas ngo mtshar dang bcas par/_/gtsang ba min pa kun gyi gter/_/byas pa mi gzo rnam par 'jig_/lus ngan dag gi ched du yang /_/rmongs pa dag ni sdig par byed/_/kye ma klu rnams kyi rgud pa la 'di ni mthar thug pa med do/_/bdag nyid kyis rtogs par rang gi lus yongs su btang bas gdengs
[\[241a.7\]]can cig tsam yang bdag gis yongs su srung bar byed nus par gyur na ci ma rung 'on kyang bshes gnyen gyi dbyeg gnas so/_/de nas sgo skyong zhugs par gyur to/_/ri'i rtse mor ni bdag gis 'dzegs so/_/rnam par bltas nas bshes gnyen gyi dbyeg 'di mag pa dang nye ba na 'khod do/_/re zhig drung du 'gro
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]bar bya'o/_/nye bar btud de/_gzhon nu rgyal bar gyur cig_/bshes gnyen gyi dbyeg gis/_rab dga' dgos pa ci'i sbad du 'ongs/_sgo srungs kyis rna bar shub par byed do/_/bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis/_gzhon nu yab kyis bdag 'bod par byed do/_/'dren pas gshegs mdzod cig_/
[\[241b.2\]]bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis/_gzhon nu yang gnod pa mang ba'i phyogs 'dir ltad mo la yun ring du gnas par mi bya'o/_/sgo srungs dang 'grogs te song bar gyur to/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas/_re zhig bdag gis kyang ri'i rtse mo 'di las babs te rgya mtsho'i 'gram blta bar bya'o/_/babs nas song ngo /_/phyi rol na kyi
[\[241b.3\]]hud bu sdug_/kyi hud bu sdug_/dung gi gtsug khyod gsod par byed zer na bdag gis ji ltar blta bar bya/_sprin gyi bzhon pas a ye bud med lta bu gzir ba'i cho nge dag go/_/des na re zhig nye bar btud de/_'di su zhig yin/_'di'i 'jigs pa gang las yin zhes gsal bar bya'o/_/de nas rgan mo ngu zhing
[\[241b.4\]]rjes su 'brang ba'i dung gi gtsug zhugs par gyur to/_/gos zung dag spras pa'i king ka ra yang ngo /_/rgan mos mchi ma dang bcas par kyi hud bu sdug gdung gi gtsug_/di ring khyod gsod par 'gyur ba bdag gis ji ltar blta bar bya/_o sko nas bzung ste/_khyod kyi bzhin byi zla ba 'di dang bral bas ni di ring bdag gi
[\[241b.5\]]sa 'og mun par 'gyur ro/_/dung gi gtsug gis/ma ma 'di ltar shin tu smre sngags 'don cing bdag rab tu gdung bar byed/_rgan mos nges par brtags nas/_bu'i lus la reg cing /_kyi hud bu sdug khyod kyi lus nyi ma ma mthong bas shin tu gzhon pa 'di ji ltar na snying la brtse ba med pa'i mkha' lding gis
[\[241b.6\]]nges par za bar 'gyur/_mgrin pa nas bzung ste ngu bar byed do/_/dung gi gtsug gis yum smre sngags kyis ci zhig phan ltos shig_/dang po gang tshe skyes pa na/_/mi rtag nyid kyi pang du byed/_/ma yis phyis nas ma mas bzhin/_/de tshe mya ngan rim pa ci/_/rgan mos bu sdug yud tsam zhig 'dug dang /_re
[\[241b.7\]]zhig khyod kyi bzhin blta bar bya'o/_/king ka ras tshur shog tshur shog gzhon nu dung gi gtsug_/de dag brjod par byed la ci/_/nges par bu la chags pas rmongs pa 'di dag gis ni rgyal po'i bya ba mi shes so/_/dung gi gtsug gis bzang po 'ong ba 'di nyid do/_/king ka ras bdag nyid kyis rtogs
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]par nges par bdag gis dung gi gtsug gsod pa'i rdo dang nye bar khrid zin to/_/re zhig gsod pa'i rtags 'di byin to gsod pa'i rdo dag bstan par bya'o/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas mthong nas/_a ye 'di ni bud med do/_/dung gi gtsug mthong nas nges par 'di ni 'di'i bu yin par brtag par
[\[242a.2\]]bya'o/_/des na nges par ci'i don du ngu bar byed/_kun du bltas nas/_nges par 'jigs pa'i rgyu ni ci yang ma mthong ngo /_/des na 'di'i 'jigs pa gang las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ci zhig nye bar btud nas dri bar bya'o/_/yang na 'di ni 'di ltar rgyun du cho nge 'don pas gal te 'di nyid las
[\[242a.3\]]gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/des na yal 'dab can gyis bsgribs te mnyan par bya'o/_/king ka ras mchi ma dang bcas par thal mo sbyar nas gzhon nu dung gi gtsug 'di ni nges par jo bo'i bka' yin no zhes bya ste/_mi bzad pa 'di 'dra ba dag smra'o/_/dung gi gtsug gis bzang por spros shig_/king ka
[\[242a.4\]]ras klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyis khyod la bka' byed to/_/dung gi gtsug gis gus pa dang bcas par spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas rje yis ci zhig bka' byed/_king ka ras gos dmar po zung 'di dag gyon la gsod pa'i rdo la 'dzegs shig_/gang gis gos dmar po'i rtags kyis nye bar mtshon pa dag
[\[242a.5\]]mkha' lding gis bzung nas zas kyi don du 'khyer bar 'gyur ro/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas mchi ma dang bcas par 'di nyid sdug pa nor rgyas kyis yongs su btang ba zhig go/_/king ka ras/_dung gi gtsug 'di long shig_/gos zung dag gtod do/_/dung gi gtsug gis gus pa dang bcas par blangs te/_
[\[242a.6\]]mgo la bzung nas rje la gus par byed do/_/rgan mos bu'i lag na gos dag 'dug pa mthong nas brang brdung ba dang bcas par kyi hud mnyes gshin gang gis 'jigs pa rdo rje rtsang ba ni 'di nyid do/_/brgyal bar gyur to/_/king ka ras nges par mkha' lding 'ong ba'i dus la nye bar gyur to/_/des na myur
[\[242a.7\]]du 'bros par bya'o/_/king ka ra song bar gyur to/_/dung gi gtsug gis yum dbugs phyin par gyur cig_/rgan mo dbugs phyung ste mchi ma dang bcas par kyi hud kyi hud bu sdug yid la re ba brgya yis thob pa bo/_/khyod phyis bdag gis gang du mthong bar 'gyur/_/mgrin pa la bzung ste/_sprin gyi bzhon pas
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]mchi ma dang bcas par kun du rmongs shing yang yang mchi ma'i rgyun gtong smre sngags mang du brjod byas nas/_/bdag gi bu sdug skyob pa su zhes phyogs rnams dag tu phongs pas mig 'phen ma'i/_/ma yi pang na nye bar bsten pa'i bu 'di brtse ba dor nas za byed pa/_/bya yi bdag po'i mchu nyid ma yin snying yang rdo rje
[\[242b.2\]]dag las byas sam snyam/_/dung gi gtsug gis bdag nyid kyi lag pas ma'i gdong yongs su 'phyi zhing yum shin tu 'khrugs pas ci zhig phan dbugs phyung shig_/rgan mos mchi ma dang bcas par ji ltar dbugs phyin par 'gyur/_ci bdag ni bu gcig pa can no zhes bya ste brtse ba dang bcas par klu'i
[\[242b.3\]]rgyal pos ma bsams so/_/kyi hud brtse med mthar byed da lta brtse ba med pa'i snying can khyod kyis 'di ltar rgyas shing gson pa'i 'jig rten na bdag gi bu sdug gcig pu dran no/_/rnam pa thams cad du skal ba zhan pa bdag bcom par gyur to/_/brgyal lo/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas/_gzir zhing mgrin par
[\[242b.4\]]srog phyin te/_/rang gi gnyen gyis yongs btang ba/_/'di ni gal te ma bsrungs na/_/bdag gi lus kyi yon tan ci/_/des na re zhig nye bar 'gro bar bya'o/_/dung gi gtsug gis yum bdag nyid brtan par mdzod cig_/rgan mos kyi hud bu sdug rnyed dka' ba rnyed pa dung gi gtsug_/gal te re zhig
[\[242b.5\]]klu'i 'jig rten yongs su srung bar byed pa nor rgyas kyis byed yongs su btang ba de la su zhig gis khyod yongs su skyob par 'gyur/_sprin gyi bzhon pas 'phral la nye bar btud de kye bdag go/_/rgan mos 'jigs pa dang bcas par stod g.yogs kyis bu g.yogs nas sprin gyi bzhon pa la nye bar btud de/_bi
[\[242b.6\]]na ta'i bu bdag la 'tshe ba gyis shig_/bdag ni khyod kyi zas kyi rgyur yongs su brtags pa'o/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas/_mchi ma dang bcas par/_e ma'o bu la byams pa'o/_/'di yi bu la byams pa yis/_/'khrugs pa 'di ni mthong gyur nas/_/snying la brtse med lag 'gro yi/_/dgra
[\[242b.7\]]yang brtse ba byed dam snyam/_/dung gi gtsug gis yum skrag pas ci zhig phan/_'di ni nges par klu'i dgra ma yin no/_/ltos shig_/klu chen mgo bo bskam zhing khrag gzags pa'i/_/zer mas byugs pa gtum po'i mchu dang ldan/_/gang na mkha' lding dag ste gang na yang /_/zhi ba'i rang bzhin gzugs
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]can dam pa 'di/_/rgan mos bu sdug bdag ni khyod gsod pas 'jigs te thams cad mkha' lding nyid du mthong ngo /_/sprin gyi bzhon pas/_kye yum ma 'jigs shig_/bdag ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i gzhon nu ste/_khyod kyi bu bsrung ba nyid kyi don du 'ongs pa yin no/_/rgan mos
[\[243a.2\]]dga' ba dang bcas par bu slar yang de brjod cig_/sprin gyi bzhon pas/yum yang dang yang du brjod pa 'di yis ci/_las nyid kyis rdzogs par bya'o/_/rgan mos spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas bdag gi bu sdug yun ring du 'tsho bar gyur cig_/sprin gyi bzhon pas/_yum gcig gsod rtags 'di ni bdag
[\[243a.3\]]la gsol/_/rang lus g.yogs te khyod kyi bu yi ni/_/srog dag bsrung phyir be+e na ta skyes kyi/_/kha zas dag la bdag gis stsal bar bgyi'o/_/rgan mos rna ba bsgribs te tshig de zhi bar gyur cig_/khyod kyang dung gi gtsug dang /_khyad par med par bdag gi bu nyid do/_/yang na dung gi gtsug
[\[243a.4\]]pas kyang khyod shin tu lhag pa nyid do/_/gang zhig gnyen gyi skye bos kyang yongs su btang ba bdag gi bu lus sbyin pas kyang bsrung bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro/_/dung gi gtsug gis ya mtshan dang bcas par e ma ho sems can chen po 'di'i spyod pa ni 'gro ba dag las bzlog pa zhig ste/_gang gi phyir/_gang gi slad du kun
[\[243a.5\]]gyi bshes kyi gtum po bzhin du sngon tshe khye sha zos gyur cing /_/gang gi ched du go ta ma yis de la phan byas tA la'i byin pa rab tu bsad/_/gang gi don du mkha' lding 'od srung bu 'dis nyi ma so sor lto 'phye 'joms byed pa/_/srog de nyid ni rtswa bzhin gang zhig brtse bas gzhan gyi don du ster bar byed pa mtshar/_/
[\[243a.6\]]sprin gyi bzhon pa la mtshon nas kye bdag nyid chen po khyod kyis bdag nyid rab tu rtsom pa'i zol med pa'i brtse ba dang ldan pa dag bdag la bstan to/_/des na 'bad pa 'di yis ci zhig bya/ltos shig_/bdag lta srog chags phra mo rnams/_/skye ba dang ni 'chi 'gyur te/_/gzhan gyi don la nus ldan pa/_/
[\[243a.7\]]khyod 'dra 'byung ba ga la zhig_/des na 'dis ci zhig bya/_zhen pa 'di thong shig_/sprin gyi bzhon pas dung gi gtsug gi lag nas bzung ste/_gzhon nu dung gi gtsug bdag gis gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pas yid la re ba'i skabs yun ring po nas rnyed pa dag gi bar chad bya bar mi 'os so/_/rnam par
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]rtog pa med par gsod pa'i rtags dag byin cig_/dung gi gtsug gis sems dpa' chen po don med pa'i gdung ba chen po 'dis ci zhig bya/_dung gi gtsug gis dung skyong gi rigs dung ltar dkar ba dri ma can du byed dam ci/_ci ste khyod bdag la rjes su brtse bar byed pa de lta na bdag cag gi yum 'di ji ltar 'tsho ba stong
[\[243b.2\]]par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs bsam par mdzod cig_/sprin gyi bzhon pas kye thabs bsams pa nyid ma yin nam/_'dir ci zhig bsam/_de ni byed nyid kyi dbang du gyur to/_/dung gi gtsug gis ji ltar sprin byi bzhon pas gang zhig khyod ni shi gyur na/_/'chi zhing gson na gson 'gyur ba/_/de ni gal te gson
[\[243b.3\]]'dod na/_/bdag gi srog gis bdag nyid srungs/_/'di ni thabs yin te/_des na bdag la gsod pa'i mtshan ma myur du gsol cig_/'dis bdag nyid g.yogs te gsod pa'i rdo la 'dzegs par bya'o/_/khyod kyang ma'i mdun du brdar te gnas 'di nas ldog par byos shig_/gal te na gsod pa'i
[\[243b.4\]]gnas nye bar gyur pa 'di mthong nas bud med rang bzhin gyis sdar ma'i ngang can srog btang bar srid do/_/bsad pa'i klu rnams kyis keng rus kyis dkrigs pa'i dur khrod chen po khyod kyis ma mthong ngam ci/_de ltar yang g.yo ba'i mchu yis drangs shing phyed lhung sha yi cha ni zos pas 'dod pa 'phel gyur pa'i/_/bya rgod
[\[243b.5\]]rnams kyi gshog pa gnyis ni skyod par byed pas mun pa stug po nyid byas shing /_/khrag gi rgyun 'bebs mang po'i zhag ni rgyun du zag cing rul pa'i dri nga ldang ba 'dir/_/ce spyang rnams kyi kha nas rab 'bar me yi phreng ba lhung zhing lhab ces sgogs par byed/_/dung gi gtsug gis ji ltar bdag gis ma mthong sbrul
[\[243b.6\]]gyi zas kyis nyi ma so sor ni/_/mi stong bya ba'i 'dren pas dga' byas pa/_/ri bong can dkar rus pa thod pa can/_/dur khrod 'di ni drag po'i lus bzhin no/_/des na song zhig skrag par nye bar bkod pa 'di dag gis ci zhig bya/_nges par mkha' lding 'ong ba'i dus ni nye bar gyur to/_/ma'i mdun du
[\[243b.7\]]pus mo btsugs nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba bkod de/_da ni yum khyod kyang log cig/_/yum gcig gang dang gang du bdag_/rab tu skye ba nyid 'gyur ba/_/de dang der ni bu la byams/_/khyod nyid bdag gi mar gyur cig_/rkang pa la gtugs so/_/rgan mos mchi ma dang bcas pas kyi hud ji
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]ltar khyod kyi tshig ni mchi ma med pa'o/_/nges par bu sdug khyod btang nas gzhan du bdag gi rkang pa mi 'dor ro/_/des na khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu 'gro bar bya'o/_/dung gi gtsug gis longs nas re zhig bdag gis kyang shin tu mi ring ba na legs ldan lho phyogs go kar+Na yod pa la bskor ba byas te/_
[\[244a.2\]]rje'i bka' la gnas par bya'o/_/gnyi ga song bar gyur to/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas/_kye ma mngon par 'dod pa grub par ma gyur to/_/des na 'di la thabs ci zhig yod 'phral la nyug rum par zhugs par gyur te gos zung 'di sprin gyi bzhon pas mthong nas dga' ba dang bcas shing bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa e ma ma brtags
[\[244a.3\]]par rnyed pa'i gos dmar po zung cig po 'dis bdag gi mngon par 'dod par grub par gyur to/_/nyug rum pas/_gos zung cig po 'di ni lha mo bshes gnyen gyi dbyeg gi yum gyis gzhon nu la bskur ba yin no/_/des na gzhon nus 'di yongs su bzhes shig_/sprin gyi bzhon pas langs nas blangs te bdag nyid kyis
[\[244a.4\]]rtogs par bdag gi ma la ya can ma'i lag pa bzung ba ni 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur to/_/gyon nas gsal bar kye nyug rum pa gshegs shig khyod kyis bdag tshig gis lha mo la phyag 'tshal bar bya ste/_ji ltar yun ring du thogs pa'i sprin gyi bzhon pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/nyug rum pas/_ji
[\[244a.5\]]ltar gzhon nus bka' byed pa bzhin no/_/song ngo sprin gyi bzhon pas/_gzhan gyi don du lus gtong ba'i/_/dus la bab tshe byung gyur pa/_/gos ni dmar po zung 'di dag_/dga' ba shin tu chen po byed/_/rnam par bltas nas ji ltar ri ma la ya'i rdo'i tshogs g.yo ba dang rlung drag tu ldang ba de ltar bya'i rgyal po nye
[\[244a.6\]]bar gyur to zhes bdag rtog go/_/gzhan yang 'jig pa'i sprin dang mtshungs pa gshog rtsa'i phreng ba dag gis nam mkha' rab tu sgrib byed cing /_/shugs kyi rlung gis bskyod pa'i rgya mtshos sa gzhi 'gengs pa bzhin du chu dag ngogs su 'phen/_/phyogs kyi gnyis 'thung dbang po rnams kyi dus mthar dogs pa
[\[244a.7\]]byed cing 'jigs bcas bltas gyur te/_/bcu gnyis nyi ma ltar 'bar lus kyi 'od kyis phyogs bcu dag ni rab tu ser skyar byed/_/des na ji srid dung gi gtsug 'di 'ongs par ma gyur pa de srid du gsod pa'i rdo 'di la myur bar bdag 'dzeg par bya'o/_/de ltar byed do/_/'dug ste reg pa'i gar byed cing /_/e ma
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]'di yi rig pa'o/_/ji ltar mngon par 'dod don grub pa'i slad/_/gsod pa'i rdo 'di la sbyar de ltar ni/_/ma la ya yi tsan dan ros brlan pa'i/_/ma la ya can mas kyang bde mi byed/_/yang na ma la ya can ma ci zhig_/ma yi pang du byes pa ni/_/bde bar nyal bas gang thob pa'i/_/bde de bdag gis gsod pa yi/_/rdo 'di yi
[\[244b.2\]]ni steng du thob/_/des na bya khyung 'dir 'ong ste/_/re zhig bdag nyid bsgribs te 'dug par bya'o/_/de ltar byed do/_/de nas mkha' lding zhugs par gyur to/_/lhag ma can gzugs 'jigs pas rlum por byas pa dran zhing bsel zer can gyi dkyil 'khor 'phangs/_/shing rta'i rta ni skrag nas nyi ma bskyod tshe sngon la skyes pas kun
[\[244b.3\]]dga' ldan par mthong /_/mtha' nas chu 'dzin tshogs pa dag ni nges par 'bab pas gshog pa ring po nyid gyur pa/_/sbrul zas la dga' bdag ni mgyogs pas skad cig nyid la ri bo ma la yar phyin to/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas smon lam byed do/_/klu ni srung byed bdag gi bsod nams gang /_/rang lus sbyin las de ring gang
[\[244b.4\]]bsgrubs pa/_/de yis bdag nyid srid pa srid par ni/_/gzhan phan snying por ldan pa'i lus thob shog_/mkha' lding gis sprin gyi bzhon pa la nges par brtags nas/_lhag ma'i klu rnams bsrung phyir gsod pa'i rngo 'di dag la nges par lhung gyur pa'i/_/snying kha la ni rdo rje'i dbyug pa rab drag mchu yis rab tu bcom byas nas/_/
[\[244b.5\]]bdag la 'jigs pas snying dag dral zhing zag pa'i khrag gis rab tu byugs pa bzhin/_/gos dmar gyis g.yogs gdengs can dag ni bza' bar bya phyir myur bar blang bar bya/_/mngon par btab ste blangs so/_/mtha' nas me tog ltung bar byed do/_/mkha' lding gis ya mtshan dang bcas par a ye steng nas me
[\[244b.6\]]tog gi char pa dang rnga bo che'i sgra 'di dag kyang mthong zhing thos nas/_/bung ba kun du dga' bar byed pa'i dri ldang me tog char 'di mkha' las ci phyir 'bab/_/mtho ris phyogs kyi 'khor lo rnga chen rnams kyi sgra 'dis mu cor dag tu ci slad byed/_/de yang 'di ltar shes te/_bdag gi shugs kyi rlung gis yongs 'du dag ni bskyod pa dang /_/
[\[244b.7\]]'jigs pa'i sprin gyi tshogs rnams dus mthar dogs pa skyes te 'di yang bsgrags pa yin nam snyam/_sprin gyi bzhon pas e ma bdag gi don byas par gyur to/_/mkha' lding gis rtog cing klu rnams srung bar byed pa 'di/_/ji ltar bdag la lji bar snang /_/de ltar sbrul dag za 'dod pa/_/gsal bar di ring sel bar 'gyur/_/des
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]na re zhig ri ma la ya'i rtse mor 'dzegs te ji ltar 'dod par 'di bza' bar bya'o/_/khyer nas song bar gyur to/_/mtshan ma bzhi pa'o//_//de nas sgo srungs rab dga' zhugs par gyur to/_/mdza' bos rang khyim skyed tshal gnas la yang /_/mdza' ba dag la ldig pa dogs 'gyur na/_/gnod mang mthong zhing
[\[245a.2\]]'jigs su rung ba yi/_/'brog dgon dbus na gnas la smos ci dgos/_/de ltar yang sprin byi bzhon pa rgya mtsho'i rlabs lta ba'i ltad mo la song ba ni yun ring du thogs so zhes rgyal po chen po kun gyi dbyig sdug bsngal dang ldan par gnas so/_/de yis bdag la dka' bsgos pa rab dga' bdag gi mkha' lding gi 'jigs
[\[245a.3\]]pa dang nye ba'i phyogs su mag pa sprin rmi bzhon pa song bar gyur to zhes thos so/_/tshul 'dis dogs par gyur te/_des na myur bar song la ci 'di rang gi khyim du 'ongs sam/_ma 'ongs shes par gyis shig ces so/_/re zhig de nyid du 'gro bar bya'o/_/song ba dang mdun du mthong nas/_a ye 'di ni rgyal po'i drang srong sprin gyi
[\[245a.4\]]bzhon pa'i yab sprin gyi tog bsti gnas kyi khyams na yum chos spyod ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i bu mos rim gro byed cing 'khod do/_/de ltar yang rab dkar 'khyog po g.yo zhing bskyod pa lbu ba ldan pa'i chu dang mtshungs pa 'dzin/_/na tshod mtshungs shing bsod nams che ldan lha mos rnam mdzes snu'i bu mo bzhin/_/ji
[\[245a.5\]]ltar rlabs kyis mdzes bzhin gang gi drung na ma la ya can nye bar gnas/_/sprin gyi tog 'di nyid ni chu gter dag dang rab tu mtshungs pa'i dpal 'di 'dzin/_/des na re zhig nye bar 'gro bar bya'o/_/de nas sprin gyi tog gdan la gnas shing btsun mo dang mna' ma dang bcas pa zhugs par gyur to/_/lang tsho dag gi bde
[\[245a.6\]]ba spyad cing grags pa rgyas par byas/_/brtan pa'i blo yis rgyal srid la 'dug dka' thub rnam par spyad/_/bu 'di bsngags 'os mna' ma 'di ni rigs mtshungs legs las skyes/_/ka ye don byas bdag gi di ring 'chi ba bsam par byas/_/rab dgas 'phral la nye bar btud nas sprin gyi bzhon pa'i sprin gyi tog gis
[\[245a.7\]]rna ba bsgribs nas sdog pa zhi bar gyur cig_/yum gyis nges par bkra mi shis pa 'di nyams par gyur cig_/ma la ya can mas bdag nyid kyis rtogs par mtshan ma ngan pa 'dis bdag gi snying 'dar ba bzhin no/_/sprin gyi tog gis bzang po sprin gyi bzhon pa ci/_rab dgas sprin gyi bzhon pa'i lam lta ba la rgyal po chen
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]po kun gyi dbyig gis khyod kyi drung du bdag btang ngo /_/des na rgyal po chen po bdag la bka' spyod cig_/bdag gis rje la ji skad ces rtogs par bgyi/_sprin gyi tog gis/_ci bu de nyid na nye bar mi gnas sam rab dgas ma mchis so/_/yum gyis mya ngan dang bcas par rgyal po chen po de yang med na da ni bdag gi bu gang du
[\[245b.2\]]song /_gang gis na de ltar yun ring du thogs/_sprin gyi tog gis nges par bdag cag gi srog bsrung ba'i don du ring du song bar gyur to/_/ma la ya can mas mya ngan dang bcas shing bdag nyid kyis rtogs par bdag gis kyang rje'i sras yud tsam zhig kyang ma mthong bas gzhan nyid 'ga' zhig dogs so/_/rab
[\[245b.3\]]dgas rgyal po chen po bka' byed cig_/bdag gis rje la ji skad gsol ba bgyi/_sprin gyi tog gis mig g.yon pa 'gul bas gsal bar byed do/_/sprin gyi bzhon pa yun ring du thogs so zhes bdag 'khrugs shing sems par byed pa na mi 'dod bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/_yang yang g.yas pa min pa'i mig_/ci
[\[245b.4\]]zhig la g.yo mig ngan khyod/_/g.yo ba nyi mas sel gyur cig_/steng du lta zhing /_bcom ldan 'od stong pa 'di ni srid pa gsum gyi mig gcig pu ste/_sprin gyi bzhon pa dge legs dag gsal bar ston cig_/ya mtshan dang bcas par/_bltas par gyur na mig la sdug bsngal rab tu ster/_/khrag gi zer
[\[245b.5\]]ma dang mtshungs 'od zer gsal bo 'gyed/_/ltas ngan rlung gis bskyod byas skar ma dang mtshungs 'di/_/glo bur nyid du mkha' las ci slad mdun du 'bab/_/ji ltar bdag gi rkang pa nyid la 'bab/_/thams cad kyis nges par brtags so/_/sprin gyi tog gis a ye sha rlon pa dang skra dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi nor
[\[245b.6\]]bu 'di su zhig gi yin par 'gyur/_yum gyis mya ngan dang bcas par gtsug gi rin po che 'di ni bdag gi bu'i yin pa 'dra'o/_/ma la ya can mas/_yum de skad ma gsungs/_rab dgas rgyal po chen po de ltar ma rtogs par gdung bar ma byed cig_/'dir ni klu mkha' lding gis zos pa rnams kyi
[\[245b.7\]]gtsug gi nor bu sder mo dang khas bcom pa du ma dag ltung ba nyid do/_/sprin byi tog gis/_lha mo rab dgas rig pa dag brjod do/_/gal te de ltar yang yin pa srid do/_/yum byis rab dgas gal te na dus 'di tsam gyis gyos sgyug gi khab nyid du bdag gi bu 'ongs pa srid do/_/des na song la rtogs te myur du
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]'phrin srings shig_/rab dgas ji ltar lha mos gsungs pa bzhin no/_/song bar gyur to/_/sprin gyi tog gis/_lha mo klu dag gi gtsug gi nor bu yin pa yang srid do/_/de nas dung gi gtsug gos dmar po dag bzung ste zhugs par gyur to/_/mchi ma dang bcas par brlag go/_/kye ma brlag go/_/myur bar rgya mtsho'i
[\[246a.2\]]'gram du go kar+Na la btud byas nas/_/lto 'phye chen po gsod pa'i sa gzhi der ni bdag phyin na/_/rig pa 'dzin pa kha dang sder mos snying kha bcom pa de/_/khyen nas mkha' lding dag ni mkha' la rab tu song bar gyur/_/kye hud rgyu med pa'i gnyen gcig po/_kye hud mchog gi snying rje can kyi hud gzhan byi sdug bsngal ba can/_kye khyod ni
[\[246a.3\]]gang du gshegs bdag gi tshig gi lan byin cig_/nyams pa dung gi gtsug mngal na gnas pa nyid na ci'i phyir ma shi byed kyis ci zhig byas/_klu rnams bskyabs las grags pa cig ma thob/_/bsngags par 'os pa'i rje yi gsung ma bsgrubs/_/gzhan gyis bdag nyid btang bsrungs mya ngan 'os/_/kye ma kyi hud smad bdag bslus
[\[246a.4\]]so bslus/_/des na rnam pa 'di ltar gyur pa bdag ni skad cig tsam 'tsho zhing bdag nyid la nye bar bgad par mi bya'o/_/re zhig 'di'i rjes su song ste brtag par bya'o/_/yongs su 'gro zhing sa la bltas te/_dang por sa gzhi khyab byas de nas mdun du thigs pa rags pa grol ba dag tu lhung /_/rdo rnams la lhung brdabs shing 'thor gyur
[\[246a.5\]]thigs phran ldan pa'i thang la srog chags rnams kyis dkrigs/_khams kyi ngos la mtshon dka' bzhin stug dag gi rtse dang phug rnams dag la chags gyur pa/_/khrag gi rgyun 'di'i rjes su legs par 'brangs te mkha' lding lta 'dod bdag ni 'gro bar bya/_/yum gyis thos nas skrag pa dang bcas par/_rgyal po chen po su zhig ngu ba'i bzhin dang
[\[246a.6\]]ldan pa 'di ni 'di nyid du myur bar 'ong zhing bdag gi snying 'khrugs par byed des na re zhig 'di su yin shes par byos shig_/sprin gyi tog gis/_ji ltar lha mo smra ba bzhin no/_/dung gi gtsug gis kyi hud 'jig rten gsum gyi gtsug gi nor bu gcig pu khyod bdag gi gang du blta bar bya/_bcom par gyur to/_/sprin gyi tog gis thos nas
[\[246a.7\]]dga' ba dang bcas par bgad nas lha mo mya ngan thong shig_/'di'i gtsug gi nor bu 'di sha la chags pa'i bya 'ga' zhig gis mgo las bcad de khyen ba lhung ba yin nam snyam mo/_/yum gyis tshim pa dang bcas par ma la ya can ma la 'khyud nas a yI yugs sa mor ma gyur ma brten par mdzod cig_/khyod ni rnam pa 'di 'dra ba dag gis
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]nges par yugs sa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/ma la ya can mas dga' ba dang bcas par yum khyod kyi shis par brjod pa yis so zhes te zhabs la gtugs so/_/sprin gyi tog gi dung gi gtsug la nye bar btud nas bu byed kyi gtsug gi nor bu stor ram ci/_dung gi gtsug gis rje bdag gcig pu'i ma
[\[246b.2\]]yin gyi/_'jig rten gsum gyi yang ngo /_/sprin kyi tog gi bu ji ltar na dung gi gtsug gi sdug bsngal gyi khur chen po dang ldan pas mchi mas mgrin pa nye bar bsgags pa bdag gis brjod par mi nus so/_/sprin gyi tog gis rang gi mya ngan shin tu bzod par dka' ba dag bdag la spros shig_/de bdag la 'phos pa gang gis na
[\[246b.3\]]khyod kyis bzod par bya bar 'gyur ro/_/dung gi gtsug gis gsan par mdzod cig_/nges par bdag ni klu dung gi gtsug ces bya ba'o/_/zas kyi res la bab nas klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyis bi na ta'i bu la bsrings so/_/mang pos ci zhig bya/_gal te khrag gi rgyun gyi lam 'di rdul gyis bsgribs te mtshan dka' bar 'gyur ro/_/des na
[\[246b.4\]]mdor bsdus pa bshad par bya'o/_/sems ni snying rje dang ldan pa/_/rig pa 'dzin pa su zhig gis/_/rang nyid mkha' lding la byin nas/_/bdag gis srog ni bsrungs par gyur/_/sprin gyi tog gis/_mnyes gshin gzhan la phan pa la zhen pa de lta bu bdag gi bu las gzhan pa su zhig yod/_kye bu sprin gyi bzhon pa yis zhes
[\[246b.5\]]gsal bar brjod cig_/kyi hud skal ba ngan pa bdag bcom mo/_/yum gyis kyi hud bu sdug pa khyod kyis 'di ci la byas/_ma la ya can mas/_kyi hud ji ltar bdag la mtshan ma ngan pa ni bden pa nyid du gyur to/_/brgyal bar gyur to/_/dung gi gtsug gis mchi ma dang bcas par a ye nges par sems dpa' chen po de'i yab yum
[\[246b.6\]]ni 'di dag go/_/bdag gi mi 'dod pa brjod nas 'di dag gnas skabs 'di la bkod do/_/yang na dug 'dzin gye kha nas dug las gzhan pa ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/_kye ma srog rab tu ster ba sprin gye bzhon pa la de dang mtshungs pa'i phan pa dung gi gtsug gis byas so/_/des na da lta nyid du bdag nyid kyis gsad par bya'am ci/_yang
[\[246b.7\]]na re zhig 'di dag dbugs dbyung bar bya'o/_/yab dbugs phyin par mdzod cing /_/yum dbugs phyin par mdzod cig_/gnyi ga dbugs phyin par gyur to/_/yum gyes bu mo longs shig_/rings par ma byed cig_/bdag cag kyang sprin gyi bzhon pa med par 'tsho 'am ci/_des na re zhig dbugs phyin par gyis shig_/ma la ya can mas
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]dbugs phyin nas kyi hud rje'i sras khyod gang du bdag gis blta bar bya/_/sprin gyi tog gis/_kyi hud bu bla ma'i zhabs kyi bsnyen bkur gyi cho ga shes pa khyod bdag gis gang du blta bar bya/_khyod kyis bdag gi rkang pa la/_/gtsug gi nor bu gtug tu bcug_/'jig rten gzhan du 'gro na yang /_/dul ba'i
[\[247a.2\]]rim pa ma dor ro/_/gtsug gus nor bu blangs nas kyi hud khyod kyis bdag la 'di tsam kho na bstan par byas/_snying la brlan nas a ha ha gus pas shin tu rings nas 'dug cing mgo btud pas/_/rtag tu bdag gi rkang la phyag 'tshal khyod kyi ni/_/gtsug gi nor bu 'di rtsub min yang brdar ba yis_/bdag gi snying ni
[\[247a.3\]]shin tu 'joms par byed pa ci/_/yum kyis kyi hud bu sprin gyi bzhon pa gang khyod ni bla ma'i zhabs kyi sri zhu bor nas gzhan pa'i bde ba nyid la sred pa ma yin na/_de ji ltar da ni yab spangs nas mtho ris kyi bde ba nyams su myong bar byed du song bar gyur/_sprin gyi tog gis mchi ma dang bcas par lha mo yu cag sprin gyi bzhon pa
[\[247a.4\]]med par 'tsho'am ci gang gis na de lta bu'i smre sngags rjod par byed/_ma la ya can mas rkang pa dag la gtugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas yab rje'i sras kyi mtshan ma gtsug gi nor bu dag khrod cig_/gang gis na 'di snying la byas pas me bcug ste bdag nyid kyi gdung ba bsal bar bya'o/_/sprin gyi tog gis bdag po'i brtul
[\[247a.5\]]zhugs ma ci la 'khrugs par byed/_bdag cag thams cad 'di nyid du nges pa ma yin nam/_yum kyis kye rgyal po chen po de lta na ci zhig la thogs/_sprin gyi tog gis ci la yang ma yin no/_/'on kyang bsgrubs pa'i me las gzhan pa'i mes 'dus bya ba mngon par bsgrubs pa ma yin no/_/des na mchod sbyin gyi khang pa las me
[\[247a.6\]]blangs te bdag cag rnams bsreg par bya'o/_/dung gi gtsug gis bdag nyid rtogs par ji ltar sdig can bdag gcig pu'i don du rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs 'di mtha' dag chad par 'gyur te/_des na re zhig 'di skad do/_/gsal bar yab nges pa nyid du ma gyur par 'di 'dra ba'i thub chod sgrub par regs pa ma yin
[\[247a.7\]]no/_/byed po'i rnam 'phrul ni rnam par bkra ba yin te/_gal te na klu'i dgras 'di klu ma yin pa zhig go zhes shes te/_sprin gyi bzhon pa 'tsho ba dang bcas pa nyid gtong ba yang srid do/_/des na khrag gi rgyun 'di nyid kyis re zhig bi na ta'i bu'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o/_/yum gyis rnam pa kun du lha rnams kyi
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]bka' drin gyis bu 'tsho ba dang ldan pa nyid mthong bar gyur cig_/ma la ya can mas bdag nyid kyis rtogs par nges par 'di ni skal ba zhan pa bdag la dkon no/_/sprin gyi tog gis/_bu khyod kyi tshig mi bden pa ma yin par gyur cig_/de lta na yang me dang bcas pa nyid du bdag nyid 'gro bar rigs so/_/des na khyod
[\[247b.2\]]rjes su song shig_/bdag cag kyang me'i khang pa nas me blangs te myur ba nyid du 'ong ngo /_/sprin gyi tog btsun mo dang mna' ma dang bcas pa song bar gyur to/_/dung gi gtsug gis des na re zhig mkha' lding gi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o/_/'jig rten 'das gyur spyod pa dag gis gtsang ba'i lus dang ldan/_/bya yi bdag po blo gros
[\[247b.3\]]'khrul pa dag gis khyer ba 'di/_/ji srid zos par ma gyur de srid rab tu bsrung ba'i phyir/_/sa gzhi 'dzin pa mchog tu mtho ba'i phyir ni 'gro bar bya/_/zhes te dung gi gtsug song bar gyur to/_/mtshan ma lnga pa'o//_//des na dung gi gtsug zhugs par gyur te/_mdun du nges par brtags nas/_khrag gis brlan pa'i
[\[247b.4\]]mchu dag brdar bas ri la dro Ni gsar pa bzhin byed cing /_/rang gi 'dren byed 'od zer me yi phreng bas nye ba'i nags kyi khongs dag bsregs/_/'jigs rung rdo rje ltar rtsub sder mo dag ni mtha' ru sa la brdab cing byeng /_/sbrul gyi dgra 'di ma la ya yi cog gi rtse mor ring po dag nas mthong /_/de nas mdun du sprin gyi bzhon pa
[\[247b.5\]]'gyel ba'i mkha' lding zhugs par gyur to/_/mkha' lding gi bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa skyes nas bzung ste lag 'gro'i bdag po dag zos par gyur na/_'di 'dra ba'i ya mtshan dang bcas pa ni bdag gis sngar ma mthong ngo /_/gang zhig sems dpa' chen po 'di la gdung ba med pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_dga' ba rgya chen
[\[247b.6\]]po dang bcas pa bzhin du yang mthong ngo /_/de ltar yang /_brtan pa'i rgya mtsho 'di yi khrag ni lhag par 'thungs kyang dman par 'gyur ba med/_/sha dag rab tu bcad pa las skyes gdung ba 'dzin yang dga' bas bzhin rab dwangs/_/gang zhig lus ni zos pa min pa de la spu long 'di ni gsal pos mtshan/_/gnod byed bdag la yang
[\[247b.7\]]ni 'di yi mig dag phan pa byed pa bzhin du blta/_/des na 'di yi brtan pa'i tshul gyis bdag ni dge mtshan dang ldan pa bzhin du byas so/_/'di ni bza' bar mi bya'i/_re zhig su yin brtag par bya'o/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas mkha' lding la bltas nas/_bdag gi lus la da dung sha dag yod/_/rtsa sgo rnams las khrag ni zag pa nyid/_/
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]khyod kyang tshim par gyur pa ma mthong na/_/mkha' lding zas kyi don la chags bral ci/_/mkha' lding gi bdag nyid kyis rtogs shing ngo mtshar dang bcas par ji ltar na 'di gnas skabs 'di la yang 'di ltar snying stobs dang ldan pa nyid du mngon par brjod/_gsal bar/_khyod kyi snying las khrag dag ni/_/bdag
[\[248a.2\]]gi mchu yis rab tu 'phrog_/slar yang khyod kyi brtan pya pa 'dis/_/bdag gi snying nyid phrogs par gyur/_/de'i phyir khyod su yin thos par 'dod do/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas/_'di ltar bkres pa'i sdug bsngal kyis/_/gzir la khyod kyis mnyan mi 'os/_/re zhig bdag gi sha dang ni/_/khrag rnams dag gis tshim par mdzod/_/dung gi gtsug
[\[248a.3\]]gis rings pa dang bcas par nye bar btud de/_mkha' lding mkha' lding nges par thub chod dag bsgrub par mi bya'o/_/'di ni klu ma yin pas yongs su thong la bdag zo shig_/bdag ni klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyis khyod kyi zas kyi don du btang ba'o brang bstan to/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas dung gi gtsug la lta zhing kye ma dung gi gtsug
[\[248a.4\]]'ongs te/_bdag gi yid la re ba 'bras bu med par byas so/_/mkha' lding gis gnyi ga la bltas nas/_gnyi ga yang gsod pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pas gang nges par klu yin zhes bdag gis ma rtogs so/_/dung gi gtsug gis khyod ni gnas ma yin pa la 'khrul pa ste/_brang la bkra shis mtshan ma lta zhog bdag gi lus la
[\[248a.5\]]shun pa ma mthong ngam_/rjod par byed bzhin du yang lce gnyis dag ni khyod kyis nges par ma 'grangs sam/_/mi bzad dug gi me yi du ba'i tshogs kyis rin chen 'od zer nyams byed cing /_/bzod dka' gdung bas sdud byas rlung gis rgyas gyur gdengs ka 'di gsum ma mthong ngam/_/mkha' lding gis dung gi gtsug gi
[\[248a.6\]]gdengs ka mthong nas/_sprin gyi bzhon pa la lta zhing nges par 'di su zhig bdag gis bsad par gyur/_dung gi gtsug gis/_kye 'di ni rig pa 'dzin pa sprin gyi bzhon pa'o/_/mkha' lding gis/_'di rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi thig le sprin gyi bzhon pa yin nam/_ri rab man+d+ra ra'i ngos dang gangs kyi rtse dang dbang chen dag gi
[\[248a.7\]]ri/_/ke la sha yi rdo ba'i gzhi dang ma la ya yi ngos kyi cha dag dang /_/phyogs ni de dang de dag rnams su gang gi grags pa rnam mngo 'jig rten dang /_/'jig rten min par rnam dpyod rgyu ba'i tshogs rnams dag gis glur len de dag thos/_/rnam pa thams cad du grags pa ma yin pa'i 'dam chen por bying bar gyur to/_/sprin gyi bzhon pas
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]gdengs can gyi bdag po ci'i phyir 'di ltar yid 'byung bar byed/_dung gi gtsug gis/_'di yid 'byung ba'i gnas ma yin nam ci/_rang gi lus kyis bdag gi lus 'di mkha' lding las yongs su bsrungs pa khyod kyis bdag sa 'og las kyang 'og tu dgyer bar 'os so/_/mkha' lding gis a ye ji ltar brtse bas brlan pa'i
[\[248b.2\]]sems dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid chen po 'di bdag gis bza' ba'i spyod yul du gyur pa'i gdengs can rnams kyi srog yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir bdag nyid rang zas kyi don du nye bar 'ongs so/_/des na bdag gi bya ba ma yin pa chen po byas so/_/mang pos ci zhig bya/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di nyid gsad par gyur to/_/des
[\[248b.3\]]na sdig pa chen po 'di dag par byed pa ni me rab tu 'jug pa las gzhan ma mthong ngo /_des na nges par bdag gis me dag gang du rnyed par 'gyur/_phyogs rnams su blta zhing a ye su zhig 'dis me blangs nas 'di nyid du 'ong bar byed de/_re zhig 'dir rjes su bskyang bar bya'o/_/de nas dung gi gtsug gis gzhon nu khyod kyi

[\[248b.5\]]'dug ste stod g.yogs bzung nas de ltar byed do/_/de nas sprin gyi tog btsun mo dang mna' mar bcas pa zhugs par gyur to/_/sprin gyi tog gis mchi ma dang bcas par/_bu sprin byi bzhon pa/_bdag dang gzhan gyi 'di zhes bden par snying rje'i rim pa bdag la ga la yod/_/ci zhig mang po'am gcig nyid bsrung zhes khyod la

[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]bya ba med de/_bu bsad pas ngo tsha bas na 'di'i bzhin la blta bar mi nus so/_/yang na me'i ched du yongs su 'khrugs pas ci zhig bya/_bdag chu gter gyi ngogs nyid du gnas par bya'o/_/de nas re zhig da ni 'jig rten gsum za ro la bskyod pa'i dus kyi lce rtse dang 'dra 'bar zhing 'khyog_/kun nas rab tu g.yo

[\[249b.1\]]yid brtan par mdzod cig_/bdag nyid chen po yid brtan par mdzod cig_/sprin gyi bzhon pas yid brtan nas dung gi gtsug bla ma dag dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig rjo/_dung gi gtsug gis de ltar byed do/_/yab yum dbugs phyin par mdzod cig sprin gyi bzhon pa ni dbugs phyin par gyur to/_/ci mi lta'am slar

[\[250a.1\]]des na nye bar bstan par mdzod cig_/gang gis sdig pa las grol bar 'gyur/_sprin gyi bzhon pas yab bdag la gnang ba gsol cig_/'di'i sdig pa yongs su 'dzad pa nye bar bstan par bya'o/_/sprin gyi tog gis bu de bzhin gyis shig_/sprin kyi bzhon pas bi na ta'i bu nyon cig_/mkha' lding

[\[250b.1\]]skyobs shig_/yongs su skyobs shig_/bdag gi bu 'di ni 'chi bar byed do/_/ma la ya can mas/_kyi hud rje'i sras po khyod ni yongs su 'dor bar 'dod pa bzhin du mtshon no 'di ci zhig byung rjo/_sprin gyi bzhon pas thal mo sbyar bar 'dod cing /_dung gi gtsug bdag gi lag pa sbyor cig_/dung gi gtsug gis de ltar

[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]rtsi'i char gyis sprin gyi bzhon pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de sngar so'i dug can zos pa'i rus pa'i phung po 'di dag kyang sbar 'tsho bar bya'o/_/ci ste 'di ma byin na de'i tshe/_bdag gis chu yi mgon po gshog pas 'thung zhing lus ni rab tu bskyod tshe drag po'i rlung dang ldan/_/me dang bcas pa'i nyi ma bcu gnyis mig
[\[251a.2\]]gi 'od kyis sreg cing brgyal 'khrugs 'gyel 'gyur ba'i/_/mchu yis brgya byin rdo rje nor lha'i be con yi dwags dbang po'i dbyig pa bcom byas nas/_/rang dgar gshog pa spangs te skad cig bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin char ni mngon par dbab par bya/_/des na bdag 'ongs so zhes te song bar gyur to/_/sprin gyi

[\[251b.1\]]sprin gyi bzhon pa ni nyams pa med pa'i lus dang ldan no/_/yum gyis langs te dga' ba dang bcas par bcom ldan ma'i bka' drin byis so/_/rkang pa dag la gtugs so/_/gnyi gas sprin gye bzhon pa la 'khyud do/_/ma la ya can mas rje'i sras slar 'tsho bar byas pa ni dga'o/_/gau rI'i zhabs dag la gtugs

[\[251b.3\]]du blta'o/_/sprin gyi tog gis/_ji ltar sprin du med pa'i char 'bab/_bcom ldan ma 'di ci zhig gau rIs/_rgyal po chen po sprin gyi bzhon pa dang /_lto 'phye'i bdag po rus pa'i lhag mar gyur pa 'di dag slar 'tsho bar bya ba'i phyir 'dab chags kyi bdag po 'gyod pa yang dag par skyes pas lha'i 'jig rten nas bdud rtsi'i char
[\[251b.4\]]'bebs par byed do/_/mdzub mos ston cing khyod kyis ma mthong ngam ci/_gdengs ka'i nor bu gsal zhing rab 'bar yan lag mchog ldan nyams pa med pa'i lus thob cing /_/bdud rtsi'i ro ni myang ba la chags lce rtse gnyis kyis sa la rab tu ldag byed cing /_/dug 'dzin bdag po 'di dag da ni mgyogs pa dang bcas 'khyog por

[\[251b.7\]]'di ni mdun du byung bar gyur pa dang /_/so bzhi dag gis mtshan pa'i gnyis 'thung dkar po 'di dang ni/_/sngo bsangs rta mchog ma la ya can yang ste 'di dag ni/_/khyod kyi rin chen rnams so 'khor los sgyur ba legs par ltos/_/gzigs par mdzod cig_/ma tang ga de ba la sogs pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i bdag
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]po 'di rnams bdag gis bskul te/_gtsug gi nor bu rab tu mdzes pa'i 'od zer gyis dbang po'i gzhu'i phreng ba 'god cing gus pas slob ma'i lus mngon par btud de phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/bu slar yang khyod la dga' ba ci zhig bya/_sprin gyi bzhon pas/_'di las gzhan pa'i dga' ba ci

[\[252a.3\]]sum du mthong 'di las dga' ba gzhan gang bdag ni ci zhig don du gnyer/_/de lta mod kyis 'di ltar gyur cig rma bya rab dga'i 'jo sgeg ltar byed chu 'dzin dag ni dus su char 'be+ebs shing /_/sa gzhi rgyun du rab 'khrungs lo thog ljang gu'i gos dang ldan par byed gyur cig_/ngogs bzhin lus kyi tshogs gtam 'ga'
[\[252a.4\]]zhig dag tu gling gi rnam pa dang /_/'ga' zhig dag tu lus po bskyil ba'i 'khor lo dag tu 'khrul bar byed/_/'ga' zhig tu yang rgya mtsho'i chur bying zam pa dag dang mtshungs pa ste/_/klu yi tshogs rnams rgya mtsho chen por bde ba nyid du rol gyur cig_/gzhan yang khyod kyi grags pa 'di dag tsan dan dag gi nags
[\[252a.5\]]tshal 'dir ni klu yi na chung rnams/_/li khris byugs bzhin rab rdo nyi ma'i 'od zer reg pas 'gram pa dmar ba dang ldan zhing /_/skra yi tshogs pa rab 'dzin dgod pa'i ngal dub dag gis lus dman gdung ba mi rtsi bar/_/ting ting shag lhung blangs nas khu byug bzhin du shin tu rab snyan chags las sgogs gyur cig_/
[\[252a.6\]]rgud pa dang bral phrag dog med pa'i yid kyis legs byas rab tu rgyas byed cing /_/stug po'i gnyen 'dun grogs kyi tshogs kyis rab dga' skye dgu rnams ni dga' pya gyur cig_/thams cad song bar gyur ro/_/mtshan ma drug pa'o/_/klu kun du dga' ba zhes bya ba'i zlos gar dpal dga' ba'i lhas mdzad pa
[\[252a.7\]]rdzogs so//_//yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pas spras pa'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po dang /_dpon chen shAkya bzang po'i bka' lung gis/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po la k+Sh+mi kar dang bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shong ston gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//_//
